quotes.quote: We need to re-create boundaries. When you carry a digital gadget that creates a virtual link to the office, you need to create a virtual boundary that didn't exist before.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Many buy gadgets they don’t really need, with money they don’t have, for people they don’t actually care for, while infringing their corporeal and financial capacities, in order to pay doctors and psychiatrists.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: We cannot get grace from gadgets.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.quote: Do we have Steve Jobs to thank for the iPod and iPod shuffle? iTunes? I think so. He changed the way we hear and think about music.
quotes.author: John Taylor

quotes.quote: I'm not really gadget oriented. I'm not into technology or computers. I'm not good at interfacing with that sort of gear.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.quote: There are times when I have to take, I call it a 'silence bath,' where I shut off all of the external gadgets. I go walk around, talk to people, and just live life for a while.
quotes.author: Patton Oswalt

quotes.quote: Anyway, all these computers and digital gadgets are no good. They just fill your head with numbers and that can't be good for you.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: Cell phones, mobile e-mail, and all the other cool and slick gadgets can cause massive losses in our creative output and overall productivity.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: I have a lot of gadgets, remote controls for everything - the curtains, pool cover - it's like The Jetsons!
quotes.author: Romeo Miller

quotes.quote: I don't own a computer. I've never seen anything online at all - nothing. I don't own a word processor. I have none of that stuff. It's not an act of rebellion. I'm just not a gadget person.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Oh I love gadgets and I pride myself on keeping at the cutting edge of technology.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: Texting is not talking and a phone is not a friend.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Gadgets helps the solo, not the soul.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: What is so brilliant about the gadgets is their simplicity.
quotes.author: Desmond Llewelyn

quotes.quote: Using fake feelings and relying on a trick box of artificial gadgets in order to create a simulation of desire, will not unravel the knotty puzzle to reinvent oneself.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: There is no more discovery. Not since the beginning of this century. There are new gadgets. New important gadgets.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Godard

quotes.quote: I'm guilty of being fascinated by gadgets and toys and technology, but any penny that I spend, I try to make it be a part of what I do for a living. Because then you are forwarding. You are forwarding that art, forwarding that career ahead.
quotes.author: Jeff Dunham

quotes.quote: I've always been interested in gadgets and technology and I've always been a reader.
quotes.author: Levar Burton

quotes.quote: All these gadgets, the phone and the computer, they expose the inside of your brain in a way that's bad.
quotes.author: Michel Gondry

quotes.quote: Dreams about the future are always filled with gadgets.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Every great device, gadget, electric car, and robot would be even greater if batteries didn't suck so badly.
quotes.author: Steven Levy

quotes.quote: Man should never work for the machine, machine should work for the man.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Somewhere I read, if Apple is an school then Samsung is the brilliant student. In Indian market I can say that Micromax is the smartest student.
quotes.author: Anoop Raghav

quotes.quote: I'm kind of stupid when it comes to gadgets.
quotes.author: David Duchovny

quotes.quote: No computer, no gadget, no trickery. I am an animal, it is a plant. I will beat the weed!
quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

quotes.quote: For safety is not a gadget but a state of mind.
quotes.author: Eleanor Everest Freer

quotes.quote: A galaxy is composed of gas and dust and stars billions upon billions of stars. Every star may be a sun to someone.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: I am a being of Heaven and Earth, of thunder and lightning, of rain and wind, of the galaxies.
quotes.author: Eden Ahbez

quotes.quote: When you look at the stars and the galaxy, you feel that you are not just from any particular piece of land, but from the solar system.
quotes.author: Kalpana Chawla

quotes.quote: Space is big. You just won't believe how vastly, hugely, mind-bogglingly big it is.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The priceless galaxy of misinformation called the mind.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: The immense distances to the stars and the galaxies mean that we see everything ins pace int he past, some as they were before the Earth came to be. Telescopes are time machines.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: I had always seen myself as a star I wanted to be a galaxy.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: There may be aliens in our Milky Way galaxy, and there are billions of other galaxies. The probability is almost certain that there is life somewhere in space.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Our galaxy, the Milky Way, is one of 50 or 100 billion other galaxies in the universe. And with every step, every window that modern astrophysics has opened to our mind, the person who wants to feel like they're the center of everything ends up shrinking.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Who are we? We find that we live on an insignificant planet of a humdrum star lost in a galaxy tucked away in some forgotten corner of a universe in which there are far more galaxies than people.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Is it not careless to become too local when there are four hundred billion stars in our galaxy alone.
quotes.author: A. R. Ammons

quotes.quote: How can you look at the galaxy and not feel insignificant?
quotes.author: Ridley Scott

quotes.quote: Never apologize for burning too brightly or collapsing into yourself every night. That is how galaxies are made.
quotes.author: Tyler Kent White

quotes.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: There are at least as many galaxies in our observable universe as there are stars in our galaxy.
quotes.author: Martin Rees

quotes.quote: However alert we are, antiquity remains an unknown, unanticipated galaxy
quotes.author: Donald Hall

quotes.quote: Those freckles make you seem like a galaxy of stars, just waiting to be explored and loved.
quotes.author: Nikita Gill

quotes.quote: The dancing Sun the dancing moon the dancing stars and the dancing galaxies are the direct expression of our divine Self.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Our galaxy's pretty ordinary, garden-variety. So if we believe our galaxy has a super massive black hole, that tells us that most, if not all, galaxies host such a black hole at their centers.
quotes.author: Andrea M. Ghez

quotes.quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: They are at the end of the gallery; retired to their tea and scandal, according to their ancient custom.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: Galleries, and they're all the same, and rightly so, they sell work.
quotes.author: Kim Weston

quotes.quote: The whole world is an art gallery when you're mindful. There are beautiful things everywhere and they're free.
quotes.author: Charles Tart

quotes.quote: The gallery in which the reporters sit has become a fourth estate of the realm.
quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quotes.quote: Love the gallery, the arena of representation. It's a commercial world, and morality is based generally around economics, and that's taking place in the art gallery.
quotes.author: Jeff Koons

quotes.quote: There is more to representing art than selling art. The life of the gallery is dependent on the renewal and refreshment of its artists and dealers. When that stops happening, it's the end.
quotes.author: Arne Glimcher

quotes.quote: You never see what you want to see, forever playing to the gallery.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: In a gallery, there's an expectation of high prices and a somewhat elitist atmosphere.
quotes.author: Will Cotton

quotes.quote: The appeal all too often is to the gallery, hungry for sensation.
quotes.author: Otto Hermann Kahn

quotes.quote: Walking rapidly - or even slowly - through a gallery is equivalent to browsing through a bookstore and reading the blurbs.
quotes.author: Wendy Beckett

quotes.quote: The museum spreads its surfaces everywhere, and becomes an untitled collection of generalizations that mobilize the eye.
quotes.author: Robert Smithson

quotes.quote: Every museum is full of nice things. That's the opposite of before. It was important things or serious things. Now we have interesting things.
quotes.author: Gerhard Richter

quotes.quote: Real museums are places where time is transformed into Space.
quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

quotes.quote: That's why we have the Museum, to remind us of how we came, and why: to start fresh, and begin a new place from what we had learned and carried from the old.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: A museum is a place where nothing was lost, just rediscovered.
quotes.author: Nanette L. Avery

quotes.quote: Museums have a simple way to love their story and enjoy greatly to visit it.
quotes.author: Sirajuddin Jalil

quotes.quote: Museums are managers of consciousness. They give us an interpretation of history, of how to view the world and locate ourselves in it. They are, if you want to put it in positive terms, great educational institutions. If you want to put it in negative terms, they are propaganda machines.
quotes.author: Hans Haacke

quotes.quote: Museums should be places where you raise questions, not just show stuff.
quotes.author: William Thorsell

quotes.quote: The museum is to help people enjoy, understand, and use the visual arts of our time.
quotes.author: Alfred H. Barr, Jr.

quotes.quote: A museum is a place where one should lose one's head.
quotes.author: Renzo Piano

quotes.quote: The Museum is not meant either for the wanderer to see by accident or for the pilgrim to see with awe. It is meant for the mere slave of a routine of self- education to stuff himself with every sort of incongruous intellectual food in one indigestible meal.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: A museum has to renew its collection to be alive, but that does not mean we give on important old works.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Believe that when you go into a gallery or a museum, the most powerful pieces are the ones that don't have the words in the corner that distract you from the larger piece.
quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan

quotes.quote: Museums are not normally presenting the works on the walls as provocations to work. It's more like going to a Jacuzzi.
quotes.author: Hans Haacke

quotes.quote: Many museums are drawing audiences with art that is ostensibly more entertaining than stuff that just sits and invites contemplation. Interactivity, gizmos, eating, hanging out, things that make noise - all are now the norm, often edging out much else.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.quote: True luck consists not in holding the best of the cards at the table; luckiest is he who knows just when to rise and go home.
quotes.author: John Milton Hay

quotes.quote: In gambling the many must lose in order that the few may win.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The gambling interests like to point to the construction jobs, but those jobs go away.
quotes.author: John Warren Kindt

quotes.quote: The subject of gambling is all encompassing. It combines man's natural play instinct with his desire to know about his fate and his future.
quotes.author: Franz Rosenthal

quotes.quote: Victory is a fleeting thing in the gambling business. Today's winners are tomorrow's blinking toads, dumb beasts with no hope.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: I figure you have the same chance of winning the lottery whether you play or not.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: You bring in gambling into a major population base, and the more people you have going into a casino, the more people you have hooked on gambling.
quotes.author: John Warren Kindt

quotes.quote: At the gambling table, there are no fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Gambling has held human beings in thrall for millennia. It has been engaged in everywhere, from the dregs of society to the most respectable circles.
quotes.author: Peter L Bernstein

quotes.quote: If you must play, decide upon three things at the start: the rules of the game, the stakes, and the quitting time.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Gambling operates under the premise that greed can be satisfied by luck.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Gambling is not a vice, it is an expression of our humanness. We gamble. Some do it at the gaming table, some do not. You play, you win, you play, you lose. You play.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Gambling is the great leveller. All men are equal at cards.
quotes.author: Nikolai Gogol

quotes.quote: At gambling, the deadly sin is to mistake bad play for bad luck.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: The gambling supply house catalog is distinctly not the safest place to learn about cheating devices, beware of catalog men.
quotes.author: John Scarne

quotes.quote: Gambling makes boys selfish and cruel as well as men.
quotes.author: Thomas Hughes

quotes.quote: Gambling is entertainment. People go to casinos to be entertained.
quotes.author: Eric Schneiderman

quotes.quote: The gambling known as business looks with austere disfavor upon the business known as gambling.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Gambling is not as destructive as war or as boring as pornography. It is not as immoral as business or as suicidal as watching television. And the percentages are better than religion.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Gambling can turn into a dangerous two-way street when you least expect it. Weird things happen suddenly, and your life can go all to pieces.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: A Gentleman is a man who will pay his gambling debts even when he knows he has been cheated.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Gambling with cards or dice or stocks is all one thing. It's getting money without giving an equivalent for it.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: It's hard to walk away from a winning streak, even harder to leave the table when you're on a losing one.
quotes.author: Cara Bertoia

quotes.quote: I want people to understand, gambling is not a bad thing if you do it within the framework of what it's meant to be, which is fun and entertaining.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Gambling is an act of faith of gamblers. Prophecy is an act of faith of the saints.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Gambling is a disease of barbarians superficially civilized.
quotes.author: Dean Inge

quotes.quote: All gambling is the telling of a fortune, but of a monstrously depleted fortune, empty of everything save one numerical circumstance, shorn of all such richness as a voyage across the water, a fair man that loves you, a dark woman that means you harm.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Time spent in a casino is time given to death, a foretaste of the hour when one's flesh will be diverted to the purposes of the worm and not of the will.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Gambling is a principle inherent in human nature.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: By gaming we lose both our time and treasure: two things most precious to the life of man.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: Gambling: The sure way of getting nothing for something.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Some psychiatrists claim gambling is masochistic, that gamblers want to lose to punish themselves. Sure some do. Some People like to jump off the Empire State Building. But millions go up to look at the view.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: A gambler is someone who plays slot machines. I prefer to own slot machines.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: It's the risk I like about owning a casino. Some days you win, other days you win more.
quotes.author: Paul Lyons

quotes.quote: No use gambling if you can't lose your head once in a while.
quotes.author: Larry Merchant

quotes.quote: So the gambler, lest he should lose, does not stop losing.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: He was so sure he would lose that he had not played everything— as if to prolong the sensation of losing.
quotes.author: Andre Malraux

quotes.quote: They gambled with me for my heart with all kinds of games. They defeated me and took it away.
quotes.author: As-Sanawbari

quotes.quote: The solemn resolutions, which are nevertheless broken, never to do it again, the stupefying pleasure and the bad conscience which tells the subject he is ruining himself.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Bad beats haunt you like bad dreams.
quotes.author: Alvin Alvarez

quotes.quote: Show me a gambler and I'll show you a loser.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: To gamble is to risk, to approach 'the ruin factor.' When I was poor the ruin factor was not important. Hell, I was ruined anyway.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: I play in order to lose. That's what gets my juice going. If I only bet on the games I know, I could at least break even.
quotes.author: Axel Freed

quotes.quote: The games became burning lights on the floor of my withdrawal, and later, while I slept, there were poker chips falling through my dreams.
quotes.author: Jim Lewis

quotes.quote: My only worry about my husband's gambling is that he may lose.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: It is possible that a wise and good man may be prevailed on to gamble; but it is impossible that a professed gamester should be a wise and good man.
quotes.author: Lavater

quotes.quote: Some play for gain; to pass time others play; both play the fool; who gets byplay is loser in the end.
quotes.author: Heath

quotes.quote: Curst is the wretch enslaved to such a vice, who ventures life and soul upon the dice.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: All gaming, since it implies a desire to profit at the expense of others, involves a breach of the tenth commandment.
quotes.author: Whately

quotes.quote: Gambling houses are temples where the most sordid and turbulent passions contend; there no spectator can be indifferent. A card or a small square of ivory interests more than the loss of an empire, or the ruin of an unoffending group of infants and their nearest relatives.
quotes.author: Zimmermann

quotes.quote: Out of adultery comes murder, out of gambling comes thieving.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: In Texas it's not a question of gambling; it's a question of what time are we gambling. I mean, I grew up shooting dice.
quotes.author: Jackie Burke

quotes.quote: Life is a big gambling game. Some are born lucky and some are born unlucky.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: I have a notion that gamblers are as happy as most people, being always excited; women, wine, fame, the table, even ambition, sate now & then, but every turn of the card & cast of the dice keeps the gambler alive— besides one can game ten times longer than one can do anything else.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: There is no gambling like politics.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: I have no brief for gambling, nay / The notion I express / That money earned 's the only way / To pay for happiness. / With cards and dice I do not hold; / By betting I've been bit: / Conclusion: to get honest gold / You've got to sweat for it.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: To build a new way / That may lead, towards / The same outcome / So I dare not / I am afraid, / From such ones / It seems everyone is that / I cannot risk and bear / Such gambling again.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Quit while you're ahead. All the best gamblers do.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian y Morales

quotes.quote: The only sure thing about luck is that it will change.
quotes.author: Bret Harte

quotes.quote: The roulette table pays nobody / except him that keeps it./ Nevertheless a passion for gaming is common, / though a passion / for keeping roulette tables is unknown.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Luck, bad if not good, will always be with us. But it has a way of favoring the intelligent and showing its back to the stupid.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Remember this: The house doesn't beat the player. It just gives him the opportunity to beat himself.
quotes.author: Nicholas Dandolos

quotes.quote: There, inside the game's two-dimensional universe, life was simple: It's just you against the machine. Move with your left hand, shoot with your right, and try to stay alive as long as possible.
quotes.author: Ernest Cline

quotes.quote: When a Dragon, an Elf, and a Human walk into a bar, the Human is always going to be the punch line.
quotes.author: Bryan Fields

quotes.quote: Disengage,' she whispered, pulling the red tab on her wristband. Immediately Avery’s weapons were rendered inactive and she became invisible to everyone in the augmented reality game, able to do nothing except walk back to the staging room until she reactivated. It was like she wasn’t even there, like she’d suddenly erased herself. Which was exactly how she felt.
quotes.author: Katherine McGee

quotes.quote: On the one hand we have the playing mind—innovative, magical, boundless. On the other is the gaming mind—concentrated, determined, intelligent. And on the hand that holds them both together we have the notion of playing well.
quotes.author: Bernie DeKoven

quotes.quote: A group of adventurers is known as a "party," and not just because they like to celebrate their success together in the end. Your party should be as close to you as your family--assuming your family can cast spells, kill monsters, and bring you back from the edge of death.
quotes.author: Matt Forbeck

quotes.quote: To keep our minds and bodies healthy, we have to simulate those old ways in the midst of our modern, technological lives, where everything on the planet has already been hunted and gathered. Thankfully, the technology that created this problem also gave rise to its solution—a way for us modern city dwellers to exorcise our inner evolutionary demons: video games.
quotes.author: Ernest Cline

quotes.quote: Alright, go away. I have a tiny world to save.
quotes.author: Bryan Lee O'Malley

quotes.quote: Just like the notion of 'Internet natives', who have never known a world without Internet access, we, who have lived our entire lives with video games, can be known as 'video game natives'.
quotes.author: Alexei Maxim Russell

quotes.quote: A game is an opportunity to focus our energy, with relentless optimism, at something we’re good at (or getting better at) and enjoy. In other words, gameplay is the direct emotional opposite of depression.
quotes.author: Jane Mcgonigal

quotes.quote: I think it's fair to say most video games let players experience only eight emotions: anger, panic, dread, surprise, wonder, satisfaction, joy and disappointment. And some games only disappoint.
quotes.author: Scott Rogers

quotes.quote: Gamers always believe that an epic win is possible and that it's always worth trying and trying now.
quotes.author: Jane Mcgonigal

quotes.quote: I don't need to "get a life". I'm a gamer. I have lots of lives.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Gamers don't die, they respawn.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: I, as a gamer, understand passion to discuss favorite games.
quotes.author: Hidetaka Miyazaki

quotes.quote: I always thought being a gamer and someone who had a sense of responsibility to the game and to my teammates was the honorable thing.
quotes.author: Cal Ripken

quotes.quote: I don't want a gamer to feel like they have to commit their whole life to changing the world.
quotes.author: Jane Mcgonigal

quotes.quote: Gaming is one of those things that's pretty amazing because when you think about it, everybody wants to game; whether you're a casual gamer, or you're an enthusiast gamer, there's a large market for us.
quotes.author: Lisa Su

quotes.quote: As a gamer, I can't think of anything more annoying for everyone concerned than playing games in a shared living room.
quotes.author: Naomi Alderman

quotes.quote: Needless to say, nobody is born an avid gamer.
quotes.author: Satoru Iwata

quotes.quote: As a gamer, I like to go up and look at people's faces and see how good of a job they did.
quotes.author: Jim Lee

quotes.quote: To be champion requires more than simply being a strong player; one has to be a strong human being as well.
quotes.author: Anatoly Karpov

quotes.quote: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her: but once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cards in order to win the game.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The integrity of the game is everything.
quotes.author: Peter Ueberroth

quotes.quote: Only a gamer would jump at nothing to find a hidden block. But something tells me you're not just some gamer, but thee gamer.
quotes.author: Kevin Finn

quotes.quote: I know a lot of gamers out there who don't have much patience.
quotes.author: Suda 51

quotes.quote: They should get laid out, played out, you know / Set to gauge range, straight to you friend / Stretched out, gamers, played out, over-run / Stretching out a lot of nothing
quotes.author: Neneh Karlsson

quotes.quote: Chess, some hardest gamers, the world black as entertainment) / Your time is short, change your thought, rearrange your sports
quotes.author: Chris Smith

quotes.quote: Watch your (ah), I'm a gamer! / Free free free from material world
quotes.author: Sofia Achoun

quotes.quote: Every gamer relies on hardware. Like power plants or electricity, it's the foundation that makes gaming possible.
quotes.author: Tyler "Ninja" Blevins

quotes.quote: Believe me: there's nothing worse than knowing you lost a game because your equipment failed you.
quotes.author: Tyler "Ninja" Blevins

quotes.quote: Every choice is an opportunity to be the best player you can be.
quotes.author: Tyler "Ninja" Blevins

quotes.quote: A game is a playful, interactive goal- and rule-based with an established set of mechanics and an integrated feedback metric, in which players work toward solving problems and completing challenges.
quotes.author: Carly Finseth

quotes.quote: Virtual worlds are the product of game objects but are also shaped by the gamers themselves.
quotes.author: Routelge

quotes.quote: One of the most significant problem in discussing Gamergate, and the things it grew out of - such as internet and gaming culture - is that there are a lot of people that simply don't understand it. Any of it.
quotes.author: James Desborough

quotes.quote: A Gamer is an engaged, active, interested and knowledgeable member of the gaming community for whom gaming is a primary hobby.
quotes.author: James Desborough

quotes.quote: The difference between 'Gamer' and 'someone who plays games' is the same.
quotes.author: James Desborough

quotes.quote: Gamers are a core, reliable audience but also a critical one. One that knows the ins and outs of games.
quotes.author: James Desborough

quotes.quote: Without Gamers, the games industry in all its success and glory today could not exist.
quotes.author: James Desborough

quotes.quote: Play is inherent to who we are as humans. Through play we have entertained, expressed, taught, socialized, and competed since before recorded history.
quotes.author: Meagan Marie

quotes.quote: Video games can no longer be thought of as little more than meaningless distractions designed to fill the playtime of children.
quotes.author: Richard Abanes

quotes.quote: As one gamer eloquently expressed it, video games 'are a great escape from a bland reality, a way to stimulate your mind and relax your soul in colorful, distant worlds that the talented minds of the creators have conceived.'
quotes.author: Richard Abanes

quotes.quote: Video games are therefore understood as an expression of life and culture in the late modernity.
quotes.author: Daniel Muriel

quotes.quote: The culture of gaming is characterized by a shared sense of identity among the majority of industry participants.
quotes.author: Library of Congress Cataloguing-in-Publication Data

quotes.quote: It was rather difficult to throw a game when you had no idea what you were doing to win it in the first place.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: We do not stop playing because we grow old. We grow old because we stop playing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: There are at least two kinds of games. One could be called finite, the other infinite. A finite game is played for the purpose of winning, an infinite game for the purpose of continuing the play.
quotes.author: James P. Carse

quotes.quote: It is in games that many men discover their paradise.
quotes.author: Robert Wilson Lynd

quotes.quote: At the games end we shall see who gaines.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: All games contain the idea of death.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: You never win any games you don't play.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: To play a good game, you need a few players.
quotes.author: R.J. Torbert

quotes.quote: If all the year were playing holidays, to sport would be as tedious as to work.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: For a game, you don't need a teacher.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Games are all about taking risks.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: A play visibly represents pure existing.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: Games give you a chance to excel, and if you're playing in good company you don't even mind if you lose because you had the enjoyment of the company during the course of the game.
quotes.author: Gary Gygax

quotes.quote: Life is a game. We must keep playing the game. The more we play, the more we will understand the game of life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Games in hand are a good thing only if you win them.
quotes.author: Patrick Marleau

quotes.quote: Games are the only force in the known universe that can get people to take actions against their self-interest, in a predictable way, without using force.
quotes.author: Gabe Zichermann

quotes.quote: Life is more fun if you play games.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: By playing games you can artificially speed up your learning curve to develop the right kind of thought processes.
quotes.author: Nate Silver

quotes.quote: In order to fully realize how bad a popular play can be, it is necessary to see it twice.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Whatever games are played with us, we must play no games with ourselves, but deal in our privacy with the last honesty and truth.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Games shouldn't only be fun. They should teach or spark an interest in other things.
quotes.author: Hideo Kojima

quotes.quote: Games are the most elevated form of investigation.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There's a difference between fair game and playing games.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Never play cat and mouse games if you're a mouse.
quotes.author: Don Addis

quotes.quote: There are games in which it is better to lose than win.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: You play games with people's lives.You forget that they are fragile.
quotes.author: Patricia Briggs

quotes.quote: The more games you coach, the more comfortable you feel.
quotes.author: Scott Brooks

quotes.quote: There are only three sports: mountain climbing, bull fighting, and motor racing. All the rest are merely games.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: All games are meaningless if you do not know the rules.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: If you must play, decide upon three things at the start: the rules of the game, the stakes, and the quitting time.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Games are nature's most beautiful creation.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: Games lubricate the body and mind.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A delayed game is eventually good, a bad game is bad forever.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.quote: The game itself is bigger than the winning.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Games are a compromise between intimacy and keeping intimacy away.
quotes.author: Eric Berne

quotes.quote: Men may trifle their business and their politics, but they never trifle with their games.
quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A well-adjusted person is one who can play golf and bridge as if they were games.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If you watch a game, it's fun; if you play it, it's recreation; if you work at it, it's golf.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: What some people enjoy most about table tennis is stepping on the ball.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Life is the game that must be played.
quotes.author: Edwin Arlington Robinson

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: If he is to become a ball player, he must learn the rules of the game. And, contrary to popular thinking, children appreciate rules.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: When you're in a high-pressure situation and the game is on the line, and everyone is watching you, remember to smile, have fun, and enjoy it. Life is short; you only live once. You have nothing to lost. Seize the moment.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: The great fallacy is that the game is first and last about winning. It's nothing of the kind. The game is about glory. It is about doing things in style, with a flourish, about going out and beating the other lot, not waiting for them to die of boredom.
quotes.author: Danny Blanchflower

quotes.quote: But war's a game, which, were their subjects wise, Kings would not play at.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: The game,' said he, 'is never lost till won.'
quotes.author: Gretna Green

quotes.quote: Battledore and shuttlecock's a very good game, when you an't the shuttlecock and two lawyers the battledores, in which case it gets too exciting to be pleasant.
quotes.author: Mr. Weller

quotes.quote: Video games are therefore understood as an expression of life and culture in the late modernity.
quotes.author: Daniel Muriel

quotes.quote: I've missed 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: A baseball game is twice as much fun if you're seeing it on the company's time.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: All I know is that the way we're hitting, sick people are getting out of bed and wanting to pitch against us.
quotes.author: Bob Lemon

quotes.quote: Whenever you lose, there's going to be criticism. That's why they invented talk radio.
quotes.author: Rudy Tomjanovich

quotes.quote: Cricket: A game which the English, not being a spiritual people, have invented in order to give themselves some conception of eternity.
quotes.author: Stormont Mancroft

quotes.quote: Promising golfer: Any younger player who listens attentively to your advice and nods his head in agreement.
quotes.author: Martin Ragaway

quotes.quote: Long game: Shots where considerable distance is important. A match you are hopelessly losing is a very long game.
quotes.author: Martin Ragaway

quotes.quote: The Sport of Archery: What Is Archery? Archery Lessons On How to Make a Bow & Arrow, the History of Archery, Best Archery Equipment and Tips On Hitting the Target.
quotes.author: Andrew Harrison

quotes.quote: Forsake your lov'd Olympian games awhile, With which the tedious minutes you beguile, Wave quoits and nine-pins, those bear-garden sports, And follow shooting, often used at courts.
quotes.author: Joseph Strutt

quotes.quote: To paly the game is great, to win the game is greater, but to love the game is the greatest of all.
quotes.author: Palestra Palque

quotes.quote: You can't take ghosts from last night's game into the next day. In baseball, if you can't turn the page and get to the next game, you're going to be in trouble.
quotes.author: Mike Scioscia

quotes.quote: Five seconds left in the game. Four left in the game. Do you believe in miracles? Yes! Unbelievable!
quotes.author: Al Michaels

quotes.quote: Basketball's highest level comes down to one question: Can you make the choice that your happiness can come from someone else's success?
quotes.author: Bill Walton

quotes.quote: Play is inherent to who we are as humans. Through play we have entertained, expressed, taught, socialized, and competed since before recorded history.
quotes.author: Meagan Marie

quotes.quote: Sport for me, and specifically cricket these days, is the avenue I've found to provide personal meaning and purpose, without it defining me.
quotes.author: Ellyse Perry

quotes.quote: Gamesmanship has now become an acceptable part of modern sport.
quotes.author: John Honeybourne

quotes.quote: Video games are therefore understood as an expression of life and culture in the late modernity.
quotes.author: Daniel Muriel

quotes.quote: A game is a playful, interactive goal- and rule-based with an established set of mechanics and an integrated feedback metric, in which players work toward solving problems and completing challenges.
quotes.author: Carly Finseth

quotes.quote: In the cases of both happiness and aesthetics in football, it is plausible that this unexpected structure is exhibited.
quotes.author: Stephen Mumford

quotes.quote: The philosophy of win at all costs also produces what is ugly in football.
quotes.author: Stephen Mumford

quotes.quote: Some people rent clubs until they're sure the game of golf agrees with them. For a real bargain, you can often wait around the eighteenth green and pick up a set cheap from a guy who is just giving up the game.
quotes.author: Joe James

quotes.quote: Free will and determinism are like a game of cards. The hand that is dealt you represents determinism. The way you play your hand represents free will.
quotes.author: Robert Arp

quotes.quote: Games also posses so many different characteristics that many approaches are possible.
quotes.author: Roger Caillois

quotes.quote: Archery is the game that involves the shooting of arrows that is released from the bow and shot at a target.
quotes.author: Andrew Harrison

quotes.quote: Video games can no longer be thought of as little more than meaningless distractions designed to fill the playtime of children.
quotes.author: Richard Abanes

quotes.quote: As one gamer eloquently expressed it, video games 'are a great escape from a bland reality, a way to stimulate your mind and relax your soul in colorful, distant worlds that the talented minds of the creators have conceived.'
quotes.author: Richard Abanes

quotes.quote: Long did he live the honor of the bow, And his long life to that alone did owe ; But how can art secure, or what can save Extreme old age from an appointed grave? Surviving archers much his loss lament, And in respect bestowed this monument, Where whistling arrows did his worth proclaim, And eternize his memory and name.
quotes.author: Joseph Strutt

quotes.quote: Although versatility, adaptability and the ability to perform under pressure are all valuable assets, players with a strong foundation of core cricket skills have a better chance of success in all forms of the game.
quotes.author: Frank Pyke

quotes.quote: Each sport has its great ones; cricket seems to have them in abundance. And when we talk of cricket's heroes, we talk not just of runs and wickets, but--much more significantly.
quotes.author: Geoff Armstrong

quotes.quote: Playing around offers plenty of challenges--such as figuring out how to dominate in Tic-tac Toe or the best way to bean your buddy with a dodgeball.
quotes.author: Ben Applebaum

quotes.quote: For many kids, dodgeball isn't a game: It's revenge. It's their chance to settle a score in a legitimate fashion.
quotes.author: Julia Scheeres

quotes.quote: In truth, a number of the players really resented some of the young black cricketers being promoted.
quotes.author: Tatenda Taibu

quotes.quote: Cricket--a sport with passionate fans across several continents-- was a natural fit.
quotes.author: Geoff Armstrong

quotes.quote: If a man possesses any good qualities, cricket will most surely develop them. It is a game which calls constantly for little acts of courtesy and self-denial, and no one who plays it can help feeling the better for its influence.
quotes.author: Cassell's Saturday Journal

quotes.quote: Crowds too can show sportsmanship by applauding good play by both teams, keeping quiet when players take penalties and accepting referees' decisions.
quotes.author: John Honeybourne

quotes.quote: Personal integrity leads to good sportsmanship.
quotes.author: Mary Mueller

quotes.quote: Self-control when facing trouble also shows good sportsmanship.
quotes.author: Mary Mueller

quotes.quote: Apparently my street has a leaf blower gang who tag team all day, so the sounds of the leaf blower are forever blowing from dawn to dusk.
quotes.author: Bob Saget

quotes.quote: I think we have always had a fascination for gangs and gangsters, and I think we always will.
quotes.author: Ross Kemp

quotes.quote: I suppose if a band is like a gang, it is a moment in time.
quotes.author: Roddy Woomble

quotes.quote: It is kind of weird being the last gang in town.
quotes.author: Steve Diggle

quotes.quote: All the gang of those who rule us Hope our quarrels never stop Helping them to split and fool us So they can remain on top.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: We're this big melting pot, but someone turned up the heat too high, and the stew started to burn. Gangs, crime, fights, and fear are now a regular part of our local stew.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: A general loathing of a gang or sect usually has some sound basis in instinct.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: A team is where a boy can prove his courage on his own. A gang is where a coward goes to hide.
quotes.author: Mickey Mantle

quotes.quote: Gangs are a group reaction to helplessness.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Every city in the world always has a gang, a street gang, or the so-called outcasts.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: A demagogue is a person with whom we disagree as to which gang should mismanage the country.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: I was raised inside the gang culture.
quotes.author: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.quote: Shootouts are not gunfights of honor, they're gang wars and racial riots.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.quote: If you want to be in with a gang then you have to go along with hiding people's things.
quotes.author: Louise Burfitt-Dons

quotes.quote: Even gang members imagine a future that doesnt include gangs.
quotes.author: Greg Boyle

quotes.quote: They travel best in gangs, hanging around like clumps of bananas, thick skinned and yellow.
quotes.author: Neil Kinnock

quotes.quote: These were neighborhoods where nearly half the population didn't work, where crime and gang activity were said to be entrenched, where the welfare rolls and were swollen.
quotes.author: Sudhir Venkatesh

quotes.quote: Gangs undeniably commit crimes and are menace to every citizen; issues are increasingly changing and impactful.
quotes.author: Robert Matthew Brzenchek

quotes.quote: The age-old question on why someone would join a gang started when caveman banded together to hunt, gather, and protect.
quotes.author: Robert Matthew Brzenchek

quotes.quote: Gangs are part of the rich and storied history of New York, with numerous street gangs vying for territory in the various neighborhoods and cultural subsets of the city.
quotes.author: Robert Matthew Brzenchek

quotes.quote: The basic creed of the gangster, and for that matter of any other type of criminal, is that whatever a man has is his only so long as he can keep it, and that the one who takes it away from him has not done anything wrong, but has merely demonstrated his smartness.
quotes.author: Herbert Asbury

quotes.quote: Gangster was a stupid roughneck born in filth and squalor and reared amid vice and corruption. He fulfilled his natural destiny.
quotes.author: Herbert Asbury

quotes.quote: To define gangs and gang activities, we must consider both the sociological and the social contexts of the meaning of gangs.
quotes.author: William Sanders

quotes.quote: Claiming territory and fighting over territory with groups who did likewise was also part of what define as gangs.
quotes.author: William Sanders

quotes.quote: To simplify--and I believe accurately portray--the level of violence needed to define a gang, I propose that for a group to be a gang, it must use deadly force.
quotes.author: William Sanders

quotes.quote: If a group is willing to use enough violence to kill others, whether in defense or in aggression, then it should be considered a gang.
quotes.author: William Sanders

quotes.quote: The continued repression of gangs through the profiling of gang members in schools and in criminal justice only makes them stronger.
quotes.author: Robert Garot

quotes.quote: Activities within the gang, according to Thrasher, were diverse and motivated by typical youthful concerns, such as thrills and excitement.
quotes.author: Steve Decker

quotes.quote: Violence is a regular part of the gang life, and gang members are unafraid to use it or receive it.
quotes.author: Steve Decker

quotes.quote: Violence also serves to reinforce the solidarity among gang members and accentuate the boundaries between gang and nongang members.
quotes.author: Steve Decker

quotes.quote: Being identified as a gang member restricted opportunities that were available to nongang members.
quotes.author: Steve Decker

quotes.quote: Gang members become further marginalized because their membership poses a threat to other family members, schools, neighbors, and social institutions.
quotes.author: Steve Decker

quotes.quote: When you mix broken families and gangster culture with poverty, cartels and impunity, it is a lethal cocktail.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: In communities scarred with violence, many don't know what peace looks like.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: Teenagers in Brazilian favelas, Jamaican garrisons and Honduran slums see these crime wars as a natural state of affairs.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: Gangster warlords nurture their culture, their pseudo religion, and their rhetoric of fighting for the poor.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: A true gangster can smell out a person's strengths and weaknesses in a matter of minutes, but what they can sense most of all, what their bodies are most attuned to, is the scent of fear.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: The older you get, the deadlier you have to be and you use age to your advantage. You make it a strength. Most of us are more dangerous the longer we live. If we didn't care about dying when we were young, we're not going to be too concerned about it when we have two feet in our grave.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: Like many executives in the corporate world, a gangster is consumed with an insatiable desire to possess what belongs to someone else.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: Mobsters are not satisfies with a mere Wall Street-backed takeover, no matter how lucrative. They will not rest until they live to see their opponent buried.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: A gangster's survival depended not on the destruction of his enemies but on the strength of his allies.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: A gangster who does not want to stop living life gangster will not stop living life gangster.
quotes.author: G.A. Global Services Inc. Fellowship Approved

quotes.quote: One historian has also described New York as having a 'gangster era' of municipal government in the late 1800s when 'elections were decided by repeat voters and poll-box smashers, by the intimidation and beating of citizens before they could cast their votes.
quotes.author: K. Hirschfeld

quotes.quote: Political gangsterism and kleptocracy are also readily visible in the 20th century histories of Cuba's closest neighbors.
quotes.author: K. Hirschfeld

quotes.quote: My role model were gangsters, criminals, drug dealers, and my father made me a wise guy. My mother was the only thing sane in my life.
quotes.author: Paul Tully

quotes.quote: The lawyer with the briefcase can steal more money than the man with the gun.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: A true gangster can smell out a person's strenghts and weaknesses in a matter of minutes, but what they can sense most of all, what their bodies are most attuned to, is the scent of fear.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: The Italian gangster thing has become a form of the modern-day Western.
quotes.author: Armand Assante

quotes.quote: Gangsters lived in the neighborhood. They weren't apart from it. Their relationships with people were both benevolent and scary.
quotes.author: Ruby Dee

quotes.quote: A gangster must always be prepared to kill a friend. It is one of the many open secrets of the business, since it is the truest test of his ability to rule and command the respect of his crew.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: Playing the game, and unfortunately, playing the gangster game is very profitable.
quotes.author: Quincy Jones

quotes.quote: Gangsta rappers can't fight, so they rap about guns.
quotes.author: Sean Price

quotes.quote: You can get much farther with a kind word and a gun than you can with a kind word alone.
quotes.author: Al Capone

quotes.quote: Everybody's a gangster until a gangster walks in the room.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A team is where a boy can prove his courage on his own. A gang is where a coward goes to hide.
quotes.author: Mickey Mantle

quotes.quote: Isolation from power makes men look for a mob in which they can be strong.
quotes.author: Herbert Gold

quotes.quote: War is a thug's game. The thug strikes first and harder. He doesn't go by rules and he isn't afraid of hurting people.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Any distraction tends to get in the way of being an effective gangster.
quotes.author: Terence Winter

quotes.quote: Shoot first, ask questions last. That's how these so called gangsta's last.
quotes.author: Waka Flocka Flame

quotes.quote: It is a rule of law alone which hinders the rulers from turning themselves into the worst gangsters.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: No gangster is ever happy when he's at peace. The main reason he's in the business is to eliminate his enemies.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: The Mafia exists in the American imagination because we want it to exist.
quotes.author: Pete Hamill

quotes.quote: Everybody who comes from the gangster life - they want what that man in the suburbs wants. Nice family. Nice house. Nice cars. Bills paid. Kids in school. Food on the table. Nothing more.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.quote: The Mafia is a question every time an Italian raises his head.
quotes.author: Mario Cuomo

quotes.quote: The gangster is the man of the city, with the city's language and knowledge, with its queer and dishonest skills and its terrible daring, carrying his life in his hands like a placard, like a club.
quotes.author: Robert Warshow

quotes.quote: The classy gangster is a Hollywood invention.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: The only difference between the Government & the Mafia is that the Mafia actually turns a profit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every man is a mob, a chain gang of idiots.
quotes.author: Jonathan Nolan

quotes.quote: The lawyer with the briefcase can steal more money than the man with the gun.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Every human being has a bit of gangster in him
quotes.author: Binyavanga Wainaina

quotes.quote: When you're a kid and you see gangsters living the life, you kind of want to be like that.
quotes.author: Jaume Collet-Serra

quotes.quote: Even gang members imagine a future that doesn't include gangs.
quotes.author: Greg Boyle

quotes.quote: Mafia is the best example of capitalism we have
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: A thug only understands you when you speak his language
quotes.author: Alexander Lukashenko

quotes.quote: The mob is man voluntarily descending to the nature of the beast.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A street thug and a paid killer are professionals - beasts of prey, if you will, who have dissociated themselves from the rest of humanity and can now see human beings in the same way that trout fishermen see trout.
quotes.author: Willard Gaylin

quotes.quote: The effect of a gangster film is to embody this dilemma in the person of the gangster and resolve it by his death...not ours.
quotes.author: Robert Warshaw

quotes.quote: A gangster doesn't think of himself a hustler, I assume he thinks of himself as a businessman.
quotes.author: Delroy Lindo

quotes.quote: He ain't a gangster, he's a real old time desperado. Gangsters is foreign, he's an American.
quotes.author: Charley Grapewin

quotes.quote: You think I care about the money? I only care about makin' people do what I tell `em.
quotes.author: Eduardo Ciannelli

quotes.quote: I didn't have to pour it on— but I wanted a reputation. I wanted to be known as the smartest, youngest, and toughest hood.
quotes.author: Morris Rudensky

quotes.quote: It's hard to tell whether there is more guns or flowers at a gangster's funeral. I would rather have the undertaker's privilege with some high-class gang, than to have a seat on the Stock Exchange.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The gangster was no social bandit engaged engaged in the redistribution of wealth, but the underworld society epitomized by the term 'Chicago Gangster' had some role, romanticized or not, to play in a period before the state apparatus of the social welfare contract was put in place in the immediate prewar and postwar years.
quotes.author: Andrew Ross

quotes.quote: Gangster warfare has ravaged the Americas, paradoxically when my nations appeared to be getting freer and wealthier.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: Perhaps it is a combination of factors. When you mix broken families and gangster cultre with poverty, cartels, and impunity, it is a lethal cocktail.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: We white people are merely modified Thugs; Thugs fretting under the restraints of a not very thick skin of civilization.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A mob is a monster with heads enough, but no heart, and little brains.
quotes.author: Cardinal de Rez

quotes.quote: Every numerous assembly is a mob; everything there depends on instantaneous turns.
quotes.author: Cardinal de Rez

quotes.quote: A mob is the scum that rises upmost when the nation boils.
quotes.author: Dryden

quotes.quote: The mob is a sort of bear, while your ring is through is nose, it will even dance under your cudgel; but should the ring slip, and you lose your hold, the brute will turn and rend you.
quotes.author: Jane Porter

quotes.quote: A crowd always think with its sympathy, never with its reason.
quotes.author: W.R. Alger

quotes.quote: The multitude unawed is insolent; once seized with fear, contemptible and vain.
quotes.author: Mallet

quotes.quote: Passion may not unfitly be termed the mob of the man, that commits a riot on his reason.
quotes.author: Penn

quotes.quote: They feared me because I feared Nothing.
quotes.author: Lydia Lunch

quotes.quote: When you understand the mechanics of stress and master the techniques to manipulate someone's fears and dreams, you will be powerful.
quotes.author: Gregory Hartley

quotes.quote: Cuz even a gangsta rapper can find redemption / For the sins committed before revelation.
quotes.author: Carlos Salinas

quotes.quote: It's always better to like a gangster from a distance anyway. Like a tiger cub in a cage. They always look soft and cute and warm behind those iron bars. Everybody's happy, smiling, waving, taking pictures. But you take away those bars and all that goes away. All that's left is the fear.”
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: In my world, of course, it don't matter. You could be a gangster with a dress, you could be a gangster with baggy pants.
quotes.author: Young Thug

quotes.quote: If you want street fight, let's go. If you want boxing, I show you. But people think I am, like, gangster. No. Ring is different world. Very dangerous.
quotes.author: Gennady Golovkin

quotes.quote: The great nations have always acted like gangsters, and the small nations like prostitutes.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.quote: A lot of my friends are gangsters. Not like gangsters - well, yeah, all sorts of levels of criminality - but not the types that are preying on innocent people. I have no interest in the type of criminality that has no respect for collateral damage.
quotes.author: Charlie Hunnam

quotes.quote: I would just as soon listen to a gangster lecture on honesty as watch Hollywood portray the Bible.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Everybody needs love. There are a lot of guys that you think are hard-core gangsters, but all these guys' weaknesses are women. Look at the movie Scarface. At the end of the day, all he wanted to do was to have kids with his woman.
quotes.author: Master P

quotes.quote: A lot of these kids have no fathers, and they want to be gangsters. They don't believe in God and have no faith in anything but their own instincts. Boxing provides a way for them to express themselves in a positive way, and I'm happy to be able to help them.
quotes.author: Bobby Slayton

quotes.quote: Gun control? It's the best thing you can do for crooks and gangsters. I want you to have nothing. I'm a bad guy; I'm always gonna have a gun. Safety locks? You will pull the trigger with a lock on, and I'll pull the trigger. We'll see who wins.
quotes.author: Sammy Gravano

quotes.quote: A well-read gangster is still a gangster.
quotes.author: Doris Hursley

quotes.quote: Just don't raise them to be gangsters. Because to be a gangster is a foolish way to live.
quotes.author: Minoru Inuzuka

quotes.quote: Gangsters are not nearly so frightening as you'd think. Some of them are quite ordinary looking.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: If gangsters look like gangsters, the police would soon get after them.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Gangsters: they act like big men, until they turn into rats.
quotes.author: Alan Burnett

quotes.quote: Once a gangster, always a gangster.
quotes.author: Gary Glasberg

quotes.quote: The spirit of Pancasilla Youth - which people accuse of being gangsters - Gangsters are people who work outside the system - not for the government.
quotes.author: Joshua Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: The word "gangster" comes from 'free men'.
quotes.author: Joshua Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: Gangsters can create both security and riots.
quotes.author: Joshua Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: Gangsters don't look like gangsters anymore - they look like businessmen.
quotes.author: Dean Riesner

quotes.quote: There'll always be cops like there'll always be gangsters.	There'll always be cops like there'll always be gangsters.
quotes.author: Jonathan Nolan

quotes.quote: You need more than guts to be a good gangster. You need ideas.
quotes.author: Paulo Lins

quotes.quote: Make up your mind to be a cop, not a gangster with a badge.
quotes.author: A.I. Bezzerides

quotes.quote: All institutions of the American government are essentially a gangster syndicate; and everybody knows this.
quotes.author: Francis Richard Conolly

quotes.quote: We need reliable candidates with solid military backgrounds or good social skills. Taking on wannabe gangsters will turn us into a bunch of thugs.
quotes.author: Sang-yoon Lim

quotes.quote: When you mix broken families and gangster culture with poverty, cartels and impunity, it is a lethal cocktail.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: In communities scarred with violence, many don't know what peace looks like.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: Teenagers in Brazilian favelas, jamaican garrisons and honduran slums see these crime wars as a natural state of affairs.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: Gangster warlords nurture their culture, their pseudo religion, and their rhetoric of fighting for the poor.
quotes.author: Ioan Grillo

quotes.quote: A gangster who does not want to stop living life gangster will not stop living life gangster.
quotes.author: G.A. Global Services Inc. Fellowship Approved

quotes.quote: One historian has also described New York as having a 'gangster era' of municipal government in the late 1800s when 'elections were decided by repeat voters and poll-box smashers, by the intimidation and beating of citizens before they could cast their votes.
quotes.author: K. Hirschfeld

quotes.quote: Political gangsterism and kleptocracy are also readily visible in the 20th century histories of Cuba's closest neighbors.
quotes.author: K. Hirschfeld

quotes.quote: Can you ever trust a cop to make real deal with a gangster? The answer is no. A cop is a cop.
quotes.author: Arturo Rossenaldo Romero DeLeone

quotes.quote: If you are going to snitch on a brother and be protected by cops, you are making a mistake which can cost you your freedom.
quotes.author: Arturo Rossenaldo Romero DeLeone

quotes.quote: Gangster Lean, Gangster Lean / Is he the baddest dude you ever seen? / Three piece suits, complete with a diamond ring.
quotes.author: Arturo Rossenaldo Romero DeLeone

quotes.quote: He is a really nice guy, gives money to the poor / Thanks heaven above for even more / He does not hurt anyone because he so cool / But don't get him wrong / he is nobody's fool.
quotes.author: Arturo Rossenaldo Romero DeLeone

quotes.quote: Catch him if you can, if you are so mean / Never leaves tracks because he is not in that seen / He makes the get away so complete / always so clean / Do you really know the Gangster Lean.
quotes.author: Arturo Rossenaldo Romero DeLeone

quotes.quote: My role model were gangsters, criminals, drug dealers, and my father made me a wise guy. My mother was the only thing sane in my life.
quotes.author: Paul Tully

quotes.quote: The lawyer with the briefcase can steal more money than the man with the gun.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: A true gangster can smell out a person's strengths and weaknesses in a matter of minutes, but what they can sense most of all, what their bodies are most attuned to, is the scent of fear.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: The older you get, the deadlier you have to be and you use age to your advantage. You make it a strength. Most of us are more dangerous the longer we live. If we didn't care about dying when we were young, we're not going to be too concerned about it when we have two feet in our grave.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: Like many executives in the corporate world, a gangster is consumed with an insatiable desire to possess what belongs to someone else.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: Mobsters are not satisfies with a mere Wall Street-backed takeover, no matter how lucrative. They will not rest until they live to see their opponent buried.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: A gangster's survival depended not on the destruction of his enemies but on the strength of his allies.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Carcaterra

quotes.quote: The Gangster has a secret identity, just like Superman, except that I never could understand why Superman needed a secret identify.
quotes.author: Gangster of Love

quotes.quote: Cuz even a gangsta rapper can find redemption for the sins committed before revelation.
quotes.author: Carlos Salinas

quotes.quote: Members of every major street gang, outlaw biker, and domestic extremist group have been found in a number of military branches.
quotes.author: Carter F. Smith

quotes.quote: Only God can judge me.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: There are only murderers in this room! Michael! Open your eyes! This is the life we chose, the life we lead. And there is only one guarantee: none of us will see heaven.
quotes.author: John Rooney

quotes.quote: I don’t wanna be a product of my environment. I want my environment to be a product of me.
quotes.author: Frank Costello

quotes.quote: Somebody messes with me, I’m gonna mess with him.
quotes.author: Al Capone

quotes.quote: I’m gonna make him an offer he can’t refuse.
quotes.author: Vito Corleone

quotes.quote: Two little mice fell in a bucket of cream. The first mouse quickly gave up and drowned. The second mouse, wouldn’t quit. He struggled so hard that eventually he churned that cream into butter and crawled out. Gentlemen, as of this moment, I am that second mouse.
quotes.author: Frank Abagnale

quotes.quote: The loudest one in the room is the weakest one in the room.
quotes.author: Frank Lucas

quotes.quote: There’s no such thing as good money or bad money. There’s just money.
quotes.author: Lucky Luciano

quotes.quote: All I have in this world is my balls and my word, and I don’t break them for no one.
quotes.author: Tony Montana

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close but your enemies closer.
quotes.author: Michael Corleone

quotes.quote: I asked god for a bike, but I know god doesn’t work that way. So I stole a bike and asked for forgiveness.
quotes.author: Al Pacino

quotes.quote: And remember, where you have a concentration of power in a few hands, all too frequently men with the mentality of gangsters get control. History has proven that.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.quote: I think we have always had a fascination for gangs and gangsters, and I think we always will.
quotes.author: Ross Kemp

quotes.quote: Let me say for the record, I am not a gangster and never have been. I`m not the thief who grabs your purse. I`m not the guy who jacks your car. I`m not down with the people who steal and hurt others. I`m just a brother who fight back.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Americans accept that gangsters are running the government.
quotes.author: Tim Robbins

quotes.quote: I never lie because I don’t fear anyone. You only lie when you’re afraid.
quotes.author: John Gotti

quotes.quote: Power wears out those who don’t have it.
quotes.author: Giulio Andreotti

quotes.quote: There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Garages, barns and attics are always older than the buildings to which they are attached.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: The garage is the space for the hacker, the tinkerer, the maker. The garage is not defined by a single field or industry; instead, it is defined by the eclectic interests of its inhabitants. It is a space where intellectual networks converge.
quotes.author: Steven Johnson

quotes.quote: The slogan of progress is changing from the full dinner pail to the full garage.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Bulletin boards are sort of the garage bands of cyberspace.
quotes.author: Mitch Kapor

quotes.quote: It's always consoling to know that today's Christmas gifts are tomorrow's garage sales.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Walking isn't a lost art â€” one must, by some means, get to the garage.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Your body is the garage where you park your soul.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Give a man a car of his own and he leaves humility and common sense behind him in the garage.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: I went to a garage sale. How much for the garage? It's not for sale.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Many of the big changes of the next 25 years will come from unknowns working in their bedrooms and garages.
quotes.author: Charles Leadbeater

quotes.quote: Going to church doesn't make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: A 50-year-old company can innovate as well as two guys/gals in a garage.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Take care of your car in the garage, and the car will take care of you on the road.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Ferrari used to be the car that you kept in your garage, took out to polish and show, and put back into the garage.
quotes.author: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo

quotes.quote: Out there in some garage is an entrepreneur who's forging a bullet with your company's name on it.
quotes.author: Gary Hamel

quotes.quote: The modern idea of home has been well expressed as the place one goes from the garage.
quotes.author: George Wickersham

quotes.quote: Refrigerators are good for keeping homemade moonshine less gross. Freezers are good for keeping rattlesnakes less angry. Garages are good to hide in when your wife finds either.
quotes.author: Jenny Lawson

quotes.quote: If inflation continues, the two-car garage will be replaced by the two-family garage.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: This is what entrepreneurship is all about. You start off operating from a garage. And, end up, operating from a car.
quotes.author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

quotes.quote: Funny how a wife can spot a blonde hair at twenty yards, yet miss the garage doors.
quotes.author: Corey Ford

quotes.quote: Asking a seamstress to mend is like asking Michelangelo to paint your garage.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Opposite our local funeral parlor is a garage promising 'new wings fitted.'
quotes.author: Alison Chambers

quotes.quote: Wow, you go to a garage sale and you wonder who buys all that crap.
quotes.author: Oswald Lee Harvey

quotes.quote: Woz and I started Apple in my parent's garage when I was 20. We worked hard, and in 10 years Apple had grown from just the two of us in a garage into a $2 billion company with over 4,000 employees.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Protect your home: Close and lock garage doors.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: After you and your spouse achieve the American dream of a house and two cars in a two-car garage, now comes the hard part: keeping your relationship together because you don't need each other as much.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: In Pontiac, Michigan, GM executive parking garages are heated, while the poor guys who work in the plant freeze their tails off walking to work in the snow. It costs $140,000 a year to heat one parking garage. I'd shut that thing down. It has nothing to do with cars.
quotes.author: H. Ross Perot

quotes.quote: Going to church doesn't make a person Christian any more than going to a garage makes a person a car.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: We ride good but we get out of wind walking to the garage.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The car lying dilapidated and burnt in the garage; were greedy to drink gallons of golden petrol, / The eye gruesomely dry after the day's work; were greedy to drink a bottle of tears.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: I kept the swanky automobile in the delectably compact garage; shielding it from salaciously ogling eyes and acrimonious beams of sweltering Sunshine,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: You don't have to live in a garage to write great poetry.
quotes.author: Felix Dennis

quotes.quote: I sat in a garage and invented the future.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: A clean basement, garage, and attic are signs of an empty life.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Every time my brain parks the car neatly in the driveway, my mouth drives through the back of the garage.
quotes.author: Dave Eggers

quotes.quote: When I was poor living in a garage in Kansas I began to draw the mice that scampered over my desk. That is how Mickey Mouse was born.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: When I go to the garage to pick up my clubs, I clean the spider webs off.
quotes.author: John Ratzenberger

quotes.quote: Garage door openers mysteriously not working is a clue to electromagnetic interference (EMI) issues.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Parking at a garage is like going to a prostitute. Why pay for it when you can apply yourself, and then maybe you can get it for free.
quotes.author: Jason Alexander

quotes.quote: Most of the time, you roll them around from one spot in the garage to another and just admire them.
quotes.author: Jeff Long

quotes.quote: If you are a homeowner, a garage significantly increases the value of your property. You will also appreciate the additional storage space that your garage will provide.
quotes.author: Design America Inc.

quotes.quote: Although a garage is not usually considered a 'room' of the house, it probably should be.
quotes.author: Chris Marshall

quotes.quote: Let no one think that real gardening is a bucolic and meditative occupation. It is an insatiable passion, like everything else to which a man gives his heart.
quotes.author: Karel Capek

quotes.quote: Gardening is ultimately a folly whose goal is to provide delight.
quotes.author: Deborah Needleman

quotes.quote: Gardening is the art that uses flowers and plants as paint, and the soil and sky as canvas.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Murray

quotes.quote: To forget how to dig the earth and to tend the soil is to forget ourselves.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is no spot of ground, however arid, bare or ugly, that cannot be tamed into such a state as may give an impression of beauty and delight.
quotes.author: Gertrude Jekyll

quotes.quote: Gardening is the purest of human pleasures.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: We must cultivate our own garden. When man was put in the garden of Eden he was put there so that he should work, which proves that man was not born to rest.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The glory of gardening: hands in the dirt, head in the sun, heart with nature. To nurture a garden is to feed not just the body, but the soul.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: Gardening simply does not allow one to be mentally old, because too many hopes and dreams are yet to be realized.
quotes.author: Allan Armitage

quotes.quote: Gardening is about enjoying the smell of things growing in the soil, getting dirty without feeling guilty, and generally taking the time to soak up a little peace and serenity.
quotes.author: Lindley Karstens

quotes.quote: One of the most delightful things about a garden is the anticipation it provides.
quotes.author: W.E. Johns

quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Gardening has a magical quality when you are a child.
quotes.author: Barbara Damrosch

quotes.quote: The love of gardening is a seed once sown that never dies.
quotes.author: Gertrude Jekyll

quotes.quote: Once we become interested in the progress of the plants in our care, their development becomes a part of the rhythm of our own lives and we are refreshed by it.
quotes.author: Thalassa Cruso

quotes.quote: Gardening is civil and social, but it wants the vigor and freedom of the forest and the outlaw.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Gardening requires lots of water -- most of it in the form of perspiration.
quotes.author: Lou Erickson

quotes.quote: There are no gardening mistakes, only experiments.
quotes.author: Janet Kilburn Phillips

quotes.quote: There is no gardening without humility. Nature is constantly sending even its oldest scholars to the bottom of the class for some egregious blunder.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: No occupation is so delightful to me as the culture of the earth, and no culture comparable to that of the garden.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Successful gardening is doing what has to be done when it has to be done the way it ought to be done whether you want to do it or not.
quotes.author: Jerry Baker

quotes.quote: Everything that slows us down and forces patience, everything that sets us back into the slow circles of nature, is a help. Gardening is an instrument of grace.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: We may think we are nurturing our garden, but of course it's our garden that is really nurturing us.
quotes.author: Jenny Uglow

quotes.quote: Why try to explain miracles to your kids when you can just have them plant a garden?
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Gardening imparts an organic perspective on the passage of time.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: All gardening is landscape painting.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: How deeply seated in the human heart is the liking for gardens and gardening.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Gardening is not a rational act.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: One of the healthiest ways to gamble is with a spade and a packet of seeds.
quotes.author: Dan Bennett

quotes.quote: I think this is what hooks one to gardening: it is the closest one can come to being present at creation.
quotes.author: Phyllis Theroux

quotes.quote: When I go into the garden with a spade and dig a bed, I feel such an exhilaration and health that I discover that I have been defrauding myself all this time in letting others do for me what I should have done with my own hands.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is peace in the garden. Peace and results.
quotes.author: Ruth Stout

quotes.quote: Regardless of how bad past gardens have been, every gardener believes that next years will be better. It is easy to age when there's nothing to believe in, nothing to hope for, gardeners, however, simply refuse to grow up.
quotes.author: Allan Armitage

quotes.quote: No sooner did I bend over and scratch the soil with the hoe that I began to unearth bits and pieces of my past. memories forever rooted in time were clustered in my garden consciousness like potatoes, waiting, crying to be dug up. I plant flowers and vegetables. I harvest memories—and life.
quotes.author: Nancy H. Jordan

quotes.quote: Gardening is a metaphor for life, teaching you to nourish new life and weed out that which cannot succeed.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
