quotes.quote: Attention is the rarest and purest form of generosity.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: True generosity is an offering, given freely and out of pure love. No strings attached. No expectations. Time and love are the most valuable possession you can share.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Generosity takes an open heart and a love that asks for nothing in return.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Kindness makes you the most beautiful person in the world, no matter what you look like.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Genetics help to some degree, but the most important thing is the mind and the spirit. These two are even more powerful than physical characteristics that are passed on.
quotes.author: Serge Nubret

quotes.quote: The laws of genetics apply even if you refuse to learn them.
quotes.author: Allison Plowden

quotes.quote: Heredity is what sets the parents of a teenager wondering about each other.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Your genetics load the gun. Your lifestyle pulls the trigger.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: Genetics is about how information is stored and transmitted between generations.
quotes.author: John Maynard Smith

quotes.quote: Genetics is all about showcasing human beauty along with high-quality performance.
quotes.author: Bela Karolyi

quotes.quote: Genetics is where we come from. It's deeply natural to want to know.
quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

quotes.quote: Your genetics is not your destiny.
quotes.author: George M. Church

quotes.quote: Genetics do play a role in how you consciously or subconsciously manifest your true self.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: Don't be ashamed or proud of your genetics,for you have no contribution towards it.
quotes.author: Mehnaz Ansari

quotes.quote: Heredity provides for the modification of its own machinery.
quotes.author: James Mark Baldwin

quotes.quote: Heredity is a splendid phenomenon that relieves us of responsibility for our shortcomings.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Genetics is crude, but neuroscience goes directly to work on the brain, and the mind follows.
quotes.author: Leon R. Kass

quotes.quote: Genetics play a huge part in who we are. But we also have free will.
quotes.author: Mike Hockney

quotes.quote: A genius is one who shoots at something no one else can see â€” and hits it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Genius: The capacity to see and to express what is simple, simply!
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Men of genius are rarely much annoyed by the company of vulgar people.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Genius is the true mystery, and at its edge--the abyss.
quotes.author: Guillermo Del Toro

quotes.quote: Genius always gives its best at first; prudence, at last.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: One of the strongest characteristics of genius is the power of lighting its own fire.
quotes.author: John W. Foster

quotes.quote: Doing easily what others find difficult is talent; doing what is impossible for talent is genius.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: The only genius that's worth anything is the genius for hard work.
quotes.author: Kathleen Winsor

quotes.quote: Every great genius has an admixture of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Genius is eternal patience.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: Genius is the recovery of childhood at will.
quotes.author: Arthur Rimbaud

quotes.quote: This is the nature of genius, to be able to grasp the knowable even when no one else recognizes that it is present.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Genius is finding the invisible link between things.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Real genius is nothing else but the supernatural virtue of humility in the domain of thought.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Genius hath electric power which earth can never tame.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: Geniuses don't become geniuses until they find the right moron to compare themselves to.
quotes.author: James McGregor

quotes.quote: The role of genius is not to complicate the simple, but to simplify the complicated.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: What the world needs is more geniuses with humility. There are so few of us left.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: Genius without Education is like Silver in the Mine.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: We all have genius within us, never doubt that fact.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A man of genius makes no mistakes; his errors are volitional and are the portals of discovery.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Genius is never understood in its own time.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Genius... is the capacity to see ten things where the ordinary man sees one.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: Every true genius is bound to be naive.
quotes.author: J.C.F. von Schiller

quotes.quote: Thousands of geniuses live and die undiscovered â€” either by themselves or by others.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We know that the nature of genius is to provide idiots with ideas twenty years later.
quotes.author: Louis Aragon

quotes.quote: Genius ain't anything more than elegant common sense.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Genius always looks forward, and not only sees what is, but what necessarily will be.
quotes.author: Fulke Greville

quotes.quote: In the republic of mediocrity, genius is dangerous.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Becoming a genius is not just knowing that it is possible - it is taking action and having genius experiences.
quotes.author: Andrei G. Aleinikov

quotes.quote: Genius is experience. Some seem to think that it is a gift or talent, but it is the fruit of long experience in many lives. Some are older souls than others, and so they know more.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Genius is the ability to renew one's emotions in daily experience.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Men of lofty genius when they are doing the least work are most active.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Genius might be the ability to say a profound thing in a simple way.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: One is not born a genius, one becomes a genius.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Taste is the common sense of genius.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Genius is the ability to put into effect what is on your mind.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Everyone is born a genius, but the process of living de-geniuses them.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Genius thinks out of box when leader adjusts the size of box.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: All geniuses die young.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Geniuses have the shortest biographies.
quotes.author: Claire Messud

quotes.quote: Everybody is a genius. But, if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will spend its whole life believing it is stupid.
quotes.author: Einstien

quotes.quote: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: See the genius in everyone you encounter. Just as the mountain cannot crack a nut though it can carry a forest on its back, so too does every living creature have its own perfection built into it.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: We are all geniuses up to the age of ten.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Almost everyone is born a genius and buried an idiot.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Genius is more often found in a cracked pot than in a whole one.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: Genius is talent set on fire by courage.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Mediocrity knows nothing higher than itself, but talent instantly recognizes genius.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: The principle mark of genius is not perfection but originality, the opening of new frontiers.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Genius is to other gifts what the carbuncle is to the precious stones. It sends forth its own light, whereas other stones only reflect borrowed light.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Genius without education is like silver in the mine.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: With the offspring of genius, the law of parturition is reversed; the throes are in the conception, the pleasure in the birth.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: The true genius shudders at incompleteness and usually prefers silence to saying something which is not everything it should be.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The true genius shudders at incompleteness.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: A man of genius is inexhaustible only in proportion as he is always renourishing his genius.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Constant effort and frequent mistakes are the stepping stones to genius.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Genius is the ability to act rightly without precedent - the power to do the right thing the first time.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Steady work turns genius to a loom.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The ordinary man casts a shadow in a way we do not quite understand. The man of genius casts light.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.quote: Genius is seldom recognized for what it is: a great capacity for hard work.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: First and last, what is demanded of genius is love of truth.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Genius is supposed to be a power of producing excellences which are put of the reach of the rules of art: a power which no precepts can teach, and which no industry can acquire.
quotes.author: Joshua Reynolds

quotes.quote: Firmness of purpose is one of the most necessary sinews of character, and one of the best instruments of success. Without it, genius wastes its efforts in a maze of inconsistencies.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: You don't have to be a genius or a visionary or even a college graduate to be successful. You just need a framework and a dream.
quotes.author: Michael Dell

quotes.quote: Men of genius are meteors destined to burn themselves out in lighting up their age.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The imagination of the genius vastly surpasses his intellect; the intellect of the academic vastly surpasses his imagination
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Life is not about discovering our talents; it is about pushing our talents to the limit and discovering our genius.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: The principal mark of genius is not perfection, but originality.
quotes.author: Robert Schumann

quotes.quote: Genius is the power of carrying the feelings of childhood into the powers of manhood.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: We will discover the nature of our particular genius when we stop trying to conform to our own or other people's models, learn to be ourselves, and allow our natural channel to open.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: The man of genius is he and he alone who finds such joy in his art that he will work at it come hell or high water.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of childhood into maturity.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Passion is the genesis of genius.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The genocide (in Rwanda) was a collective act. What made it possible, what made that final political crime possible, was the absence, the erasure, of seeing the other. Of knowing, of feeling, of being with the other. And when that's removed, then politics can become genocidal.
quotes.author: James Orbinski

quotes.quote: The biggest road block to action on genocide and other human rights crimes is ignorance. Most people just don't know that such things are happening, and often, if they have a vague idea they are happening, there is a feeling that there is nothing that can be done to stop these crimes.
quotes.author: John Prendergrast

quotes.quote: Genocide is not just a murderous madness; it is, more deeply, a politics that promises a utopia beyond politics - one people, one land, one truth, the end of difference. Since genocide is a form of political utopia, it remains an enduring temptation in any multiethnic and multicultural society in crisis.
quotes.author: Michael Ignatief

quotes.quote: As long as your ideology identifies the main source of the world's ills as a definable group, it opens the world up to genocide.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: I think that the memory of Armenia's genocide opened my eyes at an early age to the existence of political cynicism.
quotes.author: Serj Tankian

quotes.quote: Genocide is not a legitimate option. It's not ok to decide that an entire population has no right to live in the world. No matter whether these relationships are very proximate or very distant, there is no entitlement to expunge a population or to demean its basic humanity.
quotes.author: Judith Butler

quotes.quote: In the aftermath of any war or genocide, healing and reconciliation are ultimate aspirations.
quotes.author: Janine de Giovanni

quotes.quote: Genocide is an attempt to exterminate a people, not to alter their behavior.
quotes.author: Jack Schwartz

quotes.quote: If human is capable of conducting genocide, no need for an asteroid to wipe out dinosaurs.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Genocide begins, however improbably, in the conviction that classes of biological distinction indisputably sanction social and political discrimination.
quotes.author: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.quote: The way to virtually eliminate genocide and mass murder appears to be through restricting and checking power. This means to foster democratic freedom.
quotes.author: Rudolph Rummel

quotes.quote: The history of America is the history of a genocide that didn't end yet, the genocide of American civilizations.
quotes.author: Luis Bolognesi

quotes.quote: Historical atrocities have certainly shown that dehumanizing any group is the first step toward genocide.
quotes.author: Robert Paul Weston

quotes.quote: Nationalism of one kind or another was the cause of most of the genocide of the twentieth century. Flags are bits of colored cloth that governments use first to shrink-wrap people's minds and then as ceremonial shrouds to bury the dead.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: I don't think nations can stand aside for ethnic cleansing and genocide.
quotes.author: John Major

quotes.quote: Recognition of the genocide is a triumph of human conscience and justice over intolerance and hatred.
quotes.author: Serzh Sargsyan

quotes.quote: The cruel policy initiated by Columbus and pursued by his successors resulted in complete genocide.
quotes.author: Samuel Eliot Morison

quotes.quote: Be gentle, kind and beautiful, yet firm and strong, both mentally and physically.
quotes.author: Keiko Fukuda

quotes.quote: It's important for us to be kind to other people and treat other people the way that we want to be treated.
quotes.author: Michele Bachmann

quotes.quote: Being kind is more important than being right.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: You must be kind to others. You must foster a caretaker personality of gentleness and perseverance, even in the midst of adversity.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: A gentle focus of attention is all it takes to free the body of minor imbalances.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Be gentle and forgiving with yourself, abandon any and all shame, and refuse to engage in any self-repudiation.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The gentle minde by gentle deeds is knowne.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.
quotes.author: Solomon

quotes.quote: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for a kindness.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Let the gentle bush dig its root deep and spread upward to split the boulder.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: The one good thing about being kind of shy is that nobody bugs you when you want to be left alone.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: Human kindness has never weakened the stamina or softened the fiber of a free people. A nation does not have to be cruel to be tough.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a battle you know nothing about.
quotes.author: Wendy Mass

quotes.quote: Sometimes its not the strength but gentleness that cracks the hardest shells.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: It is not whether your words or actions are tough or gentle; it is the spirit behind your actions and words that announces your inner state.
quotes.author: Chin-Ning Chu

quotes.quote: Kindness is the evidence of greatness. If anyone is glad that you are here, then you have not lived in vain.
quotes.author: Charles Fenno Hoffman

quotes.quote: A kind heart speaks kind words.
quotes.author: Anthony D. Williams

quotes.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: A gentle heart is tied with an easy thread.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Laws too gentle are seldom obeyed; too severe, seldom executed.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Modesty: the gentle art of enhancing your charm by pretending not to be aware of it.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.quote: Be gentle and kind all the time.
quotes.author: Heather Wolf

quotes.quote: Choose being kind over being right and you'll be right every time.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: Gentle time will heal our sorrows.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Courage. Kindness. Friendship. Character. These are the qualities that define us as human beings, and propel us, on occasion, to greatness.
quotes.author: R.J. Palacio

quotes.quote: Kindness to self will put you in the perfect attitude and position to be kind to others.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Kindness is the best prayer.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Only the gentle are ever really strong.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Beyond a wholesome discipline, be gentle with yourself.
quotes.author: Juanita Kreps

quotes.quote: Take the yoke I give you. Put it on your shoulders and learn from me. I am gentle and humble, and you will find rest.
quotes.author: Matthew 11:29

quotes.quote: Nothing as so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
quotes.author: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: If you would reap praise, sow the seeds; gentle words and useful deeds.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A servant of the Lord must not be quarrelsome; he must be kind towards all. He should be a good teacher, tolerant, and gentle when he must discipline those who oppose him.
quotes.author: 2 Timothy 2:24-25

quotes.quote: The fruit of the spirit is...gentleness.
quotes.author: Galatians 5:22

quotes.quote: Soft words are hard arguments.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Only the truly strong and great can be truly tender. Tenderness is a mark of nobility, not of weakness.
quotes.author: James Philip

quotes.quote: Be humble and gentle in your conversation; and of few words, I charge you; but always pertinent when you speak.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Anger is quieted by a gentle word just as fire is quenched by water.
quotes.author: Bishop Jean Pierre Camus

quotes.quote: To feel my spirit / just look up to the sky / and watch a beautiful sunset / while it slowly drifts by.
quotes.author: Tabitha J. Bryson

quotes.quote: Never shout into the void / —when you can whisper to the heart.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Simply I yearn to listen / Where no man can hear a sound / But watch the air glisten / And dream its gentle tone abound.
quotes.author: Erwin Jung

quotes.quote: Constant, gentle pressure is my preferred technique for leadership, guidance, and coaching.
quotes.author: Danny Meyer

quotes.quote: The safest road to hell is the gradual one-the gentle slope, soft underfoot, without sudden turnings, without milestones, without signposts.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Lord, give us the wisdom to utter words that are gentle and tender, for tomorrow we may have to eat them.
quotes.author: Mo Udall

quotes.quote: The voice of beauty speaks softly; it creeps only into the most fully awakened souls.
quotes.author: Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Funny how our hearts / were designed / to love / so fiercely. / but break / ever so gently.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: The truly strong is always gentle.
quotes.author: Yuuki Obata

quotes.quote: Gentleness breeds sanity, anger breeds insanity.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: I choose gentleness... Nothing is won by force. I choose to be gentle. If I raise my voice may it be only in praise? If I clench my fist, may it be only in prayer? If I make a demand, may it be only of myself?
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Be like the elephant my friend - with a strong character and a gentle soul.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Tenderness is not weakness. Rather, it is a decision to face the scathing brutality of life, but to refuse to allow brutality to set the terms of the engagement.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: The earth is gentle. And the earth allows the flowers to bloom. We need to be gentle. And the flowers will bloom in our life.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: And realize that some people's heart's injured with far more ease than others and dance to quieter music.
quotes.author: Mimi Novic

quotes.quote: Only kind people are truly tolerant. Only gentle people are truly strong.
quotes.author: Cathy Burnham Martin

quotes.quote: We sometimes meet an original gentleman, who, if manners had not existed, would have invented them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Being male is a matter of birth. Being a man is a matter of age. But being a gentleman is a matter of choice.
quotes.author: Srinivas Shenoy

quotes.quote: He comes to the world, as a gentleman comes To a lodging ready furnished.
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: No gentleman can be without three copies of a book: one for show, one for use, and one for borrowers.
quotes.author: Richard Heber

quotes.quote: We must be gentle now we are gentlemen.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A gentleman is simply a patient wolf.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.quote: He whom we call a gentleman is no longer the man of Nature.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: A gentleman can see a question from all sides without bias.The small man is biased and can see a question only from one side.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The look of a gentleman is little else than the reflection of the looks of the world.
quotes.author: Hazlitt

quotes.quote: A gentleman with a pug nose is a contradiction in terms.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Questioning is not the mode of conversation among gentlemen.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: We have only one rule here - to act like a gentleman at all times.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: If the gentleman has ability, he is magnanimous, generous, tolerant, and straightforward, through which he opens the way to instruct others.
quotes.author: Xunzi

quotes.quote: It is almost a definition of a gentleman to say that he is one who never inflicts pain.
quotes.author: John Henry Newman

quotes.quote: Perfect soldier, perfect gentleman never gave offence to anyone not even the enemy.
quotes.author: A. J. P. Taylor

quotes.quote: You will be judged by what you succeed at gentlemen, not by what you attempt
quotes.author: Clement Attlee

quotes.quote: It is difficult to believe that a true gentleman will ever become a gamester, a libertine, or a sot.
quotes.author: Chapin

quotes.quote: A true gentleman is one that apologizes anyways, even though he has not offended a lady intentionally. He is in a class all of his own because he knows the value of a woman's heart.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The minute you try to talk business with him he takes the attitude that he is a gentleman and a scholar, and the moment you try to approach him on the level of his moral integrity he starts to talk business.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Anyone can be heroic from time to time, but a gentleman is something you have to be all the time.
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

quotes.quote: A gentleman respects every women in his life. If you can't respect your own mother, forget about respecting your girlfriend.
quotes.author: James Merrow

quotes.quote: A gentleman can live through anything.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A Gentleman is a prime example of what a man should be.
quotes.author: Pontius Joseph

quotes.quote: A gentleman has his eyes on all those present; he is tender toward the bashful, gentle toward the distant, and merciful toward the absent.
quotes.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quotes.quote: A gentleman is one who doesn't and cant forgive himself for self-committed mistake even if others forget it and the self-criticism is a mark of his right attitude towards life.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: Believe me, there exists no such dilemma as that in which a gentleman is placed when he is forced to reply to a blackguard.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: A gentleman is one who never hurts anyone's feelings unintentionally.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A gentleman's choice of timepiece says as much about him as does his Saville Row suit.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: A gentleman is one who never hurts anyone's feelings unintentionally
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Make money and the whole nation will conspire to call you a gentleman.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A gentleman is one who puts more into the world than he takes out.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The only infallible rule we know is, that the man who is always talking about being a gentleman never is one.
quotes.author: Robert Smith Surtees

quotes.quote: Being a Gentleman, has more to do with hiding his flaws, than exhibiting the virtues!
quotes.author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quotes.quote: The true gentleman is subtly poised between an inner tact and an outer defense.
quotes.author: Puzant Kevork Thomajan

quotes.quote: Gentlemen have talked a great deal of patriotism. A venerable word, when duly practiced.
quotes.author: Robert Walpole

quotes.quote: Gentlemen don't read each other's mail.
quotes.author: Henry L. Stimson

quotes.quote: The word of a gentleman is as good as his bond; and sometimes better.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Courtesy is as much a mark of a gentleman as courage.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Gentleman is a term which does not apply to any station, but to the mind and the feelings in every station.
quotes.author: Talfourd

quotes.quote: You have to be a man before you can be a gentleman.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: A gentleman is one who understands and shows every mark of deference to the claims of self-love in others, and exacts it in return from them.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: It is almost the definition of a gentleman to say that he is one who never inflicts pain.
quotes.author: John Henry Newman

quotes.quote: The final test of a gentleman is his respect for those who can be of no possible service to him.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: A real gentleman is as polite to a little girl as to a woman.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: A gentleman is someone who can play the accordion, but doesn't.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: A gentleman is any man who wouldn't hit a woman with his hat on.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: A gentleman will not insult me, and no man not a gentleman can insult me.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Most gentlemen don't like love, they just like to kick it around.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: The definition of a gentleman is a man who enters a revolving door in front of you and exits behind you.
quotes.author: Chloe Thurlow

quotes.quote: A man who needs women to prove his worth is a man who'll never be worthy. A Gentleman finds his worth in himself and his pride in a women.
quotes.author: Moyo Adekoya

quotes.quote: A gentleman is someone who does not what he wants to do, but what he should do.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: A gentleman doesn’t have one set of manners for the house of a poor man and another for the house of someone with an income incomparable to his own.
quotes.author: William Maxwell

quotes.quote: I can make a lord, but only God can make a gentleman.
quotes.author: King James I

quotes.quote: With a gentleman I am always a gentleman and a half, and with a fraud I try to be a fraud and a half.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: Be well dressed, behave like a gentleman, and keep your shoes shined.
quotes.author: Joseph Abboud

quotes.quote: Man is never so manly as when he feels deeply, acts boldly and expresses himself with frankness and with fervor.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: You can tell the greatness of a man by what makes him angry.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Masculinity is not something given to you, but something you gain. And you gain it by winning small battles with honor.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Whether the gentleman is capable or not, he is loved all the same; conversely the petty man is loathed all the same.
quotes.author: Xun Kuang

quotes.quote: For me, the best thing you can do as a man in loving someone is to do your best, go on that walk, and at the end of that walk be as much of a gentleman as you were in the beginning.
quotes.author: Bryan Adams

quotes.quote: If it be true, as a celebrated writer has maintained, that no young lady can be justified in falling in love before the gentleman's love is declared, it must be very improper that a young lady should dream of a gentleman before the gentleman is first known to have dreamt of her.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The flowering of civilization is the finished man—the man of sense, of grace, of accomplishment, of social power—the gentleman.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Education begins the gentleman, but reading, good company, and reflection must finish him.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Thoughtfulness for others, generosity, modesty, and self-respect are the qualities which make a real gentleman or lady, as distinguished from the veneered article which commonly goes by that name.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Repose and cheerfulness are the badge of the gentleman—repose in energy.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is a grand old name, that of gentleman, and has been recognized as a rank and power in all stages of society. To possess this character is a dignity of itself, commanding the instinctive homage of every generous mind, and those who will not bow to titular rank will yet do homage to the gentleman. His qualities depend not upon fashion or manners, but upon moral worth; not on personal possessions, but on personal qualities.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: We are indebted to Christianity for gentleness, especially toward women.
quotes.author: C. Simmons

quotes.quote: I am a gentleman, you are a gentleman; who is going to mind the swine?
quotes.author: Czech Proverb

quotes.quote: Father a grocer; son a gentleman; grandson a beggar.
quotes.author: Peruvian Proverb

quotes.quote: However much the right honorable gentleman may dance around the ring beforehand, at some point, he will come within the reach of a big clunking fist.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Tea, although an Oriental, / Is a gentleman at least; / Cocoa is a cad and coward, / Cocoa is a vulgar beast.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Any officer who shall behave in a scandalous manner, unbecoming the character of an officer and a gentleman shall.. be cashiered.
quotes.author: Articles of War (1872) 'Disgraceful Conduct' Article 79

quotes.quote: Arrive as a king, leave as a legend, be remembered as a gentleman.
quotes.author: Ankeet Patel

quotes.quote: The dog is a gentleman. I hope to go to his heaven, not man's .
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Absolutely a poor person can be a gentleman. A gentleman... a gentleman is someone who never forgets their manners, no matter what the situation is, no matter how terrible, how awful. Money and social standing have got nothing to do with it. A gentleman always tries to do the right thing.
quotes.author: Mr. Watts

quotes.quote: Does a gentleman's gentleman stay when the gentleman wants the gentleman's gentleman to leave the gentleman with the lady?
quotes.author: Stanley Snodgrass

quotes.quote: I thought a "gentleman" was somebody that owned horses. But it turns out, his short and simple definition of a lady or a gentleman is, someone who always tries to make sure the people around him or her are as comfortable as possible.
quotes.author: Troy

quotes.quote: Being a gentleman has nothing to do with the circumstances of one's birth. Being a gentleman is something one learns.
quotes.author: Harry Hart

quotes.quote: I'm a stone cold gentleman / I do all that I can / Give my heart, my charm, my personality / I'm a gentleman / And I'm not trying to win you over / Just give me your hand and I'll do what I can.
quotes.author: Kevin Roberson; Antonio Reid; Ralph Tresvant; Daryl Simmons

quotes.quote: Scarecrow, weathered and weary / Fragile and old beyond his years / Here we are chosen / In your eyes, the truth lies frozen / Soldier in the city heat / Refugee on every street / And life goes by / Standing in the pouring rain / He's a gentleman with a family / A gentle man, living day to day / He's a gentleman with pride, one may conclude / Sign reads, gentleman with a family will work for food.
quotes.author: Cheryl Bentyne; Gerald O'Brien; Marc Wallace Jordan

quotes.quote: There is a geography of the human spirit, common to all peoples.
quotes.author: Linda Hogan

quotes.quote: The study of geography is about more than just memorizing places on a map. It's about understanding the complexity of our world, appreciating the diversity of cultures that exists across continents. And in the end, it's about using all that knowledge to help bridge divides and bring people together.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Geography is the subject which holds the key to our future
quotes.author: Michael Palin

quotes.quote: Physical geography and geology are inseparable scientific twins.
quotes.author: Roderick Murchison

quotes.quote: Travel is a vanishing act, a solitary trip down a pinched line of geography to oblivion.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: What makes a nation in the beginning is a good piece of geography.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Geography has made us neighbors. History has made us friends. Economics has made us partners, and necessity has made us allies. Those whom God has so joined together, let no man put asunder.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Geography is just physics slowed down, with a couple of trees stuck in it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Geography is an earthly subject, but a heavenly science.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Geography blended with time equals destiny.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: As a state we are so uniquely positioned in so many ways. Our geography, our placement in the country, and our history positions us to be the state that propels energy efficiency as an industry.
quotes.author: Jennifer Granholm

quotes.quote: There is an eternal landscape, a geography of the soul; we search for its outlines all our lives.
quotes.author: Josephine Hart

quotes.quote: Everywhere's been where it is ever since it was first put there. It's called geography.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Geography should be the ultimate deciding factor for every political dilemma for proximity to an ailing land is bound to result in one's infection.
quotes.author: Aysha Taryam

quotes.quote: If geography is prose, maps are iconography.
quotes.author: Lennart Meri

quotes.quote: Geography prepares for the world of work - geographers, with their skills of analysis are highly employable!
quotes.author: Michael Palin

quotes.quote: Geography is the art of the mappable.
quotes.author: Peter Haggett

quotes.quote: As Geography without History seemeth a carkasse without motion; so History without Geography wandreth as a Vagrant without a certaine habitation.
quotes.author: John Smith

quotes.quote: Geography and mileage mean nothing. Separate is a single word that covers all distances that aren't together.
quotes.author: Rivera Sun

quotes.quote: And the geography of the thing--the geography of them--was completely and hopelessly wrong.
quotes.author: Jennifer E. Smith

quotes.quote: Geography does not define you - love does.
quotes.author: Eve Ensler

quotes.quote: Making sure that the geography and timelines work is always the hardest part of writing. But you owe it to the readers to get it right!
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: If some peoples pretend that history or geography gives them the right to subjugate other races, nations, or peoples, there can be no peace.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: An hour or two spent in writing from dictation, another hour or two in reading aloud, a little geography and a little history and a little physics made the day pass busily.
quotes.author: Hudson Stuck

quotes.quote: There is an internal landscape, a geography of the soul; we search for its outlines in our lives. Those who are lucky enough to find it, ease like water over a stone, onto its fluid contours, and are home.
quotes.author: Josephine Hart

quotes.quote: Geography is the study of earth as the home of people
quotes.author: Yi-Fu Tuan

quotes.quote: There is a geography which holds its hands just so far from the breast and pushes you away, crying so.
quotes.author: Frank O'Hara

quotes.quote: The peculiar value of geography lies in its fitness to nourish the mind with ideas and furnish the imagination with pictures.
quotes.author: Charlotte Mason

quotes.quote: Geography is about maps, but biography is about chaps.
quotes.author: Eric Bentley

quotes.quote: Geography is the key, the crucial accident of birth. A piece of protein could be a snail, a sea lion, or a systems analyst, but it had to start somewhere. This is not science; it is merely metaphor. And the landscape in which the protein "starts" shapes its end as surely as bowls shape water.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: Ahead and to the west was our ranger station - and the mountains of Idaho, poems of geology stretching beyond any boundaries and seemingly even beyond the world.
quotes.author: Norman Maclean

quotes.quote: It was during my enchanted days of travel that the idea came to me, which, through the years, has come into my thoughts again and again and always happily—the idea that geology is the music of the earth.
quotes.author: Hans Cloos

quotes.quote: I went into geology because I like being outdoors, and because everybody in geology seemed, well, they all seemed like free spirits or renegades or something. You know, climbing mountains and hiking deserts and stuff.
quotes.author: Kathy B. Steele

quotes.quote: Altogether, according to John McPhee, [geological ages] number in the „tens of dozens.” Fortunately, unless you take up geology as a career, you are unlikely ever to hear any of them again.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: “There is nothing like geology; the pleasure of the first day's partridge shooting or first day's hunting cannot be compared to finding a fine group of fossil bones, which tell their story of former times with almost a living tongue." Charles Darwin, letter to his sister Catherine, 1834”
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: “To my surprise, I found that geology demanded a type of whole-brain thinking I hadn't encountered before. It creatively appropriated ideas from physics and chemistry for the investigation of unruly volcanoes and oceans and ice sheets, It applied scholarly habits one associates with the study of literature and the arts - the practice of close reading, sensitivity to allusion and analogy, capacity for spatial visualization - to the examination of rocks. Its particular form of inferential logic demanded mental versatility and a vigorous but disciplined imagination. And its explanatory power was vast; it was nothing less than the etymology of the world.”
quotes.author: Marcia Bjornerud

quotes.quote: “I emphasize that my job is not to challenge their personal beliefs but to teach the logic of geology (geo-logic?) - the methods and tools of the discipline that enables us not only to comprehend how the Earth works at present but also to document in detail its elaborate and awe-inspiring history.”
quotes.author: Marcia Bjornerud

quotes.quote: Geology gave us the immensity of time and taught us how little of it our own species has occupied.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: All that comes above the surface [of the globe] lies within the province of Geography; all that comes below that surface lies inside the realm of Geology. The surface of the earth is that which, so to speak, divides them and at the same time 'binds them together in indissoluble union.' We may, perhaps, put the case metaphorically.
quotes.author: Charles Lapworth

quotes.quote: “[In geology,] As in history, the material in hand remains silent if no questions are asked. The nature of these questions depends on the 'school' to which the geologist belongs and on the objectivity of his investigations. Hans Cloos called this way of interrogation 'the dialogue with the earth,'
quotes.author: R.W. van Bemmelen

quotes.quote: “Much as I admired the elegance of physical theories, which at that time geology wholly lacked, I preferred a life in the woods to one in the laboratory.”
quotes.author: J. Tuzo Wilson

quotes.quote: “Nothing perhaps has so retarded the reception of the higher conclusions of Geology among men in general, as ... [the] instinctive parsimony of the human mind in matters where time is concerned.”
quotes.author: Charles Lapworth

quotes.quote: “In geology the effects to be explained have almost all occurred already, whereas in these other sciences effects actually taking place have to be explained.”
quotes.author: James Croll

quotes.quote: As in geology, so in social institutions, we may discover the causes of all past changes in the present invariable order of society.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I owe the best of myself to geology, but everything it has taught me tends to turn me away from dead things.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: Bacteria mineralized the rocks; they deposited the iron. They made the geology we see.
quotes.author: Bonnie Bassler

quotes.quote: It is a great philosophical breakthrough for geologists to accept catastrophe as a normal part of Earth history.
quotes.author: Erie Kauffman

quotes.quote: Geology gives us a key to the patience of God.
quotes.author: J. G. Holland

quotes.quote: Geology differs from physics, chemistry, and biology in that the possibilities for experiment are limited.
quotes.author: Reinout Willem van Bemmelen

quotes.quote: As inÂ geology, so in social institutions, we may discover the causes of all past changes in the present invariable order of society.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Geology, in the magnitude and sublimity of the objects of which it treats, undoubtedly ranks, in the scale of the sciences, next to astronomy.
quotes.author: John Herschel

quotes.quote: We learnÂ geologyÂ the morning after the earthquake.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We cannot take one step in geology without drawing upon the fathomless stores of by-gone time.
quotes.author: Adam Sedgwick

quotes.quote: The history of any one part of the earth, like the life of a soldier, consists of long periods of boredom and short periods of terror.
quotes.author: Derek V. Ager

quotes.quote: Geological age plays the same part in our view of the duration of the universe as the earth's orbit radius does in our view of the immensity of space.
quotes.author: John Joly

quotes.quote: The geologist takes up the history of the earth at the point where the archaeologist leaves it, and carries it further back into remote antiquity.
quotes.author: Bal Gangadhar Tilak

quotes.quote: Geologists have a saying - rocks remember.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: Caves are whimsical things, and geology on a local scale is random and unpredictable.
quotes.author: William Stone

quotes.quote: Yours for instance: you know physics, something of geology, ``Mathematics are your pastime; souls shall rise in their degree; ``Butterflies may dread extinction,---you'll not die, it cannot be.	``Yours for instance: you know physics, something of geology, ``Mathematics are your pastime; souls shall rise in their degree; ``Butterflies may dread extinction,---you'll not die, it cannot be.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Geology and botany Geology and botany We'll flog and troll in strid and hole.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: I know a little bit about biology And a little more about psychology I'm a little gem in geology But I don't know enough about you
quotes.author: Peggy Lee

quotes.quote: bout history, or biology we just talkin bout g-eology strait up, gangsta walkin
quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

quotes.quote: The subject was roses Quine geology Deliberate notice You're talking of me
quotes.author: Blondie

quotes.quote: In every game I am that wild card I participate I'm paleolithic And geology and astrophysics
quotes.author: Virgin Islander (on comparable worth)

quotes.quote: Geology is digging through my brain A manta engulfing the world To throw it up once again To a guide of lifted daggers
quotes.author: In Flames

quotes.quote: Sleeping geology On the isolated shore For million of years
quotes.author: Mr. Bungle

quotes.quote: And Africa Geology and girls' basketball All the kids in her class will tell you she's the best But she's heard other teachers in the hall saying
quotes.author: Fred Small

quotes.quote: Don't wanna know about geography I'd rather have pornography Keep your history and geology Gonna teach myself biology, the easy way.
quotes.author: John Entwistle

quotes.quote: Endless reprieve Endless from me Endless anybody It's what you demand Tacit reprimands From your body's geology
quotes.author: Dreamy D

quotes.quote: study biology, geology, and even the core of astrology Even Psychology, technology, and even the math of geometry
quotes.author: Garbo

quotes.quote: Think of old geology It is but a theory What about reality Nobody was there to see So lets go back in time
quotes.author: S.P.O.C.K.

quotes.quote: When the world was still new Long before me and you Or the study of geology
quotes.author: David LaMotte

quotes.quote: You say wanna rock for me But you don't know geology You're drying up the treasury
quotes.author: M. O.

quotes.quote: Six miles from side to side A caprice of geology Standing mountain high The wall whispers no apology Doesn't answer why The landscape changes
quotes.author: Andromeda

quotes.quote: have outlasted me in 2000 cubic foot brain capacity Mass the readvance, teminology, geology, its part of me biology All that shit follows me, swallows
quotes.author: K. Rino

quotes.quote: Geometry has two great treasures; one is the Theorem of Pythagoras; the other, the division of a line into extreme and mean ratio. The first we may compare to a measure of gold; the second we may name a precious jewel.
quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

quotes.quote: Regular geometry, the geometry of Euclid, is concerned with shapes which are smooth, except perhaps for corners and lines, special lines which are singularities, but some shapes in nature are so complicated that they are equally complicated at the big scale and come closer and closer and they don't become any less complicated.
quotes.author: Benoit Mandelbrot

quotes.quote: The knowledge of which geometry aims is the knowledge of the eternal.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Geometry alone is not enough to portray human desires, expressions, aspirations, joys. We need more.
quotes.author: Akira Yoshizawa

quotes.quote: Geometry is the only science that it hath pleased God hitherto to bestow on mankind.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Algebra is but written geometry and geometry is but figured algebra.
quotes.author: Sophie Germain

quotes.quote: Geometry enlightens the intellect and sets one's mind right. All of its proofs are very clear and orderly. It is hardly possible for errors to enter into geometrical reasoning, because it is well arranged and orderly. Thus, the mind that constantly applies itself to geometry is not likely to fall into error. In this convenient way, the person who knows geometry acquires intelligence.
quotes.author: Ibn Khaldun

quotes.quote: Mighty is geometry; joined with art, resistless.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Geometry enlightlens the intellect and sets one's mind right.
quotes.author: Ibn Khaldun

quotes.quote: The study of geometry is a petty and idle exercise of the mind, if it is applied to no larger system than the starry one. Mathematics should be mixed not only with physics but with ethics; that is mixed mathematics.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Geometry is the noblest branch of physics.
quotes.author: William Fogg Osgood

quotes.quote: Fractal geometry is not just a chapter of mathematics, but one that helps Everyman to see the same world differently.
quotes.author: Benoit Mandelbrot

quotes.quote: Geometry is one of the handles of science and philosophy.
quotes.author: Xenocrates

quotes.quote: It is through geometry that one purifies the eye of the soul.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: While fractal geometry is often used in high-tech science, its patterns are surprisingly common in traditional African designs.
quotes.author: Ron Eglash

quotes.quote: Geometry is the most complete science.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: Geometry will draw the soul toward truth and create the spirit of philosophy.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: There is no royal road to geometry.
quotes.author: Euclid

quotes.quote: Geometry is the foundation of all painting.
quotes.author: Albrecht Dürer,

quotes.quote: Plane geometry is sort of the key course where you learn about proving things and abstraction.
quotes.author: Sheldon Lee Glashow

quotes.quote: Geometry is the archetype of the beauty of the world.
quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

quotes.quote: The description of right lines and circles, upon which geometry is founded, belongs to mechanics. Geometry does not teach us to draw these lines, but requires them to be drawn.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: A work of morality, politics, criticism will be more elegant, other things being equal, if it is shaped by the hand of geometry.
quotes.author: Bernard le Bovier de Fontenelle

quotes.quote: Where there is matter, there is geometry.
quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

quotes.quote: Common to the two geometries is only the general property of one-to-one correspondence, and the rule that this correspondence determines straight lines as shortest lines as well as their relations of intersection.
quotes.author: Hans Reichenbach

quotes.quote: One geometry cannot be more true than another; it can only be more convenient; Geometry is not true, it is advantageous.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Geometry is one and eternal shining in the mind of God. That share in it accorded to humans is one of the reasons that humanity is the image of God.
quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

quotes.quote: Geometry is knowledge of the eternally existent.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Geometry in every proposition speaks a language which experience never dares to utter; and indeed of which she but halfway comprehends the meaning.
quotes.author: William Whewell

quotes.quote: The circle is the fundamental geometry of open human communication.
quotes.author: Harrison Owen

quotes.quote: Geometry is the art of correct reasoning from incorrectly drawn figures.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: Geometry is the science of correct reasoning on incorrect figures.
quotes.author: George Polya

quotes.quote: You can't criticize geometry. It's never wrong.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote: Geometry, like arithmetic, requires for its logical development only a small number of simple, fundamental principles. These fundamental principles are called the axioms of geometry.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: Geometry is knowledge that appears to be produced by human beings, yet whose meaning is totally independent of them.
quotes.author: Rudolf Steiner

quotes.quote: Analytical geometry has never existed. There are only people who do linear geometry badly, by taking coordinates, and they call this analytical geometry. Out with them!
quotes.author: Jean Dieudonne

quotes.quote: Projective geometry has opened up for us with the greatest facility new territories in our science, and has rightly been called the royal road to our particular field of knowledge.
quotes.author: Felix Klein

quotes.quote: If a special geometry has to be invented in order to account for a falling apple, even Newton might be appalled at the complications which would ensue when really difficult problems are tackled.
quotes.author: Oliver Lodge

quotes.quote: The geometry of the things around us creates coincidences, intersections.
quotes.author: Erri De Luca

quotes.quote: Geometry is beautifully logical, and it teaches you how to think and prove that things are so, step by step by step. Proofs are excellent lessons in reasoning. Without logic and reasoning, you are dependent on jumping to conclusions or - worse - having empty opinions.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: There is geometry in the humming of the strings, there is music in the spacing of the spheres.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Geometry is the rules of all mental investigation.
quotes.author: Mikhail Lomonosov

quotes.quote: O king, for traveling over the country, there are royal roads and roads for common citizens; but in geometry there is one road for all.
quotes.author: Manaechmus

quotes.quote: There is no royal road to geometry.
quotes.author: Euclid

quotes.quote: By natural selection, our mind has adapted itself to the conditions of the external world. It has adopted the geometry most advantageous to the species or, in other words, the most convenient.
quotes.author: Jules Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: All human knowledge thus begins with intuitions, proceeds thence to concepts, and ends with ideas.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: There are no sects in geometry.
quotes.author: Volatire

quotes.quote: A line is a dot that went for a walk.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.quote: The Cowboys have a way of trussing up a steer or a pugnacious bronco which fixes the brute so that it can neither move nor think. this is the hogtie, and it is what Euclid did to geometry.
quotes.author: Eric Temple Bell

quotes.quote: Music is the arithmetic of sounds as optics is the geometry of light.
quotes.author: Claude Debussy

quotes.quote: Writing is the geometry of the soul.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The child beginning geometry is presented with a dot and it is told, first, that that is a pointer, and second, that it is not a point. He cannot advance until he accepts both statements at once.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: The conception pi does not mean anything except another mathematical formulation of it. In ordinary experience the shortest distance between two points may not be a straight line, as the shortest way to get to the other side of a wall is around by the door, but geometry knows nothing of such existential untidiness.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Gravity is a response to geometry.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I never could make out what those damned dots meant.
quotes.author: Lord Randolph Churchill

quotes.quote: We may in fact regard geometry as the most ancient branch of physics...Without it, I would have been unable to formulate the theory of relativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Describing the physical laws without reference to geometry is similar to describing our thoughts without words.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Equations are just the boring part of mathematics. I attempt to see things in terms of geometry.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Simply to count and then dispose of / In patterns everybody knows, / Simply to follow curve and line / In geometrical design.
quotes.author: John Crowe Ransom

quotes.quote: I think the universe is pure geometry - basically, a beautiful shape twisting around and dancing over space-time.
quotes.author: Antony Garrett Lisi

quotes.quote: In order to give meaning to the world, one has to feel oneself involved in what he frames. This attitude requires concentration, a discipline of mind, sensitivity, and a sense of geometry.
quotes.author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

quotes.quote: The human heart likes a little disorder in its geometry.
quotes.author: Loui de Barnieres

quotes.quote: Everything one invents is true, you may be perfectly sure of that. Poetry is as precise as geometry.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: The two elements the traveler first captures in the big city are extra human architecture and furious rhythm. Geometry and anguish.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: One of the great challenges of modern cosmology is to discover what the geometry of the universe really is.
quotes.author: Margaret Geller

quotes.quote: In reality, the universe has no geometry.
quotes.author: Kedar Joshi

quotes.quote: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line. This maxim holds not only in geometry but in business as well.
quotes.author: Mike Klepper

quotes.quote: A straight line is said to have been cut in extreme and means ratio when, as the whole line is to the greater segment, so is the greater to the lesser.
quotes.author: Euclid

quotes.quote: I guess a sock is also a geometric shape—technically—but I don't know what you'd call it. A socktagon?
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Simple shapes are inhuman. They fail to resonate with the way nature organizes itself or with the way human perception sees the world.
quotes.author: James Gleick

quotes.quote: Self-similarity is symmetry across scales. It implies recursion, a pattern inside of the pattern.
quotes.author: James Gleick

quotes.quote: In geometry, whenever we had to find the area of a circle, pi * radius squared, I would get really hungry for pie. Square pie.
quotes.author: Dan Florence

quotes.quote: If you come to Georgia, you can open up a company in a day. You yourself can come tomorrow and establish a company in a day, and you're not halted by paperwork.
quotes.author: Bidzina Ivanishvili

quotes.quote: Georgian architecture respected the scale of both the individual and the community.
quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

quotes.quote: We must create the Georgia that our ancestors dreamed of, the Georgia that we dream of.
quotes.author: Mikhail Saakashvili

quotes.quote: It is time we Georgians did not depend only on others, it is time we asked what Georgia will do for the world.
quotes.author: Mikhail Saakashvili

quotes.quote: It is in Virginia and Georgia that the war now rages and where it will continue for at these points - Richmond and Atlanta - the enemy's main strength is concentrated.
quotes.author: Knute Nelson

quotes.quote: Georgia does not need Russia as an enemy.
quotes.author: Mikhail Saakashvili

quotes.quote: A small country like Georgia has little influence on conflicts that must be resolved at the global level.
quotes.author: Bidzina Ivanishvili

quotes.quote: Georgia is in an enviable position today, but we cant rest on our laurels.
quotes.author: Roy Barnes

quotes.quote: There is no chance of a revolution in Georgia.
quotes.author: Vano Merabishvili

quotes.quote: (South Georgia) is out fighting for their identity and playing a team that has a good reputation in the league. They've got nothing to lose and could be dangerous. We just have to play our game.
quotes.author: Rich Ingold

quotes.quote: At Georgia Southern, we don't cheat. That costs money and we don't have any.
quotes.author: Erk Russell

quotes.quote: Oh, Georgia booze is mighty fine booze, The best yuh ever poured yuh, But it eats the soles right offen yore shoes, For Hell's broke loose in Georgia.
quotes.author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quotes.quote: No Georgian has the right to evade or neglect his duties and responsibilities.
quotes.author: Eduard Shevardnadze

quotes.quote: Our prison in Georgia is a very different place from this prison here in Berlin. The conditions there are inhuman.
quotes.author: Irakli Okruashvili

quotes.quote: Georgia does not plan to export revolutions, and any allegations that it does are insulting.
quotes.author: Mikheil Saakashvili

quotes.quote: For the entire state of Georgia, having the premiere of Gone With the Wind on home ground was like winning the Battle of Atlanta 75 years late.
quotes.author: Anne Edwards

quotes.quote: The origin of Georgia's southern border is simpler than that of it's northern border. And bloodier.
quotes.author: Mark Stein

quotes.quote: Georgia will find very little sympathy in coastal South Carolina for the costs it must incur to correct its reliance on an unsustainable resource.
quotes.author: Dean Moss

quotes.quote: In Georgia, rednecks are just wolves in wolf clothing. In Detroit, you don't know who's a redneck until you go home and meet their parents.
quotes.author: Joseph Bruce

quotes.quote: In Georgia, apparently, men are men and women are women - at least in their folk dance.
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.quote: Georgia has some really tough allergies.
quotes.author: Brooke Elliott

quotes.quote: A quiet worker but a very productive one and a great one for the state of Georgia.
quotes.author: Roy Barnes

quotes.quote: As the population of Georgia increased dramatically, so did development.
quotes.author: Roy Barnes

quotes.quote: In Georgia, agriculture is one area where Democrats and Republicans consistently reached across the aisle and work together.
quotes.author: Sonny Perdue

quotes.quote: Georgia is not just a European country, but one of the most ancient European countries.
quotes.author: Mikheil Saakashvili

quotes.quote: Jekyll Island, Georgia, is part of Georgia's Sea Isles and boasts Millionaire's Village, 240 acres of extravagant homes and winter cottages recognized as a National Historic Landmark.
quotes.author: Steven B. Stern

quotes.quote: Savanna Georgia, is a bustling seaport with renowned historic districts that preserve its phenomenal nineteenth-century wealth and opulence.
quotes.author: Steven B. Stern

quotes.quote: Georgia's first city embraces contemporary cuisine while staying true to its culinary traditions.
quotes.author: Steven B. Stern

quotes.quote: St. Simons Island, Georgia, has an enthralling past of momentous eighteenth century battles and sprawling antebellum plantations. The St. Simons Lighthouse houses a fantastic museum devoted to the history of the Georgia Coast.
quotes.author: Steven B. Stern

quotes.quote: Georgia is a country that happens to have the same name as one of the US states.
quotes.author: Michael Spilling

quotes.quote: Georgia the country is located in the Caucasus region on the eastern side of the Black Sea.
quotes.author: Michael Spilling

quotes.quote: Modern Georgia is trying to capitalize on its amazing natural and cultural assets by promoting its tourism industry.
quotes.author: Michael Spilling

quotes.quote: When the Soviet Union fell apart in 1991, Georgia became an independent country once again. Since that time, it has been trying to create itself as a representative, democratic republic with a multi-party system.
quotes.author: Michael Spilling

quotes.quote: Georgia is a relatively small country straddling two continents, Europe and Asia. Given that the line between Europe and Asia is an imaginary, human-made division and not a natural one, the exact border is subject to disagreement.
quotes.author: Michael Spilling

quotes.quote: You'd be hard pressed to find a Georgian who hasn't, at one stage in his or her life, written a poem.
quotes.author: Gela Chkvanava

quotes.quote: Many things is Georgia are in a poor state, yet it's one of the most heart warming and exciting of all European destinations. This is above all due to its people, who are some of the most hospitable and generous you could meet anywhere.
quotes.author: Tim Burford

quotes.quote: There's quite a wide range of climates in Georgia, from the warm, humid, subtropical Black Sea coast, via the colder, wet, alpine climate of the Caucasus, to the arid steppes of the east.
quotes.author: Tim Burford

quotes.quote: Georgia was the first Soviet republic to elect a non-communist government.
quotes.author: Tim Burford

quotes.quote: The tourist potential of Georgia is immense and it appeals to foreign investors, especially the tourism sector.
quotes.author: Tim Burford

quotes.quote: Georgia has a wonderful and highly distinctive tradition of polyphonic singing, which developed several hundred years before it appeared in western Europe.
quotes.author: Tim Burford

quotes.quote: Now to escape involves not just running away, but arriving somewhere.
quotes.author: Bernhard Schlink

quotes.quote: Escape is a commodity like anything else.
quotes.author: Iain Banks

quotes.quote: What you cannot escape, you must fight; what you cannot fight, you must endure.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: He left because the world is not made to accommodate people like him.
quotes.author: Michael Finkel

quotes.quote: Once you get away from wanting to get paid, you can actually say some true things
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Get away from the crowd when you can. Keep yourself to yourself, if only for a few hours daily.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: To run away from trouble is a form of cowardice and, while it is true that the suicide braves death, he does it not for some noble object but to escape some ill.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If you should escape the censure of others, hope not to escape your own.
quotes.author: Henry Home

quotes.quote: No one gets away with evil. Judgment always comes, only the timing is uncertain.
quotes.author: Pat Robertson

quotes.quote: Let's get away from all the clever humans who put words in our mouth let's only say what our hearts desire.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The secret to getting away with lying, is believing with all your heart. That goes for lying to yourself even more so than lying to another.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bear

quotes.quote: To get away from one's working environment is, in a sense, to get away from one's self; and this is often the chief advantage of travel and change.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: You don't need to know what you're escaping from to become a fugitive.
quotes.author: Bella Pollen

quotes.quote: You can't escape what you are, but you also should know what you could be. Why you're fighting.
quotes.author: Pittacus Lore

quotes.quote: You can't get away from yourself by moving from one place to another.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Reality is what you can get away with.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: You can never really get away you can only take yourself somewhere else.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schwab

quotes.quote: You can get away with saying much more with humor than you can with a straight face.
quotes.author: Sherry Argov

quotes.quote: To escape from the world means that one's mind is not concerned with the opinions of the world.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: To escape death, she'd become death.
quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.quote: Good posture and an attitude let you get away with anything.
quotes.author: Lorna Landvik

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need to get away for a few weeks just to figure out who you are again.
quotes.author: Judd Apatow

quotes.quote: Escape is not a dirty word. None of us can face what's happening head-on all of the time.
quotes.author: Sheldon B. Kopp

quotes.quote: They're on our right, they're on our left, they're in front of us, they're behind us; they can't get away from us this time.
quotes.author: Chesty Puller

quotes.quote: Best way to get away from negative feelings and emotions is to involve ourselves without getting involved. It comes by practice and is beneficial for our health; be it physical, mental, emotional or spiritual.
quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

quotes.quote: You have to escape from management land and get in touch with your people.
quotes.author: David Cottrell

quotes.quote: Nobody ever did, or ever will, escape the consequences of his choices.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: No one can escape life's pain. That's life.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.quote: Your fears never go away. You just get more comfortable ignoring them.
quotes.author: Jason Ritter

quotes.quote: To get away well is so very much! And to get away well is often so very difficult!
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: We must escape our illusions of correctness to understand the actions and beliefs of others.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.quote: You can get away with stuff in a one-page story that you can't get away with in a book.
quotes.author: Joel Stein

quotes.quote: Once you get away from where you're from, you look at it in a different way.
quotes.author: Deana Carter

quotes.quote: Escape from boredom is one of the really powerful desires of almost all human beings.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: You cannot escape necessities, but you can overcome them.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: You can't escape moral judgment through a legal loop hole.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: If you get far enough away you'll be on your way back home.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: A man trying to escape never thinks himself sufficiently concealed.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Anybody who gets away with something will come back to get away with a little bit more.
quotes.author: Harold C. Schonberg

quotes.quote: We all try to escape pain and death, while we seek what is pleasant.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Powerful people get away with things. That's one way to demonstrate their difference from the rest of us.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Janeway

quotes.quote: No matter how far you travel, you can never get away from yourself.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Just because you escape one trap, doesn't mean you will escape the next.
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: We're all running away. Some of us just don't get very far.
quotes.author: John Dunning

quotes.quote: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: You're trying to escape from your difficulties, and there never is any escape from difficulties, never. They have to be faced and fought.
quotes.author: Enid Blyton

quotes.quote: You can get away with anything as long as it works.
quotes.author: Darryl Pinckney

quotes.quote: The further you get away from yourself, the more challenging it is. Not to be in your comfort zone is great fun.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: Life will let you get away with something for a while, but sooner or later, you will pay the price. Everything you do in life causes the effects that you experience. When you get the bill, be prepared to pay.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: Tell everyone that your mistakes are art. You can get away with a lot that way.
quotes.author: Robert Rodriguez

quotes.quote: You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you’ll discover will be wonderful. What you’ll discover is yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: You don’t choose the day you enter the world and you don’t choose the day you leave. It’s what you do in between that makes all the difference.
quotes.author: Anita Septimus

quotes.quote: You can't run away from yourself.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: You can always improve your situation. But you do so by facing it, not by running away.
quotes.author: Brad Warner

quotes.quote: Shame occurs when you haven't been able to get away with the 'who' you want people to think you are.
quotes.author: Carl Whitaker

quotes.quote: Only one feat is possible not to have run away.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You can run but you can't hide.
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.quote: Running away was easy not knowing what to do next was the hard part
quotes.author: Glenda Millard

quotes.quote: When someone is trying very hard to get something, they don't. And when they're running away from something as hard as they can, it usually catches up with them.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I need to stop fantasizing about running away to some other life and start figuring out the one I have.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: Jobs fill your pocket, adventures fill your soul
quotes.author: Jaime Lyn Beatty

quotes.quote: Normal is not something to aspire to, it's something to get away from.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: Life doesn't run away from nobody. Life runs at people.
quotes.author: Joe Frazier

quotes.quote: Don't worry about losing. If it is right, it happens. The main thing is not to hurry. Nothing good gets away.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Running away will never make you free.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.quote: If you're trying to hide something, you wouldn't keep getting away with it for 10 years. Nobody is that clever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Stop leaving and you will arrive, Stop searching and you will see, Stop running away and you will be found.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: You learned to run from what you feel, and that's why you have nightmares. To deny is to invite madness. To accept is to control.
quotes.author: Megan Chance

quotes.quote: Trying to run away is never the answer to being a fully human. Running away from the immediacy of our experience is like preferring death to life.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: I'd like to get away from earth awhile. And then come back to it and begin over.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The World is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: If you don’t get lost, there’s a chance you may never be found.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it, or learn from it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Life hurrying past us and running away, too strong to stop, too sweet to lose.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: I tell you the past is a bucket of ashes, so live not in your yesterdays, no just for tomorrow, but in the here and now. Keep moving and forget the post mortems; and remember, no one can get the jump on the future.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Get over it. Get on with your life.
quotes.author: Sally Field

quotes.quote: You don't get over it. You move past it. You move through it. You lose yourself to find it, and when found, it's yours and no longer theirs.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: Get over it - If you have a bad workout or run a bad race, allow yourself exactly 1 hour to stew about it-then move on.
quotes.author: Steve Scott

quotes.quote: Don't get stuck with the thing that ruins your day. Smile and be happy. Life is too short to be wasted on negative thinking.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: You can't change what has already happened so don't waste your time thinking about it. Move on, let go, and get over it.
quotes.author: Orebela Gbenga

quotes.quote: I think that everybody needs somebody to really look up to and know that even though you're going through a tough time, you'll get over it.
quotes.author: Bella Thorne

quotes.quote: Recovery is something that you have to work on every single day and it's something that it doesn't get a day off.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: I've always believed that if you don't stay moving, they will throw dirt on you.
quotes.author: Paul Anka

quotes.quote: Some of think that holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it's letting go.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse
