quotes.quote: Get a grip, get a life, and get over it.
quotes.author: Justin Johnson

quotes.quote: I had turned away from the picture and was going back to the world where events move, men change, light flickers, life flows in a clear stream, no matter whether over mud or over stones.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: All love gets over, and we must get over it.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: If you keep telling the same sad small story, you will keep living the same sad small life.
quotes.author: Jean Houston

quotes.quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars: you have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Cry me a river, build a bridge, and get over it.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: Get over it and get started, life is too short to hesitate.
quotes.author: Blaze Olamiday

quotes.quote: Get mad, then get over it.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Get over it - Life isn't Supposed to be fair. Get over yourself, and be of service to others.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: I decided I can't pay a person to rewind time, so I may as well get over it.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: You were many wonderful things to many people before you met him--don't let this one event define who you are.
quotes.author: Mary Esselman

quotes.quote: There are some things that you'll never get over, but if you use all of your strength there's nothing that you can't get through.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Sometimes people let the same problem make them miserable for years when they could just say, 'So what.' That's one of my favorite things to say. So what.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Try not to resist the changes that come your way. Instead, let life live through you. And do not worry that your life is turning upside down. How do you know that the side you are used to is better than the one to come.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: It is time for me to let go of my old beliefs about how relationships are supposed to be.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: You must make a decision that you are going to move on. It won’t happen automatically. You will have to rise up and say, ‘I don’t care how hard this is, I don’t care how disappointed I am, I’m not going to let this get the best of me. I’m moving on with my life.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: He loved me. He loved me, but he doesn’t love me anymore, and it’s not the end of the world.
quotes.author: Jennifer Weiner

quotes.quote: You may have a fresh start any moment you choose, for this thing that we call ‘failure’ is not the falling down, but the staying down.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: What’s broken is broken — and I’d rather remember it as it was than mend it and see the broken places as long as I lived.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: Don’t allow someone not worth it to have the power to occupy your thoughts. If they don’t find you worth the effort or the time, why should you waste yours?
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: You’ve got to make a conscious choice every day to shed the old – whatever “the old” means for you.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: I think there comes a point where you have to grow up and get over yourself, lighten up…and forgive.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: What's done is done.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There will be times when it seems that it would be best to just call him and see how he's doing. Don't deceive yourself, you don't care about how he's doing, you're just craving him, don't do it. You'll only hurt yourself.
quotes.author: Osayi Osar-Emokpae

quotes.quote: Some people don't realize what they have until it's gone, but that does not always mean they are supposed to get it back.
quotes.author: Stephan Labossiere

quotes.quote: If Paris is the setting for a romance, New York is the perfect city in which to get over one, to get over anything. Here the lost douceur de vivre is forgotten and the intoxication of living takes over.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: When you reach 95, after you get over your surprise, you start looking back.
quotes.author: Kirk Douglas

quotes.quote: I'm not an Uncle Tom.. I'm going to be here for forty years. For those who don't like it, get over it.
quotes.author: U.S. Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas

quotes.quote: A slip of the foot you may soon recover, but a slip of the tongue you may never get over.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Look ahead and move on, but be totally in the present.
quotes.author: Sukan Sethi

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on who let you down, dwell on who helped you back up.
quotes.author: Tech N9ne

quotes.quote: See that any time you feel pained or defeated, it is only because you insist on clinging to what doesn't work. Dare to let go and you won't lose a thing except for a punishing idea.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead focus on what to do next.
quotes.author: Dimz Media

quotes.quote: Most fear is just bad management of our own mental faculties. Get over it.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: 90% of what's stressing you today will be irrelevant in a year. Get over it. Move on and enjoy your life.
quotes.author: Terrence J.

quotes.quote: Never let anyone tell you how many tears you can cry and never allow anyone to tell you “to just get over it”, healing is a process. Do things in your own way and on your own terms.
quotes.author: Nichola L Stephenson

quotes.quote: Don’t tell someone to get over it. Help them get through it.
quotes.author: The Evolutionary Business Council

quotes.quote: Leaders spend 5 percent of their time on the problem and 95 percent of their time on the solution. Get over it and crush it!
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: In fact, it may even be necessary to confront defeat. It might be necessary to get over it; all the way through it; and go on...
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Why would anyone want to get over the one thing you hope for from the minute you're born and remember until the day you die?
quotes.author: Arvide Abernathy

quotes.quote: I know it hurts sometimes but you'll get over it / You'll find another life to live / I swear that you'll get over it / I know you're sad and tired / You've got nothing left to give / You'll find another life to live / I know that you'll get over it.
quotes.author: Don Cannon; Ivision Smith; Anthony Michael West; etal.

quotes.quote: As my heart is slowly ripping into pieces / Disconnecting from the circuits of my mind / You'll get over it you say in time / In time? / If the clocks are black absorbing everything but / A remembering how we made it that / Clocks are black / You say get over it if 50 is the new black, / hooray this could be your lucky day / But my cables they are surging almost / overloading as you disengage.
quotes.author: Myra Ellen Tori Amos

quotes.quote: I am sorry you are not feeling well. I hope you have a complete and quick recovery.
quotes.author: Blake Flannery

quotes.quote: Get well cards have become so humorous that if you don't get sick you're missing half the fun.
quotes.author: Flip Wilson

quotes.quote: The is one consolation in being sick; and that is the possibility that you may recover to a better state than you were ever in before.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You have a cough? Go home tonight, eat a whole box of Ex-Lax - tomorrow you'll be afraid to cough.
quotes.author: Pearl Williams

quotes.quote: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Health and good humor are to the human body like sunshine to vegetation.
quotes.author: Massillon

quotes.quote: Heard you're feeling not so good and need some cheering up, something that would brighten your day and says you're valued much we pray that you will feel God's love and know that He is near and that we all are thinking of you and want to show we care.
quotes.author: M.S.Lowndes

quotes.quote: May God's love overshadow you at this time you feel unwell and know we're here thinking of you and praying for your good health.
quotes.author: M.S.Lowndes

quotes.quote: If knowing that someone really cares, helps healing along its way then I hope you now feel better and keep improving, day by day.
quotes.author: Jon Bratton

quotes.quote: Happiness is your dentist telling you it won't hurt and then having him catch his hand in the drill.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Thinking of you and praying for you for a fresh touch from the Lord, so you will get well and be strengthened again to be whole and completely restored.
quotes.author: M.S.Lowndes

quotes.quote: Here's us hoping avidly, your recovery will be trouble free and very soon we shall see you fit as fit can be.
quotes.author: Jon Bratton

quotes.quote: I am praying that you have the strength and the peace to get you though your illness.
quotes.author: Blake Flannery

quotes.quote: I was starting to think that you were invincible. It's good to know that you are human after all. I'm looking forward to you getting back to your invincible self. Get well soon, superman.
quotes.author: Blake Flannery

quotes.quote: When I see the moon I think of you so get well soon and you'll be good as knew.
quotes.author: Ellice Booth

quotes.quote: I just wanted to write you to encourage you to stay strong and to let you know you are in my thoughts and prayers.
quotes.author: Blake Flannery

quotes.quote: Okay, so today you are feeling low. But soon you will be better you know. Listen to the doctors you meet And before you know it you'll be back on your feet.
quotes.author: C. Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Remember what I say, your getting better by the day.
quotes.author: Nana

quotes.quote: It's nice to hear you're doing well and convalescing fast, and here's a wish that your good health will last and last and last.
quotes.author: Jon Bratton

quotes.quote: The treatment is really a cooperative of a trinityâ€“the patient, the doctor and the inner doctor.
quotes.author: Ralph Bircher

quotes.quote: This card is sent to cheer you As you're confined to bed I'm sure it'll feel all worthwhile In the happier days ahead.
quotes.author: John Walter Bratton

quotes.quote: Get well soon my dear, your the only one in my life may Lord be with you for the quick recovery.
quotes.author: Jentrinda Banda

quotes.quote: If I had my way, I'd make health catching instead of disease.
quotes.author: Robert Ingersoll

quotes.quote: We're sorry you're feeling poorly, the (factory's) empty of your laughter so get yourself well, cos we miss you, mate you're a much sought after grafter.
quotes.author: Jon Bratton

quotes.quote: I heard youre feeling blue today and wanted you to know friends are all around you till the dark skies are to go when you're down and want to smile but havent found the strength just open up this little card and feel the love Ive sent.
quotes.author: Maggie

quotes.quote: A bad cold wouldn't be so annoying if it weren't for the advice of our friends.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: If these flowers were wishes, then my wish for you is to get well soon.
quotes.author: Nana

quotes.quote: For life is not to live, but to be well.
quotes.author: Martial

quotes.quote: Wishing that each day brings your renewed strength, brighter times, and a healthier, happier you. Get well soon.
quotes.author: Jahanzab Waheed

quotes.quote: A slip of the foot you may soon recover, but a slip of the tongue you may never get over.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Your well-being is of great concern and your absence deeply felt. Get well soon cause no one else knows how to run the computer!
quotes.author: Madelaine Turner

quotes.quote: You are coping with your illness with the strength, courage, and the positive attitude that you have had for as long as I have known you.
quotes.author: Madeleine Turner

quotes.quote: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Perhaps the most important thing we ever give each other is our attention...A loving silence often has far more power to heal and to connect than the most well-intentioned words.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: Only after you've accepted your situation can you begin to recover from it.
quotes.author: Jena Pincott

quotes.quote: You may surprise yourself with your ability cope with and eventually accept, even the most challenging situations.
quotes.author: Jena Pincott

quotes.quote: The comfort of knowing you're not alone is in itself remarkably healing.
quotes.author: Jena Pincott

quotes.quote: Simple presence is the artery through which health pulses; Simple contact is the vein that restores universal healing.
quotes.author: Jesus of Nazareth

quotes.quote: Your medicine is in you, and you do not observe it. Your ailment is from yourself, and you do not register it.
quotes.author: Hazrat Ali

quotes.quote: True medicine only arises from the creative knowledge of the last and deepest powers of the whole universe; only he who grasps the innermost nature of man can cure him in earnest.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Always laugh when you can. It is cheap medicine.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Much of your pain is self-chosen. It is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Most of the time we think we're sick, it's all in the mind.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.quote: Know that healing can be yours with time, effort, and desire. Know you can laugh again, can enjoy life again.
quotes.author: Sally Peters Roll

quotes.quote: Throughout history, ‘tender loving care’ has uniformly been recognized as a valuable element in healing.
quotes.author: Larry Dossey

quotes.quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.quote: A cheerful heart is a good medicine…
quotes.author: Proverbs 17:22

quotes.quote: Sleep, riches, and health to be truly enjoyed must be interrupted.
quotes.author: Johann Paul Friedrich Richter

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A Jewish woman had two chickens. One got sick, so the woman made chicken soup out of the other one to help the sick one get well.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: To array, a man's will against his sickness is the supreme art of medicine.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: I hated roses. I hated them for being so trite, so clichéd, a default, all-purpose flower that said I love you, I'm sorry, and get well soon. Give me peonies and tulips, orchids, or gardenia. Those were flowers with character.
quotes.author: Justina Chen

quotes.quote: Everything in moderation including moderation.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: The best of healers is good cheer.
quotes.author: Pindus

quotes.quote: I reckon being ill as one of the great pleasures of life, provided one is not too ill and is not obliged to work till one is better.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: M. Kathleen Casey

quotes.quote: A shop-bought card saying Get Well Soon. Didn't seem to fit the bill. This handmade card hopes that pretty soon... ...You'll be galloping up that hill.
quotes.author: John Walter Bratton

quotes.quote: The most important thing in illness is never to lose heart.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: I enjoy convalescence. It is the part that makes the illness worthwhile.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up. Let your reason get you back up.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: You do what you can for as long as you can, and when you finally can't, you do the next best thing. You back up but you don't give up.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.quote: Leaders believe that falling is not failing, but refusal to rise up after falling is the real form of failure!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: As long as you've done your best, making mistakes doesn't matter. You and I are human; we will mess up. What counts is learning from your mistakes and getting back up when life has knocked you down.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: No matter how many times you get knocked down, keep getting back up. God sees your resolve. He sees your determination. And when you do everything you can do, that's when God will step in and do what you can't do.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: I'm most proud of the blessings that God has bestowed upon me, in my life. He's given me the vision to truly see that you can fall down, but you can still get back up. Hopefully I'll learn from my mistakes and have the opportunity to strengthen and improve the next thing I do.
quotes.author: Martin Lawrence

quotes.quote: You take a crash, you get back up and next time you succeed and that's a great feeling.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: When real people fall down in life, they get right back up and keep walking.
quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.quote: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It is easy to fall, but hard to rise.
quotes.author: Dann Moudry

quotes.quote: Those who mastered in the art of falling have no fear of rising!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.quote: It's not up to you how you fall. Its up to you how far you let yourself fall and how long it takes you to get back up and stand on your own two feet
quotes.author: Sr. Tac Jeffrey Mitchell

quotes.quote: Being defeated is often temporary, giving up makes it permanent.
quotes.author: Marilyn von Savant

quotes.quote: Fall seven times. Stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: For every failure, there's an alternative course of action. You just have to find it. When you come to a roadblock, take a detour.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It's not the failures in our life that define us, it's the moments when we decide that getting back up is all that matters
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: Everyone falls down. Getting back up is how you learn how to walk.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The most beautiful people I've known are those who have known trials, have known struggles, have known loss, and have found their way out of the depths.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Anyone can give up, it's the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone else would understand if you fell apart, that's true strength.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Keep going, keep going come what may.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Life ... is not about how fast you run or even with what degree of grace. It's about perseverance, about staying on your feet and slogging forward no matter what.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A champion is someone who gets up, even when he can't.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's better to start over than to give up entirely.
quotes.author: Kevin Ngo

quotes.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success one step beyond their greatest failure.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: You drown not by falling into a river, but by staying submerged in it.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The secret of life isn't what happens to you, but what you do with what happens to you.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: It's hard to beat a person that never gives up.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: A Quitter never wins-and-a Winner never quits.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Falling and getting back up is what brings you success.
quotes.author: Tony Horton

quotes.quote: When life knocks you down, Get back up and fight harder.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We have one treasure left; the daring after despair.
quotes.author: Yitzhak Lamden

quotes.quote: Success is sweet: the sweeter if long delayed and attained through manifold struggles and defeats.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Whatever you're going through, many others have not only experienced the same but got out of it just fine.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Once you choose hope, anything's possible
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: The first step is you have to say that you can
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: They showed you no respect / What kept you driven then / What kept you going in the ring / And getting back up to fight for a different end.
quotes.author: D. Arnold

quotes.quote: We all fall down / It's the getting' back up that really counts / We live and we learn / To help someone up when it's their turn.
quotes.author: Arlis Albritton

quotes.quote: And your worlds stop when your falling out of love / But it's not the fall that's so hard / It's the getting back up.
quotes.author: Cannon Goodman

quotes.quote: I Already told you that falling is easy / It's getting back up that becomes the problem / If you don't believe you can find a way out / You become the problem.
quotes.author: Catherine Roseanne Dennis

quotes.quote: Even if you fall, it isn't over / You're here 'til the end / Nothing's stopping you / From getting back up again.
quotes.author: Stefano Giorgini

quotes.quote: Falling down is life / Living is getting back up again.
quotes.author: Kellen McGregor

quotes.quote: Everybody trips and everybody falls / But you gotta keep getting back up / Some people quit and that's why they lose / But you know that don't have to be us.
quotes.author: Adam Stuart Argyle

quotes.quote: There's something to be said about / Straight on knees and falling down / Getting' right back up again / And givin' all you have to give.
quotes.author: Danielle Peck

quotes.quote: I'm rising up / Up to the streets / And you're gonna feel / The rhythm of me / I'm rising up / You're gonna see / You're gonna see / You can't stop me.
quotes.author: Ricky Summer

quotes.quote: Rising up, straight to the top / Had the guts, got the glory / Went the distance, now I'm not going to stop / Just a man and his will to survive.
quotes.author: Jim Peterik

quotes.quote: I'm rising up this time / through the hands of time.
quotes.author: Roger Dale Jr Clem

quotes.quote: The best part of falling is getting back up again.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: There is no shame in falling down but there is pride in getting back up.
quotes.author: Lilly Singh

quotes.quote: It's all about... getting back up and getting back to work and striving to be the best you can be.
quotes.author: Robbie Lawler

quotes.quote: You can't lose confidence in yourself, or you've lost already. When you get knocked down, you've got to keep getting back up.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.quote: Get knocked down. Get back up. Always be a fighter. Don't be afraid of the punch. Don't be afraid of getting back up. Be afraid of giving up.
quotes.author: Maria Kanellis

quotes.quote: When you get knocked down, don't stay down; get back up again. Nothing good is going to happen as long as you're down on yourself.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Life is easy when you're hot. But what happens when the ball bounces the other way? You just keep getting back up and climbing up.
quotes.author: Bill Walton

quotes.quote: There comes a time in your life, when you walk away from all the drama and people who create it. You surround yourself with people who make you laugh. Forget the bad and focus on the good. Love the people who treat you right, pray for the ones who do not. Life is too short to be anything but happy. Falling down is a part of life, getting back up is living.
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: In life its not about falling down or not, it's about getting back up.
quotes.author: Nathan Hangen

quotes.quote: You will face hard times in life. Sometimes they are supposed to come, sometimes not. Get through them no matter what, 'cause the good life is always on the other side.
quotes.author: F.C.

quotes.quote: When setbacks arise - and they will from time to time - regroup, recharge, refocus and refine.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Nothing or no one is going to rescue you from your current situation. You must take control of your own well-being and forge your own path to happiness and fulfillment.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: One of the things is we tend to give up too soon. We get knocked down a couple of times, and we stay down. It's so important to get back up again.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: If one dream dies, dream another dream. If you get knocked down, get back up and go again.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Sometimes you fall down, but you have to pick yourself back up.
quotes.author: Vitor Belfort

quotes.quote: It's really sad sometimes that you have to go to that extreme bottom to find your way back up, but it's true.
quotes.author: Ivan Moody

quotes.quote: Everybody, at some point in their life, has fallen down and not felt like getting back up, but you have to, no matter how difficult it is.
quotes.author: Charlie Hunnam

quotes.quote: My drug of choice is love. Sure, I've tried other drugs, but no other drug gets both the dealer and user high from every transaction.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: I don't get high, but sometimes I wish I did. That way, when I messed up in life I would have an excuse. But right now there's no rehab for stupidity.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: I don't need anything to get high. I'm high on life.
quotes.author: Melissa de la Cruz

quotes.quote: Be drunk in love and high on life.
quotes.author: Karen Quan

quotes.quote: People don't want other people to get high, because if you get high, you might see the falsity of the fabric of the society we live in.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: Getting high off life is more than enough, and peer pressure ain't peer pressure when a boy is tough.
quotes.author: Kool Moe Dee

quotes.quote: I got high, and forgot I wasn't supposed to get high.
quotes.author: Ricky Williams

quotes.quote: I kept getting high to kill my shame at the fact that I kept getting high.
quotes.author: Jerry Stahl

quotes.quote: If love is a form of substance abuse, I hope to die high.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: I be getting high just to balance out the lows.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Don't spend your life getting high on drugs, get high on life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Marijuana enhances our mind in a way that enables us to take a different perspective from 'high up', to see and evaluate our own lives and the lives of others in a privileged way. Maybe this euphoric and elevating feeling of the ability to step outside the box and to look at life’s patterns from this high perspective is the inspiration behind the slang term 'high' itself.
quotes.author: Sebastian Marincolo

quotes.quote: My mind may be sober, but my confidence is high!
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: Flying starts from the ground. The more grounded you are, the higher you fly.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: Herb is the healing of a nation, alcohol is the destruction.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Alcohol and marijuana, if used in moderation, plus loud, usually low-class music, make stress and boredom infinitely more bearable.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: I know you’re supposed to tell kids not to do drugs, but, kids, do it! Do weed! Don’t do the other stuff, but weed is good!
quotes.author: Kevin Smith

quotes.quote: Everything is better with a bag of weed.
quotes.author: Stewie Griffin

quotes.quote: Struggle is the enemy, but weed is the remedy.
quotes.author: Kid Cudi

quotes.quote: Is marijuana addictive? Yes, in the sense that most of the really pleasant things in life are worth endlessly repeating.
quotes.author: Richard Neville

quotes.quote: Alcohol and marijuana, if used in moderation, plus loud, usually low-class music, make stress and boredom infinitely more bearable.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: He doesn't want to get high. He wants to avoid the pain of withdrawal. If he doesn't make it through rehab, he'll just go back to heroin and keep using it until it kills him.
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.quote: How many special people change? / How many lives are living strange? / Where were you while we were getting high?
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.quote: If you see me getting mighty if you see me getting high / Knock me down / I'm not bigger than life
quotes.author: Anthony Kiedis

quotes.quote: The two of us are getting high / We don't need drugs 'cause we know how to fly
quotes.author: James Mcleish Reid

quotes.quote: Corrupting in the air / I really need you / You got two play rides / I really love them / My we're getting high / Are we getting high
quotes.author: Iggy Pop

quotes.quote: I'm on a high, I'm on a high / there's nothing more to it / We are the sea and the sky / and the blue that runs through it
quotes.author: Duncan Sheik

quotes.quote: I'm on a high I'm on a high / and there's nothing more to it / I have the sun, it's a star / why should I refuse it
quotes.author: Duncan Sheik

quotes.quote: We were on the low, but you were getting high with me / When it's past 11, that's a different side I see
quotes.author: Andrew Watt

quotes.quote: Getting high off the ground / We're fading away / Lost and not found
quotes.author: William Frederick

quotes.quote: I was gonna clean my room until I got high / I was gonna get up and find the broom but then I got high / My room is still messed up and I know why (why, man?) / Yeah, hey / Cause I got high
quotes.author: Afroman

quotes.quote: I was gonna go to class before I got high (come on, y'all) / (Check it out) / I could have cheated and I could have passed but I got high / I am taking it next semester and I know why (why, man?) / Yeah, hey / Cause I got high
quotes.author: Afroman

quotes.quote: I wasn't gonna run from the cops / But I was high (I'm serious man) / I was gonna pull right over and stop / But I was high / Now I am a paraplegic and I know why (why man?) / Cause I got high
quotes.author: Afroman

quotes.quote: Oh, come on, pop. All my friends smoke pot and they're not criminals.
quotes.author: Ib Melchior

quotes.quote: Listen, when I was growing pot, I realized that the more seeds I planted, the more pot I could ultimately smoke
quotes.author: Judd Apatow

quotes.quote: Well, maybe if pot made them peaceful, we all should take pot.
quotes.author: Michael Wadleigh

quotes.quote: I promised her if I ever smoked the pot I would do it with her.
quotes.author: Marta Kauffman

quotes.quote: You beautiful, stupid young man. That is not pot. It's hashish, Moroccan, and the finest.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Did we come all the way to Europe just to smoke pot? We did that everyday when we were in college. Why don't we go check out a museum or something?
quotes.author: Eli Roth

quotes.quote: We didn't have rehab back in the seventies. Back in the seventies rehab meant you'd stop doing coke, but kept smoking pot and drinking for a couple more weeks.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: Pot balances me out. Pot brings me up. That's I smoke it if I'm going to be drinking.
quotes.author: Charlie Kaufman

quotes.quote: The two drugs contrast in some respects. Alcohol depresses the nervous system; marijuana does not.
quotes.author: John Charles Chasteen

quotes.quote: High doses, the drinker may experience difficulty walking or, famously, pronouncing words, and may black out or even, in extreme cases, die.
quotes.author: John Charles Chasteen

quotes.quote: Scientific research now demonstrates that marijuana is a medical drug, too.
quotes.author: John Charles Chasteen

quotes.quote: Cannabis has always figured in the pharmacopoeias of Europe and China, although these traditional medical uses, such as hemp seed oil in the ear for earache, or cannabis-leaf poultices on a sprain, did not involve getting high.
quotes.author: John Charles Chasteen

quotes.quote: Marijuana or by its botanical name Cannabis sativa, has been cultivated worldwide for centuries.
quotes.author: Tatiana Shohov

quotes.quote: The Cannabis plant, also raised for the production of hemp fiber, is more generally grown and consumed(smoked) for its medicinal and psychoactive effects.
quotes.author: Tatiana Shohov

quotes.quote: Marijuana use was legal under state and federal law, but it was smoked more to achieve intoxication than to relieve medical symptoms.
quotes.author: Tatiana Shohov

quotes.quote: Despite law enforcement's efforts to control its distribution and use, marijuana has over the years acquired a reputation as the most widely used illicit substance in the nation.
quotes.author: Tatiana Shohov

quotes.quote: When a young person starts out with drugs, at first there is curiosity and excitement.
quotes.author: Edward J. Benavidez

quotes.quote: As tolerance to the drug increases, the dose needed for a satisfactory high becomes overwhelming so the expense goes up exponentially.
quotes.author: Edward J. Benavidez

quotes.quote: Maybe if we choose who we love more carefully we limit the possibility of getting hurt.
quotes.author: Lee Monroe

quotes.quote: What hurts us is what heals us.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Sometimes, being hurt too many times, doesn't make you stronger, it destroy who you were, who you wanted to be and makes who you are today.
quotes.author: Rafael Prado

quotes.quote: The easiest way to avoid getting hurt is to stop caring but not caring is the hardest thing to do.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Why waste your time getting hurt by someone when there's someone else out there waiting to make you happy.
quotes.author: Cyrille Dayao

quotes.quote: The things which hurt, instruct.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Growing up is all about getting hurt. And then getting over it. You hurt. You recover. You move on. Odds are pretty good you're just going to get hurt again. But each time, you learn something.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: When you can't remember why you're hurt, that's when you're healed.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: We rarely grow when we're happy, we grow when we hurt.
quotes.author: Maggie Q

quotes.quote: Forgive those who have hurt you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: As much as it hurts, I would rather miss someone than hit someone.
quotes.author: Brian Celio

quotes.quote: I still own my heart, which I know because it hurts so much.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: We are injured and hurt emotionally, not so much by other people or what they say and don't say, but by our own attitude and our own response.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: It is when we hurt that we learn.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Being hurt by someone you truly care about leaves a hole in you heart that only love can fill.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I've been hurt but I'll continue to love, for that gives me courage to go on with my life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you are in love and you get hurt, it's like a cut it will heal, but there will always be a scar.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's always better to be hurt by the truth than be comforted with a lie.
quotes.author: Deodatta V. Shenai-Khatkhate

quotes.quote: No one can hurt you without teaching a life's lesson. So accept it with love and kindness.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha, M.D.

quotes.quote: Give the world the best you have and you may get hurt. Give the world your best anyway.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: I have never been hurt by anything I didn't say.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: We want to hurt others but don't want to be hurt in return.
quotes.author: KIZZA RONALD

quotes.quote: To hurt is as human as to breathe.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Just because one person's problem is less traumatic than another's doesn't mean they're required to hurt less.
quotes.author: J.A. Redmerski

quotes.quote: The deepest wounds aren't the ones we get from other people hurting us. They are the wounds we give ourselves when we hurt other people.
quotes.author: Isobelle Carmody

quotes.quote: You'll stop hurting when you stop hoping.
quotes.author: Guillaume Musso

quotes.quote: You decide for yourself when it will hurt.
quotes.author: Per Petterson

quotes.quote: The truth doesn't hurt unless it ought to.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: All hurt is brain hurt.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: When you have a heart, then you will be getting the hurt.
quotes.author: Noormohammad Bhuayan

quotes.quote: If they keep hurting you, love them and stay or love yourself and leave.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: T's not what others have said that hurt us the most. It's the lies we believed about ourselves that caused us the most pain and hurt.
quotes.author: Buky Ojelabi

quotes.quote: When someone hurts you time and time again, accept the fact that they dont care about you. Its a tough pill to swallow, but its necessary medicine.
quotes.author: Melchor Lim

quotes.quote: A man is not hurt so much by what happens, as by his opinion of what happens.
quotes.author: Michel Eyquem De Montaigne

quotes.quote: You don't have to cry on everything that hurts you - sometimes, it is better to show how strong you are than to make them prove that they can make you die!
quotes.author: Mary Rose Magnaye

quotes.quote: Even when someone hurts you, you choose how to struggle, resist, deny and receive.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: God never wastes a hurt.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: When people hurt you over and over, think of them like sandpaper. They may scratch and hurt you a bit, but in the end you end up polished and they end up useless.
quotes.author: Andy Biersack

quotes.quote: Don't ask them WHY they hurt you, because all they'll tell you is lies and excuses. Just know they were wrong, and try to move on.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: No man is hurt but by himself.
quotes.author: Diogenes of Sinope

quotes.quote: To go through hurt, you have to stumble on the rocks in order to walk on solid ground.
quotes.author: Alyssa Tillmon

quotes.quote: Some people use their own hurt as an excuse for hurting others.
quotes.author: Roland Merullo

quotes.quote: No matter how far life pushes you down, no matter how much you hurt, you can always bounce back.
quotes.author: Sheryl Swoopes

quotes.quote: What you don't know can't hurt you.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: Hurt's a reason to change, but all the hurt in the world don't change facts.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: There are hurts so deep that one cannot reach them or heal them with words.
quotes.author: Kate Seredy

quotes.quote: A remark generally hurts in proportion to its truth.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: There are many things that keep me from getting married. But there will be a time when marriage makes sense to me.
quotes.author: Adam Levine

quotes.quote: The magic isn't in getting married, it's in staying married.
quotes.author: Derek Luke

quotes.quote: Getting married and settling down isn't the most important thing in my life.
quotes.author: Liam Neeson

quotes.quote: Writing is like getting married. One should never commit oneself until one is amazed at one's luck.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: My advice to you is to get married. If you find a good wife, you'll be happy; if not, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Come, let's be a comfortable couple and take care of each other! How glad we shall be, that we have somebody we are fond of always, to talk to and sit with.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Love seems the swiftest but it is the slowest of all growths. No man or woman really knows what perfect love is until they have been married a quarter of a century.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Getting married isn't going to make your relationship better. It's just a ceremony.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: I guess walking slow getting married is because it gives you time to maybe change your mind.
quotes.author: Virginia Cary Hudson

quotes.quote: Getting married is like putting one's hand in a bag containing 99 serpents and one eel.
quotes.author: Thomas More

quotes.quote: Getting married was a ball. Being married was a nightmare.
quotes.author: Kid Rock

quotes.quote: When I get married I'm going to make the marriage work. Getting married is forever, no matter what my spouse does.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: Nowadays it's hip not to be married. I'm not interested in being hip.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: If he's getting married, he's not longer interesting.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: If I get married, I want to be very married.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Don't marry the person you think you can live with; marry only the individual you think you can't live without.
quotes.author: James C. Dobson

quotes.quote: Make it your goal to create a marriage that feels like the safest place on earth.
quotes.author: Greg Smalley

quotes.quote: Getting married is a lot like getting into a tub of hot water. After you get used to it, it ain't so hot.
quotes.author: Minnie Pearl

quotes.quote: Getting married is easy. Staying married is more difficult. Staying happily married for a lifetime should rank among the fine arts.
quotes.author: Roberta Flack

quotes.quote: Getting married is very much like going to a restaurant with friends. You order what you want then when you see what the other person has, you wish you had ordered that.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: You don't marry one person; you marry three: the person you think they are, the person they are, and the person they are going to become as a result of being married to you.
quotes.author: Richard Needham

quotes.quote: If you get married, you lose all your benefits. That's insane! We should give people bonuses for getting married, and sending signals and talking about it to the society.
quotes.author: Sam Brownback

quotes.quote: Instead of getting married again, I'm going to find a woman I don't like and give her a house.
quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.quote: Don't marry a man unless you would be proud to have a son exactly like him.
quotes.author: Katie Ray Blair

quotes.quote: I think that, on some level, everybody lives vicariously through couples who are getting married.
quotes.author: Amy Dickinson

quotes.quote: People today expect too much from marriage. Getting married is really like taking on a big new job.
quotes.author: Rosamunde Pilcher

quotes.quote: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: Getting married is the boldest and most idealistic thing that most of us will ever do.
quotes.author: Maggie Gallagher

quotes.quote: I think getting married gave me a focus. It gave me a focus and direction I want to have in my life. And I think having another person that you make such a purposeful bond with has given me the opportunity to see how that can be with all the other aspects of my life.
quotes.author: Selma Blair

quotes.quote: For me, getting married doesn't mean we should limit ourselves to some pre-defined idea. Rather, it's an opportunity to explore new things in life.
quotes.author: Jessica Biel

quotes.quote: For many, many people, getting married is one of the most important things they will ever do in the pursuit of happiness.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: The surest way to be alone is to get married.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
quotes.author: Nick Cave

quotes.quote: To get the full value of joy you must have someone to divide it with.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Getting married and starting a family has been a lifelong goal and one that I have persevered through different paths up to it!
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: Getting married is like trading in the adoration of many for the sarcasm of one.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: If you're getting married less you're getting less divorces.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: Getting married and really digging in with another human being can point out your greatest strengths and your greatest weaknesses.
quotes.author: Mat Kearney

quotes.quote: Getting married is an incredible act of hopefulness.
quotes.author: Ashley Judd

quotes.quote: Marriage is not forbidden to us. But instead of getting married at once, it sometimes happens we get married at last.
quotes.author: Gigi (Leslie Caron)

quotes.quote: Before a man gets married, he's like a tree in the forest. He stands there, independent, an entity unto himself. And then he's chopped down. His branches are cut-off—he's stripped off his bark—and he's thrown into the river with the rest of the logs.
quotes.author: Rock Hudson (Pillow Talk)

quotes.quote: Don't hurry. Give yourself time. It's better to be single and sad than to be married and miserable.
quotes.author: All Hands On Deck

quotes.quote: Getting married is special. I only want to do it once. Getting married is like— it's like meeting Elvis.
quotes.author: Tanya Tucker

quotes.quote: I got married when Christ died. Wasn't he 33 when he died. We both died.
quotes.author: James Woods

quotes.quote: I think marriage is a custom brought about by women who then proceed to live off men and destroy them, completely enveloping the man in a destructive cocoon or eating their way like a poisonous fungus.
quotes.author: Richard Harris

quotes.quote: He marries best who puts it off until it is too late.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Instead of getting married again, I'm going to find a woman I don't like and just give her the house.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: Marriage: A ceremony in which rings are put on a finger of the lady and through the nose of the gentleman.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: To keep your marriage brimming / With love in the loving cup, / Whenever you're wrong, admit it / Whenever you're right shut up.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Marriage may often be a stormy lake, but celibacy is almost always a muddy horse pond.
quotes.author: Thomas Love Peacock

quotes.quote: Strange to say what delight we married people have to see these poor fools decoyed into our condition.
quotes.author: Samuel Pepys

quotes.quote: But for marriage 'tis good for nothing but to make friends fall out
quotes.author: Thomas Shadwell

quotes.quote: It is a woman's business to get married as soon as possible and a man to keep unmarried as long as he can.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Marriage is popular because it combines the maximum of temptation with the maximum of opportunity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A marriage is a partnership. Responsibilities should be shared. You don't need to go overboard and create a rota or worse still a spreadsheet, but make sure you do your fair share and don't just pick all the jobs that you like.
quotes.author: Alastair Williams

quotes.quote: A successful marriage is about compromise. Two televisions might help in some circumstances.
quotes.author: Alastair Williams

quotes.quote: A happy rewarding marriage needs plenty of consideration and thought from both sides if it's to stand the test of time.
quotes.author: Alastair Williams

quotes.quote: A wedding is a licensed subject to joke upon, but there really is no great joke in the matter after all; — we speak merely of the ceremony and beg it to be distinctly understood that we indulge in no hidden sarcasm upon a married life.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I think a wedding day / Looks best, as mountains do / some miles away / Or squalid fishing-smacks far out to sea / Seen lily-sailed in the sunshine and blue-haze / Where the delicious lights are all men chase / And no man ever reaches.
quotes.author: W.H. Mallock

quotes.quote: Every time I hear that march from Lohengrin, / I am glad I'm on the outside looking in, / I have heard a lot of married people talk, / And I know that marriage is a long, long walk. / To some people weddings mean romance, / But I prefer a picnic or a dance.
quotes.author: Gus Kahn

quotes.quote: Of all life's ceremonies, that of marriage is the most touching and beautiful. This is the long-anticipated climax of girlhood— and boyhood, too—the doorway to true maturity, the farewell to parents as protectors, the acceptance of responsibility.
quotes.author: Amy Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: The sight of people getting married exhilarates me; I think that they are ding a fine thing, and I admire them for it.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: When I said I would die a bachelor, I did not think I should live till I were married.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A good marriage, if there be such, rejects the company and conditions of love. It tries to reproduce those of friendship. It is a sweet association in life, full of constancy, trust, and an infinite number of useful and solid services and mutual obligations.
quotes.author: Michel Eyquem De Montaigne

quotes.quote: Marriage has many pains, but celibacy has no pleasures.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: What is marriage, but the most sordid of bargains, the most cold and slavish of all the forms of commerce?
quotes.author: Thomas Love Peacock

quotes.quote: The one charm of marriage is that it makes a life of deception absolutely necessary for both parties.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Marriage means tyranny on one side and deceit on the other.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: Wedded love supplies the want of every other blessing in life; and as no condition can be truly happy without it, so none can be absolutely miserable with it.
quotes.author: Charlotte Lennox

quotes.quote: If you're always battling against getting older, you're always going to be unhappy, because it will happen anyhow.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: As you get older three things happen. The first is your memory goes, and the I can't remember the other two.
quotes.author: Sir Norman Wisdom

quotes.quote: There is absolutely nothing to be said in favor of growing old. There ought to be legislation against it.
quotes.author: Patrick Moore

quotes.quote: As we grow older, our bodies get shorter and our anecdotes longer.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.quote: A man is getting old when he walks around a puddle instead of through it.
quotes.author: R. C. Ferguson

quotes.quote: I don't believe one grows older. I think that what happens early on in life is that at a certain age one stands still and stagnates..
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: The great thing about getting older is that you don't lose all the other ages you've been..
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old..
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Do not regret growing older. It is a privilege denied to many.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: We turn not older with years, but newer every day.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: As we grow older, our capacity for enjoyment shrinks, but not our appetite for it.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The older you get the stronger the wind gets - and it's always in your face.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: As a man grows older it is harder and harder to frighten him.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: My mother always used to say, 'The older you get, the better you get, unless you're a banana'.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: The older I grow the more I distrust thefamiliar doctrine that age brings wisdom.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Some folks as they grow older grow wisebut most folks simply grow stubborner.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: There are compensations for growing older. One is the realization that to be sporting isn't at all necessary. It is a great relief to reach this stage of wisdom.
quotes.author: Cornelia Otis Skinner

quotes.quote: As we grow older, we must discipline ourselves to continue expanding, broadening, learning, keeping out minds active and open.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: As we grow older we grow both more foolish and wiser at the same time.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: I have found it to be true that the older I've become the better my life has become.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: You know you're getting old when you can pinch an inch on your forehead.
quotes.author: John Mendoza

quotes.quote: I'm kind of comfortable with getting older because it's better than the other option, which is being dead. So I'll take getting older.
quotes.author: George Clooney

quotes.quote: As you get older, you're always maturing, you're always learning something new about yourself.
quotes.author: Troy Vincent

quotes.quote: Everything changes as you get older - your mind, your body, the way you view the world.
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.quote: The older I get, the more open-minded I get, the less judgmental I get.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: As I get older, I realize that the thing I value the most is good-heartedness.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Growing old is no more than a bad habit which a busy man has no time to form.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: The great thing about getting older is that you become more mellow. Things aren't as black and white, and you become much more tolerant. You can see the good in things much more easily rather than getting enraged as you used to do when you were young.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.quote: I actually think there's an incredible amount of self-knowledge that comes with getting older.
quotes.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quotes.quote: I highly recommend getting older! There's less tendency to people-please.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: The good thing about getting older is that, as you become less attractive, so you have less desire to go out and conquer everyone you see.
quotes.author: Julian Clary

quotes.quote: The more you are getting older, you lose a little something. Of course there is another advantage, because of your long experience you can use it.
quotes.author: Haile Gebrselassie

quotes.quote: Part of getting older is realizing that you can integrate all these different areas of your life, rather than the adolescent mindset, which for me lasted a long time, which says, 'It's all or nothing.
quotes.author: Chris Robinson

quotes.quote: One of the pluses of getting older is you set some limits.
quotes.author: Nicolas Cage

quotes.quote: Getting older is fine. There is nothing you can do to stop it so you might as well stay on the bus.
quotes.author: John Byrne

quotes.quote: You can't help getting older, but you can help yourself from becoming old and infirm, in mind as well as body.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: It's no fun getting older. I might be wearing beautiful diamond earrings, but they can't take away the pain of losing my hearing.
quotes.author: Cilla Black

quotes.quote: You know you're getting older when the candles cost more than the cake.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Getting older is like riding a bicycle, if you don't keep peddling, you'll fall.
quotes.author: Claude D. Pepper

quotes.quote: Getting old is a fascination thing. The older you get, the older you want to get.
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.quote: We don't grow older, we grow riper.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: One of the good things about getting older is you find you're more interesting than most of the people you meet.
quotes.author: Lee Marvin

quotes.quote: Growing older is not upsetting; being perceived as old is.
quotes.author: Kenny Rogers

quotes.quote: As you get older, you look at things differently.
quotes.author: Brett Favre

quotes.quote: You don't get older, you get better.
quotes.author: Shirley Bassey

quotes.quote: As you grow older, you learn to understand life a little better.
quotes.author: Solomon Burke

quotes.quote: The fun thing about getting older is finding younger people to mentor.
quotes.author: Mike May

quotes.quote: People like you and I, thought mortal of course like everyone else, do not grow old, no matter how long you live. Never cease to stand like curious children before the great mystery into which we were born.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The older I get the less I listen to what people say and the more I look at what they do.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: At age 20 we worry about what others think of us. At 40, we don’t care what they think of us. At 60, we discover they haven’t been thinking of us at all.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Why are people afraid of getting older? You feel wiser. You feel more mature. You feel like you know yourself better. You would trade that for softer skin? Not me!
quotes.author: Anna Kournikova

quotes.quote: Those who love deeply never grow old; they may die of old age, but they die young.
quotes.author: Ben Franklin

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: We are not victims of aging, sickness, and death. These are part of scenery, not the seer, who is immune to any form of change. This seer is the spirit, the expression of eternal being.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: You are as young as your faith, as old as your doubt; as young as your self-confidence, as old as your fear, as young as your hope, as old as your despair.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: In the central place of every heart there is a recording chamber. So long as it receives a message of beauty, hope, cheer, and courage – so long are you young. When the wires are all down and our heart is covered with the snow of pessimism and the ice of cynicism, then, and only then, are you grown old.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: With age comes the inner, the higher life. Who would be forever young, to dwell always in externals?
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: The trick is to age honestly and gracefully, and make it look great so that everyone looks forward to it.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: I believe the second half of one’s life is meant to be better than the first half. The first half is finding out how you do it. And the second half is enjoying it.
quotes.author: Frances Lear

quotes.quote: The longer I live the more beautiful life becomes.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Youth is happy because it has the capacity to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: It is not true that people stop pursuing dreams because they grow old, they grow old because they stop pursuing dreams.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez

quotes.quote: We don’t stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You don’t stop laughing when you grow old, you grow old when you stop laughing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I was thinking about how people seem to read the bible a whole lot more as they get older, and then it dawned on me—they’re cramming for their final exam.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: For the unlearned, old age is winter; for the learned, it is the season of the harvest.
quotes.author: Hasidic Saying

quotes.quote: None are as old as those who have outlived enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Getting old is like climbing a mountain; you get a little out of breath, but the view is much better!
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: Age is no barrier. It’s a limitation you put on your mind.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: If wrinkles must be written upon our brows, let them not be written upon the heart. The spirit should never grow old.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: I think we are all well advised to keep on nodding terms with the people we used to be, whether we find them attractive company or not.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Every man desires to live long, but no man would to be old.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: There comes a moment in your life when you realize that no matter how hard you try, you're never going to be fluent in Spanish. Or go on that African safari you've read about since you were a kid. Or be as excited as you used to be about catching fireflies. I keep trying to find my answer to life - and it gets more elusive the older I get.
quotes.author: Kim Gruenenfelder

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Know that you are the perfect age. Each year is special and precious, for you shall only live it once. Be comfortable with growing older.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Old age is an excellent time for outrage. My goal is to say or do at least one outrageous thing every week.
quotes.author: Maggie Kuhn

quotes.quote: Of all the self-fulfilling prophecies in our culture the assumption that aging means decline and poor health is probably the deadliest.
quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

quotes.quote: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don’t mind, it doesn’t matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Oh, the worst of all tragedies is not to die young, but to live until I am seventy-five and yet not ever truly to have lived.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: I love living. I love that I’m alive to love my age. There are many people who went to bed just as I did yesterday evening and didn’t wake up this morning. I love and feel very blessed that I did.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: There is a certain part of all of us that lives outside of time. Perhaps we become aware of our age only at exceptional moments and most of the time we are ageless.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Men do not quit playing because they grow old—they grow old because they quit playing.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: He who is of a calm and happy nature will hardly feel the pressure of age, but to him who is of an opposite disposition, youth and age are equally a burden.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The trouble is, when a number—your age—becomes your identity, you’ve given away your power to choose your future.
quotes.author: Richard J. Leider

quotes.quote: Nobody grows old merely by living a number of years. We grow old by deserting our ideals. Years may wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.
quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

quotes.quote: I have absolutely no objection to growing older. I am a stroke survivor so I am extremely grateful to be ageing – I have nothing but gratitude for the passing years. I am ageing – lucky, lucky me!
quotes.author: Sharon Stone

quotes.quote: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: When grace is joined with wrinkles, it is adorable. There is an unspeakable dawn in happy old age.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: I don’t believe in aging. I believe in forever altering one’s aspect to the sun.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Laughter is timeless. Imagination has no age. And dreams are forever.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Growing old is mandatory, but growing up is optional.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The belief that youth is the happiest time of life is founded on a fallacy. The happiest person is the person who thinks the most interesting thoughts and we grow happier as we grow older.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: You can live to be a hundred if you give up all the things that make you want to live to be a hundred.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Perhaps I am stronger than I think.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: You have to remember that the hard days are what make you stronger. The bad days make you realize what a good day is. If you never had any bad days, you would never have that sense of accomplishment!
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.quote: I think it's my personality to overcome things, learn from them and become stronger, both personally and professionally. To be honest, I welcome those hardships.
quotes.author: Hope Solo

quotes.quote: Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: I'll always use the negativity as more motivation to work even harder and become even stronger.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.quote: I think you need to go through some stuff to really appreciate life and understand what it means to persevere, overcome and have faith. I think those tough times make you a stronger person.
quotes.author: Judith Hill

quotes.quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: Don't doubt me, because that's when I get stronger?.
quotes.author: Marvin Hagler

quotes.quote: You know, I think I'm a stronger person for realizing that you can't make everybody love you.
quotes.author: Clay Aiken

quotes.quote: We are stronger because we recognize that government isn't the sole answer to the most important questions, and we welcome community and faith based organizations as partners to serve the needs of Florida families.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Having a dream, living that dream, losing that dream, dreaming again and then having that dream come true again is one of the greatest feelings ever because I'm stronger.
quotes.author: Aaron Carter

quotes.quote: When you feel so strongly about something and other people feel equally strongly, you have to feel stronger about it in order to succeed.
quotes.author: Joan Chen

quotes.quote: One can choose to go back toward safety or forward toward growth. Growth mustbe chosen again and again; fear must be overcome again and again.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: The more powerful and original a mind, the more it will incline towards the religion of solitude.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: As you reach your goals, set new ones. That is how you grow and become a more powerful person.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: A man may as well expect to grow stronger by always eating as wiser by always reading.
quotes.author: Jeremy Collier

quotes.quote: Let us strive to improve ourselves, for we cannot remain stationary: one either progresses or retrogrades.
quotes.author: Mme. Du Deffand

quotes.quote: The safest principle through life, instead of reforming others, is to set about perfecting yourself.
quotes.author: B. R. Haydon

quotes.quote: Whenever you see a man who is successful in society, try to discover what makes him pleasing, and if possible adopt his system.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Never neglect an opportunity for improvement.
quotes.author: Sir William Jones

quotes.quote: Remedy your deficiencies,and your merits will take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Circumspection in calamity; mercy in greatness; good speeches in assemblies; fortitude in adversity: these are the self-attained perfections of great souls.
quotes.author: Hitopadesa

quotes.quote: Practice yourself in little things, and thence proceed to greater.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The farther a man knows himself to be free from perfection, the nearer he is to it
quotes.author: Gerard Groote

quotes.quote: Begin to see yourself as a soul with a body rather than a body with a soul.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving and that's your own self.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: By stretching yourself beyond your perceived level of confidence you accelerate your development of competence.
quotes.author: Michael Gelb

quotes.quote: Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Don't bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
quotes.author: Willam Faulkner

quotes.quote: If you wish to achieve worthwhile things in your personal and career life, you must become a worthwhile person in your own self-development.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Slumber not in the tents of your fathers. The world is advancing. Advance with it.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Mazzini

quotes.quote: Become addicted to constant and never-ending self-improvement.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: I'm going to get through this; I'm going to be fine. The power to do it is all in my mind.
quotes.author: Cindy Wagner

quotes.quote: Live up to the best that is in you: Live noble lives, as you all may, in whatever condition you may find yourselves.
quotes.author: Henry W. Longfellow

quotes.quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts, for you will never go any higher than you think.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: From a person standpoint, the old expression of what doesn't kill you makes you stronger is somewhat true.
quotes.author: Vince McMahon

quotes.quote: We must have courage to bet on our ideas, to take the calculated risk, and to act. Everyday living requires courage if life is to be effective and bring happiness.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: People do not change with the times, they change the times.
quotes.author: P.K. Shaw

quotes.quote: Many only learns in two ways, one by reading, and the other by association with smarter people.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Self-improvement is the name of the game, and your primary objective is to strengthen yourself, not to destroy an opponent.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: There is no use whatever trying to help people who do not help themselves. You cannot push anyone up a ladder unless he be willing to climb himself.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Don't let the negativity given to you by the world disempower you. Instead give to yourself that which empowers you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: I pretended to be somebody I wanted to be until finally I became that person. Or he became me.
quotes.author: Cary Grant

quotes.quote: What is important is to keep learning, to enjoy challenge, and to tolerate ambiguity. In the end there are no certain answers.
quotes.author: Martin Horner

quotes.quote: He was always smoothing and polishing himself, and in the end he became blunt before he was sharp.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: When the archer misses the mark, he turns and looks for the fault within himself. Failure to hit the bull's eye is never the fault of the target. To improve your aim -- improve yourself.
quotes.author: Gilbert Arland

quotes.quote: I understand myself better these days. There's more spiritual awareness, and it seems to be getting stronger each day. It's just like growing.
quotes.author: Cherie Sutherland Ph.D

quotes.quote: Your Monday morning thoughts set the tone for your whole week. See yourself getting stronger, and living a fulfilling, happier, and healthier life.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: The lives that are getting stronger are lives in the desert, deep-rooted in God.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: An old friendship is like old wine; the longer it lasts, the stronger it grows.
quotes.author: Antonio Perez

quotes.quote: Our passion are like convulsion fits, which, though they make us stronger for the time, leave us the weaker ever after.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: I am like a forest that has once been razed; the new shoots are stronger and brisker.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: When a child learns to trust that there is a loving caregiver right there to help in rough times, he or she can weather almost any storm— and ultimately be stronger for the experience.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: The potsherd lives on the farm but does not decay.
quotes.author: Yoruba Sayings

quotes.quote: The shadow lacks substance but it never crashes.
quotes.author: Yoruba Sayings

quotes.quote: here's something that i must say / i'm getting stronger by every passing day / every day when the night comes / it reminds me that i'm not alone.
quotes.author: Christopher Lilian

quotes.quote: I'm all alone and finally / I'm getting stronger / You'll come to see / Just what I can be.
quotes.author: Keisha Buchanan

quotes.quote: Resilience is our ability to bounce back from life’s challenges and unforeseen difficulties, providing mental protection from emotional and mental disorders.
quotes.author: Michael Rutter

quotes.quote: Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: No matter how much falls on us, we keep plowing ahead. That's the only way to keep the roads clear.
quotes.author: Greg Kincaid

quotes.quote: Resiliency is something you do, more than something you have. . . You become highly resilient by continuously learning your best way of being yourself in your circumstance.
quotes.author: Al Siebert

quotes.quote: If the fire in your heart is strong enough, it will burn away any obstacles that come your way.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of strength. Power and the ability to wield it are obvious, but resilience, the ability to resist power, is the other.
quotes.author: Raymond E. Feist

quotes.quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey
