quotes.quote: The primroses always come back. Even after a hard winter, they find a way to survive. They come back every spring.
quotes.author: Susan Meissner

quotes.quote: What breaks you makes you. It makes you stronger, wiser, and happy!
quotes.author: Avis Viswanathan

quotes.quote: Despite all of the talk about resilience being an individual trait, most of us are only as resilient as we are loved.
quotes.author: Taiki Matsuura

quotes.quote: Rise up, because they do not think and they do not expect about your rise.
quotes.author: Abdurozzaq Nurul Hadi

quotes.quote: Life is a battle between fear and courage. When fear wins, you lose; when courage wins, you struggle to get stronger.
quotes.author: Debashis Mridha

quotes.quote: Let your situation teach you wisdom. Come out of that pain stronger and wiser.
quotes.author: Thandazo Perfect Khumalo

quotes.quote: Your strength doesn't come from winning. It comes from struggles and hardship. Everything that you go through prepares you for the next level.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Use what you've been through as fuel, believe in yourself and be unstoppable!
quotes.author: Yvonne Pierre

quotes.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: I learned there are troubles of more than one kind. Some come from ahead, others come from behind. But I've bought a big bat. I'm all ready, you see. Now my troubles are going to have trouble with me.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Life is at its best when everything has fallen out of place, and you decide that you're going to fight to get them right, not when everything is going your way and everyone is praising you.
quotes.author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi

quotes.quote: We all want things to stay the same. Settle for living in misery because we are afraid of change, of things crumbling to ruins. Ruin is a gift. Ruin is the road to transformation.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this: you haven't.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure that you seek.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: They tried to bury us, but they didn't know that we were seeds.
quotes.author: Mexican Proverb

quotes.quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the road... unless you fail to make the turn.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In the midst of winter, I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The difference between stumbling blocks and stepping stones is how you use them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way. And don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: I ask not for a lighter burden, but for broader shoulders.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: When things are bad, we take comfort in the thought that they could always get worse. And when they are, we find hope in the thought that things are so bad they have to get better.
quotes.author: Malcolm S Forbes

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: This too shall pass.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Facing it, always facing it, that's the way to get through. Face it.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: After all, tomorrow is another day!
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
quotes.author: Joseph Kennedy

quotes.quote: Through all the heartaches and the tears, through gloomy days and fruitless years; I do give thanks for now I know, these were the things that helped me grow.
quotes.author: David Lockett

quotes.quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

quotes.quote: A hard beginning maketh a good ending.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: I can do ALL THINGS through Christ who strengthens me.
quotes.author: Philippians 4:13

quotes.quote: If we could all just laugh at ourselves, in hard times or good times, it would be an incredible world.
quotes.author: Jena Malone

quotes.quote: People need hard times and oppression to develop psychic muscles.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.author: Rita Mero

quotes.quote: Looking back, we see with great clarity, and what once appeared as difficulties now reveal themselves as blessings.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You're a winner. The tests of life are not meant to break you, but to make you.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Look for the opportunities in the difficulties, not the difficulties in the opportunities.
quotes.author: Victor Fiorelli

quotes.quote: Real difficulties can be overcome; it is only the imaginary ones that are unconquerable.
quotes.author: Theodore Newton Vail

quotes.quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

quotes.quote: Difficult times have helped me to understand better than before how infinitely rich and beautiful life is in every way, and that so many things that one goes worrying about are of no importance whatsoever.
quotes.author: Karen Blixen

quotes.quote: Every problem has a gift for you in its hands.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Don't take it on yourself. Forget now. Live.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: Every one of us gets through the tough times because somebody is there, standing in the gap to close it for us.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Never spend more than 10 percent of your time on the problem, and always spend at least 90 percent of your time on the solution.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. Please remember that your difficulties do not define you. They simply strengthen your ability to overcome.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Mt. Everest of Earth is 8.8 km tall; Mt. Olympus of Mars is 22 km tall. Every time you see a giant, you must know that that giant might be just a dwarf somewhere else!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Einstein was a giant. His head was in the clouds, but his feet were on the ground. Those of us who are not so tall have to choose!
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: The less courage you have, the more dwarf you shall be; the more courage you have, the more giant you shall be!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It is excellent To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous To use it like a giant.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There is a giant asleep within every man. When that giant awakes, miracles happen.
quotes.author: Frederick Schiller Faust

quotes.quote: Lots of small steps equates to a giant leap.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: You are not for any reason less than whom God created you to be, don't live like a dwarf where you are seen as a giant.
quotes.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

quotes.quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Life is never more fun than when you're the underdog competing against the giants.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.quote: You can’t out-spend the giants, but you can out-think, out-teach, and out-help them.
quotes.author: Brian Halligan

quotes.quote: Nature intends all men and women to be mental and spiritual giants, and does not intend that any one should follow the will of another.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: We are all now connected by the Internet, like neurons in a giant brain.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Most people have no idea of the giant capacity we can immediately command when we focus all of our resources on mastering a single area of our lives.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Gratitude for the seemingly insignificant—a seed—this plants the giant miracle.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: Remember that small steps can create giant leaps over time, so never think of any financial or spending matter as a small one.
quotes.author: David Bach

quotes.quote: Fear is like a giant fog. It sits on your brain and blocks everything - real feelings, true happiness, real joy. They can't get through that fog. But you lift it, and buddy, you're in for the ride of your life.
quotes.author: Albert Brooks

quotes.quote: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift.
quotes.author: Steve Prefontaine

quotes.quote: The great gift of human beings is that we have the power of empathy.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: Every gift which is given, even though it be small, is in reality great, if it is given with affection.
quotes.author: Pindar

quotes.quote: Love the giver more than the gift.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote:
The excellence of a gift lies in its appropriateness rather than in its
value.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Each day offers us the gift of being a special occasion if we can simply learn that as well as giving, it is blessed to receive with grace and a grateful heart.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The older I get, the better I understand that every day is a gift.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: The greatest gift you can give another is the purity of your attention.
quotes.author: Richard Moss

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: The greatest gift that you can give yourself is a little bit of your own attention.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: The manner of giving is worth more than the gift.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Your gift is not what you do but what you are.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The secret of success lies in the perfection of one's gift and working frantically towards God's given potential.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The greatest gift is a portion of thyself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Your personal truth is your gift to the world.
quotes.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quotes.quote: There's no greater gift than thinking that you had some impact on the world, for the better.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: The most beautiful gift of nature is that it gives one pleasure to look around and try to comprehend what we see.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It's so tempting to resist a little gift when you're expecting the otherwise.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The most considerate gift you can offer to someone who gave you advice is to not saddle them with the fallout of you ignoring it.
quotes.author: Alan Robert Neal

quotes.quote: In terms of instilling the values of mental toughness and work ethic, discipline is the gift that keeps on giving.
quotes.author: William Baldwin

quotes.quote: The greatest gift is our own eyes, sense of smell, and abilities to deduce.
quotes.author: Patricia Cornwell

quotes.quote: God wants nothing of you but the gift of a peaceful heart.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: I think relationships are work, but love is a gift.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.quote: Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness. It took me years to understand that this too, was a gift.
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: Anything that had to do with art I been doing all my life. It was a gift. It's nothing I work real hard at doing.
quotes.author: Erykah Badu

quotes.quote: The gift of learning to meditate is the greatest gift you can give yourself in this lifetime.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Realize that your gift does not belong merely to you.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: A gift of truth is the gift of love.
quotes.author: David Icke

quotes.quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: With the gift of listening comes the gift of healing.
quotes.author: Catherine Doherty

quotes.quote: Breath is the finest gift of nature. Be grateful for this wonderful gift.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: A gift consists not in what is done or given, but in the intention of the giver or doer.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: I look upon life as a gift from God. I did nothing to earn it. Now that the time is coming to give it back, I have no right to complain
quotes.author: Joyce Cary

quotes.quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: If you love someone, the greatest gift you can give them is your presence.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The gift of life is so precious that we should feel an obligation to pay back the universe for the gift of being alive.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: A book is a gift you can open again and again.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Make all you can, save all you can, give all you can.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: The greatest gift you can ever give another person is your own happiness.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: Love is a gift worth giving, sometimes you just give more than you revive.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Greatness comes from the inside and once you believe you have it, it's yours to share with the world.
quotes.author: Chris Burkmenn

quotes.quote: Every great person is always being helped by everybody; for their gift is to get good out of all things and all persons.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Everytime you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The greatest gift is the ability to forget to forget the bad things and focus on the good.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: The best gifts come from the heart, not the store.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: I believe the Bible is the best gift God has ever given to man.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Blessed are they who have the gift of making friends,for it is one of God's best gifts.
quotes.author: Thomas Hughes

quotes.quote: The Gift of Truth excels all other Gifts.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: In accepting the Gift you Honor the Giver.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Donaldson

quotes.quote: Every gift from a friend is a wish for your happiness.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: The gift without the giver is rare.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: The greatest gift in life is to be remembered.
quotes.author: Ken Venturi

quotes.quote: The gift you offer another person is just your being.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Every day the word 'gift' is used to define talent, ability, and performance. Being gifted has an even deeper meaning, a meaning that isn't always measured in points per game or win/loss records - it's measured by heart, effort, and desire.
quotes.author: Allan Cohen

quotes.quote: I've always known I was gifted, which is not the easiest thing in the world for a person to know, because you're not responsible for your gift, only for what you do with it.
quotes.author: Hazel Scott

quotes.quote: And may we not say, Adeimantus, that the most gifted minds, when they are ill- educated, become the worst?
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: I am neither especially clever nor especially gifted. I am only very, very curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: We are all gifted, but we have to discover the gift, uncover the gift, nurture and develop the gift and use it for the Glory of God and for the liberation struggle of our people.
quotes.author: Louis Farrakhan

quotes.quote: You weren't an accident. You weren't mass produced. You aren't an assembly-line product. You were deliberately planned, specifically gifted, and lovingly positioned on the earth by the Master Craftsman.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: I know very little about acting. I'm just an incredibly gifted faker.
quotes.author: Robert Downey Jr.

quotes.quote: A person who is gifted sees the essential point and leaves the rest as surplus.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: What makes a child gifted and talented may not always be good grades in school, but at a different way of looking at the world and learning.
quotes.author: Chuck Grassley

quotes.quote: The greatest danger of being gifted, is that you may never learn how to make an effort.
quotes.author: Tibor Fischer

quotes.quote: There are special, strange gifted people in the world and they have to be treated with understanding.
quotes.author: John Knowles

quotes.quote: The most gifted members of the human species are at their creative best when they cannot have their way.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Any gifted child can potentially get in real trouble because of the way they are handled.
quotes.author: Itzhak Perlman

quotes.quote: I try to speak in everyday language. I feel like God has gifted me to take Bible principles and make them practical.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: I wasn't naturally gifted in terms of size and speed; everything I did in hockey I worked for, and that's the way I'll be as a coach.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: The average teacher explains complexity; the gifted teacher reveals simplicity.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Woman is the companion of man, gifted with equal mental capacity.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The most dangerous criminal may be the man gifted with reason, but with no morals
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: When it comes to giving love, the opportunities are unlimited, and we are all gifted
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: My grammar be's ebonics, gin tonics, and chronic.
quotes.author: Nelly

quotes.quote: It's a crooked system, but gin straight take the pain away.
quotes.author: Ludacris

quotes.quote: And the sooner the tea's out of the way, the sooner we can get out the gin, eh?
quotes.author: Henry Reed

quotes.quote: Follow your fate, and be satisfied with it, and be glad not to be a second-hand motor salesman, or a yellow-press journalist, pickled in gin and nicotine, or a cripple â€“ or dead.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: The only time I ever enjoyed ironing was the day I accidentally got gin in the steam iron.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Tea instead of gin will warm the heart.
quotes.author: Louise Bogan

quotes.quote: The proper union of gin and vermouth is a great and sudden glory; it is one of the happiest marriages on earth, and one of the shortest lived.
quotes.author: Bernard DeVoto

quotes.quote: The fun, joy, and humor dry up in a relationship when one of the partners is swimming in gin. To my way of thinking, it is selfishness personified to see life through the bottom of a liquor bottle.
quotes.author: Ginger Rogers

quotes.quote: It is all nonsense about not being able to work without ale, and gin, and cider, and fermented liquors. Do lions and cart-horses drink ale?
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: A real gimlet is half gin and half Rose's lime juice and nothing else.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: When a man who is drinking neat gin starts talking about his mother he is past all argument.
quotes.author: C.S. Forester

quotes.quote: Whether it's the cotton gin or the Internet, we've added value by innovating. Innovation and free trade have served us very well.
quotes.author: Rick White

quotes.quote: Gin for executions, beer for birthdays, wine for weddings.
quotes.author: P.J. Wolfson

quotes.quote: Fortunately there is gin, the sole glimmer in this darkness. Do you feel the golden, copper-coloured light it kindles in you? I like walking through the city of an evening in the warmth of gin.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The wages of gin is debt.
quotes.author: Ethel Mumford

quotes.quote: You'd learn more about the world by lying on the couch and drinking gin out of a bottle than by watching the news.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Art for art's sake makes no more sense than gin for gin's sake.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Most cocktails containing liquor are made today with gin and ingenuity. In brief, take an ample supply of the former and use your imagination. For the benefit of a minority, it is courteous to serve chilled fruit juice in addition to cocktails made with liquor.
quotes.author: Irma S. Rombauer

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a gin which we set to catch serpents, but which, as soon as we have caught them, sting us. Like the fool, that finding a box of poison, tastes, and is poisoned indeed.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: The gin and tonic has saved more Englishman's lives and minds than all the doctors in the Empire.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: For gin, in cruel sober truth, supplies the fuel for flaming youth.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: To endure the pain of living, we all drug ourselves more or less with gin, with literature, with superstitions, with romance, with idealism, political, sentimental, and moral, with every possible preparation of that universal hashish: imagination.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A perfect martini should be made by filling a glass with gin then waving it in the general direction of Italy.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: To the question, "When were your spirits at the lowest ebb?" the obvious answer seemed to be, "When the gin gave out."
quotes.author: Francis Chichester

quotes.quote: The whole world is strewn with snares, traps, gins and pitfalls for the capture of men by women.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A good heavy book holds you down. It's an anchor that keeps you from getting up and having another gin and tonic.
quotes.author: Roy Blount, Jr.

quotes.quote: [Gin has produced] â€¦ a drunken ungovernable set of people.
quotes.author: Thomas Wilson

quotes.quote: There's a sort of movement that says that when classics are bypassed, they can become cool again. That's what's happening to gin. It's part of the whole retro cocktail culture.
quotes.author: Richard Brandes

quotes.quote: A lonely man is a lonesome thing, a stone, a bone, a stick, a receptacle for Gilbey's gin, a stooped figure sitting at the edge of a hotel bed, heaving copious sighs like the autumn wind.
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.quote: There's truth in wine, and there may be some in gin and muddy beer; but whether it's truth worth my knowing, is another question.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Any man can become rich who is base enough to keep a brothel, a gin palace, or a gambling house.
quotes.author: Charles William Day

quotes.quote: I have seen my kid struggle into the kitchen in the morning with outfits that need only one accessory: an empty gin bottle.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Without gin, there would be no martinis, and that's a scenario too troubling to contemplate sober.
quotes.author: Dr. Pretorius

quotes.quote: Zen martini: A martini with no vermouth at all. And no gin, either
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Of all the gin joints, in all the towns, in all the world ...she walks into mine.
quotes.author: Rick Blaine

quotes.quote: Gin is an alcoholic beverage, which, if your mommy's strong genes are any indication, you'll eventually learn to love as it slowly destroys a giant portion of your adult life.
quotes.author: Dr. Cox

quotes.quote: Not her! Gin was mother's milk to her. Besides he poured so much down his own throat, he knew the good of it.
quotes.author: Eliza Doolittle

quotes.quote: Gin! Gin! A drop of Gin! / Oh, and its tremendous temptations begin, / To take alas! / To the fatal glass,— / And happy the wretched that it does not win / To change the black hue / Of his ruin to blue— / While angels sorrow and demons grin— / And loose the rheumatic chill of is attic / By plunging into the palace of Gin!
quotes.author: Thoms Hood

quotes.quote: Gin was his tonic.
quotes.author: Al Drooz

quotes.quote: Creating a good gin with a balanced botanical recipe is an art form.
quotes.author: Joel Harrison and Neil Ridley

quotes.quote: From its delicate floral notes to its crisp citrus bite, gin remains a perennial favorite of cocktail-sippers everywhere.
quotes.author: Jassy Davis

quotes.quote: I got sober. I stopped killing myself with alcohol. I began to think, 'Wait a minute— if I an stop doing this, what are the possibilities? And slowly it dawned on me that it was maybe worth the risk.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: I'm glad now, at the age of sixty-six, that I never used alcohol or tobacco. I've buried a lot of friends who used tobacco or alcohol.
quotes.author: Jerry Falwell

quotes.quote: Liquor is such a nice substitute for facing adult life.
quotes.author: Dorothy B. Hughes

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a good preservative for everything but brains.
quotes.author: Mary Pettibone Poole

quotes.quote: Drinking alcohol is an act of evil for both men and women, but the poet specifically names it as evil for women.
quotes.author: Dr. B.R. Suhas

quotes.quote: I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I've made it a rule never to drink by daylight and never to refuse a drink after dark.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Alcohol is an anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The remaining half of my gin stands before me, and yet, no amount of drink can quench this thirst.
quotes.author: Ilse V. Rensburg

quotes.quote: When life gives you juniper berries, make gin!
quotes.author: Laurie Buchanan

quotes.quote: English gin is a drink for people who think a sin must always be accompanied by its penance.
quotes.author: Dexter Palmer

quotes.quote: I am drinking again / I'm on my seventh cold glass of gin / Life is a tribute to you / And so is dying / And drinking in this way / To die is what I'm trying / I am drinking again / I'm on my ninth cold glass of gin.
quotes.author: Will Oldham

quotes.quote: My main ambition as a gardener is to water my orange trees with gin, then all I have to do is squeeze the juice into a glass.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: The first time I lose I drink whiskey, second time I lose I drink gin. Third time I lose I drink anything 'cause I think I'm gonna win.
quotes.author: Gram Parsons

quotes.quote: There is something about a martini, Ere the dining and dancing begin, And to tell you the truth, It is not the vermouth- I think that perhaps it's the gin.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if when you run out of gas, you put gin in the gas tank.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: If you've had good gin on a hot day in Southern California with the people you love, you forget Nebraska. The two things cannot coexist. The stronger, better of the two wins.
quotes.author: Ann Patchett

quotes.quote: If you had said before the game we would get three points, I would have said you'd had too much gin.
quotes.author: Terry Butcher

quotes.quote: I really don't do anything to break myself. As far as the damages to my body, I'm not a drinker. I left the gin and juice alone.
quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

quotes.quote: Wildlife is something which man cannot construct. Once it is gone, it is gone forever. Man can rebuild a pyramid, but he can't rebuild ecology, or a giraffe.
quotes.author: Joy Adamson

quotes.quote: However much you know giraffes, to see one in the wild for the first time feels prehistoric.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: Sometimes facing opportunity is like staring at the knees of a giraffe.
quotes.author: Laurie Beth Jones

quotes.quote: Did you ever see a giraffe? It is like something from between the regions of truth and fiction.
quotes.author: Geraldine Jewsbury

quotes.quote: Consider the biggest animals on the planet: elephants, and buffaloes, and giraffes. These are vegetarian animals. They grow to thousands of pounds of muscle and bone without ever eating cheeseburgers and pepperoni pizzas.
quotes.author: Michael Klaper

quotes.quote: A bit of advice: never read a pop-up book about giraffes.
quotes.author: Sean Lock

quotes.quote: Do you know that giraffes only sleep like, two hours a day?
quotes.author: Bill Chais

quotes.quote: A man walks into a bar with a giraffe. They both get pissed. The giraffe falls over. The man goes to leave and the bartender says, 'Oi. You can't leave that lyin' there.' And the man says, 'No. It's not a lion. It's a giraffe.
quotes.author: Alex Garland

quotes.quote: Even a neck as long as this has only seven vertebrae to support it, just like as our short necks, for these giraffes are constructed according to the same anatomical pattern as all other mammals.
quotes.author: Bernhard Grzimek

quotes.quote: A dog can't get struck by lightning. You know why? Because he's, he's too close to the ground. See, lightning strikes tall things. Now, now if they was giraffes out there in that field, well then we'd be in trouble.
quotes.author: Sheldon Leonard

quotes.quote: Joshua Giraffe was feeling kind of sad / Things were going bad / How little of life he had / Wasting away with no room to play / Trapped in a zoo with buffalo poo / So he went next door to the elephant / And asked him what to do
quotes.author: Patrick Godfrey

quotes.quote: We all marvel at the airplanes up so high / But we aren't doing nothing but copying / What we see in the birds in the sky / We all marvel at the skyscrapers up so high / If we don't be careful / All the giraffes might not have no life
quotes.author: Billy Ray Cyrus

quotes.quote: Riding the backs of giraffes for laughs is alright for a while / The ego sings of castles and kings and things / That go with a life of style
quotes.author: Carole King

quotes.quote: In literature the giraffe symbolizes someone special, someone who either stands out above the crowd or who sticks out like a sore thumb.
quotes.author: Lynn Sherr

quotes.quote: A giraffe decorated the temple tombs of a number of other Egyptian rulers, too, a testimony to it's respected position in their kingdoms.
quotes.author: Lynn Sherr

quotes.quote: A giraffe swaying across the horizon at sunset is as serene and graceful as it was at noontime when it moved across the beat-haze mirage as if it were walking on water.
quotes.author: Norman Myers

quotes.quote: The world's tallest animal acquires that unique height through long legs, a long neck, and a high and massive chest, and those characteristics in turn mean a very large body.
quotes.author: Dale Peterson

quotes.quote: In ancient Greece and Rome it was called th 'camelopard', in East Africa today it is twiga, and in the English language we now call it 'giraffe'.
quotes.author: Bryan Shorrocks

quotes.quote: The name 'giraffe' has its earliest known origins in the Arabic word zarafa.
quotes.author: Bryan Shorrocks

quotes.quote: The most outstanding features of the giraffe are, of course, the long thin legs and the slender and long necks.
quotes.author: Ted Andrews

quotes.quote: The long thin legs of the giraffe are symbolic as well. Legs enable us to move. They are symbols of balance and represent an ability to progress.
quotes.author: Ted Andrews

quotes.quote: The giraffe is a browser, eating twigs, leaves and buds. It's tongue is used to strip the leaves from trees.
quotes.author: Ted Andrews

quotes.quote: The giraffe has a dainty head which reflects a lot of it's social character. Giraffes like each other's company.
quotes.author: Ted Andrews

quotes.quote: On the head of the giraffe are horns that are unlike any other animals. These blunt, long stubs are never shed, and they are covered with skin.
quotes.author: Ted Andrews

quotes.quote: The giraffe is instantly recognizable, with its all neck, strange angular head, long knobbly legs, golden-brown mottle coat and long, swishing tail.
quotes.author: Edgar Williams

quotes.quote: Everything about a giraffe is big or unusual and consequently the giraffe has fascinated man throughout its history.
quotes.author: Edgar Williams

quotes.quote: Many thousands of years ago, the giraffe and its ancestors were common throughout the whole of Africa, Southern Europe and India.
quotes.author: Edgar Williams

quotes.quote: The giraffe and its close relative the okapi are now the only living representatives of the Giraffidae family.
quotes.author: Edgar Williams

quotes.quote: The origin of the modern giraffe is unclear, as the fossil history of the Giraffidae is incomplete.
quotes.author: Edgar Williams

quotes.quote: Tallest of all earthly dwellers, the giraffe erects its stately head far above any animal that walks the face of the globe.
quotes.author: John George Wood

quotes.quote: A giraffe is so much a lady that one refrains from thinking of her legs, but remembers her as floating over the plains in long garb, draperies of morning mist her mirage.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: Well as giraffes say, you don't get no leaves unless you stick your neck out.
quotes.author: Sid Waddell

quotes.quote: Giraffes are fairytale animals, almost heraldic as if from the land of fables. They have extremely beautiful faces, huge eyes, very sensitive nostrils and oh, blue tongues!
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.quote: Evolution is so creative. That's how we got giraffes.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: You can't always write a chord ugly enough to say what you want to say, so sometimes you have to rely on a giraffe filled with whipped cream.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: It's an incredibly difficult thing to bring a giraffe down. They can kill a lion with a single blow from their feet.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.quote: The best way to show a giraffe your love is to knit a scarf for it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Giraffes are completely tranquil they have no predators as adults because there's not an animal in the jungle stupid enough to go for them.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.quote: The man who believes in giraffes would swallow anything.
quotes.author: Adrian Mitchell

quotes.quote: A giraffe has a black tongue twenty-seven inches long and no vocal cords. A giraffe has nothing to say. He just goes on giraffing.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: The giraffe stood tall and proud with its long neck. The giraffe was covered in a beautiful yellow and orange mosaic style pattern. The giraffe stood next to its baby. The baby was short with shaking spindly legs which shook every time it took a step.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I may look like the girl next door, but you wouldn't want to live next door to me.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Shue

quotes.quote: She was not the sort of woman guys settle for. She was the one they lust after and strive for. She was the one who ruins other people's relationships simply by existing, but she will always be surmounted as guys come to realize the virtues of the approachable girl next door. She was, in brief, too pretty to be trusted or had.
quotes.author: Thomm Quackenbush

quotes.quote: I never go outside unless I look like Joan Crawford the movie star. If you want to see the girl next door, go next door.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: Everybody always says that I'm the girl next door, which makes me think that y'all must have a lot of weird next-door neighbours.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.quote: I'm very down-to-earth and approachable, and I can be one of the guys and watch sports... I like to cook - I'm like the girl next door.
quotes.author: Marissa MIller

quotes.quote: The girl next door isn't necessarily blonde and blue-eyed anymore. So I don't feel like I need to morph into that all-American thing.
quotes.author: Emmanuelle Chirqui

quotes.quote: It's hard when you look a certain way. I look All-American, sweet, girl-next-door, so naturally those are the parts that are going to land on my doorstep.
quotes.author: Melissa Joan Hart

quotes.quote: I think people respond to me as a down-to-Earth, girl-next-door person, because I am one of those people. That's something I don't have to act very hard at.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Banks

quotes.quote: I make conscious decisions to stay out of the limelight. Without my make-up I'm pretty much the girl next door.
quotes.author: Eva Mendes

quotes.quote: There are a lot of actresses out there who are the girl next door. I relate more to characters who have an edge.
quotes.author: Eliza Dushku

quotes.quote: I've had my share of villains and played some fairly nasty characters. But I've been acting for so long. I started out as the girl next door. Now I'm the grandmother next door.
quotes.author: Jacki Weaver

quotes.quote: He was a professional athlete and coach, a Ferrari who lived his life in the fast lane. She was a girl-next-door kind of girl, closer to a golf cart than a sports car.
quotes.author: Emily March

quotes.quote: Despite all the labels, in most ways I'm really not different from anyone else. I guess if you had to label me, you could say I'm like the girl next door. I'm like the girl a few doors down.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: I was not beautiful. When I went to Hollywood the beauties were people like Joan Crawford, Hedy Lamarr, Loretta Young. They were incredibly glamorous. I was always the girl next door.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: If you're trying too hard to be the girl next door, you're not going to be.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: I suppose if I wanted to be the girl next door, I could have been. I think America is confused by someone who appears to be sexual and spiritual at the same time.
quotes.author: Sally Kirkland

quotes.quote: Black women have always been these vixens, these animalistic erotic women. Why can't we just be the sexy American girl next door?
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: I know for me like I have a reputation of being kind of tough, I have a reputation of also being the girl next door, kind of sweet but I have standards and my thing is, it's me on that screen and I don't have control over everything in this and I'm grateful and thankful.
quotes.author: Nia Long

quotes.quote: I'd like to play with a period piece. Playing a girl next door in 2010 is so different from playing one in 1950, the way you talk, walk, dress, relationships. It's really fun studying all that.
quotes.author: Emilie de Ravin

quotes.quote: Thinking you are attacking society when you condemn or ravage the hypothetical Nice Girl Next Door is the exact equivalent of thinking that stealing from the local supermarket makes you a Communist.
quotes.author: Joanna Russ

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag. It's only when she's in hot water that you realize how strong she is.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Girls should be strong together. Strong like steel, merry like the tinkling of chimes dancing in the wind.
quotes.author: Kristin Halbrook

quotes.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: Women hold all the power. They should use it like a whip, not offer it up like a sacrifice.
quotes.author: Tarryn Fisher

quotes.quote: It is amazing what a woman can do if only she ignores what men tell her she can't.
quotes.author: Carol K. Carr

quotes.quote: Why can't a girl be smart without it being explained away as a rare supernatural phenomenon?
quotes.author: Cat Winters

quotes.quote: Being a girl doesn't make you weak, Parker. It makes you special.
quotes.author: Ali Novak

quotes.quote: You have what it takes to be a victorious, independent, fearless woman.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: I said pour yourself a drink, put on some lipstick, and pull yourself together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Girl power is about loving yourself and having confidence and strength from within, so even if you're not wearing a sexy outfit, you feel sexy.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.quote: People want to put women in one box, and I'm interested in how women can be everything at once.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Meriwether

quotes.quote: She's like an earthquake in tiny human form, breaking apart anything and everything in her way.
quotes.author: Victoria Aveyard

quotes.quote: You are more powerful than you know; you are beautiful just as you are.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: I love to see a young girl go out and grab the world by the lapels.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Women do cry, sometimes meek and submissive. But once ignited or motivated; they are a lot stronger than men.
quotes.author: Ces Peta

quotes.quote: Act like barbie, smoke like marley.
quotes.author: Julia Klassen

quotes.quote: A girl is not a predictable book but is a closed diary
quotes.author: ashadnan

quotes.quote: Tears are the biggest weapon used by every girl against the boys with a success rate of hundred percent.
quotes.author: Aman Jassal

quotes.quote: Astonishingly, not all girls get dressed just to please men.
quotes.author: Jojo Moyes

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: A woman is more humble, more grateful, more loving.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: If you want them to stop using you STOP giving them something to use you for.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The more you act like a lady, the more he'll act like a gentleman.
quotes.author: Sydney Biddle Barrows

quotes.quote: Women have always been powerful. So much so, in fact, that several millennia of oppression have only made us stronger.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: No amount of witch burnings, stiletto heels, and lack of basic human rights can stop the blossoming forth of the boldest, bravest wave of women and girl power ever, here at the dawn of the new millennium.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: Packing estrogen, and, not infrequently, a pen and a sword, awesome women come in every imaginable shape, size, and color and manifest their heroism in infinite ways.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: We are true Thatcherites. She was the first Spice Girl, the pioneer of our ideology, girl power. What matters in life is the ability to rise and do anything...I like the woman. Even if her policies were hard-headed. Socialism is bad.
quotes.author: Geri Halliwell

quotes.quote: The whole world is starting to realize that it was the most unwise thing for our society to have ignored women power, to run the society with male priorities.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: If I was a Jewish girl in Hitler's day, I would become his girlfriend. After ten days in bed, he would come to my way of thinking.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: You may write me down in history / With your bitter twisted lies / You may tread me in the very dirt / But still, like dust, I'll rise.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Strong individuals are usually the possessors of uneasy pasts. However, heroines are defined not by their wounds, but by their triumphs.
quotes.author: Marlene Wagman-Geller

quotes.quote: Cause a rose is still a rose / Baby girl, you're still a flower / He can't lead you and then take you / Make you and then break you / Baby girl, you hold the power.
quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

quotes.quote: I don't know everything, I just do everything.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Girl Power in terms of Spice Girls seems to be more like, we can get ou tits out whenever we want which is basically what blokes want anyway.
quotes.author: Jarvis Cocker

quotes.quote: The female of the species is more deadly than the male.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: An opinion formed by a woman is inflexible; the fact is not half so stubborn.
quotes.author: American Proverbs (Pacific Northwest)

quotes.quote: A woman will have both her word and her way.
quotes.author: American Proverbs

quotes.quote: Women represent the triumph of matter over mind, just as men represent the triumph of mind over matter.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: With a proper background, women can do anything.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: She made the blood run around in my veins like horses on a track.
quotes.author: Ross MacDonald

quotes.quote: A perfect woman; nobly planned, / To warn, to comfort, and command.
quotes.author: Browning

quotes.quote: One is not born a woman; one becomes one.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Do you not know I am a woman? When I think, I must speak.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A woman's sword is her tongue, and she does not let it rust.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A woman's sword is her tongue, and she does not let it rust.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A woman has the form of an angel, the heart of a serpent, and the sense of an ass.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: A woman needs a man like a fish needs a bicycle.
quotes.author: Irina Dunn

quotes.quote: We had met as equals, rarely a good thing in such matters, for the woman who wishes to be the equal of a man usually turns out to be less than a man and less than a woman. A woman is herself, which is something altogether different than a man.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: You've got to admit she's pretty much of a woman, and she as always the lady. But you've got to admit she keeps what she's got so you know it's there.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: A man you can figure on; a woman you can't. They're likely either to faint or to grab for a gun regardless of consequences.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: How long is a girl a child? She is a child, and then one morning you wake up and she's a woman and a dozen different people of whom you recognize none.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: A woman will always have to be better than a man in any job she undertakes.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I was being human, born alone; I am, being woman, hard beset.
quotes.author: Elinor Wylie

quotes.quote: In politics, if you want anything said, ask a man. If you want anything done, ask a woman.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Women can hold up half the sky.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: It's important to have girlfriends, because guys tend to come and go.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.quote: Whether you're throwing up or breaking up, you want your girlfriend right there! I don't trust women who don't go to their girlfriends.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: I mean everybody's got ex-boyfriends and girlfriends. Everybody's got baggage.
quotes.author: Nina Dobrev

quotes.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: True friends are like diamonds bright, beautiful, valuable and always in style.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: Girls get competitive, as though there's only one spot in the world for everything but that's not true. We need to stick together and see there's more to life than pleasing men. It's important not to cut yourself off from female friendships. I think sometimes girls get scared of other girls, but you need each other.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round; love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: We like the wrong sorts of girls, they wrote. They are usually the ones worth writing about.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey, Jr.

quotes.quote: The greatest sweetener of human life is friendship. To raise this to the highest pitch of enjoyment, is a secret which but few discover.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Friendship is the inexpressible comfort of feeling safe with a person, having neither to weigh thoughts nor measure words.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Grow old along with me, the best is yet to be.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: I have said nothing because there is nothing I can say that would describe how I feel as perfectly as you deserve it.
quotes.author: Kyle Schmidt

quotes.quote: As we grow older together, As we continue to change with age, There is one thing that will never change. . . I will always keep falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Karen Clodfelder

quotes.quote: One relationship ends but life goes on. Your Ex' was just a stepping stone to something better.
quotes.author: Sushan R Sharma

quotes.quote: I thought I still loved you but then I realized I just love the memories of who you used to be.
quotes.author: Morgan Hanthorn

quotes.quote: You're no longer a part of my life, but I wish you the best with yours.
quotes.author: Mario Tomasello

quotes.quote: When your girlfriend breaks your heart, don't say a word, just smile because she gives you the opportunity to find someone better than her.
quotes.author: Werley Nortreus

quotes.quote: No relationship is perfect nor will anyone ever be the best boyfriend or girlfriend. Long as you put in the effort and try to make your lover happy. That's all we can ask for.
quotes.author: Kevin McCarty

quotes.quote: A good girl gives you happiness and a bad girl gives you experience both are essential in life so enjoy every girlfriend!
quotes.author: Tribhuvan Suthar

quotes.quote: Music is like girlfriends to me; I'm continually astonished by the choices other people make.
quotes.author: David Lee Roth

quotes.quote: A Code of Honor: Never approach a friend's girlfriend or wife with mischief as your goal. There are just too many women in the world to justify that sort of dishonorable behavior. Unless she's really attractive.
quotes.author: Bruce Jay Friedman

quotes.quote: I don't have a girlfriend. But I do know a woman who'd be mad at me for saying that.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: I could have a million chances to fall in love again. I never can fall in love with anyone the way I fell for you!
quotes.author: Manor Johns

quotes.quote: If you would stop looking in the mirror and only look at yourself the way I look at you, you would know that you are not only precious but also the most beautiful person ever.
quotes.author: Donald Risks

quotes.quote: If you want know how special you are to me, remember that you are not my number one. You are my only one and I will never ever let you down.
quotes.author: Jake Oran

quotes.quote: But to see her was to love her, Love but her, and love forever.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: And here is my heart which beats only for you.
quotes.author: Paul Verlaine

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength; loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Half the motorists can't drive fast enough to please their girlfriends, while the other half can't drive slow enough to appease their wives.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: A wife is a great consolation, especially when a man comes home after his girl friend has run out on him.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A penny saved is a girlfriend lost.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Sometimes, when one person is missing, the whole world seems depopulated.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: The best way to mend a broken heart is time and girlfriends.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: All discarded lovers should be given a second chance, but with somebody else.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: I change my mind so much I need two boyfriends and a girlfriend.
quotes.author: Pink

quotes.quote: I change my mind so much I need two boyfriends and a girlfriend.
quotes.author: Betty Dodson

quotes.quote: You know, the man of my dreams might walk round the corner tomorrow. I'm older and wiser and I think I'd make a great girlfriend. I live in the realm of romantic possibility.
quotes.author: Stevie Nicks

quotes.quote: Right now I'm pretty single...My career is my boyfriend.
quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

quotes.quote: There's only two people in your life you should lie to... the police and your girlfriend.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.quote: I am a hopeless romantic and I love to spoil my girlfriends.
quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

quotes.quote: A girlfriend once told me never to fight with anybody you don't love.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.quote: I fantasize about going back to high school with the knowledge I have now. I would shine. I would have a good time, I would have a girlfriend. I think that's where a lot of my pain comes from. I think I never had any teenage years to go back to.
quotes.author: Spalding Gray

quotes.quote: I don't have a girlfriend. But I do know a woman who'd be mad at me for saying that.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Women are in control. This is the biggest thing you will ever learn. In dating, women are totally in control.
quotes.author: Romy Miller

quotes.quote: Women are your friends; they're your buddies. You've just got to learn about them and learn hot to work them. There are no real dating techniques.
quotes.author: Romy Miller

quotes.quote: Once you learn about women, you can start pushing their buttons--in a good way. Women love for men to pay attention to them. But there has to be something special about that man who's giving the attention.
quotes.author: Romy Miller

quotes.quote: Enchantment of eyes of one of the opposite sex may be the beginning of a love. Whether intentional or not, eyes gaze from a man to a woman, or from a woman to a man, can turn into love and then become love.
quotes.author: M Dafi

quotes.quote: Whether or not you are in a relationship, or just have girlfriend who you hang out with, know that there will always be a place in life where you will have to learn how to accept someone else's differences.
quotes.author: Venez C. Allen

quotes.quote: A girlfriend is an individual that's focused on her life which is why many girlfriends may be vaguely annoying asnd may be somewhat needy.
quotes.author: Darshaun McAway

quotes.quote: Girls want strong men who are self-sufficient...not 'loveable losers' needing women to be happy and complete.
quotes.author: Social Natural

quotes.quote: Being in a relationship is about being selfless. You'll stop thinking about yourself and learn about empathizing with others, especially your girlfriend.
quotes.author: Social Natural

quotes.quote: Having a girlfriend that complements you, will make you both a powerhouse unstoppable team together helping each other get ahead in live and synergistically achieve greatness.
quotes.author: Social Natural

quotes.quote: Having a girlfriend can be both a love-and-hate relationship in itself...with your own self.
quotes.author: Social Natural

quotes.quote: Having a girlfriend means you'll going to have more maintenance on your hand to keep the relationship going. If you're the overly ambitious-type trying to make a success out of yourself, you are going to have to sacrifice some time into your girlfriend.
quotes.author: Social Natural

quotes.quote: If you call a girl once and she doesn't return your call, it's possible that she never got the message. However, if you call a girl fifty-one times and she still hasn't called you back, it's you who hasn't gotten the message.
quotes.author: J. Chris Newberg

quotes.quote: Prom night was one of the worst night of my life. My girlfriend looked fantastic. The problem was, so did her date.
quotes.author: Deion Sanders

quotes.quote: As my success has grown, I've really learned who my true friends are.
quotes.author: Jamie Lynn

quotes.quote: Our closest girlfriends will remain constant, ready to tell us, whenever we need to hear it, that we're strong and good and equal to each new challenge.
quotes.author: Sandy Sheehy

quotes.quote: I've always had only a few close girlfriends, and we think of each other as sisters in the truest sense.
quotes.author: Franz Zeiner

quotes.quote: When I have a problem, my best friend doesn't tell me what to do. She just says things that help me make the right decisions.
quotes.author: Alecia Elliot

quotes.quote: You know everything about the other. You are comfortable. There are no secrets.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Wise are those who don’t have a Girlfriend / They are free to enjoy with their friends / I feel happy to think that I don’t have a Girlfriend / O God, shield me against this trend
quotes.author: Komal Vasudeva

quotes.quote: Girlfriend causes two friends to fight / Just for the show of might / One should avoid having a girlfriend / If one wants to avoid fighting with a friend
quotes.author: Komal Vasudeva

quotes.quote: All I need in this life of sin / Is me and my girlfriend / Down to ride till the happy end / Is me and my girlfriend
quotes.author: Henning Hoel Eriksen

quotes.quote: All I'm saying is that you shouldn't stay with him for the wrong reasons, even if they are noble ones. No one owes it to someone else to be their girlfriend. It's a choice you remake every day.
quotes.author: Aprilynne Pike

quotes.quote: A relationship is likely to last way longer, if each partner convinces or has convinced themselves that they do not deserve their partner, even if that is not true.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: In innumerable cases, the woman fell in love, not with the man, but with the lifestyle that came with being his girlfriend, wife, or mistress.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Many a man once started a friendship with a woman just to get into her life, with the sole intention of making her his girlfriend as soon as he could.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: To find out a girl's faults, praise her to her girlfriends.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It's the good girls who keep diaries; the bad girls never have the time.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: Every girl should use what Mother Nature gave her before Father Time takes it away.
quotes.author: Dr. Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: who and what she wants.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The saddest thing for a girl to do is to dumb herself down for a guy.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: Every girl pretends she is a princess at one point, no matter how little her life is like that.
quotes.author: Alex Flinn

quotes.quote: Every girl is beautiful. Sometimes it just takes the right guy to see it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: It's giving girls names like that [Euphemia],' said Biggins, 'that nine times out of ten makes 'em go wrong. It unsettles 'em. If ever I was to have a girl, if ever I was to have a dozen girls, I'd call 'em all Jane.'
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: Signs are small measurable things, but interpretations are illimitable, and in girls of sweet, ardent nature, every sign is apt to conjure up wonder, hope, belief, vast as a sky, and coloured by a diffused thimbleful of matter in the shape of knowledge.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: I never cared for fashion much. Amusing little seams and witty pleats. It was the girls I liked.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.quote: The girl herself is the least part of herself.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: That's the thing about girls. Every time they do something pretty, even if they're not much to look at, or even if they're sort of stupid, you fall in love with them, and then you never know where the hell you are. Girls. Jesus Christ. They can drive you crazy. They really can.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: You should write a book,' Ron told Hermione as he cut up his potatoes, 'translating mad things girls do so boys can understand them.'
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: In my experience, boys are predictable. As soon as they think of something, they do it. Girls are smarter—they plan ahead. They think about not getting caught.
quotes.author: Eoin Colfer

quotes.quote: I waited to be told what was good about me. [...] All that time I had spent readying myself, the articles that taught me life was really just a waiting room until someone noticed you- the boys had spent that time becoming themselves.
quotes.author: Emma Cline

quotes.quote: You're more trouble than you're worth.'
quotes.author: Tamora Pierce

quotes.quote: What girls do to each other is beyond description. No Chinese torture comes close.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: All little girls should be told they are pretty, even if they aren't.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Girls have an unfair advantage over men: if they can't get what they want by being smart, they can get it by being dumb.
quotes.author: Yul Brynner

quotes.quote: A smart girl leaves before she is left.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: To save a girl is to save generations!
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: A girl doesn't need anyone who doesn't need her.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Little girls are the nicest things that happen to people.
quotes.author: Allan Beck

quotes.quote: Happy girls are the prettiest.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Big girls need big diamonds.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: When a girl ceases to blush, she has lost the most powerful charm of her beauty.
quotes.author: Gregory I

quotes.quote: A girl is Innocence playing in the mud, Beauty standing on its head, and Motherhood dragging a doll by the foot.
quotes.author: Allan Beck

quotes.quote: Any girl can look glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: One girl is worth more use than 20 boys.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: When a girl cries, few things are more worthless than a boy.
quotes.author: Alexandra Bracken

quotes.quote: If a girl says not to get her a birthday present that means get me a birthday present and make sure it's jewelry.
quotes.author: Kami Garcia

quotes.quote: Girls are like slugs they probably serve some purpose, but it's hard to imagine what.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: I hated the easy assumption that girls had to be slower than boys.
quotes.author: Dawn Fraser

quotes.quote: A rich man is never ugly in the eyes of a girl.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: One of my favorite phobias is that girls, often don't get a fair break...It has come down through the generations, an inheritance of age-old customs which produced the corollary that women are bred to timidity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earheart

quotes.quote: Good girls go to heaven; bad girls go everywhere.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.quote: Who would ever think that so much went on in the soul of a young girl?
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: The hearts of small children are delicate organs. A cruel beginning in the world can twist them into curious shapes.
quotes.author: Carson McCullers

quotes.quote: From birth to age 18, a girl needs godparents. From 18-35, she needs good looks. From 35-55, she needs a good personality. And from 55 on, she needs cash.
quotes.author: Sophie Tucker

quotes.quote: I have the same goal I've had ever since I was a girl. I want to rule the world.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: I've always felt heroic about my life... As a child, I remember little girls in the playground moaning about how boys could do more than they could. I didn't think that was the case at all. My parents didn't treat me as a girl.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: When I was a little girl, I used to learn to sew all the holes in things, darning socks, but nobody mends things anymore.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: He regarded women in the way little girls regarded their dolls, as toys to be dressed and undressed.
quotes.author: Frank Swinnerton

quotes.quote: Cause a rose is still a rose, / Baby girl, you're still a flower / he can't lead you and then take you / make you and then break you / Baby girl, you hold the power.
quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

quotes.quote: You bring up your girls as if they were meant for sideboard ornaments, and then complain of their frivolity?
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: A good daughter is like a good piece of writing; candid, lyrical, graceful, moving, alive. I have seen a young girl walk across a room, intent on her intense errand, and it was like seeing a voice become visible, as if not her tongue but her motion said, 'I will do this for my life,'
quotes.author: Paul Engle

quotes.quote: Never hang around on park benches. People will think you're a cheap girl.
quotes.author: Anne Hollingworth's mother

quotes.quote: Men seldom make passes / At girls who wear glasses.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Childhood is the world of miracle or of magic. It is as if creation rose luminously out of the night, all new and fresh and astonishing. Childhood is over the moment things are no longer astonishing.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: What was wonderful about childhood is that anything in it was a wonder. It was not merely a world of miracles; it was a miraculous world.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Boys and girls tumbling in the streets and playing are moving jewels.
quotes.author: Thomas Traherne

quotes.quote: The childhood shows the man as morning shows the day.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Childhood is the kingdom where nobody dies. Nobody that matters, that is.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: There is always one moment in childhood when the door opens and lets the future in.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Childhood is measured out by sounds and smells / And sights before the dark of reason grow.
quotes.author: John Bentjeman

quotes.quote: But childhood prolonged cannot remain a fairyland. It becomes a hell.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: Growing apart doesn't change the fact that for a long time we grew side by side; our roots will always be tangled. I'm glad for that.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.quote: Summer will end soon enough, and childhood as well.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Anybody who has survived his childhood has enough information about life to last him the rest of his days.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: Think for a minute, darling: in fairy tales, it's always the children who have the fine adventures. The mothers have to stay at home and wait for the children to fly in the window.
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.quote: If you carry your childhood with you, you never become older.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Childhood means simplicity. Look at the world with the child's eye - it is very beautiful.
quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

quotes.quote: Every girls' night needs a funny movie and a good conversation about guys! My friends and I also love picking outfits out for each other to try on at slumber parties. It's so fun.
quotes.author: Jennette Mccurdy

quotes.quote: On girls night in we talk about dating; the ups and downs of the previous week. Our collective laughter is uncontrollable and tearful, even the most disappointing dates become meritorious on girls night in.
quotes.author: Cilla Black

quotes.quote: Help me hold my hair back walk me home 'cause I can't find a cab. And we dance down the bowery held hands like we were 17 again. And then it's 4am.The sun is creepin' up again. Don't you leave me,oh, darling don't you leave me.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Pour yourself a drink, put on some lipstick, and pull yourself together.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: It's Friday and I'm ready to swing. Pick up my girls and hit the party scene.
quotes.author: Aaliyah

quotes.quote: Let's get this weekend going people! That wine ain't gonna pour itself!
quotes.author: Chardonnay

quotes.quote: Go girl, seek happy nights to happy days.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It's not that diamonds are a girl's best friend, but it's your best friends who are your diamonds.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.quote: Just because I'm sassy and have a mouth on me doesn't mean I'm coming from a negative place.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Let's get down and dirty. Let's be a real girl.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: It's the good girls who keep diaries; the bad girls never have the time.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: The whisper of a pretty girl can be heard further than the roar of a lion.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Too many girls follow the line of least resistance, but a good line is hard to resist.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: I'm kidding. Look, we're just having fun. It's Girls Night Out.
quotes.author: Wil Calhoun

quotes.quote: My sister does not do Girls Night Out. I'm really worried about her. She's been so torn up, and now she's partying with a girl she can't stand.
quotes.author: Wil Calhoun

quotes.quote: It's girl's night out tonight, you want to come? I know, you need your beauty rest... Not much of it though.
quotes.author: Lucky McKee

quotes.quote: I thought inviting those girls out would make things easier for you at school. It's a Friday night. We should be out, I don't know, partying with the homies.
quotes.author: Amy Sherman-Palladino

quotes.quote: Why don't we go out and have some fun? You know, like, maybe we could go out dancing Friday night.
quotes.author: Dennis Feldman

quotes.quote: Goin' out on the weekend / Gettin' dressed with my girls / Put on my favorite lip gloss / Cherry Garcia swirl / Perfume, pleasure, and platforms / Livin' that kind of world (Ooh-ooh)
quotes.author: Charlotte Emma Aitchison

quotes.quote: So, if you're out with your girls / And if you feel on top of the world / Whoa-ah-ah-ah-oh / Out with your girls / We're gonna live it up tonight
quotes.author: Charlotte Emma Aitchison

quotes.quote: It's a girls' night out / Let's have a girls' night out tonight
quotes.author: Charlotte Emma Aitchison

quotes.quote: Let's have a girls' night out tonight / (Whoa-ah-ah-ah-oh) / It's a girls' night out / I'm with my best friends, and it feels so right
quotes.author: Charlotte Emma Aitchison

quotes.quote: So ladies are you down, down / For a girls night out / Getting loud, show me how you move, ooh / We need a girls night / We need a girls night out
quotes.author: Joshua Mark Crosby

quotes.quote: (We need a girl's night out) / Yeah! Yep! Hey! / Let's go! / It's been a crazy week, yeah / Haven't been off my feet, no / I need a stress relief, yeah / Only my girls can bring, oh
quotes.author: Joshua Mark Crosby

quotes.quote: Girls night out / So many women looking good / In the place right now
quotes.author: Claude Kelly

quotes.quote: It's just a girls night out / We'll have fun and scream and shout / It's time for us to have a night / Without a man or boy in sight
quotes.author: Alda Bkork Olafsdottir

quotes.quote: We can dance and sing out loud / It's just a girls night out / We'll have fun and scream and shout, yeah
quotes.author: Alda Bkork Olafsdottir

quotes.quote: Friday finally came around / This girl's ready to paint the town / Tonight ain't nothin' gonna slow me down
quotes.author: Brent Maher

quotes.quote: Well, I've been couped up all week long / I've been workin' my fingers to the bone / Well, it's a girl's night out / Honey, there ain't no doubt
quotes.author: Brent Maher

quotes.quote: I'm gonna dance every dance 'til the boys go home / Well, it's my night to rock / No watchin' that ol' clock / Oh, ain't no doubt, Lordy it's a girl's night out
quotes.author: Brent Maher

quotes.quote: Boy, I need some time / Some time to get out and relieve my mind / Boy, I need a change / I just wanna kick it with my girls tonight
quotes.author: Ron Spearman

quotes.quote: It's a girls thing, if you can understand / Girl's got to do what a girl's got to do
quotes.author: Ron Spearman

quotes.quote: I'm going out with the girls tonight / We're gonna have ourself's a real good time / I'm going out with the girls tonight / And everything is gonna be alright, alright
quotes.author: Ron Spearman

quotes.quote: I've been needing a girls night out / I got nothing but hand-me-downs / I need a quick fix to make these clothes hotter
quotes.author: Nate Hills

quotes.quote: Only got one life / Feeling good tonight / No, this girl's not staying home
quotes.author: Nate Hills

quotes.quote: Meet my friends for a girls' night out / Seems there ain't much to talk about / Same drinks that we're all raising / But all of the toasts just don't feel the same
quotes.author: Josh Hoge

quotes.quote: I walk in on Friday nights / Same old bar, same burned out lights / Same people and all the same faces
quotes.author: Josh Hoge

quotes.quote: I want to go out with my girlfriends and party all night. / And this time, you can't change my mind. / I've got my mind made up, so don't wait up for me.
quotes.author: Darryl Ross

quotes.quote: The time has come for the boys to realize / that it's our turn to have some fun, and it's gonna be tonight. / It's the girls night out, ni ni nite out, and there's nothing you can say, / baby. It's the girls night to play, / our night to play, so don't wait up for me.
quotes.author: Darryl Ross

quotes.quote: Me, and my girls, chilling at the club / Players jocking us, females hating / But we don't care, keep doing what we do / Came to have a good time, and party with my crew
quotes.author: John Costello

quotes.quote: Been at the salon all day getting ready / Excitement running through my veins / Can't wait for the evening ahead / It's a girl's night out, time to relieve all stress
quotes.author: John Costello

quotes.quote: The workday is gone, the weekend's ahead / Trying to have fun and not worry about a thing / But my head, nails and toes are tight / Make sure my outfit's off the chain / And my girls are ready tonight
quotes.author: John Costello

quotes.quote: All night out girl, until there's light out / We ain't gonna brake / Just keep moving and grooving
quotes.author: Quincy Brown

quotes.quote: If he has a change of heart, I'm gonna cry, cry baby / but a girl's night out.. is just the thing to save me
quotes.author: Amanda Page Cornett

quotes.quote: Yeah I burped you twice sounded good / Did everything a father should / Read Barney and nursery rhymes / I guess your momma needs a girls night out every once in a while
quotes.author: Toby Keith

quotes.quote: Got drunk on girls' night out / If they're the good years, I don't know / What you call the hard years / If they're the good times, I don't know / What you call the hard times
quotes.author: Chris Eckman
