quotes.quote: It's ladies night / This is your night tonight, / Everything is going to be alright / This is your night tonight, / C'mon girls
quotes.author: Claydes Smith

quotes.quote: Girls, we've all got one / A night that's special everywhere / From New York to Hollywood / It's ladies night and girl / The feeling's good
quotes.author: Claydes Smith

quotes.quote: Glitter shoes on dirty pavement / Trip up on a Thursday girls night out / I can see the light shine through / And the floor is drowned in red white blue
quotes.author: Liv Kristine Espenaes Krull

quotes.quote: And while part of being a good friend means being there when the other person needs us, it is just as important to be there for our friends so we can share in their joyous celebrations and triumphs.
quotes.author: Chad Love Lieberman

quotes.quote: Success and happiness can fell empty without someone to share them with, and who better to join in our victory dances than our good friends.
quotes.author: Chad Love Lieberman

quotes.quote: We women love to gather with our friends, In fact, we use just about any excuse to get together and have a party.
quotes.author: Penny Warner

quotes.quote: When we party without men, we can let our hair down, gorge on chocolate,snort when we laugh, and generally be ourselves.
quotes.author: Penny Warner

quotes.quote: We had such fun girl's night out. It was absolutely wonderful, the perfect end to a very satisfying trip.
quotes.author: Mary Jo Buttafuoco

quotes.quote: So many women--so many stories! It was from that one night 'out of town' that ladies night out was born.
quotes.author: Maralee Lowder

quotes.quote: Oh yes, it's ladies night and the feeling's right. Oh yes, it's ladies night; oh, what a night' the ladies sang.
quotes.author: Nikita Lynnette Nichols

quotes.quote: A wise girl knows her limits, a smart girl knows that she has none.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Every girl should use what Mother Nature gave her before Father Time takes it away.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: The only thing more beautiful than the woman that knows what she wants I the woman who isn't waiting on anybody else to get it for her.
quotes.author: Rob Hill Sr

quotes.quote: We girls, we're tough, darling. Soft on the outside but, deep down, we're tough.
quotes.author: Kristen Ashley

quotes.quote: A clever girl may pass through the phase of foolish miss on the way to sensible woman.
quotes.author: Mary Lascelles

quotes.quote: You're a beautiful girl, and you can do anything you want in life.
quotes.author: Jeanine Pirro

quotes.quote: There are certain shades of limelight that can wreck a girl's complexion.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Too many girls follow the line of least resistance, but a good line is hard to resist.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Some girls are just born with glitter in their veins.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: If I was a girl again, I would like to be like my fans, I would like to be like Madonna.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: It's the good girls who keep diaries; the bad girls never have the time.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Elegance does not consist in putting on a new dress.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: A girl can wait for the right man to come along but in the meantime that still doesn't mean she can't have a wonderful time with all the wrong ones.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: Give a girl the correct footwear and she can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: A girl doesn't need anyone who doesn't need her.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Beneath the makeup and behind the smile I am just a girl who wishes for the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: There are no good girls gone wrong—just bad girls found out.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Pour yourself a drink, put on some lipstick, and pull yourself together.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: If you're sad, add more lipstick and attack.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: To find out a girl's faults, praise her to her girl friends.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When I was just a cute little caterpillar, you loved me. So I became a butterfly so you would never leave.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: Heels and red lipstick will put the fear of God into people.
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.quote: A real girl isn't perfect and a perfect girl isn't real.
quotes.author: Harry Styles

quotes.quote: Girls can be so petty and jealous. I swear they're worse than guys sometimes. Except they're all quiet about it. They sugarcoat it or else they talk behind each other's backs. It's seriously twisted.
quotes.author: Melody Carlson

quotes.quote: You've got the look of a girl who's no stranger to the page. I can tell. You've got words in your soul.
quotes.author: Jay Kristoff

quotes.quote: Girly thoughts are your inner, negative self-talk that tell you how you should and should not be as a woman.
quotes.author: Patricia O'Gorman

quotes.quote: Your girly thoughts are your own internalized criteria for should think, act, and most important, look.
quotes.author: Patricia O'Gorman

quotes.quote: Your girly thoughts are the part of you that pushes too hard to be accepted and acceptable and that acts like your own mean girl club--the part of you that has internalized society's messages.
quotes.author: Ph.D.Patricia O'Gorman

quotes.quote: Your identity is formed in part by your girly thoughts.
quotes.author: Patricia O'Gorman

quotes.quote: The moment we allow culture to define our womanhood is the moment we take our first wrong turn.
quotes.author: Kristen Clark

quotes.quote: It takes guts, bravery, and heart to walk a mile in a single girl's shoes. And sometimes a fabulous pedicure.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Remember the opposite of adorable is detestable, and no one likes detestable little girls in pretty pink dresses.
quotes.author: Cha Jones

quotes.quote: Some girls have money, todays, and dreams, but girls who know that life is what they make it, are really blessed.
quotes.author: Cha Jones

quotes.quote: A bold woman doesn't have to show you or tell you anything. A bold woman is bold because she has something that you want, but can't necessarily have.
quotes.author: Cha Jones

quotes.quote: All girls are created equal, but some use their beauty, brilliance, and beliefs to move them to places of balance and excellence; not bewilderment or betrayal.
quotes.author: Cha Jones

quotes.quote: Everywhere we see evidence of women's growing power and success.
quotes.author: Nancy D O'Reilly

quotes.quote: All women, especially women of color, are still severely underrepresented and underserved.
quotes.author: Nancy D O'Reilly

quotes.quote: The number of women running for office in 2018 blew apart all previous records, and let's not forget that this is a sector of paid jobs that has long been off-limits for women.
quotes.author: Nancy D O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Even though almost all women believe that it's harder for a woman to get elected than it is for a man, they are running anyway.
quotes.author: Nancy D O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Studies show that women actually win elections at the same rate as men.
quotes.author: Nancy D O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Brains are not a handicap to a girl because a smart girl knows enough to hide them behind a low neckline.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A tomboy is a girl who misbehaves like a boy.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Every man is a little boy at heart, and every girl is a woman.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Even when a girl is as pretty as a picture, a man still likes to look at the frame.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: It's not easy for a beautiful girl to believe that love is blind.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Plain girls should have someone telling them they are beautiful. Sometimes this works miracles.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: who and what she wants.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: All little girls should be told they are pretty, even if they aren't.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: If a girl looks swell when she meets you, who gives a damn if she's late?
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: A girl with brains ought to do something else with them besides think.
quotes.author: Anita Loos

quotes.quote: The thing to remember about fathers is, they're men. A girl has to keep it in mind.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: The real superstar is a man or a woman raising six kids on one hundred fifty dollars a week.
quotes.author: Spencer Haywood

quotes.quote: It takes a woman twenty years to make a man out of her son, and another woman twenty minutes to make a fool of him.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: People don't want to see women doing things they don't think women should do.
quotes.author: Joan Jett

quotes.quote: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: You can give without loving, but you cannot love without giving.
quotes.author: Amy Carmichael

quotes.quote: For it is in giving that we receive.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: We should give as we would receive, cheerfully, quickly, and without hesitation; for there is no grace in a benefit that sticks to the fingers.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: By giving people the power to share, we're making the world more transparent.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: To give and then not feel that one has given is the very best of all ways of giving.
quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

quotes.quote: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Giving should be entered into in just the same way as investing. Giving is investing.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: The manner of giving is worth more than the gift.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: You give to yourself by giving of yourself.
quotes.author: Matt Kahn

quotes.quote: Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

quotes.quote: Giving frees us from the familiar territory of our own needs by opening our mind to the unexplained worlds occupied by the needs of others.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: I have found that among its other benefits, giving liberates the soul of the giver.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches, but reveal to them their own.
quotes.author: Disraeli

quotes.quote: To give and not expect return, that is what lies at the heart of love.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You give before you get.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: For of those to whom much is given, much is required.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: It is normal to give away a little of one's life in order not to lose it all.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: When you give yourself, you receive more than you give.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: It is not the gift, but the thought that counts.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: We must give more in order to get more, It is the generous giving of ourselves that produce the generous harvest.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Before giving, the mind of the giver is happy; while giving, the mind of the giver is made peaceful; and having given, the mind of the giver is uplifted.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: We must not only give what we have; we must also give what we are.
quotes.author: Desire Joseph Mercier

quotes.quote: Make all you can, save all you can, give all you can.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: If you have much, give of your wealth; if you have little, give of your heart.
quotes.author: Arabic Proverb

quotes.quote: To give without any reward, or any notice, has a special quality of its own.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Give what you have. To someone, it may be better than you dare to think.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Giving to others will not take away from what you have but will in fact add to your life.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: In Giving, a man receives more than he gives; and the more is in proportion to the worth of the thing given.
quotes.author: George Mcdonald

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Giving is the master key to success, in all applications of human life.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The wise man does not lay up his own treasures. The more he gives to others, the more he has for his own.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The best things to do with the best things in life is to give them away
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: Fill yourselves first and then only will you be able to give to others.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Continually give, continually gain.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The best investment with the least risk and the greatest dividend is giving.
quotes.author: Sir John Templeton

quotes.quote: If I cannot give bountifully, yet will I give freely.
quotes.author: Arthur Warwick

quotes.quote: At its best, giving is an act of worship.
quotes.author: Cornelius J. Dyck

quotes.quote: The Heart That Gives, Gathers.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: Give the world the best you have and the best will come back to you.
quotes.author: Madeline Bridge

quotes.quote: When giving comes directly from the heart, it can never disappoint or embarrass.
quotes.author: Bel Kaufman

quotes.quote: Give naught, get same. Give much get same.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Giving is the key to living life of abundance blessings.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The second best thing after a gift itself is the way of giving it
quotes.author: Ali Boussi

quotes.quote: Giving back involves a certain amount of giving up.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Giving and take give we hear a great deal about the Lord loving cheerful givers.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: When it comes to giving charity, some people stop at nothing.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The Lord loves a cheerful giver, and so does everyone else.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: There's nothing so rare as the ability to take good advice, except the wisdom to give it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The man who takes and never gives, may last for years but never lives.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: It takes a heart filled with love to give when there is very little to give.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: It's a known fact that if you want the fireplace to give you heat, you have got to keep feeding it some wood.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: You can never out-give your source.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: When God gives you a vision he also gives you the ability, and in his timing you'll certainly reach your destination if you persevere.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: God is love. He's the source which keeps giving to the stream continually.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Take whatever He gives and give whatever He takes with a big smile.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa of Calcutta

quotes.quote: Give a man a fish, feed him for a day; teach him how to fish, feed him for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Treat all men alike, Give them all the same law. Give them all an even chance to live and grow. All men were made by the same Great Spirit Chief. They are all brothers.
quotes.author: Chief Joseph

quotes.quote: When things are in danger: someone has to give them up so that others may keep them.
quotes.author: Frodo Baggins

quotes.quote: God gave us the gift of life. it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The man who will use his skill and constructive imagination to see how much he can give for a dollar, instead of how little he can give for a dollar is bound to succeed.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Telling a teenager the facts of life is like giving a fish a bath.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the giving, and so the receiving, of life.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: When you give, you'll receive something back too.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: No matter where you are in life or what your consequences are, you can give.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Friendship, at least those that I've known, is about giving.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: You may give a man an office, but you cannot give him discretion.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Give in this world. Receive in the next.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: A wise lover values not so much the gift of the lover as the love of the giver.
quotes.author: Thomas Kempis

quotes.quote: The only gift is the portion of thyself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We do not quite forgive a giver. The hand that feeds us is in some danger of being bitten.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you give what can be taken, you are not really giving.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: The manner of giving is worth more than the gift.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Take what you are given, not what you want to be given.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Give what cannot be taken.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Why should we give God thanks? Because everything we have comes from God.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Christ wants to give you hope for the future.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Give them quality. That's the best kind of advertising.
quotes.author: Milton Hershey

quotes.quote: If you give 100 percent all the time, somehow things will work out in the end.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: I need to give you something impossible, as a gift, so you can feel some of my joy.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: The lord give-it and the lord take-it, so I give it so he won't have to take it.
quotes.author: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Good works is giving to the poor and the helpless.
quotes.author: Dr Purushothaman

quotes.quote: Never regret a day in you life. Goo days give you happiness. Bad days give you experience. Worst days give lessons, and the best days give memories.
quotes.author: Fernan Vargas

quotes.quote: Generosity is the virtue of giving good things to others freely and abundantly.
quotes.author: Christian Smith

quotes.quote: Generosity also involves giving to others not simply anything in abundance but rather giving those things that are beneficial to others.
quotes.author: Christian Smith

quotes.quote: Generosity always intends to enhance the true well-being of those to whom something is being given.
quotes.author: Christian Smith

quotes.quote: Generous people can give may vary: money, possessions, time, attention, aid, encouragement, emotional availability and more.
quotes.author: Christian Smith

quotes.quote: Generosity is like love in a way. People often say that we increase love we have by giving it away.
quotes.author: Christian Smith

quotes.quote: Generosity works its magic on one person at a time.
quotes.author: Barbara Bonner

quotes.quote: Generosity is a practice, and as with anything we practice, we get better at it over time.
quotes.author: Barbara Bonner

quotes.quote: Generosity is willing to take risks.
quotes.author: Barbara Bonner

quotes.quote: Generosity invites us to put ourselves in another's shoes, see and feel the existence of a pressing need, realize that it within our power to help.
quotes.author: Barbara Bonner

quotes.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Giving is the highest expression of potency...Giving is more joyous than receiving, not because it is a deprivation, but because in the act of giving lies the expression of my aliveness.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Give yourself entirely to those around you. Be generous with your blessings. A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Happiness doesn't result from what we get, but from what we give.
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.quote: Presents are made for the pleasure of who gives them, not the merits of who receives them.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The value of a man resides in what he gives and not in what he is capable of receiving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I don't think you ever stop giving. I really don't. I think it's an on-going process. And it's not just about being able to write a check. It's being able to touch somebody's life.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Give cheerfully and freely. It is the energy behind the giving that matters so do not give grudgingly. The law of cause and effect guarantees that you shall receive plenty for what you give.
quotes.author: David Cameron Gikandi

quotes.quote: If you have much, give of your wealth; If you have little, give of your heart.
quotes.author: Arab Proverb

quotes.quote: Giving back involves a certain amount of giving up.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Giving back is something that comes from the heart to me. It's not that I do it because it's the right thing: I do it because I want do it.
quotes.author: Henry Kravis

quotes.quote: When you're in a position to have gotten so much, the gift at this point is giving back.
quotes.author: Paul Stanley

quotes.quote: Hope and purpose in this world is living as best as you can and maybe having life that gives back. But simply giving back isn't purpose; it's a branch of purpose, but it is not the trunk or root of the tree.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: It's enough to indulge and to be selfish but true happiness is really when you start giving back.
quotes.author: Adrian Grenier

quotes.quote: That's what I consider true generosity. You give your all, and yet you always feel as if it costs you nothing.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: When you learn, teach. When you get, give.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It is more blessed to give than to receive.
quotes.author: Acts 20: 35

quotes.quote: Social advance depends quite as much upon an increase in moral sensibility as it does upon a sense of duty.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: I have found that among its other benefits, giving liberates the soul of the giver.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone towards heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Life engenders life. Energy creates energy. It is by spending oneself that one becomes rich.
quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.quote: I don't know what your destiny will be, but one thing I do know: the only ones among you who will be really happy are those who have sought and found how to serve.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Everyone can be great, because everyone can serve.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: We are not put on this earth for ourselves, but are placed here for each other. If you are there always for others, then in time of need, someone will be there for you.
quotes.author: Jeff Warner

quotes.quote: Caring has the gift of making the ordinary special.
quotes.author: George R. Bach

quotes.quote: Love cannot remain by itself it has no meaning. Love has to be put into action and that action is service.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If you haven't got any charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Giving with glad and generous hearts has a way of routing out the tough old miser within us. Even the poor need to know that they can give. Just the very act of letting go of money, or some other treasure, does something within us. It destroys the demon greed.
quotes.author: Richard J. Foster

quotes.quote: One man gives freely, yet gains even more; another withholds unduly, but comes to poverty.
quotes.author: Prov. 11:24

quotes.quote: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.
quotes.author: Luke 6:37-38

quotes.quote: What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.quote: No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
quotes.author: John Bunyon

quotes.quote: When you become detached mentally from yourself and concentrate on helping other people with their difficulties, you will be able to cope with your own more effectively. Somehow, the act of self-giving is a personal power-releasing factor.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Unless we think of others and do something for them, we miss one of the greatest sources of happiness.
quotes.author: Ray Lyman Wilbur

quotes.quote: It is normal to give away a little of one's life in order not to lose it all.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: When you give yourself, you receive more than you give.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: There is no delight in owning anything unshared.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It is like the seed put in the soil -- the more one sows, the greater the harvest.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: If you have zest and enthusiasm you attract zest and enthusiasm. Life does give back in kind.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Love life. Engage in it. Give it all you've got. Love it with a passion because life truly does give back, many times over, what you put into it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I believe that as much as you take, you have to give back. It's important not to focus on yourself too much.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: Not he who has much is rich, but he who gives much.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: From what we get, we can make a living. What we give, however, makes a life.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: He who cannot give anything away cannot feel anything either.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Your mind will give back to you exactly what you put into it.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up.The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Sacrifice everything, and give up nothing.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When you feel like giving up, remember why you held on for so long in the first place.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't be discouraged. It's often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Never give up on something that you can't go a day without thinking about.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Don't let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway; we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: When things go wrong, don't go with them.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Giving up represents a choice you make when you decide not to take action on something over which you actually do have control.
quotes.author: Darren L. Johnson

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: The only one who can make you give up is yourself.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.quote: Circumstances don't defeat you -you defeat yourself when you give up.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Never give in, never give in, never; never; never; never - in nothing, great or small, large or petty - never give in except to convictions of honor and good sense.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Lots of people limit their possibilities by giving up easily. Never tell yourself this is too much for me. It's no use. I can't go on. If you do you're licked, and by your own thinking too. Keep believing and keep on keeping on.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Achievement seems to be connected with action. Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: All right Mister, let me tell you what winning means - you're willing to go longer, work harder, give more than anyone else.
quotes.author: Vincent Lombardi

quotes.quote: Giving up doesn't always mean you are weak. Sometimes it just means you're strong enough to let go.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The only thing you should ever quit is giving up!
quotes.author: Steve Pfiester

quotes.quote: Don't give up trying to find your way. But do remember that sometimes it takes bending to avoid breaking.
quotes.author: Katinka Hesselink

quotes.quote: Never give up on anybody. Miracles happen everyday.
quotes.author: H Jackson Brown Jr

quotes.quote: If you can't stand the heat get out of the kitchen.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Better return half way than lose yourself.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: Either do not begin or, having begun, do not give up.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A just man falls seven times, and rises up again.
quotes.author: Biblical Proverb

quotes.quote: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: If you fall behind, run faster. Never give up, never surrender, and rise up against the odds.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: All who have accomplished great things have had a great aim, have fixed their gaze on a goal which was high, one which sometimes seemed impossible.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas Alva Edison

quotes.quote: Most people give up just when they're about to achieve success. They quit on the one yard line. They give up at the last minute of the game, one foot from a winning touchdown.
quotes.author: H.Ross Perot

quotes.quote: Never give up on something you really want. It's difficult to wait, but more difficult to regret.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Where there is a will there is a way.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: No one has the power to shatter your dreams unless you give it to them.
quotes.author: Maeve Greyson

quotes.quote: Every cloud has a silver lining.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Never give up. And never, under any circumstances, face the facts.
quotes.author: Ruth Gordon

quotes.quote: Not knowing when the dawn will come, I open every door.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: When you blame others, you give up your power to change.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: Never give up. You only get one life. Go for it!
quotes.author: Richard E. Grant

quotes.quote: The man who gives up accomplishes nothing and is only a hindrance. The man who does notgive up can move mountains.
quotes.author: Ernest Hello

quotes.quote: Try and fail, but don't fail to try.
quotes.author: Stephen Kaggwa

quotes.quote: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Setbacks are temporary as long as you don't give up.
quotes.author: Kevin Ngo

quotes.quote: I can't do it' never yet accomplished anything. 'I will try' has performed miracles.
quotes.author: George P. Burnham

quotes.quote: I can't' isn't a reason to give up, it's a reason to try harder.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I felt so much better since I gave up hope.
quotes.author: Zen Comics

quotes.quote: Wanna fly, you got to give up the shit that weighs you down.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: The act of giving something up is painful. But as we negotiate the curves and corners of our lives, we must continually give up parts of ourselves. The only alternative is not to travel at all on the journey of life.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: You must want to fly so much that you are willing to give up being a caterpillar.
quotes.author: Trina Paulus

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Don't give up. Keep going. There is always a chance that you stumble onto something terrific. I have never heard of anyone stumbling over anything while he was sitting down.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Nothing stops the man who desires to achieve. Every obstacle is simply a course to develop his achievement muscle. It's a strengthening of his powers of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Eric Butterworth

quotes.quote: The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
quotes.author: Herbert Kaufman

quotes.quote: Most people who succeed in the face of seemingly impossible conditions are people who simply don't know how to quit.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: As long as I can stand it, God, I'll keep on keeping on.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: Self-discipline never means giving up anything, for giving up is a loss. Our Lord did not ask us to give up the things of earth, but to exchange them for better things.
quotes.author: Fulton John Sheen

quotes.quote: Success is the inability to give up. Failure is giving up.
quotes.author: Nadia McInnis

quotes.quote: You might feel like giving up on your dreams. Do not give up, there is an unexplainable joy waiting for you.
quotes.author: Nadia MacInnis

quotes.quote: The habit of giving up when the present task is half-finished and trying something else is one of the chief causes of failure.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: It's not how hard you hit. It's how hard you get hit...and keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: It is okay to fail as long as you keep trying.
quotes.author: Frankenweenie

quotes.quote: Two little mice fell in a bucket of cream. The first mouse quickly gave up and drowned. The second mouse, wouldn't quit. He struggled so hard that eventually he churned that cream into butter and crawled out.
quotes.author: Catch Me If You Can

quotes.quote: Relying on solitude is easy; giving up things to do is hard.
quotes.author: Adept Godrakpa

quotes.quote:
Waiting, and waiting /, After all, I am giving up, / To be free / From waiting / To start /
A new journey of new hopes / And new dreams.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Give up trying to make me give up.
quotes.author: Masashi Kishimoto

quotes.quote: Each mistake teaches you something new about yourself. There is no failure, remember, except in no longer trying. It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Chis Bradford

quotes.quote: When you know who matters most to you, giving things up, even yourself, doesn't really feel like a sacrifice.
quotes.author: Kiera Cass

quotes.quote: Anyone can give up; it is the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone would expect you to fall apart, now that is true strength.
quotes.author: Chris Bradford

quotes.quote: How long should you try? Until.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Never give up on the fight until you win the belt.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Falling doesn't give you a reason to give up, as long as you believe.
quotes.author: Naruto Diaries

quotes.quote: You just can't beat the person who just won't give up.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: You do what you can for as long as you can, and when you finally can’t, you do the next best thing. You back up but you don't give up.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.quote: I haven't been to Tasmania. I haven't been to the South Pole, and I haven't been to the North Pole. I want to see the polar bear migration before there are no polar bears. I want to see Glacier National Park before the glacier melts.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: The two principal parks in Alaska are Denali and Glacier Bay. Tourism is just overriding the protection of resources that tourists want to see. We have too many tourists in Denali and too many big cruise ships in Glacier Bay.
quotes.author: Michael Frome

quotes.quote: The prediction that glaciers will be gone from Glacier National Park has been moved up by 10 years to 2020, the same year it's predicted the Arctic Sea will be ice-free in the summer.
quotes.author: Bill Kurtis

quotes.quote: I've been lucky enough to meet a lot of fantastic people, from royalty to rock stars. I've also been known to be a bit of a daredevil, so I've tried to explore extreme travel and adventure - scuba-diving in an arctic glacier and camping in the Himalayas.
quotes.author: Cynthia Rowley

quotes.quote: The glacier was God's great plough set at work ages ago to grind, furrow, and knead over, as it were, the surface of the earth.
quotes.author: Louis Agassiz

quotes.quote: There is a glacier in Iceland, Solheimar, which has retreated a great deal, and every time I go back there and see what's not there any more, it does something to the heart. It makes you realise it's possible for a gigantic natural element to just disappear.
quotes.author: James Balog

quotes.quote: To get the feel of the polar night, I went back to Spitsbergen in winter. I went snowshoeing in the dark and experimented with headlamps and climbed a glacier in driving snow.
quotes.author: Michelle Paver

quotes.quote: The 'New Yorker' asked me to shoot a story on climate change in 2005, and I wound up going to Iceland to shoot a glacier. The real story wasn't the beautiful white top. It ended up being at the terminus of the glacier where it's dying.
quotes.author: James Balog

quotes.quote: Flooding in low-lying coastal areas. Threat of global warming. Melting of glaciers. Rising sea-level. Warning.
quotes.author: Shweta Gupta

quotes.quote: Snow capped reaches, Still chill air, Majestic creations, lofty ridges. Captivating view and Overwhelming emotions. Enthralling beauty of the glaciers Glistening on the outside, Infuse life with new meanings. While on the insides of the arctic chests... Lies buried deep crevasses Resulting in an encounter Between different worlds and different values.
quotes.author: Ranjeeta Nath Ghai

quotes.quote: Future generations are not going to ask us what political party were you in. They are going to ask what did you do about it, when you knew the glaciers were melting.
quotes.author: Martin Sheen

quotes.quote: If the world was an etch-a-sketch, glaciers are the big shake.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: Just because you see pictures of glaciers falling into the ocean doesn't mean anything bad is happening. This is something that happens all the time. It's part of the natural cycle of things. We know from measurements that glaciers have been melting for 200 years at least.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: A glacier will frequently move forward one foot while retreating three feet... Which reminds me a lot of myself!
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: East Yorkshire, to the uninitiated, just looks like a lot of little hills. But it does have these marvelous valleys that were caused by glaciers, not rivers. So it is unusual.
quotes.author: David Hockney

quotes.quote: Glacial pace is actually an incorrect concept. The glaciers move a lot faster and they react a lot faster than people imagine.
quotes.author: James Balog

quotes.quote: When you get out onto a glacier that's the size of Northern Ireland and it's so vast, and you're standing on top of it and you can see forever, it's so pure and clear that you can see for miles and miles and miles. You really do think, "Wow, there is a god!" You feel very humbled.
quotes.author: Richard Dormer

quotes.quote: The retreat and disappearance of glaciers—there are only 160,000 left—means we're burning libraries and damaging the planet, possibly beyond repair. Bit by bit, glacier by glacier, rib by rib, we're living the Fall.
quotes.author: Gretel Ehrlich

quotes.quote: Long, blue, spiky-edged shadows crept out across the snow-fields, while a rosy glow, at first scarce discernible, gradually deepened and suffused every mountain-top, flushing the glaciers and the harsh crags above them. This was the alpenglow, to me the most impressive of all the terrestrial manifestations of God. At the touch of this divine light, the mountains seemed to kindle to a rapt, religious consciousness, and stood hushed like devout worshippers waiting to be blessed.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The mountain glaciers in every region of the world are melting, many of them at an accelerated rate, threatening drinking supplies - drinking water supplies and agricultural water supplies. We have these record storms, drought, floods, fires, three deaths (ph) in the American West, climate refugees beginning now, expected to rise to the hundreds of millions unless we take action.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Just to lie here in the sun with great white peaks all around me and the biggest glacier in Europe at my feet, to eat from time to time, to sleep a little and dream a great deal- it is a heavenly existence.
quotes.author: George Leigh Mallory

quotes.quote: One learns that the world, though made, is yet being made. That this is still the morning of creation. That mountains, long conceived, are now being born, brought to light by the glaciers, channels traced for coming rivers, basins hollowed for lakes.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: An ethereal mountain emerging from a tossing sea of clouds framed between two dark barracks a massive blue-black tooth of shear rock inlaid with azure glaciers, austere yet floating fairly-like on the near horizon... For hours afterwards I remained spell-bound.
quotes.author: Felice Benuzzi

quotes.quote: In Alaska, the beaches are slumping so much, people are having to move houses. In Tuktoyaktuk, the land is starting to go under water. The glaciers are melting and the permafrost is melting. There are new species of birds and fish and insects showing up. The Arctic is a barometer for the health of the world. If you want to know how healthy the world is, come to the Arctic and feel its pulse.
quotes.author: Sheila Watt-Cloutier

quotes.quote: Sea level rise and destruction of water resources as glaciers melt alone may have horrendous human consequences.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: I am involved in making measurements in polar oceans, and they are changing more than anything else. I think we have to be prepared for major changes associated with the melting of floating ice and the melting of the Greenland glacier.
quotes.author: Walter Munk

quotes.quote: Was it because a lot of the heat went into melting Arctic sea ice or parts of Greenland and Antarctica, and other glaciers? Was it because the heat was buried in the ocean and sequestered, perhaps well below the surface?...Perhaps all of these things are going on?
quotes.author: Kevin E. Trenberth

quotes.quote: in just 25 years the glaciers in the Himalayas which provide water for three-quarters of a billion people could disappear entirely.
quotes.author: Gordon Brown

quotes.quote: Glaciers are delicate and individual things, like humans. Instability is built into them.
quotes.author: Will Harrison

quotes.quote: As the ice shelves are disintegrating, the glaciers that are feeding them from the land are surging forward.
quotes.author: Robert Gilbert

quotes.quote: Glamour is translucent not transparent, not opaque. It invites us into the world but it doesn't give us a completely clear picture.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.quote: Glamour, that trans-human aura or power to attract imitation, is a kind of vessel into which dreams are poured, and some vessels are simply worthier than others. A beautiful woman can turn heads but real glamour has a deeper pull. Glamour is the power to rearrange people's emotions, which, in effect, is the power to control one's environment.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: Elegance is a glowing inner peace. Grace is an ability to give as well as to receive and be thankful. Mystery is a hidden laugh always ready to surface! Glamour only radiates if there is a sublime courage & bravery within: glamour is like the moon; it only shines because the sun is there.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell

quotes.quote: Glamour doesn't just happen, people don't wake up in the morning glamorous.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.quote: Glamour is something you can't bear to be without once you're used to it.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: Glamour cannot exist without personal social envy being a common and widespread emotion.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Glamour can be something very simple. Glamour can be how you wash your face, how you make your breakfast.
quotes.author: Zac Posen

quotes.quote: Glamour looks eloquent but seldom talks.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Glamour is beyond beauty and beyond age. It's like sex appeal.
quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

quotes.quote: Glamour is all about transcending this world and getting to an idealized, perfect place. And this is one reason that modes of transportation tend to be extremely glamorous. The less experience we have with them, the more glamorous they are. So you can do a glamorized picture of a car, but you can't do a glamorized picture of traffic.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.quote: Being glamorous is about strength and confidence. It's black and white dramatic. You have to be strong.
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta Jones

quotes.quote: Glamour is about feeling good in your own skin.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Glamour is something more than what you put on your body. It has to do with the way you carry yourself and the impact you have on others.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.quote: Glamour invites us to live in a different world. It has to simultaneously be mysterious, a little bit distant that's why, often in these glamour shots, the person is not looking at the audience, it's why sunglasses are glamorous but also not so far above us that we can't identify with the person.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Glamour is when a man knows a woman is a woman.
quotes.author: Gina Lollobrigida

quotes.quote: Glam culture is ultimately rooted in obsession, and those of us who are truly devoted and loyal to the lifestyle of glamour are masters of its history. Or, to put it more elegantly, we are librarians.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Glamour is a shooting star, it catches your eye, but fades away, beauty is the sun always brilliant day after day.
quotes.author: Michael Dolan

quotes.quote: Glamour is what makes a man ask for your telephone number. But it also is what makes a woman ask for the name of your dressmaker.
quotes.author: Lilly Dache

quotes.quote: Glamour is assurance. It is a kind of knowing that you are all right in every way, mentally and physically and in appearance, and that, whatever the occasion or the situation, you are equal to it.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Glamour is something no woman can be born with. It's not a gift at all. It's more of a concoction than anything else.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: Glamour is an imaginative process that creates a specific emotional response: a sharp mixture of projection, longing, admiration, and aspiration. It evokes an audience's hopes and dreams and makes them seem attainable, all the while maintaining enough distance to sustain the fantasy.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.quote: For every two minutes of glamour, there are eight hours of hard work.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.quote: Glamour is what makes a man ask for your telephone number, and a woman ask for the name of your dressmake.
quotes.author: Lilly Dache

quotes.quote: A glamour girl is a thing of beauty and an expense forever.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Glamour is something that evaporates when the sweater is a little too large.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A glamour girl is one who looks good enough to eat and dresses with taste.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A glamorous creature has the kind of figure that men give the once-over twice.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: There's something glamorous about every women, especially when there are a few drinks in a man.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Glamour is about feeling good in your own skin.
quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

quotes.quote: I don't mind the sparkle. I think it's kind of a tradition in skating.
quotes.author: Kristi Yamaguchi

quotes.quote: If you want to wear slip-ons, and sweats, and a hat, and you want to go gender-fluid one day, or you want to put on a sexy silk dress the next night. That's the cool thing about being a woman today. You can make whatever choice you want, and no man, no person could tell you it's the wrong choice.
quotes.author: Cat Cora

quotes.quote: Beauty and femininity are ageless and can't be contrived, and glamour, although the manufacturers won't like this, cannot be be manufactured.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Love of glamour is arguably one of the most common and pervasive stereotypes associated with femininity.
quotes.author: Amy Stanton

quotes.quote: I'll always wear a touch of pink, not because I'm a girly girl but because of that expression of bows and frivolity.
quotes.author: Shelley Zalis

quotes.quote: Glamour is a beautiful illusion the word 'glamour' originally meant a literal magic spell that promises to transcend ordinary life and make the ideal real. It depends on a special combination of mystery and grace. Too much information breaks the spell.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.quote: Find the thing that makes you feel great, powerful, in control, good about yourself.
quotes.author: Amy Stanton

quotes.quote: Romance is the glamour which turns the dust of everyday life into a golden haze.
quotes.author: Carolyn Gold Helibrun

quotes.quote: The true face of smoking is disease, death and horror - not the glamour and sophistication the pushers in the tobacco industry try to portray.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: Glamour was being conceptualized as a style of life, defined on the one hand as essentially the obserse of their own 'boring' present existence, whatever that may be; and on the other hand in terms of qualities of being.
quotes.author: Beverley Skeggs

quotes.quote: Glamour offers the ability to appear as something different from the mundane.
quotes.author: Beverley Skeggs

quotes.quote: Glamour involves attitude as well as appearance, it is a 'structure of feeling'.
quotes.author: Beverley Skeggs

quotes.quote: Glamour is a way of transcending the banalities of femininity which render women as passive objects.
quotes.author: Beverley Skeggs

quotes.quote: The glass is falling hour by hour,/ the glass will fall for ever./ But if you break the bloody glass / you won't hold up the weather.
quotes.author: Louis MacNiece

quotes.quote: Tis visible silence, still as the hour-glass.
quotes.author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quotes.quote: Thou art thy mother's glass, and she in thee / Calls back the lovely April of her prime.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: To drink a glass of sherry when you can get a dry Martini is like taking a stagecoach when you can travel by the Orient Express.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: It was a blonde. A blonde to make a bishop kick a hole in the stained glass window.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Fortune is like glass - the brighter the glitter, the more easily broken.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Your glass seems like it will always be half full even it falls down and shatters to pieces.
quotes.author: K. Jared Hosein

quotes.quote: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: TheÂ glassÂ ceiling gets more pliable when you turn up the heat.
quotes.author: Pauline R. Kezer

quotes.quote: The world is a looking glass and gives back to every man the reflection of his own face.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: When you look at a piece of delicately spun glass you think of two things: how beautiful it is and how easily it can be broken.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote:
An empty glass is perceived by the eyes as nothing,
in reality, this nothing is something, because it has air.
That something is what we call energy pervading everywhere,
for it is the breath of air which brings life into you.
quotes.author: Gian Kumar

quotes.quote: A woman and a glass are never out of danger.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: The more women look in their glass the less they look in their house.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Handle with care women and glass.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: The glitter of the sea was like a glass in my eyes.
quotes.author: Steve Erickson

quotes.quote: Her long hair was naturally a light brown but the sun had bleached tawny streaks in it, like the stripes of a very old battle flag seen through imperfect glass.
quotes.author: R.V. Cassill

quotes.quote: Kept rattling the ice in her glass, rattling her beads, rattling her bracelet like an impatient pony jingling its harness.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: A glaring summery heat covered everything like a layer of glass.
quotes.author: Jean Thompson

quotes.quote: Life... flat and stale, like an old glass of beer.
quotes.author: Andre Dubus

quotes.quote: The great glass doors...swished together behind him like an indrawn breath.
quotes.author: A. Alvarez

quotes.quote: Life, like a dome of many-colored glass, stains the white radiance of eternity.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: When I was little, my grandfather gave me a box of broken glass for Christmas. He gave my brother a box of Bandaids and said, 'You two share.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Glass, china, and reputation are easily cracked, and never well mended.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Her words showered down upon us like little glass pellets.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: People who choose to live in glass houses shouldn't complain about public affection.
quotes.author: Sidney S. Prasad

quotes.quote: People who choose to live in glass houses shouldn't sing in a high pitch.
quotes.author: Sidney S. Prasad

quotes.quote: 'A singer can shatter glass with the proper high note,' he said, 'but the simplest way to break glass is simply to drop it on the floor.'
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: A fine glass vase goes from treasure to trash, the moment it is broken. Fortunately, something else happens to you and me. Pick up your pieces. Then, help me gather mine.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: You use a glass mirror to see your face; you use works of art to see your soul.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Don't throw stones at your neighbors if your own windows are glass.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The bird, the bee, the running child are all the same to the sliding glass door.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Take out the garbage... true happiness comes from within not from without.
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: 12% of people with glasses wear them as an attempt to see better. 88% of people with glasses wear them as an attempt to appear smarter.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: If you had weak eyes, they needed exercises to get strong. Glasses were like crutches. They prevented people with feeble eyes from seeing the world on their own.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: Everybody comes with prejudices, colored glasses on their eyes. Then they see everything colored according to their glasses. Yes, a few people come just like you, unprejudiced, without any idea gathered from yellow jounalism.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: People who wear glasses, without them they always look unfocused, vulnerable. Out in the open. A layer removed.
quotes.author: Lee Child

quotes.quote: You know, anyone who wears glasses, in one sense or another, is a cyborg.
quotes.author: Evgeny Morozov

quotes.quote: Sometimes you've got to put your realistic glasses on and see who you are.
quotes.author: Will Muschamp

quotes.quote: The greatest magnifying glasses in the world are a man's own eyes when they look upon his own person.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Do not expect the world to look bright, if you habitually wear gray-brown glasses.
quotes.author: Charles William Eliot

quotes.quote: People have a tendency to see country life through rose-colored glasses.
quotes.author: P. J. Harvey

quotes.quote: Women have served all these centuries as looking glasses possessing the power of reflecting the figure of man at twice its natural size.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Don't call the world dirty because you forgot to clean your glasses.
quotes.author: Aaron Hill

quotes.quote: Being sick feels like you're wearing someone else's glasses.
quotes.author: Megan Boyle

quotes.quote: Girls with glasses aren't happy being nomads; they need a safe place to put their glasses while they sleep.
quotes.author: Marissa Walsh

quotes.quote: The moon is like a bar, we all fill our glasses the way we can.
quotes.author: M. F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: When people think about computer science, they imagine people with pocket protectors and thick glasses who code all night.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.quote: A celebrity is a person who works hard all of their life to become well known, and then wears dark glasses to avoid being recognized.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: People really give you a hard time when you wear fake glasses out to a bar.
quotes.author: Ryan Eggold

quotes.quote: Putting on a new pair of glasses or sunglasses is a simple way to completely transform your look - just like a new hairstyle.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.quote: It never gets old watching someone receive their first pair of glasses and regain their vision and their life.
quotes.author: Neil Blumenthal

quotes.quote: A simple, well-proven surgery can restore sight to millions, and something even simpler, a pair of glasses, can make millions more see.
quotes.author: Thulasiraj Ravilla

quotes.quote: With the right glasses, a girl can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Life's too short to wear boring glasses.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: All that glitters is not gold.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Personality is the glitter that sends your little gleam across the footlights and the orchestra pit into that big black space where the audience is.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Some girls are just born with glitter in their veins.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: A life without glitter is no life at all.
quotes.author: Toni Collette

quotes.quote: When life gives you Monday, dip it in glitter and sparkle all day.
quotes.author: Ella Woodward

quotes.quote: Shower the world with pink and glitter.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: If something doesn't look right, throw some glitter on it.
quotes.author: Adam Lambert

quotes.quote: You know you're putting a good thing out into the universe when you put on glitter.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: All that glitters is not hovery.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: Share your sparkle wherever you are.
quotes.author: Dodinsky Quotes

quotes.quote: You know how we can be about things which sparkle and shine. We imagine they will put back something of what has been lost.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: Every creature is a glittering, glistening mirror of Divinity.
quotes.author: Hildegard of Bingen

quotes.quote: A little glitter can turn your whole day around.
quotes.author: Barbara Park

quotes.quote: Glitter is the herpes of craft supplies.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: There's glitter on the floor after the party.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Every woman in this world wears a little sparkle, some in their dress, and some in their eyes.
quotes.author: Shahla Khan

quotes.quote: Don't let anyone or anything to dull your sparkle.
quotes.author: Pradeepa Pandiyan

quotes.quote: Nothing cam dim light that shines from within.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We are all of us stars and we deresrve to twinkle.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Through God, everyone sparkles.
quotes.author: John Ericson

quotes.quote: The warnings about global warming have been extremely clear for a long time. We are facing a global climate crisis. It is deepening. We are entering a period of consequences.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Climate change is the most severe problem that we are facing today, more serious even than the threat of terrorism.
quotes.author: David King

quotes.quote: Global warming threatens our health, our economy, our natural resources, and our children's future. It is clear we must act.
quotes.author: Eliot Spitzer

quotes.quote: Today, we can see with our own eyes what global warming is doing. In that context it becomes truly irresponsible, if not immoral, for us not to do something
quotes.author: Joe Lieberman

quotes.quote: Global warming is too serious for the world any longer to ignore its danger or split into opposing factions on it.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: The big damages come if the climate sensitivity to greenhouse gases turns out to be high [causing greater global warming than current projections.] Then it's not a bullet headed at us, but a thermonuclear warhead.
quotes.author: Raymond T. Pierrehumbert

quotes.quote: The earth lies polluted under its inhabitants; for they have transgressed laws, violated the statutes, broken the everlasting covenant. Therefore a curse devours the earth, and its inhabitants suffer for their guilt.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: If we don't take the action today, tomorrow will be the End. Let us be awake and fight back against global warming
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Planting and growing increasing quantities of trees is the scientific solution to Earth's environmental dilemma.
quotes.author: Richard Barbe-Baker

quotes.quote: First, I worry about climate change. It's the only thing that I believe has the power to fundamentally end the march of civilization as we know it, and make a lot of the other efforts that we're making irrelevant and impossible
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: I used to be skeptical of global warming, but now I'm absolutely convinced that the world is spiraling out of control. CO2 is like a bushfire that gets bigger and bigger every year.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: It's unlikely that the U.S. is going to take serious action on climate change until there are observable, dramatic events, almost catastrophic in nature, that drive public opinion and drive the political process in that direction.
quotes.author: Robert Stavins

quotes.quote: Without urgent measures to rapidly reduce our greenhouse gas emissions, the possibility of limiting the temperature rise below a dangerous level will have disappeared within a decade.
quotes.author: Steve Sawyer

quotes.quote: We are running out of time, we must have a planetary solution to a planetary crisis.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: We are running out of time. We know that if we continue to rely on fossil fuels we will face a future of worsening air pollution and an increasingly inhospitable climate.
quotes.author: Jim Leape

quotes.quote: Humankind has suddenly entered into a brand new relationship with our planet. Unless we quickly and profoundly change the course of our civilization, we face an immediate and grave danger of destroying the worldwide ecological system that sustains life as we know it.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: When I was a boy in the 1930s, the carbon dioxide level was still below 300 parts per million. This year, it reached 382, the highest figure for hundreds of thousands of years.
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.quote: Global warming is too serious for the world any longer to ignore its danger or split into opposing factions on it.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: The blunt truth about the politics of climate change is that no country will want to sacrifice its economy in order to meet this challenge.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Climate change is one of the greatest challenges facing humanity, and it is the world's most vulnerable populations who are most immediately at risk. The actions of the wealthiest nations?those generating the vast majority of greenhouse gases?have tangible consequences for people in the rest of the world, especially in the poorest nations.
quotes.author: Michael R. Bloomberg

quotes.quote: The planet will continue to cook.
quotes.author: Paul Krugman

quotes.quote: High resolution records from Antarctic ice cores show that carbon dioxide concentrations increased 600 400 years after the warming
quotes.author: Dr. Hubertus Fischer et al.

quotes.quote: Climatism is the belief that man-made greenhouse gases are destroying Earth's climate.
quotes.author: Steve Goreham

quotes.quote: In my view, climate change is the most severe problem that we are facing today, more serious even than the threat of terrorism.
quotes.author: Sir David King

quotes.quote: Climate change is a result of the greatest market failure the world has seen We risk damages on a scale larger than the two world wars of the last century.
quotes.author: Sir Nicholas Stern

quotes.quote: One problem facing humanity is now so urgent that, unless it is resolved in the next two decades, it will destroy our global civilization: the climate crisis.
quotes.author: Dr. Tim Flannery

quotes.quote: The facts are there that we have created, man has, a self-inflicted wound that man has created through global warming.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: The danger posed by war to all of humanity - and to our planet - is at least matched by the climate crisis and global warming. I believe that t he world has reached a critical stage in its efforts to exercise responsible environmental stewardship.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: Global warming has melted the polar ice caps, raised the levels of the oceans and flooded the earth's great cities. Despite its evident prosperity, New Jersey is scarcely Utopia.
quotes.author: Godfried Danneels

quotes.quote: While human-induced global warming is not going to turn present-day Earth into present-day Mars, global warming is dire enough that our most distinguished scientists recently concluded that as many as 1 million species on the planet could be extinct by 2050 if affairs do not change.
quotes.author: Jay Inslee

quotes.quote: I want to testify today about what I believe is a planetary emergency - a crisis that threatens the survival of our civilization and the habitability of the Earth.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: The nation that leads the clean energy economy will be the nation that leads the global economy.
quotes.author: Obama's State of the Union

quotes.quote: Combating climate change requires collaboration with many levels of government.
quotes.author: Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: It is increasingly apparent that we must act now, as climate change is accelerating. Climate change threatens both our security and our economic development. Failure to take decisive action will have a dramatic impact.
quotes.author: Angela Merkel

quotes.quote: Climate change is our generation's greatest environmental challenge. It threatens our economy, our Western way of life and our future. It will change every facet of our existence, and unless we adapt to it, the results will be catastrophic for years to come.
quotes.author: Gov. Bill Ritter

quotes.quote: The impact of climate change is a tremendous risk to the security and well-being of our countries.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: The problem of climate change is so large that it can't be solved by voluntary individual responses. It requires an economy-wide solution, i.e. one that limits the total carbon intake of the economy.
quotes.author: Peter Barnes

quotes.quote: The climate challenge illustrates how we have to change. The developing countries need more support and opportunities to develop and use clean energy. Because if the current situation continues, then the world will not be able to handle this burden.
quotes.author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

quotes.quote: Global warming is a matter of national security. Will we live in a world where we must fight our neighbors for fresh water and food? Or will we take the lead now and leave to our children and grandchildren a world better off than the one we inherited from our parents?
quotes.author: General Wesley Clark

quotes.quote: We should not be drilling for oil anywhere because burning oil and coal and natural gas is what's destroying our environment, our climate. And we need the climate if we're going to eat.
quotes.author: Paul Ehrlich

quotes.quote: The warnings about global warming have been extremely clear for a long time. We are facing a global climate crisis. It is deepening. We are entering a period of consequences."
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: The message should be clear, climate change must take its place along those threats like conflict, poverty.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Climate change is responsible for conflicts that can only deepen in the future if we don't act as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Jose Manuel Barroso

quotes.quote: Climate change means catastrophically violent weather.
quotes.author: Ken Livingstone

quotes.quote: A report issued earlier this year by the UN Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) concluded both that global temperatures are rising, (and) that this is caused largely by human activities.
quotes.author: George Bush

quotes.quote: The scale and the pace of environmental change at the beginning of the 21st Century are a serious wake up call to us as human beings on this planet.
quotes.author: Achim Steiner

quotes.quote: Dealing with global warming doesn't mean we have all got to suddenly stop breathing. Dealing with global warmning means that we have to stop waste, and if you travel for no reason whatsoever, that is a waste.
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.quote: If you ask what you are going to do about global warming, the only rational answer is to change the way in which we do transportation, energy production, agriculture and a good deal of manufacturing. The problem originates in human activity in the form of the production of goods.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: Global warming creates volatility. I feel it when I'm flying. The storms are more volatile. We are paying the price in more hurricanes and tornadoes.
quotes.author: Debbie Stabenow

quotes.quote: The pace of global warming is accelerating and the scale of the impact is devastating. The time for action is limited - we are approaching a tipping point beyond which the opportunity to reverse the damage of CO2 emissions will disappear.
quotes.author: Eliot Spitzer

quotes.quote: Preservation of our environment is not a liberal or conservative challenge, it's common sense.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: One of the biggest obstacles to making a start on climate change is that it has become a cliché before it has even been understood
quotes.author: Tim Flannery

quotes.quote: Pollution is nothing but the resources we are not harvesting. We allow them to disperse because we've been ignorant of their value.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: We are the first generation to feel the sting of climate change, and we are the last generation that can do something about it.
quotes.author: Jay Inslee

quotes.quote: Global warming will not end by Earth finding a shade under the trees but under our hands joined together
quotes.author: Agona Apell

quotes.quote: We cannot hope to either understand or to manage the carbon in the atmosphere unless we understand and manage the trees and the soil too.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: This is the moment when we must come together to save this planet.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Global climate change needs global action now. The alarm bells ought to be ringing in every capital of the world.
quotes.author: John Gummer

quotes.quote: Scientists have been warning about global warming for decades. It's too late to stop it now, but we can lessen its severity and impacts.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: https://books.google.com.ph/books?id=S5UIEAAAQBAJ&pg=PA6&dq=Climate+change+is+no+longer+some+far-off+problem;+it+is+happening+here,+it+is+happening+now.&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjlosWsmMvxAhVMs54KHfHzDYIQ6AEwBnoECAcQAg#v=onepage&q=Climate%20change%20is%20no%20longer%20some%20far-off%20problem%3B%20it%20is%20happening%20here%2C%20it%20is%20happening%20now.&f=false
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: We’ve been given a warning by science and a wake-up call by nature; it is up to us now to heed them.
quotes.author: Bill McKibben

quotes.quote: It is our collective and individual responsibility to preserve and tend to the environment in which we all live.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Climate change is a terrible problem, and it absolutely needs to be solved. It deserves to be a huge priority
quotes.author: Bill Gates
