quotes.quote: A nation that destroys its soils destroys itself. Forests are the lungs of our land, purifying the air and giving fresh strength to our people.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The environment is where we all meet; where all of us have a mutual interest; it is the one thing all of us share.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: Climate change is a planetary crisis. We've got to act, and we have to act boldly.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: Twenty-five years ago people could be excused for not knowing much, or doing much, about climate change. Today we have no excuse.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: I would like nuclear fusion to become a practical power source. It would provide an inexhaustible supply of energy, without pollution or global warming.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Global warming is real and human activity is the main cause. The consequences are mainly negative and headed toward catastrophic, unless we act. However, the good news is that we can meet this challenge. It is not too late, and we have everything we need to get started.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: We do not know how much our climate could or will change in the future. We do not know how fast change will occur or even how some of our actions could impact it.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Globalizing a bad thing makes it worse. But globalizing a good thing is usually good.
quotes.author: Richard Stallman

quotes.quote: We talk about globalization today as if it's some great big new thing, that we've all just discovered. But there's really nothing new about it.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Winspear

quotes.quote: Globalization has enriched the planet beyond belief, leading to ever-increased demands of perfection. And thanks to 24/7 communications, we all instantaneously know when these expectations aren't met.
quotes.author: Victor Davis Hanson

quotes.quote: In this age of globalization, instant real time media and television, everyone all over the world realizes that high energy usage equates with a high standard of living and wealth.
quotes.author: John Olver

quotes.quote: Globalization creates economic policies where the transnationals lord over us, and the result is misery and unemployment.
quotes.author: Evo Morales

quotes.quote: Diversification and globalization are the keys to the future.
quotes.author: Fujio Mitarai

quotes.quote: This globalization is lifting up hundreds of millions of people out of poverty. The Left needs to see that.
quotes.author: Chrystia Freeland

quotes.quote: With globalization and with a lot of power evaporating from the nation-states, the late-19th century established hierarchies of importance, or 'pecking orders' of cultures, presenting assimilation as an advancement or promotion, dissolved.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: No generation has had the opportunity, as we now have, to build a global economy that leaves no-one behind. It is a wonderful opportunity, but also a profound responsibility.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: Globalization is a strategy of liberalization that becomes an economic nightmare for the poor.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Globalization is now no longer an objective but an imperative, as markets open and geographic barriers become increasingly blurred and even irrelevant.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Globalization means we have to re-examine some of our ideas, and look at ideas from other countries, from other cultures, and open ourselves to them. And that's not comfortable for the average person.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: Globalization offers us enormous opportunities in the race to leapfrog in development processes. It also obliges us to set in motion processes which would minimize its risks.
quotes.author: Manmohan Singh

quotes.quote: The regime of globalization promotes an unfettered marketplace as the dynamic instrument organizing international relations.
quotes.author: William Greider

quotes.quote: Globalization is the process by which markets integrate worldwide.
quotes.author: Michael Spence

quotes.quote: In this era of globalization we are witnessing struggles within individual states about what their identity and interests consist in.
quotes.author: Dale Jamieson

quotes.quote: Globalization could be the answer to many of the world's seemingly intractable problems. But this requires strong democratic foundations based on a political will to ensure equity and justice.
quotes.author: Sharan Burrow

quotes.quote: Globalization is not a monolithic force but an evolving set of consequences - some good, some bad and some unintended. It is the new reality.
quotes.author: John B. Larson

quotes.quote: Globalization is a fact of economic life.
quotes.author: Carlos Salinas de Gortari

quotes.quote: It has been said that arguing against globalization is like arguing against the laws of gravity.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Globalization exists but we shouldn't conflate globalization with trade agreements. Trade agreements is how we can shape globalization.
quotes.author: Michael Froman

quotes.quote: Globalization requires taking a broad contextual and long-term view.
quotes.author: Helen Fisher

quotes.quote: Accordingly, globalization is not only something that will concern and threaten us in the future, but something that is taking place in the present and to which we must first open our eyes.
quotes.author: Ulrich Beck

quotes.quote: Globalization can be a great opportunity.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Macron

quotes.quote: Globalization is simply opening the free marketplace to encompass the entire world.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Globalization is a fact, because of technology, because of an integrated global supply chain, because of changes in transportation. And we're not going to be able to build a wall around that.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Globalization is stirring widespread economic anxiety, and middle class incomes have stagnated while a class of super-rich has emerged.
quotes.author: Nina Easton

quotes.quote: With the growth of both urbanization and globalization, consumers are becoming increasingly disconnected from their food.
quotes.author: Denise Morrison

quotes.quote: Globalization cannot take shape without the speed of light.
quotes.author: Paul Virilio

quotes.quote: We must take care that globalization does not become something people become afraid of.
quotes.author: Gerhard Schroder

quotes.quote: One day there will be no borders, no boundaries, no flags and no countries and the only passport will be the heart.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: Globalization is a form of totalitarianism. It is the rich who rule, and the poor live as they can.
quotes.author: Jose Saramago

quotes.quote: Globalization has taken a hit in that there is some sand in the gears because most of us have supply chains that are all over the world that we've had to lengthen.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Globalization presumes sustained economic growth. Otherwise, the process loses its economic benefits and political support.
quotes.author: Paul Samuelson

quotes.quote: Globalization has changed us into a company that searches the world, not just to sell or to source, but to find intellectual capital - the world's best talents and greatest ideas.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Our global economy is out of control and performing contrary to basic principles of market economics.
quotes.author: David Korten

quotes.quote: Globalization, as defined by rich people like us, is a very nice thing you are talking about the Internet, you are talking about cell phones, you are talking about computers. This doesn't affect two-thirds of the people of the world.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: Globalization is a policy, not an act of God.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: Globalization and free trade do spur economic growth, and they lead to lower prices on many goods.
quotes.author: Robert Reich

quotes.quote: Globalization was a deep trend pushed by technology and right ideas, as much as anything else.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Sachs

quotes.quote: Globalization is a form of artificial intelligence.
quotes.author: Erol Ozan

quotes.quote: Globalization means standardization. The very rich and the very poor must want the same things, but only the rich can have them.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: Globalization means that business strategy and business ethics cannot be separated from each other.
quotes.author: Ofra Strauss

quotes.quote: That's just globalization. It's got good sides as well. But scenes aren't allowed to develop on their own anymore. Everyone knows about everything.
quotes.author: Aphex Twin

quotes.quote: Globalization is a great thing, but it needs a legal framework in which to blossom.
quotes.author: Loretta Napoleoni

quotes.quote: Globalization has made national boundaries more porous but not irrelevant. Nor does globalization mean the creation of a universal community.
quotes.author: Joseph S. Nye Jr.

quotes.quote: Globalization has rendered the world increasingly interdependent, but international politics is still based on the sovereignty of states.
quotes.author: George Soros

quotes.quote: Globalization is incredibly efficient but also so far incredibly unjust.
quotes.author: Pascal Lamy

quotes.quote: The essence of globalization is a subordination of human rights, of labor rights, consumer, environmental rights, democracy rights, to the imperatives of global trade and investment.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: The triumph of economic globalization has inspired a wave of techno-savvy investigative activists who are as globally minded as the corporations they track.
quotes.author: Naomi Klein

quotes.quote: Every day one reads meretricious babble about 'globalization' and the abolition of frontiers most of it amounting to little more than celebration of the worldwide availability of Wheel of Fortune.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Globalization, usually the company song of the American corporate strategy, stops at the water's edge and turns prickly and isolationist when it comes to the rights of others to judge American actions.
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Globalization has made copper and other minerals more valuable, and Ghana and Kenya have recently discovered mineral resources.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The current pandemic will influence global politics and society as other diseases have in the past.
quotes.author: Jeffrey D. Sachs

quotes.quote: Throughout history, it has been important to understand the threats arising from globalization and to face them head-on, not by ending the benefits of globalization, but by using the means of international cooperation to control the negative consequences of global-scale interconnectedness.
quotes.author: Jeffrey D. Sachs

quotes.quote: Globalization enables one part of the world to learn from others.
quotes.author: Jeffrey D. Sachs

quotes.quote: The history of globalization is a history of humanity's glorious achievements, cruelties, and self-inflicted harms and of the great complexities of achieving progress in the midst of crisis.
quotes.author: Jeffrey D. Sachs

quotes.quote: Globalization not only exacerbated the already too-high level of inequality among individuals but also deeply weakened many communities.
quotes.author: Joseph E. Stiglitz

quotes.quote: Globalization has put a greater burden on governments to offset its adverse effects on so many at the bottom. But at the same time, it reduced their capacity to deal with the problems; globalization set off a race to the bottom among countries offering low taxes to corporations and individuals.
quotes.author: Joseph E. Stiglitz

quotes.quote: Globalization, as it has been managed, has contributed to growing inequality—including the evisceration of the middle class—even if it is not the only, or most important force giving rise to this inequality.
quotes.author: Joseph E. Stiglitz

quotes.quote: Others condemn globalization as a destructive force that annihilates traditional communal values, wrecks our planet, and stretches social disparities beyond sustainable levels.
quotes.author: Manfred B. Steger

quotes.quote: Globalization is about intensifying planetary interconnectivity.
quotes.author: Manfred B. Steger

quotes.quote: Globalization is a product of a large number of firms competing against one another in an increasing number of global economies.
quotes.author: Robert E. Hoskisson

quotes.quote: Globalization increases the range of opportunities for companies competing in the current competitive landscape.
quotes.author: Robert E. Hoskisson

quotes.quote: While globalization will make the world smaller and more accessible, we must continue to appreciate its vibrant diversity.
quotes.author: Jean Phillipe Courtois

quotes.quote: Where globalization means, as it so often does, that the rich and powerful now have new means to further enrich and empower themselves at the cost of the poorer and weaker, we have a responsibility to protest in the name of universal freedom.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: We are aware that globalization doesn't mean global friendship but global competition and, therefore, conflict. That doesn't mean we will all destroy each other, but it is no happy global village, either.
quotes.author: Rene Girard

quotes.quote: In too many instances, the march to globalization has also meant the marginalization of women and girls. And that must change.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Globalization is going to bring us closer and closer together across nations and technology you can't stop.
quotes.author: John P. Kotter

quotes.quote: I recognize that globalization has helped many people rise out of poverty, but it has also damned many others to starve to death. It is true that global wealth is growing in absolute terms, but inequalities have also grown and new poverty has arisen.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: If globalization is to succeed, it must succeed for the poor and rich alike. It must deliver rights no less than riches. It must provide social justice and equity no less than economic prosperity and enhanced communication.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Globalization is exposing new fault lines - between urban and rural communities, for example.
quotes.author: Ban Ki Moon

quotes.quote: We live in an era of globalization and the era of the woman. Never in the history of the world have women been more in control of their destiny.
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: The benefits of globalization do not trickle down automatically. It takes politics to make sure that there is a benefit.
quotes.author: Margareth Vestager

quotes.quote: Globalization that has swept away the barriers to the movement of goods, ideas, and people has also swept with it barriers that confined and localized security threats.
quotes.author: Mohammed ElBaradei

quotes.quote: This is a basic requirement the meaning of globalization is that we should admit that the economy of each country is dependent on the economy of all the others.
quotes.author: Richard Grasso

quotes.quote: Globalization is very destructive to our species.
quotes.author: Varg Vikernes

quotes.quote: Globalization doesn't have to be a bad thing as long as the government provides us all with the tools to cope in a changing world.
quotes.author: John B. Larson

quotes.quote: When thunderstorms roll in, you make a choice to either succumb with tears to the gloomy downpour, or smile and look for rainbows.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: The sky has a huge heart open for all clouds even on the gloomiest of days.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Only a happy mind will see the beauty of a beautiful view! For the sad mind everywhere looks gloomy!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It keeps him happy, Dahlaine, and happy people are nicer than gloomy ones. Haven't you noticed that before?
quotes.author: David Eddings

quotes.quote: Sometimes a gloomy street is all a sad person needs! A magical relief may arise from the meeting of the two sad things!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: No matter how gloomy the morning, it is a new day where anything is possible.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: You can't escape the thoughts on a rainy day: In the spirit of the gloom there is a talisman that keeps people from having fun and invites them to the world of thoughts!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Some days I wish we weren't so distant, life wasn't so cruel and the weather in my heart wasn't so gloomy.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: I think it's important not to get carried away when you are successful - and not to let yourself feel gloomy when times are bad.
quotes.author: Zhou Qunfei

quotes.quote: The hallway of every man's life is paced with pictures; pictures gay and pictures gloomy, all useful, for if we be wise, we can learn from them a richer and braver way to live.
quotes.author: Sean O'Casey

quotes.quote: We're like sun and rainy weather / Sometimes we're a hit together / Me and I / Gloomy moods and inspiration / We're a funny combination
quotes.author: Benny Goran Bror Andersson

quotes.quote: I'll be gloomy / But send that rainbow to me / Then my shadows will fly / Though you'll be gone for a while / I know that I'll be Smiling with my baby
quotes.author: Jule Styne

quotes.quote: Some people laugh in the dark, / Some people cry alone. / Some people talk without saying a thing, / And everything turns out gloomy.
quotes.author: John Cameron Fogerty

quotes.quote: When everything turns out gloomy. / Brothers'll make you look sideways, / Fathers'll make you look back. / And when you're done talking, you still got to shoot
quotes.author: John Cameron Fogerty

quotes.quote: I get awful gloomy / You mean, very gloomy / Very gloomy, now and then, in this town / 'Cause it's always so hard / To find a real pard / Who'll play in your yard / When you're down / But since the talk, you and me / I mean, you and I have had / I've got a good friend, I see / Well, I'm not so very bad
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: And woe betide you annan water / At night you are a gloomy river / And over you I'll build a bridge / That never more true love may sever
quotes.author: Colin Meloy

quotes.quote: Maybe he's crying for me / And as the skies turn gloomy / Night winds whisper to me / I'm lonesome as I can be
quotes.author: Alan Block

quotes.quote: Take of the gloomy mask of tragedy / It's not your style / You'll look so good that you'll be glad / You decided to smile
quotes.author: Charles Strouse

quotes.quote: I know a girl so gloomy / She never laugh or sing / She wouldn't listen to me / Now she's a mean old thing / So spread sunshine all over the place / And put on a happy, happy face
quotes.author: Charles Strouse

quotes.quote: Oh there is nowhere I can run / And there is no hiding place / Sticking out like a sore thumb / By the gloomy look upon my face / Without love I'm incomplete
quotes.author: Chuck Butler

quotes.quote: Someone like you cures everything gloomy / Turns wrong into right, brightens the night / Brings happiness to me
quotes.author: Harry Warren

quotes.quote: You'd never know it, but buddy I'm a kind of a poet / And I've got a lot of things to say / And when I'm gloomy, you simply gotta listen to mean / Until it's talked away
quotes.author: Harold Arlen

quotes.quote: Lead me through the darkness / And through each gloomy day. / Take my hand, oh, precious Lord / And help me on my way.
quotes.author: Griff

quotes.quote: It's a gray, gray gloomy day / A strange and moody blues day / Gotta get through, gotta get through another day
quotes.author: Carole King

quotes.quote: Sometimes the cabin's gloomy and the table's bare / But then he'll kiss me and it's Christmas everywhere / Trouble's fly away and life is easy go
quotes.author: E.Y. Harburg

quotes.quote: Maybe next summer, maybe by fall / Well, if not then, I am sure you'll recall / That our gloomy December will brighten by May / You're on your way
quotes.author: Michael Daniel Penn

quotes.quote: Hurray, hurray, hurray! / Trouble is on the way. / There are bad times just around the corner, / The horizon's gloomy as can be
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: Gloomy day pass me all above / Revolution kept inside / And even so, I'll try / To get the senses into mind / For this cozy time / Simple truth gonna fade away / All my fantasy out of line / I can get your breathe again
quotes.author: Hui Ting Chen

quotes.quote: Gloomy day pass me all above / In such a messy land / But if I can see / Hind behind your reality / I'd make you free
quotes.author: Hui Ting Chen

quotes.quote: And these Starry Nights and Gloomy Sights / Will be here, will be here no more / And I know depression won't rule me no more
quotes.author: Joseph Edmonds

quotes.quote: On gloomy afternoons / Tinting the solitude / Put on your dancing shoes / And show me what to do / I know you've got the moves
quotes.author: Alex Turner

quotes.quote: I only count the sunny hours, brightest hours of day. / I never count the gloomy hours I let them slip away. And I realize I'm away.
quotes.author: Will Adams

quotes.quote: And I don't like them gloomy days, nah, ay / Praying for some sunny days, yeah, ay (prra) / I'm praying for them better days, yeah, ay
quotes.author: Nicholas Diego Leanos

quotes.quote: Rainy and gloomy days certainly can lower your spirits. Even in the sunshine state all days are not just sunny, as our life us not always bright.
quotes.author: Lyndall Stokes Ridenour

quotes.quote: Mandy said that on gloomy days she has to be around people even it if means going out to a mall.
quotes.author: Barbara Keddy

quotes.quote: Gloominess is found in several degrees: from 'I'm just not feeling quite alright' to 'I've had enough' off it'.
quotes.author: Wassili Zafiris

quotes.quote: The opposite of depressed is 'zest for life'. The desire to live and to keep on living.
quotes.author: Wassili Zafiris

quotes.quote: You can't be depressed and in a depressing life, when you have faith in God. You have to let go of depressed feelings...you have to expect change..expect something better for your life.
quotes.author: Bettie Jo Walker

quotes.quote: Never yield to gloomy anticipation. Place your hope and confidence in God. He has no record of failure.
quotes.author: Lettie Cowman

quotes.quote: What a gloomy thing, not to know the address of one's soul.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: If a man be gloomy let him keep to himself. No one has the right to go croaking about society, or what is worse, looking as if he stifled grief.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Do you feel gloomy? Lift your eyes. Stand on your feet. Say a few words of appreciation and love to the Lord. Be positive.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Don't be gloomy. Even if you are not happy, put a smile on your face. Life is about joy, something to be happy and excited about.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: When you find yourselves a little gloomy, look around you and find somebody that is in a worse plight than yourself; go to him and find out what the trouble is, then try to remove it with the wisdom which the Lord bestows upon you; and the first thing you know, your gloom is gone, you feel light, the Spirit of the Lord is upon you, and everything seems illuminated.
quotes.author: Lorenzo Snow

quotes.quote: No matter how dark and gloomy it looks in your life right now, if you'll release the weight of those burdens, you will see the sun break forth.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: When you feel gloomy, think what has been done within the last year. How, rising from nothing.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The gloomy and the resentful are always found among those who have nothing to do or who do nothing.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: In narrow and gloomy streets, keep your spirit high!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A gloomy guest fits not a wedding feast.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: The situation may be depressing, but you don't have to be depressed in i..no agreements between the adjective(depressing) and the verb (depressed) is necessary in this life situation.
quotes.author: Bettie Jo Walker

quotes.quote: A person without a vision is someone without a purpose. And a person without a purpose is someone that will live a depressing life full of regret and sadness.
quotes.author: Sheldon D. Newton

quotes.quote: Focusing on one person that we may not be able to have makes life depressing. And the truth is, that person can't truly make us happy anyway. We make our own selves happy.
quotes.author: Aaron Lumpkin

quotes.quote: The bottom line is that if we are depressed about life because we can't have someone we want, we are probably causing ourselves a lot if unnecessary grief.
quotes.author: Aaron Lumpkin

quotes.quote: When gloomy days come knocking / and soberness I feel / I lift my head to Jesus / fall to the floor and knee
quotes.author: Joyce Joyce Ashton-Douglas

quotes.quote: Life is so fast and so complex that it starts to control us unless we take charge of it and put it in the right perspective.
quotes.author: Waqi Munim

quotes.quote: Feeling gloomy, got the blues, what's the reason, got no clues / Tired and listless, life's a drag, nothing helps, I just feel bad. / Life's a spiral, spinning around, deeper darker, underground / In the vortex I can't think, in depression slowly sink!
quotes.author: David Vercoe

quotes.quote: Feeling gloomy or sad most of the time and not knowing how to experience pleasure, joy, excitement, or assertiveness. It is important in treatment to help the person read her internal emotional experience and connect them with bodily sensations and thoughts.
quotes.author: Georgia A. DeGangi

quotes.quote: Persons with depression are overwhelmed with sad, depressing thoughts, walking around home and work with a black cloud over them. Self-soothing activities, medication, mindfulness practice, and other sources of pleasurable experience need to be a major focus in the depressed person's life.
quotes.author: Georgia A. DeGangi

quotes.quote: Depression can manifest through emotional withdrawal and shutdown,irritability, and a negative view if the world. Effective treatment for depression should combine dialectical behavioral therapy and mind.
quotes.author: Georgia A. DeGangi

quotes.quote: When we accept feeling gloomy or depressed, something changes immediately. Accepting our feelings as they are does not mean that we have to agree with them or that they have defeated us that we should surrender.
quotes.author: Josau B.V.

quotes.quote: It's like feeling gloomy on a rainy day and feeling great on a sunny day, and again people will see in your in your eyes how happy or unhappy you really are. So keep that race going on so the sun never stops shining.
quotes.author: Glenn Allan Moody

quotes.quote: No matter how hard the loss, defeat might serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Glory is so enchanting, that we love whatever we associate with it, even though it be death.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: Surviving is the only glory in war.
quotes.author: Samuel Fuller

quotes.quote: The young do not know enough to be prudent, and therefore they attempt the impossible - and achieve it, generation after generation.
quotes.author: Pierce S. Buck

quotes.quote: I give all the glory to God. It's kind of a win-win situation. The glory goes up to Him and the blessings fall down on me.
quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

quotes.quote: To be really great in little things, to be truly noble and heroic in the insipid details of everyday life, is a virtue so rare as to be worthy of canonization.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Glory to Man in the highest! For Man is the master of things.
quotes.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quotes.quote: Glory and repose are things that cannot possibly inhabit in one and the same place.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Real glory springs from the silent conquest of ourselves.
quotes.author: Joseph P. Thompson

quotes.quote: The glory is being happy. The glory is not winning here or winning there. The glory is enjoying practicing, enjoy every day, enjoying to work hard, trying to be a better player than before.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.quote: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The glory of God is the human person fully alive.
quotes.author: Irenaeus of Lyons

quotes.quote: God's glory is the big news of the Bible, and my desire is that it would be all about me, but really it's all about God's glory.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: There is no glory in battle worth the blood it costs.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Consciousness is the glory of creation.
quotes.author: James Broughton

quotes.quote: Grace is but glory begun, and glory is but grace perfected.
quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.quote: Glory follows virtue as if it were its shadow.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: All glory comes from daring to begin.
quotes.author: Eugene F. Ware

quotes.quote: For glory lit, and life alive, for goals unreached and aims to strive. All men must try, the wind did see. It is the test, it is the dream.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Our glory is hidden in our pain, if we allow God to bring the gift of himself in our experience of it.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in Him.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: It is indeed a desirable thing to be well-descended, but the glory belongs to our ancestors.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Glory is attained from hard work, step by step.
quotes.author: Ma Long

quotes.quote: True glory consists in doing what deserves to be written, in writing what deserves to be read, and in so living as to make the world happier and better for our living in it.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.quote: The glory of friendship is not the outstretched hand, nor the kindly smile...it's the spiritual inspiration that comes to one when he discovers that someone else believes in him and is willing to trust him with his friendship.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Glory belongs to the act of being constant to something greater than yourself, to a cause, to your principles, to the people on whom you rely and who rely on you in return.
quotes.author: John McCain

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The real glory is being knocked to your knees and then coming back. That's real glory. That's the essence of it.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: For glory gives herself only to those who have always dreamed of her.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the glory of expression.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The glory of a workman, still more of a master workman, that he does his work well, ought to be his most precious possession, like the honor of a soldier, dearer to him than life.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: The glory of creation is in its infinite diversity.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: We rise in glory as we sink in pride.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: Glory is largely a theatrical concept. There is no striving for glory without a vivid awareness of an audience... The desire to escape or camouflage their unsatisfactory selves develops in the frustrated a facility for pretending -- for making a show -- and also a readiness to identify themselves wholly with an imposing spectacle.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: True glory takes root, and even spreads; all false pretences, like flowers, fall to the ground; nor can any counterfeit last long.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: The nearest way to glory is to strive to be what you wish to be thought to be.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The glory of God's faithfulness is that no sin of ours has ever made Him unfaithful.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Great is the glory, for the strife is hard!
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The glory of each generation is to make its own precedents.
quotes.author: Belva Lockwood

quotes.quote: Glory, built on selfish principles, is shame and guilt.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: There's no glory like those who save their country.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Glory is fleeting, but obscurity is forever.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Glory is like a circle in the water, Which never ceaseth to enlarge itself Till by broad spreading it disperse to naught.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Glory is sacrifice, glory is exhaustion, glory is having nothing left to give. Almost. It is death by living.
quotes.author: N.D. Wilson

quotes.quote: Where's the glory in repeating what others have done?
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Showing off is the fool's idea of glory.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: There are miracles and glory in every child. Our glory lies in empowering them to flourish their glory.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Love of glory can only create a great hero; contempt of glory creates a great man.
quotes.author: Charles-Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.quote: Glory lies in the attempt to reach one's goal and not in reaching it.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The glory of gardening: hands in the dirt, head in the sun, heart with nature. To nurture a garden is to feed not just on the body, but the soul.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: There is the glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars; for one star differeth from another star in glory.
quotes.author: 1 Corinthians 15:41

quotes.quote: I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us.
quotes.author: Romans 8:18

quotes.quote: The paths of glory lead but to the grave.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: The glory of God is a living man, and the life of man consists in beholding God.
quotes.author: St. Irenaeus

quotes.quote: Provided that God be glorified, we must not care by whom.
quotes.author: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: By faith we know his existence, in glory we shall know his nature.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: The glory of the gospel is that when the church is absolutely different from the world, she invariably attracts it.
quotes.author: David Martyn Lloyd-Jones

quotes.quote: A man does not direct all his actions to the glory of God by forming a conception in his mind, or stirring up a strong imagination upon any action that that must be for the glory of God; it is not thinking of God's glory that is glorifying of Him.
quotes.author: John Smith

quotes.quote: The heavens are telling the glory of God, and the firmament proclaims this handiwork.
quotes.author: Psalm 19:1

quotes.quote: That is what gives Him the greatest glory—the achieving of great things through the weakest and most improbable means.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: There is the supreme truth that the glory of God lies in His compassion and that God never so fully reveals His Glory as when he reveals His pity.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: The glory of love is its unaccountability; it is not something rendered proportionately— such and such an excellence , so much regard for it—but is rather a divine overflow.
quotes.author: Mark Rutherflow

quotes.quote: Glory is only given to those who have always dreamed of it.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Of all the affections which attend human life, the love of glory is the most ardent.
quotes.author: Richard Steele

quotes.quote: The desire for glory clings even to the best man longer than any other passion.
quotes.author: Cornelius Tacitus

quotes.quote: The glory of a great man ought always to be estimated by the means used to acquire it.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Hasty glory goes out in a snuff.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The heavens declare His righteousness, and all the people see his glory
quotes.author: Psalm 97:6

quotes.quote: Real glory springs from the silent conquest of ourselves. Without that, the conqueror is nought but the foist slave.
quotes.author: Thomson

quotes.quote: The shortest way to glory is to be guided by conscience.
quotes.author: Home

quotes.quote: Though God hath raised me high, yet this I count the glory of my crown: that I have reigned with your loves.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth

quotes.quote: Think where man's glory most begins and ends, and say my glory was I had such friends.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: There must be a beginning of any great matter, but the continuing unto the end until it be thoroughly finished yields the true glory.
quotes.author: Francis Drake

quotes.quote: When there is no peril in the fight there is no glory in the triumph.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: The greater the effort, the greater the glory.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Glory is a scandal. Let me state once & for all: I do not wish to be civilized.
quotes.author: Arthur Cravan

quotes.quote: May those who follow their fate be granted happiness; may those who defy it be granted glory.
quotes.author: Mizuo Shinonome

quotes.quote: God is not willing to do everything, and thus take away our free will and that share of glory which belongs to us.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: We are only human, and the gods have fashioned us for love. That is our great glory, and our great tragedy.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: The taste for glory can make ordinary men behave in extraordinary ways.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: The beautiful light behind her smile makes her eyes glow with a love for life I've never experienced before. What true beauty is.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Space for the sunflower, bright with yellow glow, to court the sky.
quotes.author: Caroline Gilman

quotes.quote: Shine your light on love and truth and your soul will glow.
quotes.author: Anthony D. Williams

quotes.quote: Let your light shine. Shine within you so that it can shine on someone else. Let your light shine.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: If you want to give light to others you have to glow yourself.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Shine as light in the darkness of every human sphere of life.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The sun's glow had given way to a brilliant twilight that colored the great mountains with violet and orange rivers.
quotes.author: Michael R. Hicks

quotes.quote: May the bright and festive glow of New Year candle warm the days all the year through. Hoping you will have a wonderful time enjoying New Year that is happy in every way.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of light - the glow that illuminates, and the glare that obscures.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: You are the light of the world. Shine, and darkness will disappear.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: With a strong strong glow of courage, drank off the potion.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Glow wherever you go and let the light of God reflect in the world around you. You carry the light of God and wherever you pass, darkness must flee.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: We are sparks that must glow as brightly as possible.
quotes.author: Asger Jorn

quotes.quote: Shine with all you have. When someone tries to blow you out, just take their oxygen and burn brighter.
quotes.author: Katelyn S. Bolds

quotes.quote: To be a star, you must shine your own light, follow your own path, and don't worry about the darkness, for that is when the stars shine brightest.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Always let your inner light shine. By doing so, you not only light a path for yourself, but also light a way for others.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: The glow of satisfaction which follows the consciousness of doing our level best never comes to a human being from any other experience.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Let your light shine, never look back and live as if today is your last day because it just might be.
quotes.author: Gena Showalter

quotes.quote: Charm is a glow within a woman that casts a most becoming light on others.
quotes.author: John Mason Brown

quotes.quote: The sunset glow of self-possession.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: Every day, strive to refine your contagious shine, and shake the nonsense offered by those who lack the will to polish-up from within.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Shine brightly, so you can help those who have not found their path a way through the darkness.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: Shine, shine, shine tonight- It's time to let it show- Burn bright, light the fire- That leads the way to hope- The Maker of the stars lives in our soul- We have His light, what are we waiting for- Get out and glow.
quotes.author: Moriah Peters

quotes.quote: The glow of inspiration warms us; it is a holy rapture.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Sun glows for a day, candle for an hour, matchstick for a minute but a good day can glow forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Anytime that you look up to the clear sky and see colors in it, you should be suspecting that you are looking at a flow of energy through the sky that is causing a gas to glow.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: I saw that my life was a vast glowing empty page and I could do anything I wanted.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Also, as I lay there thinking of my vision, I could see it all again and feel the meaning with a part of me like a strange power glowing in my body but when the part of me that talks would try to make words for the meaning, it would be like fog and get away from me.
quotes.author: Black Elk

quotes.quote: The person who lives life fully, glowing with life’s energy, is the person who lives a successful life.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: Happiness is hard to recall. It's just a glow.
quotes.author: Frank McCourt

quotes.quote: When we recall the past, we usually find that it is the simplest things not the great occasions that in retrospect give off the greatest glow of happiness.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: I have self-actualized. Pardon me while I adjust my glowing halo.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.quote: We were on the dark side of the Earth when we started to see outside the window this soft pink glow, which is a lot of little angry ions out there going very fast. We were hitting them very fast.
quotes.author: Robert Crippen

quotes.quote: One man loved the pilgrim soul in you and loved the sorrows of your changing face.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The most wonderful of all things in life, I believe, is the discovery of another human being with whom one's relationship has a glowing depth, beauty, and joy as the years increase.
quotes.author: Hugh Walpole

quotes.quote: Time, which is so often an enemy in life, can also become our ally if we see how a pale moment can lead to a glowing moment, and then turn to a moment of perfect transparency, before dropping again to a moment of everyday simplicity.
quotes.author: Peter Brook

quotes.quote: You know how to paint pleasure, cruelty, arrogance in glowing colors.
quotes.author: Leopold Von Sacher-Masoch

quotes.quote: The very purpose of existence is to reconcile the glowing opinion we hold of ourselves with the appalling things that other people think about us.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Surely happiness is reflective, like the light of heaven and every countenance, bright with smiles, and glowing with innocent enjoyment, is a mirror transmitting to others the rays of a supreme and ever shining benevolence.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: For male and female alike, the bodies of the other sex are messages signaling what we must do they are glowing signifiers of our own necessities.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: From the glow of enthusiasm I let the melody escape.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: I must bridge the gap between adolescent glitter and mature glow.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: There is magic in the night when pumpkins glow by moonlight.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The love of praise, however concealed by art, reigns more or less, and glows in every heart.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: The doubters said, man can not fly. The doers said, Maybe, but we'll try, and finally soared Into the morning glow while nonbelievers watched from below.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Goodness is uneventful. It does not flash, it glows.
quotes.author: David Grayson

quotes.quote: She would rather light a candle than curse the darkness and her glow has warmed the world.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.quote: Dealing with the unconscious has become a question of life for us.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Our heart glows, and secret unrest gnaws at the root of our being.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The energy, the faith, the devotion which we bring this endeavor will light our bounty and all who serve it, and the glow from that fire can truly light the world.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The very purpose of existence is to reconcile the glowing opinion we have of ourselves with the appalling things that other people think about us.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Love a wildly misunderstood although highly desirable malfunction of the heart which weakens the brain, causes eyes to sparkle, cheeks to glow, blood pressure to rise and the lips to pucker
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We are all worms, But I do believe that I am a glow worm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Health, a light body, freedom from cravings, a glowing skin, sonorous voice, fragrance of body: these signs indicate progress in the practice of meditation.
quotes.author: Shvetashvatara Upanishad

quotes.quote: Condense some daily experience into a glowing symbol and an audience is electrified.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: January brings the snow, makes our feet and fingers glow.
quotes.author: Sara Coleridge

quotes.quote: The energy, the faith, the devotion which we bring to this endeavor will light our country and all who serve it and the glow from that fire can truly light the world.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Every time a resolve or fine glow of feeling evaporates without bearing practical fruit, it is worse than a chance lost. It works so as positively to hinder future resolutions and emotions from taking the normal path of discharge.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: If a person who indulges in gluttony is a glutton, and a person who commits a felony is a felon, then God is an iron.
quotes.author: Spider Robinson

quotes.quote: Gluttony, do not eat thy neighbor's wife's popcorn.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Oh, pity the poor glutton whose troubles all begin in struggling on and on to turn what's out into what's in.
quotes.author: Walter de la Mare

quotes.quote: Gluttony and Lust are the only sins that abuse something that is essential to our survival.
quotes.author: Henry Fairlie

quotes.quote: A deadly sin that brings no evil material sequel to the satisfaction afforded by committing it is one thing. A deadly sin that gives you the stomach-ache is quite another.
quotes.author: Rafael Sabatini

quotes.quote: Gluttons no longer gorge themselves; they are simply suffering from one of a variety of eating disorders.
quotes.author: Frank Furedi

quotes.quote: Gluttony is mankind's exclusive prerogative.
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Gluttony and vanity grow with age.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Gluttony is an emotional escape, a sign something is eating us.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: The glutton is much more than an animal and much less than a man.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The most of what a glutton eats goes to create a desire for more.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: There is no love sincerer than the love of food.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The flesh endures the storms of the present alone; the mind, those of the past and future as well as the present. Gluttony is a lust of the mind.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Gluttony and surfeiting are no proper occasions for thanksgiving.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: In a way, gluttony is an athletic feat, a stretching exercise.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Gluttony and idleness are two of life's great joys, but they are not honourable.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.quote: Gluttony and drunkenness have two evils attendant on them; they make the carcass smart, as well as the pocket.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: There is a difference between eating and drinking for strength and from mere gluttony.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Gluttony is not a secret vice.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Gluttony is the parent of disease.
quotes.author: William Hardcastle Browne

quotes.quote: Gluttony is the source of all our infirmities and the fountain of all our diseases. As a lamp is choked by a superabundance of oil, and a fire extinguished by excess of fuel, so is the natural health of the body destroyed by intempe diet.
quotes.author: Marion LeRoy Burton

quotes.quote: Gluttony is the act of digging a grave with your own teeth.
quotes.author: Enock Maregesi

quotes.quote: It is the just doom of laziness and gluttony to be inactive without ease and drowsy without tranquility.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Only good poets cure us of an overindulgence in words. Only simple essential food cures us of gluttony
quotes.author: Hector Abad Faciolince

quotes.quote: Gluttony might be innocuous were it not for the fact that gluttons tend to disregard whether their self-serving behaviors harm anyone else. We don't need to look far and wide to find examples of gluttonous behavior, as they are numerous throughout the history of capitalism.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: Gluttony kills more than the sword.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Trust not in Sprites nor the motivations of a Gnome.
quotes.author: Jefferson Smith

quotes.quote: Actually, cats do this to protect you from gnomes who come and steal your breath while you sleep.
quotes.author: John Dobbin

quotes.quote: She sat in the dew-damp grass and ripped up clumps of it, tossing them in the air and feeling vaguely guilty about it. Some gnome ought to pop out of the tree and scold her for torturing the lawn.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: I remember her telling me once that rabbits were the gnomes in attendance to the Fairy Queen and that the stars were God's daisy chain. Perfect rot, of course.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Cats are the slipperiest of domestic animals. Thousands of years of genetic coding has taught them to melt into azaleas, lie motionless behind garden gnomes, glide along fence tops, and slink under benches.
quotes.author: Caroline Paul

quotes.quote: In the Land of Ire, the belief in fairies, gnomes, ogres and monsters is all but dead; in the Land of Ind, it still flourishes in all the vigor of animism.
quotes.author: Joseph Jacobs

quotes.quote: Here's a book about gnomes, undies, salamanders, elves, sylphs, fairies, but it, too, brings in the origins of Aryan civilization. The SS, apparently, are descended from the Seven Dwarfs.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Look, the life of gnomes and goblins is nasty, brutish and short. So are they.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Elves, pixies, gnomes- the Moo-mins, Chorlton and the Wheelies, Sponge Bob Square Pants, they all tried to invade you at some point.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In short, you have all the social prospects of a garden gnome.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Lawhead

quotes.quote: If I ever wanted a gnome, I guess I'd just stand out on my lawn for a while.
quotes.author: Johnny Christ

quotes.quote: People kill over money and power and love, but no one kills over gnomes.
quotes.author: S.J. Kincaid

quotes.quote: Call them what you want. Garden gnomes. Lawn ornaments. Little evil outdoor statuary hell-bent on world domination. It doesn't matter. What does matter is that, right now, they're hiding in plain sight, pretending to be symbols of merriment and good will.
quotes.author: Chuck Sambuchino

quotes.quote: The things I encounter that I call elves or gnomes, it's just a gloss. I mean, they're small, and they have the archetype. They're more like leprechauns, and this maybe raises a racial issue.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Gnomes live ten times faster than humans. They're harder to see than a high-speed mouse. That's one reason why most humans hardly ever see them. The other is that humans are very good at not seeing things they know aren't there. And, since sensible humans know that there are no such things as people four inches high, a gnome who doesn't want to be seen probably won't be seen... Wings.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: I make it a point of honour to have a couple of gnomes in my garden as silent testimony to the right of gnome-lovers everywhere to do their own thing without fear of snide remarks.
quotes.author: Richard Briers

quotes.quote: Life is a magic garden. With wondrous softly shining flowers, but between the flowers there are the little gnomes, they frighten me so much, they stand on their heads, and the worst is, they call out to me that I should also stand on my head, every once in a while I try, and I die of embarrassment; but sometimes the gnomes shout that I am doing very well, and that I'm indeed a real gnome myself after all. But on no account I will ever fall for that.
quotes.author: L. E. J. Brouwer

quotes.quote: Get you gone, you dwarf; / You minimus, of hindering knot-grass made; / You bead, you acorn.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Our drink shall be prepared gold and amber; / Which we will take, until my roof whirl around / With the vertigo: and my dwarf shall dance.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: A little child, a limber elf, / Singing, dancing to itself, / A fairy thing with red round cheeks, / That always finds, and never seeks, / Makes such a vision to the sight / As fills a father's eyes with light.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Going to Aunt Mirandy's is like going down cellar in the dark. There might be ogres and giants under the stairs,—but, as I tell Hannah, there might be elves and fairies and enchanted frogs!
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

quotes.quote: To a co-wife, a fairy is uglier than a goblin.
quotes.author: Urdu (Indian) Proverb

quotes.quote: Ah! gentle, fleeting, wav'ring sprite, / Friend and associate of this clay!
quotes.author: Hadrian

quotes.quote: We easily know / By this these angels from an evil sprite, / They set our hairs, but these our flesh upright.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Bigger is not always better; gnomes and dwarfs are often more interesting than giants.
quotes.author: Thijs Porck

quotes.quote: Who would shoot a gnome? And why is the 'g' silent?
quotes.author: Piper Halliwell

quotes.quote: Garden gnomes have been used throughout history as the protectors from evil. The peaceful creatures are known for their loving upkeep and safeguarding of their owners' gardens. Yeah, great, fine. Where's the part where these "peaceful creatures" go crazy and try to kill the owners' kid while they're away antiquing?
quotes.author: Sally Wilcox

quotes.quote: Okay is the life of a jolly wood gnome / They have long beards and they love your lawn / They dance little jigs on their little gnome homes / Hooray for the life of a jolly wood gnome.
quotes.author: Lazlo

quotes.quote: Beware the teeth of the deadly wood gnomes / They'll bite your leg when you're all alone / And they'll drag you back to their little gnome home / Where they'll boil you for stew till you're nothing but bone!
quotes.author: Slinkman

quotes.quote: I want to tell you a story / About a little man / If I can / A gnome named Grimble Crumble / And little gnomes stay in their homes / Eating, sleeping, drinking their wine / He wore a scarlet tunic / A blue green hood / It looked quite good / He had a big adventure / Amidst the grass / Fresh air at last / Wining, dining, biding his time / And then one day, hooray! / Another way for gnomes to say / Ooomray.
quotes.author: Syd Barrett

quotes.quote: Wandering off the beaten path / You'll find a garden / In this garden you will find / A cobblestone path to a gnome home / In this gnome home you shall hear / Two gnomes stuck in a gnome drone / Flailing their canes in the air / Spilling gnome beer everywhere.
quotes.author: Sam DeRouen and Jacob DeRouen

quotes.quote: And it's there I hear that they all come true, / The fairy-stories, whatever they do / Elf and goblin, dear elf and goblin, loved elf and goblin and all the crew / Of witch and wizard and gnome and fay, / And prince and princess, that wander through / The storybooks we have put away, / The fairytales that we loved and knew.
quotes.author: Madison Julius Cawein

quotes.quote: Gnomes are supposed to be good luck in a garden, protecting against pests and diseases. A mythic gatekeeper, in the way a kitchen witch is.
quotes.author: Kelly Asbury

quotes.quote: A dwarf standing on the shoulders of a giant may see farther than a giant himself.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: A dwarf on a giant's shoulders sees farther of the two.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: This is the basic insight of the Gnostics, the one known to the great mystical thinkers of all traditions: the divine spark is within each human being.
quotes.author: Lesley Hazleton

quotes.quote: This system of chain wars can end only in two ways: either it will result in horrible physical destructions and concomitant revolutionary changes of social order beyond reasonable guesses; or, with the natural change of generations, it will lead to the abandoning of Gnostic dreaming before the worst has happened.
quotes.author: Eric Voegelin

quotes.quote: The Gnostic's passionate adoration of Sophia was known as philosophia â€“ the love of Sophia â€“ a mystical communication with divine feminine wisdom, having little to do with the strictly intellectual, most often masculine, pursuit currently labeled â€œphilosophy.
quotes.author: Zeena Schreck

quotes.quote: Scientism is gnosticism wrapped in a post-modern package.
quotes.author: R. Alan Woods

quotes.quote: The emanistic theories which played so great a part in Neoplatonic philosophy and Gnostic theology are forms of evolution.
quotes.author: Thomas Henry Huxley

quotes.quote: Gnosticism was stamped out completely and its remnants are so badly mangled that special study is needed to get any insight at all into its inner meaning.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Gnostics, in general, are not trying to delineate a set of beliefs. The intent is to inspire the sacred quest for true gnosis and to provide keys through which true gnosis might be acquired.
quotes.author: Tau Malachi

quotes.quote: The timidity of the child or the savage is entirely reasonable; they are alarmed at this world, because this world is a very alarming place. They dislike being alone because it is verily and indeed an awful idea to be alone. Barbarians fear the unknown for the same reason that Agnostics worship it --because it is a fact.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: When one admits that nothing is certain one must, I think, also admit that some things are much more nearly certain than others.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: There are some kinds of Christianity that insist you have to believe literally in doctrine. The Gnostic gospels open out the complexity and multiplicity of approaches to this. If you think the story of the virgin birth is mistranslated, for instance, it doesn't mean you have to throw out the whole thing.
quotes.author: Elaine Pagels

quotes.quote: Grounded in the natural philosophy of the Middle Ages, alchemy formed a bridge: on the one hand into the past, to Gnosticism, and on the other into the future, to the modern psychology of the unconscious.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Gnosticism is an outsider proposition, an introvert's game
quotes.author: Christopher Knowles

quotes.quote: The Gnostics believed that exile was the essential condition of man. Do you agree? I do. The artist and the addict both wrestle with this experience of exile. They share an acute, even excruciating sensitivity to the state of separation and isolation, and both actively seek a way to overcome it, to transcend it, or at least to make the pain go away. What is the pain of being human? It's the condition of being suspended between two worlds and being unable to fully enter into either.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: The perpetual enemy of faith in the true God is not atheism (the claim that there is no God), but rather Gnosticism (the claim that God is known).
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: Patience is the Gnostic's scale and the humble the garden's door.
quotes.author: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.quote: The idea that we are to be absorbed into the Deity is Gnostic in its origins and is quite antithetical to Christianity.
quotes.author: R. Alan Woods

quotes.quote: The true Gnostic understands that there is a difference between religious activity and spiritual truth.
quotes.author: David Tresemer

quotes.quote: GNOSTICS, n. A sect of philosophers who tried to engineer a fusion between the early Christians and the Platonists. The former would not go into the caucus and the combination failed, greatly to the chagrin of the fusion managers.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: As a corpus, the (Gnostic) scriptures are nearly incoherent, like a crowd of sages, mystics and madmen all speaking at once. But always they call upon us to know ourselves.
quotes.author: William T. Vollmann

quotes.quote: Sacraments, like the Incarnation itself, constitute physical points at which the eternal touches time, or the unseen touches the seen, or grace touches nature. It is the Gnostics and Manicheans who want a purely disembodied religion.
quotes.author: Thomas Howard

quotes.quote: Gnosticism has always been difficult to define, largely because it is a system of thought based upon and frequently amended by experiences of nonordinary states of consciousness, and thus it is resistant to theological rigidity.
quotes.author: Stephan Hoeller

quotes.quote: Gnostic teachings speak of the reality and power of evil and its fundamental presence throughout manifest existence. They declare that while we may not be able to rid the world or ourselves of evil, we may, and indeed will, rise above it through gnosis.
quotes.author: Stephan Hoeller

quotes.quote: In the Gnostic formula it is understood that, though thrown into temporality, we had an origin in eternity, and so also we have an aim in eternity.
quotes.author: Hans Jonas

quotes.quote: Gnostic politics is self-defeating in so far as its disregard for the structure of reality leads to continuous warfare.
quotes.author: Eric Voegelin

quotes.quote: Gnostic tales tell of the homesickness of the soul, its yearning for its own milieuâ€¦
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Authentic atheism is a blank page; Gnostic atheism hides a text written in invisible ink. The Ãœbermensch is the recourse of a nonconformist atheism. Nietzsche invents a human consolation for the death of God; Gnostic atheism, on the other hand, proclaims the divinity of man.
quotes.author: Nicolás Gómez Dávila

quotes.quote: The Gnostic needs a lot of patience because any act of impatience leads him to failure.
quotes.author: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.quote: Philosophy springs from the love of being; it is man's loving endeavor to perceive the order of being and attune himself to it. Gnosis desires dominion over being; in order to seize control of being the Gnostic constructs his system. The building of systems is a gnostic form of reasoning, not a philosophical one.
quotes.author: Eric Voegelin

quotes.quote: In Gnosticism, the physical world did not ultimately matter - which meant physical suffering did not matter either. Seeking 'enlightenment' meant cultivating an attitude of detachment, even indifference.
quotes.author: Nancy Pearcey

quotes.quote: The Gnostic only can wake up to the true state of Illumination by understanding and disintegrating dreams.
quotes.author: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.quote: Destiny doesn't do home visits... you have to go for it yourself.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Whatever it is your heart desires, please go for it, it's yours to have.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.quote: We're renting the space that we call Earth, so we may as well just go for it.
quotes.author: Masiela Lusha

quotes.quote: Be confident in yourself, in your abilities, and in your goals. Then go for it.
quotes.author: Sharon Gannon

quotes.quote: You only regret what you don't do! Go for it, live your dreams and enjoy it all!
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: A second ago is gone, and a second from now might be. Now is all you've got. Go for it!
quotes.author: Lyn St. James

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to do the most insane thing. Don't think it's too crazy. Just go for it.
quotes.author: Mikey Way

quotes.quote: If you're around someone who makes you feel good, you have to go for it. Don't hold back.
quotes.author: Faith Sullivan

quotes.quote: The purpose of education is to create a purpose for life. Go for it with the utmost sincerity.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha M.D.

quotes.quote: Once you are prepared and you think you have every angle of preparation covered, you have to go for it.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: If you can find something you love, go for it everyday of your life, and it would be really good to you.
quotes.author: Jenifer Lewis

quotes.quote: Your future shines bright - find your purpose and go for it. Starting tomorrow, you can change the world.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Giffords

quotes.quote: A, surround yourself by positive people who will help you reach your goal and support you. And B, go for it!
quotes.author: Zendaya

quotes.quote: Risk it; go for it. Life always gives you another chance, another go at it. It's very important to take enormous risks.
quotes.author: Mary Quant

quotes.quote: When you feel that you can't fight it, you just go for it. When it comes to the arts, passion should always trump common sense.
quotes.author: Robert De Niro

quotes.quote: When chasing a dream, make sure the price is truly worth paying - if it is, go for it, if not, tweak your dream a little and then go for it.
quotes.author: John Avery

quotes.quote: You have to focus on what's important to you and go for it. But don't stab people in the back. It poisons your whole life if you're like that.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: No matter how long the preparation, you will never feel ready to write an exam, to start a business, to be parent or even to die. Just go for it.
quotes.author: Moffat Machingura

quotes.quote: When good enough gets the job done, go for it. It's way better than wasting resources or, even worse, doing nothing because you can't afford the complex solution.
quotes.author: Jason Fried

quotes.quote: You have to dream big and go for it. Surround yourself with people who believe in you and ignore those who try to bring you down. Never give up, no matter what - overcoming obstacles makes you stronger!
quotes.author: Shannon MacMillan

quotes.quote: If you're passionate about what you do, then go for it wholeheartedly. Be prepared that if anytime, you may be surprised by a phenomenal opportunity that may come your way, and that's when I say, do your homework. Be ready.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: If you like something, go for it.
quotes.author: Elie Tahari

quotes.quote: Dream! Dream! And then go for it!
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and go for it.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: If something excites you, go for it.
quotes.author: Chad Hurley

quotes.quote: Good things happen when you go for it!
quotes.author: Alan Webb

quotes.quote: What you want is within reach. Go for it.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Get out, realize your dream, and go for it.
quotes.author: Kai Greene

quotes.quote: Never give up. You only get one life. Go for it!
quotes.author: Richard E. Grant

quotes.quote: Dreams can come true, but you have to go for it.
quotes.author: Johan Santana

quotes.quote: To satisfy a want or a need, you must first go for it
quotes.author: Martin Powell

quotes.quote: You just go for it and see what works. There are no rules.
quotes.author: Joey McIntyre

quotes.quote: When you find what you want in life, you just gotta go for it.
quotes.author: Chris Coppernoll

quotes.quote: If you want to do something, go for it -you've got nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Louis Tomlinson

quotes.quote: You're the only one who can make the difference. Whatever your dream is, go for it.
quotes.author: Earvin Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: You should have a dream and absolutely go for it. Don't let anybody say you can't do it.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Anything that you think is wild or fun, or can't wait to see or show your friends, go for it.
quotes.author: Roman Coppola

quotes.quote: Never doubt yourself. Never change who you are. Don't care what people think and just go for it.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: Unleash your life's potential! Don't hold back on the things you've always wanted to do. Go for it!
quotes.author: Denise Austin

quotes.quote: Just keep being true to yourself, if you're passionate about something go for it. Don't sacrifice anything, just have fun.
quotes.author: Blake Lewis

quotes.quote: Don't listen to anybody who's trying to bring you down. There's so much negativity in the world. If you really want something, then you go for it.
quotes.author: Ryan Cabrera

quotes.quote: If you are talented, you can really do anything. And if your heart is at the right place and you have the passion for it, you can go for it and do it.
quotes.author: Heidi Klum

quotes.quote: If you feel that you are going without go within.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: If they don't chase you when you walk away keep walking.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Even a dead fish can go with the flow.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.quote: The river makes the water flow. That's how I live. I just let everything flow. Flow with the river.
quotes.author: Vitor Belfort

quotes.quote: If you don't know what you want, you will probably never get it.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr

quotes.quote: Water flows because it's willing.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Don't ever go with the flow. Be the flow.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: Everything flows and nothing abides, everything gives way and nothing stays fixed.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: If you just go with the flow, no matter what weird things happen along the way, you always end up exactly where you belong.
quotes.author: Tom Upton

quotes.quote: Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: There is not past, no future; everything flows in an eternal present.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: There is really nothing but the flow. You are not really on the bank. That, methinks, is the greatest illusion of all. You are the bank, the flow, the boat, the rudder.
quotes.author: Nicoletta Baumeister

quotes.quote: Going with the flow is for some people an excuse for not taking action and it refers usually to one's life situation.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Move with the flow. Don't fight the current. Resist nothing. Let life carry you. Don't try to carry it.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The more in harmony you are with the flow of your own existence, the more magical life becomes.
quotes.author: Adyashanti

quotes.quote: All things change, nothing is extinguished. There is nothing in the whole world which is permanent. Everything flows onward; all things are brought into being with a changing nature; the ages themselves glide by in constant movement.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: No doubts, no expectations. just go with the flow and everything will work itself out.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Life is so much easier when I allow myself to be myself and go with the flow.
quotes.author: Taylor Schilling

quotes.quote: Give fear no hold on you. Keep sinews loose and senses open, ready at every instant to flow with the rush of action.
quotes.author: Poul Anderson

quotes.quote: Flow with whatever is happening and let your mind be free. Stay centered by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate.
quotes.author: Chuang Tzu

quotes.quote: One who can learn to flow with the current as well as manage the current is the successful one.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: Flow doesn't come to those who try to do things well, it comes to those who try to do things freely.
quotes.author: Barry Michaels

quotes.quote: It is not the stongest person who wins in life, but it is the most nimble, flexible, and adaptive person who wins in life.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Everything is in motion. Everything flows. Everything is vibrating.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Going with the flow is soothing but risky.
quotes.author: Jenny Holzer

quotes.quote: Your flow is as tangible and real as any locomotive, and just as powerful.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: Everything in the universe has a purpose. Indeed, the invisible intelligence that flows through everything in a purposeful fashion is also flowing through you.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Human behavior flows from three main sources: desire, emotion, and knowledge.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Going with the flow is responding to cues from the universe. When you go with the flow, you're surfing Life force. It's about wakeful trust and total collaboration with what's showing up for you.
quotes.author: Danielle LaPorte

quotes.quote: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Go with the flow is an often-heard term. It is arguably good course to adopt if you wish a relatively trouble-free life.
quotes.author: Rex Ellis

quotes.quote: If you want to go with the flow and find a way to blissful living, you must recognize, relate to, assimilate, and control this enemy number one that is within us all.
quotes.author: Rev. Dr. Mushtaq H. Jaafri

quotes.quote: As I thought about the phrase, I began to realize that we are interfering with the flow because we are using the mind's thinking instead of God's thoughts. Obeying God's will means going with the flow while obeying the mind's will means interrupting.
quotes.author: Rev. Dr. Mushtaq H. Jaafri

quotes.quote: Come on, vogue Let your body move to the music (move to the music) Hey, hey, hey
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: Outside the frame, is what we're leaving out You won't remember anyway I can go with the flow But don't say it doesn't matter anymore I can go with the flow Do you believe it in your head?
quotes.author: Queens of the Stone Age

quotes.quote: Love will come It will go It's a give and take so just go with the flow Go with the flow
quotes.author: Never Shout Never

quotes.quote: Better just go with the flow Last thing that we should do is go slow I'm thinking we should ride
quotes.author: Lurk

quotes.quote: Go, go with the flow Rock, rock the freeway Drink, smoke, love, enjoy the ride Right or wrong Hair down long We vote her out Nationwide screams and shouts
quotes.author: Super Furry Animals

quotes.quote: Waking up to visions of where you think you'll We know there is nothing on your mind Go, go lets go with the flow Leave your inhibitions
quotes.author: Afrodyty

quotes.quote: That's right, you got to roll with the punches Yeah, you've got to go with the flow Roll with the punches Yeah, that's one thing I know
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: Sippin' on sunshine No don't got nowhere to go So we'll go with the flow Yeah, we're living the life Sippin' on sunshine
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: Show me how old is your soul Believe in magical stories you told Go with this flow I know we don't need to know Tomorrow's waiting
quotes.author: Olivera

quotes.quote: Just let go Take a deep breath and go with the flow Make it easy on yourself Let go Things'll get better
quotes.author: Firehouse

quotes.quote: Go, just go Just go with your heart Go with the flow There's only one way you're ever gonna know
quotes.author: Erika Jo

quotes.quote: and stay on it Chances are your chance will come along And just go with it Flow with it Ride that wave and roll with it You just might end up where you
quotes.author: Presley & Taylor

quotes.quote: just go with the flow We've been working all week Tomorrow doesn't matter When you're moving your feet It's all about tonight
quotes.author: Pixie Lott

quotes.quote: When you move like a jellyfish Rhythm don't mean nothing You go with the flow You don't stop Move like
quotes.author: Byron Lee

quotes.quote: easier when you go with the flow Ride the wave See where it takes you The moment you fight back You can't let it break you Tear me down Don't let it bury
quotes.author: Blueshift
