quotes.quote: When love comes along you go with the flow You should trust your feelings on it When you get hit by the arrow you'll know Cupid's aim is always on it
quotes.author: Robert Palmer

quotes.quote: Love, it comes, love, it goes Diamond memories go with the flow In the music, say the word See the light, join the herd Love, it comes, love, it goes
quotes.author: David Guetta

quotes.quote: Mouse more than man yes I am You know I want to say no and just stick to my own plan Mouse more than man, yes I am Coz yet I go with the flow
quotes.author: Millencolin

quotes.quote: You gotta make that change I know that it's gonna get rough You gotta go with the flow sometimes It doesn't mean that you give up
quotes.author: Matt Costa

quotes.quote: Even the sparrow knows to fly with the wind And the willow tree it knows when to bend Even a fool knows when to go with the flow I know you don't so when will I let go
quotes.author: Steve Wariner

quotes.quote: I move like water, I go with the flow I go back to old school, I go back to Rome But this is not history, it's the start of the show Never worry, that is the way that I roll
quotes.author: Chase & Status

quotes.quote: talk over the moon And go with the flow (go with the flow) Tonight we're getting loose Of all the pain that's been hanging on our necks Until we meet
quotes.author: Lester Lam

quotes.quote: Hear me now and understand He's gonna find me some piece of mind And if that piece of mind won't stay I'm gonna find myself a better way And if that better way ain't so I'll ride with the tide and go with the flow And that's why I keep on shoutin' in your ear Say yeah, yeah whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, uh, oh
quotes.author: Charlie Foxx

quotes.quote: But when you groove you move me so I can't let you go The place is pumping, gonna go with the flow Scratching lines on my soul
quotes.author: The Gemini Effect

quotes.quote: Head high Knowledge low Against it all but go with the flow No matter how true you pretend to be Those values that you preach Are just a cloak
quotes.author: Hippie Trim

quotes.quote: Don't think, jump in, And feel all my waves crashing, Just live a little, Just go with the flow and give a little, Just trust your heart to live a little
quotes.author: JACO

quotes.quote: is good, life is sweet, is it real, is it fiction So I go with the flow, yeah I ride like the wind, it's my mission I'm freewheelin' I do what I want
quotes.author: Starmen

quotes.quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: This one step-choosing a goal and sticking to it-changes everything.
quotes.author: Scott Reed

quotes.quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: All who have accomplished great things have had a great aim, have fixed their gaze on a goal which was high, one which sometimes seemed impossible.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The greater danger for most of us isn't that our aim is too high and miss it, but that it is too low and we reach it.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: Most "impossible" goals can be met simply by breaking them down into bite size chunks, writing them down, believing them, and then going full speed ahead as if they were routine.
quotes.author: Don Lancaster

quotes.quote: Your goal should be just out of reach, but not out of sight.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley and Remi Witt

quotes.quote: In all things that you do, consider the end.
quotes.author: Solon

quotes.quote: Aim at the sun, and you may not reach it; but your arrow will fly far higher than if aimed at an object on a level with yourself.
quotes.author: J. Howes

quotes.quote: Who aims at excellence will be above mediocrity; who aims at mediocrity will be far short of it.
quotes.author: Burmese Saying

quotes.quote: Write it down. Written goals have a way of transforming wishes into wants; cant's into cans; dreams into plans; and plans into reality. Don't just think it-ink it!
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: Any man who selects a goal in life which can be fully achieved has already defined his own limitations.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: The most important key to achieving great success is to decide upon your goal and launch, get started, take action, move.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: See the things you want as already yours. Think of them as yours, as belonging to you, as already in your possession.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Aim for the highest.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Many people fail in life, not for lack of ability or brains or even courage but simply because they have never organized their energies around a goal.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Our plans miscarry because they have no aim. When a man does not know what harbor he is making for, no wind is the right wind.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: The secret to productive goal setting is in establishing clearly defined goals, writing them down and then focusing on them several times a day with words, pictures and emotions as if we've already achieved them.
quotes.author: Geoffry Abert

quotes.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If you aim at nothing, you'll hit it every time.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Setting a goal is not the main thing. It is deciding how you will go about achieving it and staying with that plan.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: The important thing in life is to have a great aim, and the determination to attain it.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.
quotes.author: Stephen A. Brennan

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy and inspires your hopes.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: All successful people have a goal. No one can get anywhere unless he knows where he wants to go and what he wants to be or do.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Man, with no objective, will soon possess nothing. Having an objective, even low, is better than having none.
quotes.author: Carlisle

quotes.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: You'll fail at a 100% of the goals you don't set.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: The most important key to achieving great success is to decide upon your goal and launch, get started, take action, move.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Big goals get big results. No goals get no results or somebody else's results.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: People with goals succeed because they know where they are going. It's as simple as that.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Without goals, and plans to reach them, you are like a ship that has set sail with no destination.
quotes.author: Fitzhugh Dodson

quotes.quote: The goal you set must be challenging. At the same time, it should be realistic and attainable, not impossible to reach. It should be challenging enough to make you stretch, but not so far that you break.
quotes.author: Rick Hansen

quotes.quote: The establishment of a clear,central purpose or goal in life is the starting point of all success.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Setting goals for your game is an art. The trick is in setting them at the right level neither too low nor too high.
quotes.author: Greg Norman

quotes.quote: Goal Setting:I Set Long Term GoalsII Set Short Term GoalsIII Set ObjectivesIV Prioritize the ObjectivesV Define and DetailVI Do ItVII Evaluate
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Set your goals high enough to inspire you and low enough to encourage you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Define your business goals clearly so that others can see them as you do.
quotes.author: George F. Burns

quotes.quote: Please don't nag yourself with thoughts of failure. Do not set goals far beyond your capacity to achieve. Simply do what you can do, in the best way you know, and the Lord will accept of your effort.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: The major reason for setting a goal is for what it makes of you to accomplish it. What it makes of you will always be the far greater value than what you get
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: In the long run, men hit only what they aim at. Therefore, though they should fail immediately, they had better aim at something high.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Not having a goal is more to be feared than not reaching a goal.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: You have to set the goals that are almost out of reach. If you set a goal that is attainable without much work or thought, you are stuck with something below your true talent and potential.
quotes.author: Steve Garvey

quotes.quote: Set goals that don't feel all that easy, that challenge you, stimulate you, and give you a chance to stretch and push yourself. That is where the power of growth lies.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: The victory of success is half won when one gains the habit of setting goals and achieving them. Even the most tedious chore will become endurable as you parade through each day convinced that each task, no matter how menial or boring, brings you closer to achieving your dreams.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Only a goalie can appreciate what a goalie goes through.
quotes.author: Jacques Plante

quotes.quote: The goalie is like the guy on the minefield. He discovers the mines and destroys them. If you make a mistake, somebody gets blown up.
quotes.author: Arturs Irbe

quotes.quote: Goalies are fine fellows when you meet them at center ice. They are fine fellows off the ice too. But don't think this cordiality is going to apply when you skate by the front of his cave. He'd slice you up if you come in close.
quotes.author: Chandler Sterling

quotes.quote: There is no position in sport as noble as goaltending.
quotes.author: Vladislav Tretiak

quotes.quote: If you're thinking three or four or five plays ahead, you're not finding goaltending interesting.
quotes.author: Glenn Hall

quotes.quote: Goaltenders not only have to stop the shots, but players flying at them as well.
quotes.author: Harry Neale

quotes.quote: Goalkeepers need an element of insanity.
quotes.author: Oliver Kahn

quotes.quote: For a goalkeeper, there is no hiding place
quotes.author: Brad Friedel

quotes.quote: Every old goalkeeper loses a step at some point, but you can gain that back through experience.
quotes.author: Tim Howard

quotes.quote: The goal is too small and the goalies are too big.
quotes.author: Scotty Bowman

quotes.quote: Your best penalty killer is your goalie.
quotes.author: Dave Allison

quotes.quote: It is pretty tough for a goalie when you look at it. You're always the last line of defense. If you let a goal in, you can't go to the bench and hide between the guys or anything
quotes.author: Kirk McLean

quotes.quote: Goalies almost never get credit for winning a game, but they always get blamed for losing a game.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.quote: Is it unprecedented for two goalkeepers employed in a match comprising seven goals to be the fixture's most competent protagonists?
quotes.author: Pete Gill

quotes.quote: Don't try to beat the goalkeeper. Try to destroy the goalkeeper.
quotes.author: Steven Gerrard

quotes.quote: As a goalkeeper, you can't come off the bench for 10 minutes and prove your worth it's either you're in or you're out.
quotes.author: Joe Hart

quotes.quote: It's tough to look great as a goalie. Most of the time, you're the one either letting in a goal or losing the game, so no one wants to say anything or upset you, but at the end of the day you might need some talking to.
quotes.author: Jake Allen

quotes.quote: Being a goalkeeper is like being the guy in the military who makes the bombs one mistake and everyone gets blown up.
quotes.author: Artur Boruc

quotes.quote: As a goalkeeper you need to be good at organising the people in front of you and motivating them. You need to see what's going on and react to the threats. Just like a good manager in business.
quotes.author: Peter Shilton

quotes.quote: Everybody makes mistakes, but when goalkeepers make them, it is costly. That's the nature of being a goalkeeper.
quotes.author: Gary Speed

quotes.quote: Goalies often react quickly to shots with no regard for what might happen to their body because we are trained to stop pucks first and ask questions later.
quotes.author: Martin Brodeur

quotes.quote: If you're a goalkeeper, it doesn't matter what you save the ball with if you keep it out, it's not a goal.
quotes.author: Mark Lawrenson

quotes.quote: Goaltending is a suffering position. Your equipment protects you from injury, but not from pain, every time you go out there. And if you allow a goal, the red lights go on for everyone to see. But you get to be a hero too!
quotes.author: Kevin Constantine

quotes.quote: The pressure is unreal. Most of the goalkeepers they feel the pressure. The only ones that don't worry are the ones too dumb to know what's happening to them.
quotes.author: Tony Esposito

quotes.quote: Goaltending beats top notch scoring anytime!
quotes.author: Eddie Giacomin

quotes.quote: Goalies are three sandwiches shy of a picnic.
quotes.author: Jim Taylor

quotes.quote: The goalkeeper is the jewel in the crown and getting at him should be almost impossible. It's the biggest sin in football to make him do any work.
quotes.author: George Graham

quotes.quote: A goal keeper must radiate pace. But he must watch out that he thereby doesn't fall asleep.
quotes.author: Sepp Maier

quotes.quote: The goalkeeper is the lone eagle, the man of mystery, the last defender.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov.

quotes.quote: Goalkeeping is like extreme sports sometimes you have to let yourself go.
quotes.author: Jens Lehmann

quotes.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: You'll fail at a 100% of the goals you don't set.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: Big goals get big results. No goals get no results or somebody else's results.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: People with goals succeed because they know where they are going. It's as simple as that.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: As you reach your goals, set new ones. That is how you grow and become a more powerful person.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Famous archer, Howard Hill won all of the 267 archery contests he entered. He could hit a bullseye at 50 feet, then split first arrow with the second. Would it be possible for you to shoot better than him? YES, if he were blindfolded! How can you hit a target you can't see? Even worse, how can you hit a target you don't even have!? You need to have GOALS in your life!
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Goals provide the energy source that powers our lives. One of the best ways we can get the most from the energy we have is to focus it. That is what goals can do for us; concentrate our energy.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: The most important thing about goals is having one.
quotes.author: Geoffrey F. Abert

quotes.quote: For me, goals are my road map to the life I want. They have helped me accomplish things I once thought were impossible.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Goals are not only absolutely necessary to motivate us. They are essential to really keep us alive.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: The secret to productive goal setting is in establishing clearly defined goals, writing them down and then focusing on them several times a day with words, pictures and emotions as if we've already achieved them.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Goals: There is no telling what you can do when you get inspired by them. There is no telling what you can do when you believe in them. There is no telling what will happen when you act upon them.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Goals are reached with patience and guidance. Goals are like clouds that drift through the skies waiting to be touched. Goals are the ultimate accomplishment of a wheel that is set in motion.
quotes.author: Alvaretta Roberts

quotes.quote: If you're bored with life, if you don't get up every morning with a burning desire to do things, you don't have enough goals.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Although goals are important, having a plan of action is vital to the success of those goals. Having a goal with no plan of action is like wanting to travel to a new destination without having a map.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Don't let your plans or goals become more important than yourself, or the ones you care about!
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: The more goals you set - the more goals you get.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Without goals, and plans to reach them, you are like a ship that has set sail with no destination.
quotes.author: Fitzhugh Dodson

quotes.quote: Think big goals and win big success.
quotes.author: David. J. Schwartz

quotes.quote: Crystallize your goals. Make a plan for achieving them and set yourself a deadline. Then, with supreme confidence, determination and disregard for obstacles and other people's criticisms, carry out your plan.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: Goals are dreams we convert to plans and take action to fulfill.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You must have long-range goals to keep you from being frustrated by short-range failures.
quotes.author: Charles C. Noble

quotes.quote: The ultimate reason for setting goals is to entice you to become the person it takes to achieve them.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Setting goals for significant accomplishments you want to achieve in your life, both personal and professional accomplishments, costs you nothing. Failure to set them can cost you plenty. You are smack in the middle of the only life your going to have. You can choose to succeed, or choose to drift; having goals makes the difference.
quotes.author: Alec Mackenzie

quotes.quote: Goals give you more than a reason to get up in the morning; they are an incentive to keep you going all day. Goals tend to tap the deeper resources and draw the best out of life.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: The reason most people never reach their goals is that they don't define them, learn about them or even seriously consider them as believable or acheivable. Winners can tell you where they are going, what they plan to do along the way, and who will be sharing the adventure with them.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: An average person with average talents and ambition and average education, can outstrip the most brilliant genius in our society, if that person has clear, focused goals.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Review your goals twice every day in order to be focused on achieving them.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Where are the people who don't have goals headed? Those 97 per cent end up working for the three percent.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You have to set goals that are almost out of reach. If you set a goal that is attainable without much work or thought, you are stuck with something below your true talent and potential.
quotes.author: Steve Garvey

quotes.quote: Your goal should be out of reach but not out of sight.
quotes.author: Anita DeFrantz

quotes.quote: Make each day count by setting specific goals to succeed, then putting forth every effort to exceed your own expectations.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Goals that are not written down are just wishes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When we are motivated by goals that have deep meaning, by dreams that need completion, by pure love that needs expressing, then we truly live life.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goals.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Goals determine what you're going to be.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.quote: There is no achievement without goals.
quotes.author: Robert J. McKain

quotes.quote: Set a goal to achieve something that is so big, SO exhilarating that it excites you and scares you at the same time. It must be a goal that is so appealing, so much in line with your spiritual core, that you can't get it out of your mind. If you do not get chills when you set a goal, you're not setting big enough goals.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: To have Goals is to have a future, because without goals we will strive for nothing.
quotes.author: Andrew Ridings

quotes.quote: Goals allow you to control the direction of change in your favor.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The most important thing you can do to achieve your goals is to make sure that as soon as you set them, you immediately begin to create momentum. The most important rules that I ever adopted to help me in achieving my goals were those I learned from a very successful man who taught me to first write down the goal, and then to never leave the site of setting a goal without firs taking some form of positive action toward its attainment.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr

quotes.quote: Goals help you overcome short-term problems.
quotes.author: Hannah More

quotes.quote: If what you are doing is not moving you towards your goals, then it's moving you away from your goals.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Establishing goals is all right if you don't let them deprive you of interesting detours.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Goals are dreams with deadlines.
quotes.author: Diana Scharf Hunt

quotes.quote: People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals â€“ that is, goals that do not inspire them.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: If you go to work on your goals, your goals will go to work on you. If you go to work on your plan, your plan will go to work on you. Whatever good things we build end up building us.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: A person without ambition is like an lifeless object and when you work with an ambition, no goal is difficult to achieve.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Leaders aren't born they are made. And they are made just like anything else, through hard work. And that's the price we'll have to pay to achieve that goal, or any goal.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The tragedy of life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goals to reach.
quotes.author: Benjamin Mays

quotes.quote: A goal without an action plan is a daydream.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: You need a plan to build a house. To build a life, it is even more important to have a plan or goal.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A good goal is like a strenuous exercise - it makes you stretch.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Goals are the sweetest fruits of the most bitter trials of life.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: If you're going to be able to look back on something and laugh about it, you might as well laugh about it now.
quotes.author: Marie Osmond

quotes.quote: You can get everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The trouble with not having a goal is that you can spend your life running up and down the field and never score.
quotes.author: Bill Copeland

quotes.quote: Go as far as you can see, and when you get there you will see farther.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Goals are not only absolutely necessary to motivate us. They are essential to really keep us alive.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Everybody has their own Mount Everest they were put on this earth to climb.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: We are kept from our goal not by obstacles but by a clear path to a lesser goal.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: This one step â€“ choosing a goal and sticking to it â€“ changes everything.
quotes.author: Scott Reed

quotes.quote: Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: By recording your dreams and goals on paper, you set in motion the process of becoming the person you most want to be. Put your future in good hands â€” your own.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: Goals determine what you're going to be.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Goals are the end results of a long hard struggle that is considered the fruit of all efforts.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be who you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal â€” a commitment to excellence â€” that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: All who have accomplished great things have had a great aim, have fixed their gaze on a goal which was high, one which sometimes seemed impossible.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: It's better to be at the bottom of the ladder you want to climb than at the top of the one you don't.
quotes.author: Stephen Kellogg

quotes.quote: Goals are discovered, not made.
quotes.author: Richard J. Foster

quotes.quote: Goals are accomplished when accomplishment rules the heart and mind.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: The road leading to a goal does not separate you from the destination; it is essentially a part of it.
quotes.author: Charles DeLint

quotes.quote: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Without some goals and some efforts to reach it, no man can live.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves simply as something to aim at.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Without some goal and some effort to reach it, no one can live.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Obstacles are those things you see when you take your eyes off the goal.
quotes.author: Hannah More

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Sometimes there has to be a goat on some level, and I'm totally fine with that being me.
quotes.author: Abby Wambach

quotes.quote: A goat does not eat into a hen's stomach no matter how friendly the two may be.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: We know the goats are imported because they don't speak English.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: The blood of a goat will shatter a diamond.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The goat's business is none of the sheep's concern.
quotes.author: Edna Ferber

quotes.quote: When a goat likes a book, the whole book is gone, and the meaning has to go find an author again.
quotes.author: William Stafford

quotes.quote: He who lets the goat be laid on his shoulders is soon after forced to carry the cow.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: An old goat is never the more reverend for his beard.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: When two goats met on a bridge which was too narrow to allow either to pass or return, the goat which lay down that the other might walk over it was a finer gentleman than Lord Chesterfield.
quotes.author: Lord David Cecil

quotes.quote: To you liberals, of course, goats are just sheep from broken homes.
quotes.author: Malcolm Bradbury

quotes.quote: Goats are the cable talk show panelists of the animal world, ready at a moment's notice to interject, interrupt, and opine. They have something to say about everything, little of it complimentary. They are the most impertinent animals I have ever known.
quotes.author: Jon Katz

quotes.quote: The lust of the goat is the bounty of God.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Whatever gets your goat gets your attention. Whatever gets your attention gets your time. Whatever gets your time gets you. Whatever gets you becomes your master. Take care, lest a little thing horn in and get your goat
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Don't approach a goat from the front, a horse from the back, or a fool from any side.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: In a dead white field an untethered goat gave them sardonic greeting.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: I will lose the habit of stars in the heavens, as frozen water loses the habit of snowflakes. I will take my frozen body, and give it to the young goats that they might graze it.
quotes.author: Nichita Stănescu

quotes.quote: I love you more than I love goats, and you know how I feel about goats", Gaby said.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: In the silence, I could hear the distinct sound of goats maa-ing in the barn. Lying there listening to them made me smile, too. I'd always loved goats - every one of them different from every other one, and all of them goofy and playful.
quotes.author: Steve Watkins

quotes.quote: I saw goats. A party can’t be all bad when you have goats,” Lucy said.
quotes.author: Mary Jane Hathaway

quotes.quote: IQ's are a combination of eyes, and queues. Would you wait in line to see my goat show? Of course you wouldn't, because the line is invisible.
quotes.author: Will Advise

quotes.quote: Look carefully at the goat sitting on the edge of the cliff: Everything that shows you the peace of being fearless is a great teacher for you! That goat is a teacher for you, respect him!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It's good for a person to be terrorized by a goat. Hard to get high and mighty when there's something chasing you for vegetables
quotes.author: Natasha Pulley

quotes.quote: I've got kids, goats. My wife always wanted a donkey, so I bought her one.
quotes.author: Jason Momoa

quotes.quote: Every man can tell how many goats or sheep he possesses, but not how many friends.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: A goat will eat anything. A goat could probably eat a bike.
quotes.author: David Guion

quotes.quote: Have you ever just spent five months living with a herd of goats, as one of them?
quotes.author: David Guion

quotes.quote: Mess with the goat, you get the hooves.
quotes.author: Tom Sheppard

quotes.quote: Drive back your goats until the sheep are watered.
quotes.author: Dorothy Clarke Wilson

quotes.quote: You know, after all your luck, you owe the spirits a goat.
quotes.author: Lee David Zlotoff

quotes.quote: Some people say goats is gonna replace cattle some day.
quotes.author: Earl Pomerantz

quotes.quote: When I wasn't minding the goats, I had to mind the children. The goats were nicer.
quotes.author: Marie Arana

quotes.quote: Love and hate are two horns on the same goat
quotes.author: Tate Taylor

quotes.quote: Don't call me 'Ma'. You're not a goat.
quotes.author: Marshall Herskovitz

quotes.quote: Anywhere a goat can go, we can go. Grandfather told me.
quotes.author: Fred Brogger

quotes.quote: How do you talk to a little baby goat you can't go meow like a cat / When you go meow to a little baby goat he can't go meow right back / No you have to say baaa to a little baby goat you can't say hello like a man
quotes.author: Tom T. Hall

quotes.quote: And the goats on His left and He shall say to the sheep / Come ye, blessed of My Father inherit the Kingdom
quotes.author: Keith Green

quotes.quote: Each sunny day upon my way / A goat I pass / He has a beard of silver grey / A bell of brass.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Alas! though bards make verse sublime / And lines to quote / It takes a fool like me to rhyme / About a goat.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: Beautiful Paris, evil-hearted Paris / Leading a jet-black goat white-horn'd, white-hooved.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: I sought a cup that had no dust / And found it at the Goat and Vine / Mingled of brandy, beer and wine.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbit

quotes.quote: Jesus answered their questions with a series of parables, concluding with one about a herd of sheep and goats
quotes.author: W Publishing Group

quotes.quote: The Son of Man condemned the goats for not meeting his needs: leaving him hungry, thirsty, naked, and lonely when he needed their help most.
quotes.author: W Publishing Group

quotes.quote: Goats are probably one of the earliest animals domesticated (made friendly to humans).
quotes.author: John Davidson

quotes.quote: Goats are a cloven footed animal, like the camel and the pig. That means their feet are split down the middle.
quotes.author: John Davidson

quotes.quote: Most goats are descended from a goat in the Capra species, and come from mostly Eastern Europe, Asia and Africa.
quotes.author: John Davidson

quotes.quote: A goat is a member of the Bovidae family, which mainly consists of goats and antelopes.
quotes.author: John Davidson

quotes.quote: The sound a goat makes is called a bleat, and they can range from small sounds to loud screams.
quotes.author: John Davidson

quotes.quote: The goat is a hardy animal, and good health is the rule in herds that are well managed
quotes.author: Various

quotes.quote: Goats are another animal with negative symbolic connotations.
quotes.author: Margo Demello

quotes.quote: The Greek half-man/half-goat God Pan was probably an early inspiration for the later Christian image of the devil as a half-man/half-goat.
quotes.author: Margo Demello

quotes.quote: In Christianity, goats represent the damned and sheep represent the saved.
quotes.author: Margo Demello

quotes.quote: Medieval European depictions of the goat represented it as the devil, and goats were thought to be witches' familiars.
quotes.author: Margo Demello

quotes.quote: Goats are typically gendered male, and often are said to represent uncontrolled male sexuality.
quotes.author: Margo Demello

quotes.quote: The goat is also very well adapted to various extreme environmental and nutritional conditions (climate, food resources, etc.). Furthermore, it is a relatively long-living, multiparous animal with a short generation interval
quotes.author: Lawrence B. Schook

quotes.quote: We need to find God, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature - trees, flowers, grass- grows in silence; see the stars, the moon and the sun, how they move in silence... We need silence to be able to touch souls.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
quotes.author: Paul Dirac

quotes.quote: God never ends anything on a negative; God always ends on a positive.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: God will not permit any troubles to come upon us, unless He has a specific plan by which great blessing can come out of the difficulty.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Sometimes God allows what he hates to accomplish what he loves.
quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.quote: Because God has made us for Himself, our hearts are restless until they rest in Him.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: It is when we notice the dirt that God is most present in us; it is the very sign of His presence.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Any fool can count the seeds in an apple. Only God can count all the apples in one seed.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Every evening I turn my worries over to God. He's going to be up all night anyway.
quotes.author: Mary C. Crowley

quotes.quote: What you are is God's gift to you, what you become is your gift to God.
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.quote: If God had wanted to be a big secret, He would not have created babbling brooks and whispering pines.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: I don't know if God exists, but it would be better for His reputation if He didn't.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: The sun, the moon, the stars, the birds, the animals, the flowers, are all proof that a universal power exists.
quotes.author: RVM

quotes.quote: Before God we are all equally wise and equally foolish.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Man is born broken. He lives by mending. The grace of God is glue.
quotes.author: Eugene O'Neill

quotes.quote: I cannot conceive of a God who rewards and punishes his creatures, or has a will of the type of which we are conscious in ourselves. An individual who should survive his physical death is also beyond my comprehension, nor do I wish it otherwise; such notions are for the fears or absurd egoism of feeble souls.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Maybe there isn't a God after all, maybe there's only a universe rotating by itself like a millstone.
quotes.author: Gao Xingjian

quotes.quote: God is that infinite All of which man knows himself to be a finite part.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: All powers, all laws, are but the fair embodied thoughts of God.
quotes.author: John Stuart Blackie

quotes.quote: God doesn't owe us anything-yet in His grace, He still gives us good things.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Only God can fully satisfy the hungry heart of man.
quotes.author: Hugh Black

quotes.quote: The universe is centered on neither the earth nor the sun. It is centered on God.
quotes.author: Alfred Noyes

quotes.quote: I love to think of nature as an unlimited broadcasting station, through which God speaks to us every hour, if we will only tune in.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: To fall in love with God is the greatest of all romances; to seek him, the greatest adventure; to find him, the greatest human achievement.
quotes.author: Raphael Simon

quotes.quote: Coincidence is God's way of remaining anonymous.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I know God won't give me anything I can't handle. I just wish he didn't trust me so much.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.quote: Everyone who believes in God at all believes that he knows what you and I are going to do tomorrow.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The more we depend on God the more dependable we find He is.
quotes.author: Cliff Richard

quotes.quote: Only God can fully satisfy the hungry heart of man.
quotes.author: Hugh Black

quotes.quote: Indeed, I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Were there no God, we would be in this glorious world with grateful hearts, and no one to thank.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: Sometimes when we get overwhelmed, we forget how big God is.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: The closer a person is to God, the closer he is to people.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: When you have nothing left but God, then for the first time, you become aware that God is enough
quotes.author: Maude Royden

quotes.quote: Four things let us ever keep in mind: God hears prayer, God heeds prayer, God answers prayer, and God delivers by prayer.
quotes.author: E. M. Bounds

quotes.quote: God asks no man whether he will accept life. That is not the choice. He must accept it. The only choice is how.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: God is in the sadness and the laughter, in the bitter and the sweet. There is a divine purpose behind everything - and therefore a divine presence in everything.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Find out how much God has given you and from it take what you need; the remainder is needed by others.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: The more you succeed in loving, the more you'll be convinced at the existence of God and the immortality of your soul.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: The place God calls you to is the place where your deep gladness and the world's deep need meet.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: God puts something good and loveable in every man His hands create.
quotes.author: The American Vandal speech

quotes.quote: I believe God is managing affairs and that He doesn't need any advice from me. With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end. So what is there to worry about.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Without God there is for mankind no purpose, no goal, no hope, only a wavering future, an eternal dread of every darkness.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: God is a circle whose center is everywhere and circumference nowhere.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: God is a concept by which we measure our pain.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Always, everywhere God is present, and always He seeks to discover Himself to each one.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: God does not give us everything we want, but He does fulfill His promises, leading us along the best and straightest paths to Himself.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: God loves each of us as if there were only one of us.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: God never said that the journey would be easy, but He did say that the arrival would be worthwhile.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: God will meet you where you are in order to take you where He wants you to go.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: God's work done in God's way will never lack God's supplies.
quotes.author: Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: We need to find God, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature trees, flowers, grass grows in silence; see the stars, the moon and the sun, how they move in silence . We need silence to be able to touch souls.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Being human means you will make mistakes. And you will make mistakes, because failure is God’s way of moving you in another direction.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: God never gives someone a gift they are not capable of receiving. If he gives us the gift of Christmas, it is because we all have the ability to understand and receive it.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: We may ignore, but we can nowhere evade the presence of God. The world is crowded with Him. He walks everywhere incognito.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: If we find ourselves with a desire that nothing in this world can satisfy, the most probable explanation is that we were made for another world.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Prayer is not asking. It is a longing of the soul. It is daily admission of one's weakness. It is better in prayer to have a heart without words than words without a heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: To be a Christian means to forgive the inexcusable because God has forgiven the inexcusable in you.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: We are not necessarily doubting that God will do the best for us; we are wondering how painful the best will turn out to be.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Thou hast made us for thyself, O Lord, and our heart is restless until it finds its rest in thee.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: I don't stand for black man's side, I don't stand for white man's side, I stand for God's side.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The great thing to remember is that though our feelings come and go God's love for us does not.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Listen to God with a broken heart. He is not only the doctor who mends it, but also the father who wipes away the tears.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It is when we notice the dirt that God is most present in us; it is the very sign of His presence.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Let us never forget to pray. God lives. He is near. He is real. He is not only aware of us but cares for us. He is our Father. He is accessible to all who will seek Him.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: What comes into our minds when we think about God is the most important thing about us.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: The eye through which I see God is the same eye through which God sees me; my eye and God's eye are one eye, one seeing, one knowing, one love.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: There is but one good; that is God. Everything else is good when it looks to Him and bad when it turns from Him.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: If you think God’s there, He is. If you don’t, He isn’t. And if that’s what God’s like, I wouldn’t worry about it.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: You can get a thousand no's from people, and only one "yes" from God.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.quote: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift should be curiosity.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Her godmother simply touched her with her wand, and, at the same moment, her clothes were turned into cloth of gold and silver, all decked with jewels.
quotes.author: Charles Perrault

quotes.quote: A godchild fills your heart with love and joy as if they were your very own.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A Goddaughter is a treasure whose worth you cannot measure except by the love in your heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Goddaughters make life more special.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you love yourself. You really know how much better you deserve. Respect the goddess who is embedded in you soul.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Rising up from the ashes airing those flickering flame. I'll reassemble myself becoming the goddess of flame.
quotes.author: Misbah Abu Obaida Khan

quotes.quote: Even a blind man opens his eyes to worship the goddess of his solitary sighs.
quotes.author: A.Jayakumar

quotes.quote: Men who care passionately for women attach themselves at least as much to the temple and to the accessories of the cult as to their goddess herself.
quotes.author: Marguerite Yourcenar

quotes.quote: Men of action are favored by the Goddess of luck.
quotes.author: George S. Clason

quotes.quote: The Goddess does not rule the world; She is the world. Manifest in each of us, She can be known internally by every individual, in all her magnificent diversity.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: The image of the Goddess inspires women to see ourselves as divine, our bodies as sacred, the changing phases of our lives as holy, our aggression as healthy, our anger as purifying, and our power to nurture and create, but also to limit and destroy when necessary, as the very force that sustains all life. Through the Goddess we can discover our strength, enlighten our minds, own our bodies, and celebrate our emotions. We can move beyond narrow, constricting roles and become whole.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: A queen keeps a court that is spoken about. A goddess keeps a court that is never forgotten.
quotes.author: Nalini Singh

quotes.quote: The goddess has never been lost. It is just that some of us have forgotten how to find her.
quotes.author: Patricia Monaghan

quotes.quote: he Goddess falls in love with Herself, drawing forth her own emanation, which takes on a life of its own. Love of self for self is the creative force of the universe. Desire is the primal energy, and that energy is erotic: the attraction of lover to beloved, of planet to star, the lust of electron for proton. Love is the glue that holds the world together
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: The simplest and most basic meaning of the symbol of the Goddess is the acknowledgment of the legitimacy of female power as a beneficent and independent power
quotes.author: Carol P. Christ

quotes.quote: In a child's eyes a mother is a goddess. She can be glorious or terrible, benevolent or filled with wrath, but she commands love either way. I am convinced this is the greatest power in the universe.
quotes.author: N.K. Jemison

quotes.quote: The symbol of Goddess gives us permission. She teaches us to embrace the holiness of every natural, ordinary, sensual dying moment. Patriarchy may try to negate body & flee earth with its constant heartbeat of death, but Goddess forces us back to embrace them, to take our human life in our arms & clasp it for the divine life it is – the nice, sanitary, harmonious moment as well as the painful, dark, splintered ones.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: The Goddess of Old Europe and Ancient Crete represented the unity of life in nature, delight in the diversity of form, the powers of birth, death and regeneration.
quotes.author: Carol P. Christ

quotes.quote: The long sleep of Mother Goddess is ended. May She awaken in each of our hearts - Merry meet, merry part, and blessed be.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: Actions speak louder than words. In the days to come the Goddess of Victory will bestow her laurels only on those who prepared to act with daring.
quotes.author: Heinz Guderian

quotes.quote: The Gods and Goddesses of myth, legend and fairy tale represent archetypes, real potencies, and potentialities deep within the psyche, which, when allowed to flower, permit us to be more fully human.
quotes.author: Margot Adler

quotes.quote: There are two goddesses in your heart,” he told them. “The Goddess of Wisdom and the Goddess of Wealth. Everyone thinks they need to get wealth first, and wisdom will come. So they concern themselves with chasing money. But they have it backwards. You have to give your heart to the Goddess of Wisdom, give her all your love and attention, and the Goddess of Wealth will become jealous, and follow you.” Ask nothing from your running, in other words, and you’ll get more than you ever imagined.
quotes.author: Christopher McDougall

quotes.quote: The Goddess is the Encircler, the Ground of Being; the God is That-Which-Is-Brought-Forth, her mirror image, her other pole. She is the earth; He is the grain. She is the all encompassing sky; He is the sun, her fireball. She is the Wheel; He is the traveler. He is the sacrifice of life to death that life may go on. She is the Mother and Destroyer; He is all that is born and is destroyed.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: Our great symbol for the Goddess is the moon, whose three aspects reflect the three stages in women's lives and whose cycles of waxing and waning coincide with women's menstrual cycles.
quotes.author: Carol P. Christ

quotes.quote: I sometimes wonder if the hand is not more sensitive to the beauties of sculpture than the eye. I should think the wonderful rhythmical flow of lines and curves could be more subtly felt than seen. Be this as it may, I know that I can feel the heart-throbs of the ancient Greeks in their marble gods and goddesses.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.quote: Two thousand years ago, we lived in a world of Gods and Goddesses. Today, we live in a world solely of Gods. Women in most cultures have been stripped of their spiritual power.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Until we stop clinging to the concept of good and evil, the world will continue to manifest as friendly goddesses and harmful demons
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: The Moon! Artemis! the great goddess of the splendid past of men! Are you going to tell me she is a dead lump?
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Who wants to be a goddess when we can be human? Perfection is a flaw disguised as control
quotes.author: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.quote: Fairy godmothers didn't exist, and even if they did, they wouldn't wave a magic wand and make everything better. Not without a contract, anyway.
quotes.author: Julie Kagawa

quotes.quote: The idea that somebody else is going to swoop down and play the fairy godmother role is pretty unlikely, so why not take care of yourself?
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.quote: You, of all people, deserve a happy ending. Despite everything that happened to you, you aren't bitter. You aren't cold. You've just retreated a little and been shy, and that's okay. If I were a fairy godmother, I would give you your heart's desire in an instant. And I would wipe away your tears and tell you not to cry.
quotes.author: (Rachel) Sylvain Reynard

quotes.quote: If you can no longer believe in your fairy godfather, maybe it will be easier for you to believe in your fairy godmother. I'm up on all this Oedipus nonsense, you know.
quotes.author: Fairy Godfather

quotes.quote: My deceased grandmother on my mom's side was a real fairy godmother, who lived to be 102 and who I always feel is looking after me. My mom really is, also. The older I get, the more I realize how much she sacrificed to make sure that my brothers and I had what we needed to pursue what our dreams were. To be able to have someone to grant every wish – she's my biggest inspiration.
quotes.author: Victoria Clark

quotes.quote: My best friend just had a baby, and she's my age. So I'm a godmom now, which is crazy.
quotes.author: Kristen Stewart

quotes.quote: The day that I was christened- / It’s a hundred years, and more!- / A hag came and listened / At the white church door, / A-hearing her that bore me / And all my kith and kin / Considerately, for me, / Renouncing sin. / While some gave me corals, / And some gave me gold, / And porringers, with morals / Agreeably scrolled, / The hag stood, buckled / In a dim gray cloak; / Stood there and chuckled, / Spat, and spoke: / “There’s few enough in life’ll / Be needing my help, / But I’ve got a trifle / For your fine young whelp. / I give her sadness, / And the gift of pain, / The new-moon madness, / And the love of rain.” / And little good to lave me / In their holy silver bowl / After what she gave me- / Rest her soul!
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Honey, I'm your fairy godmother. Didn't you see me "poof" next to you?
quotes.author: Fairy Godmother

quotes.quote: Ah! "Godmother"! Now you have accidentally said something valuable.
quotes.author: Hercule Poirot

quotes.quote: They're unrealistic. All fairy godmothers, true love, happily ever-afters. I'm afraid they just don't happen.
quotes.author: Jonathan 'J.J.' Jones

quotes.quote: When I got back to my hometown / I saw the ghosts of yesterday / And my godmother bless her soul / She still lives down this way / Remember when I was just a kid / And she would tell a story / Of the rainbow / Rainbow / No one knows / Where the rainbow goes.
quotes.author: Robbie Robertson

quotes.quote: Morning is my godmother / Loving me like no other / Yeah, morning is my godmother / Loving me like no other.
quotes.author: Bill Callahan

quotes.quote: Deep in my inner self / Buried in ashes and stones / Wind and rain / In my soul / A fallen fairy godmother / Is waiting for the light.
quotes.author: Frost

quotes.quote: For anyone who has had a Christian upbringing, or has a friend who is Christian, you understand why being asked to be a confirmation sponsor or a godparent is a big deal. Such roles mean someone thinks of you a role model, that you are a person they can rely on for guidance and support throughout their lives. Essentially, they think you're the bomb.
quotes.author: Lauren Stanton

quotes.quote: She wiped away her flowing tears / And scrubbed the kitchen pots and bowls / Watching the dance leaping among / Somber shadows and glowing coals. / But her fairy godmother soon appeared / With a beauteous gown and, in a thrice, / From a pumpkin produced a golden coach / With prancing steeds, once six white mice. / She gave Cinderella a lush bouquet / And a glass slipper she quickly donned, / She turned ashes to flashing jewels / With one wave of her magic wand.
quotes.author: Jose Asuncion Silva

quotes.quote: Her little face is like a walnut shell / With wrinkling lines; her soft, white hair adorns / Her withered brows in quaint, straight curls, like horns; / And all about her clings an old, sweet smell. / Prim is her gown and quakerlike her shawl. / Well might her bonnets have been born on her. / Can you conceive a Fairy Godmother / The subject of a strong religious call? / In snow or shine, from bed to bed she runs, / All twinkling smiles and texts and pious tales, / Her mittened hands, / that ever give or pray, / Bearing a sheaf of tracts, a bag of buns: / A wee old maid that sweeps the Bridegroom's way, / Strong in a cheerful trust that never fails.
quotes.author: William Ernest Henley

quotes.quote: So really, it was just as well that Godmother had caught up to me, in spite of my best efforts to avoid her. I'd hate to find out that the universe really wasn't conspiring against me. It would jerk the rug out from under my persecution complex.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: I'm a godmother, that's a great thing to be, a godmother. She calls me god for short, that's cute, I taught her that.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: I've been a godmother loads of times, but being a grandmother is better than anything.
quotes.author: Vivien Leigh

quotes.quote: Her godmother simply touched her with her wand, and, at the same moment, her clothes were turned into cloth of gold and silver, all decked with jewels.
quotes.author: Charles Perrault

quotes.quote: I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift should be curiosity.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I'm not sure I would be a good godmother. I have read about it, and I found that the godmother's position is to take care of the morals of the child. I don't know how good I would be at that.
quotes.author: Susan Glaspell

quotes.quote: Always a godmother, never a mother. That sucks. I've got to get me one of those little accessories.
quotes.author: Courteney Cox

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Her godmother simply touched her with her wand, and, at the same moment, her clothes were turned into cloth of gold and silver, all decked with jewels.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift should be curiosity.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I'm a godmother, that's a great thing to be, a godmother. She calls me god for short, that's cute, I taught her that.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Know you what it is to be a child? It is to be something very different from the man of today. It is to have a spirit yet streaming from the waters of baptism; it is to believe in love, to believe in loveliness, to believe in belief; it is to be so little that elves can reach to whisper in your ear; it is to turn pumpkins into coaches, and mice into horses, lowness into loftiness, and nothing into everything, for each child had its fairy godmother in its soul. It is to live in nutshell and to count yourself the king of infinite space.
quotes.author: Francis Thompson

quotes.quote: This reminds me, Godmother, to ask you a serious question. You are as wise as wise can be (having been brought up by the fairies), and you can tell me this: Is it better to have had a good thing and lost it, or never to have had it?
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: As the moment of your baptism arrives, I wish you feel the love that God has showered on you and you feel what a blessed child you are! God Bless!
quotes.author: Janette Rallison

quotes.quote: Thank you for being a part of our wedding and sharing in our joy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The key to happiness as any good fairy godmother will tell you is not to avoid problems, but to overcome them.
quotes.author: Janette Rallison

quotes.quote: Thank you for your love that you show me regularly. You are generous with your time, energy and forgiveness
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Gold gathers more than a shovel.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: Gold does not rust on the ground, and rocks don't get soaked in the rain.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: Pure gold does not rust. Only gold alloys do so. You may have golden dreams. But if you go in the company of toxic people, you become a 'gold alloy' and what that means is that you can rust at any time!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: More gold has been mined from the thoughts of men than has been taken from the earth.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Are you looking for gold, friend? Look around you; anything useful to you is pure gold, pure silver!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Gold like the sun, which melts wax, but hardens clay, expands great souls.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: Gold opens all locks, no lock will hold against the power of gold.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Gold may shine; but it has no true light.
quotes.author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: As every thread of gold is valuable, so is every moment of time.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: All the gold which is under or upon the earth is not enough to give in exchange for virtue.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Gold is so heavy it settles down upon the lowest souls.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: If a man has gold, he lives with the terror that someone will take it away from him, so he builds walls around it. Then everyone knows where the gold is, so they come and take it. That's the way it always goes, brother. Fools and gold, together.
quotes.author: Conn Iggulden

quotes.quote: Second-hand gold is as good as new.
quotes.author: Ken Alstad

quotes.quote: Because gold is honest money it is disliked by dishonest men.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.quote: A mask of gold hides all deformities.
quotes.author: Thomas Dekker

quotes.quote: Gold often commends the unworthy.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: Gold authenticity can only be tested under maximum fire. The same holds true with regard to manhood.
quotes.author: Moutasem Algharati

quotes.quote: The desire for gold is the most universal and deeply rooted commercial instinct of the human race.
quotes.author: Gerald M. Loeb

quotes.quote: We must learn who is gold, and who is gold plated.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If gold rusts, what then can iron do?
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: There is gold everywhere, most people are not trained to see it.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Hunger for gold is made greater as more gold is acquired.
quotes.author: Aurelius Clemens Prudentius

quotes.quote: Gold makes monsters of men.
quotes.author: Erin Bowman

quotes.quote: Those that go gold into the furnace will come out no worse.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Gold gives to the ugliest thing a certain charming air, For that without it were else a miserable affair.
quotes.author: Jean Baptiste Moliere

quotes.quote: No gold glitters like that which is our own.
quotes.author: Eliza Cook

quotes.quote: Gold is money. Everything else is credit.
quotes.author: J. P. Morgan

quotes.quote: Gold begets in brethren hate; Gold in families debate; Gold does friendship separate; Gold does civil wars create.
quotes.author: Abraham Cowley

quotes.quote: Do not hold everything as gold that shines like gold.
quotes.author: Alain de Lille

quotes.quote: Where gold speaks every tongue is silent.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The desire of gold is not for gold. It is for the means of freedom and benefit.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: To have gold is to be in fear, and to want it to be sorrow.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Gold's father is dirt, yet it regards itself as noble.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: It is much better to have your gold in the hand than in the heart.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Gold is worshipped in all climates, without a single temple, and by all classes, without a single hypocrite.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Gold makes the ugly beautiful.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: That is gold which is worth gold.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: All that glitters is not gold.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Gold will be slave or master.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: True gold fears no fire.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote:
"Dare to love yourself
as if you were a rainbow
with gold at both ends."
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: What glitters may not be gold; and even wolves may smile; and fools will be led by promises to their deaths.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: But what's worth more than gold? Practically everything. You, for example. Gold is heavy. Your weight in gold is not very much gold at all. Aren't you worth more than that?
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Gold is the corpse of value.
quotes.author: Neal Stephenson

quotes.quote: [Gold] gets dug out of the ground in Africa, or someplace. Then we melt it down, dig another hole, bury it again and pay people to stand around guarding it. It has no utility. Anyone watching from Mars would be scratching their head.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote:
There is thy gold, worse poison to men's souls,
Doing more murder in this loathsome world,
Than these poor compounds that thou mayst not sell.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Gold conjures up a mist about a man, more destructive of all his old senses and lulling to his feelings than the fumes of charcoal.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I did not know that mankind were suffering for want of gold. I have seen a little of it. I know that it is very malleable, but not so malleable as wit. A grain of gold will gild a great surface, but not so much as a grain of wisdom.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Let truth be told. The more we allow water to be controlled, bottled and sold — the more we sell the security of our sons, daughters and souls. He who controls the water, controls us all. Water is the true gold.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Gold medals aren’t really made of gold. They’re made of sweat, determination and a hard to find alloy called guts.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: I did not know that mankind were suffering for want of gold. I have seen a little of it. I know that it is very malleable, but not so malleable as wit. A grain of gold will gild a great surface, but not so much as a grain of wisdom.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Let truth be told. The more we allow water to be controlled, bottled and sold — the more we sell the security of our sons, daughters and souls. He who controls the water, controls us all. Water is the true gold.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Gold medals aren’t really made of gold. They’re made of sweat, determination and a hard to find alloy called guts.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: All that is gold does not glitter, not all those who wander are lost; the old that is strong does not wither, deep roots are not reached by the frost.
quotes.author: J. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Truth, like gold, is to be obtained not by its growth, but by washing away from it all that is not gold.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Everything has its limit – iron ore cannot be educated into gold
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Commodities such as gold and silver have a world market that transcends national borders, politics, religions, and race. A person may not like someone else’s religion, but he’ll accept his gold
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Gold / Always believe in your soul / You've got the power to know / You're indestructible / always believe in.
quotes.author: Gary Kemp

quotes.quote: Gold and I've been told / It's too hot to hold you can get it sold / In the summer heat in the winter cold / Fourteen karat gold won't mold.
quotes.author: Daryl Barnes

quotes.quote: As we are looking back / And then we'll Understand / We held gold dust / In our hands.
quotes.author: Tori Ellen Amos

quotes.quote: My search for gold is leading nowhere / Whichever lonely road I take / It seems to go nowhere.
quotes.author: Eddie Seago

quotes.quote: Your hair streaked with sun-light / your lips red as flame / your face with a luster / That puts gold to shame.
quotes.author: Alan Jay Lerner

quotes.quote: I've been wrong before / But now I know / I've made mistakes in the past / But now I know the difference / From gold and brass.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: Some shine when the day is new / But fade when the day is through / But you look like gold.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: But gold is the snare of the soul. Gold is the root of all evil.
quotes.author: Jon Reeves

quotes.quote: Not all treasure is silver and gold.
quotes.author: Ted Elliott

quotes.quote: Gold will never fill an empty heart
quotes.author: Dorothy Clarke Wilson

quotes.quote: That's the beauty of gold. It never tarnishes. Lasts forever, too. You can twist it, pound it, even piss on it but it's always the same gold.
quotes.author: Bob Gale

quotes.quote: If the clouds showered gold instead of rain; marriages round the globe would occur in chambers of impeccable silk.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: If the clouds showered gold instead of rain; man would incorporate his house with gigantic slabs of the same.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: If the clouds showered gold instead of rain; people would be saved from the tyranny of monotonous work.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Gold in the mountain / And gold in the glen / And greed in the heart / Heaven having no part / And unsatisfied men.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Lo! I am come to autumn / When all the leaves are gold / Grey hairs and golden leaves cry out / The year and I are old.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: Though / You are like an old / But I see you as a gold / Like an inspiring lamp.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: O brother, purer than pure gold / Is the soil of my land / Her soil and water / Her fruits and flowers / Quench our thirst and hunger.
quotes.author: Kazi Nazrul Islam

quotes.quote: But gold defiles with frequent touch / There's nothing fouls the hand so much / And scholars give it for the cause / Of British Midas' dirty paws.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Midas, we are in story told / Turn'd every thing he touch'd to gold / He chipp'd his bread; the pieces round / Glitter'd like spangles on the ground.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Old hay is equal to old gold / And hence a critic deep maintains / We learn'd to weigh our gold by grains.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: THERE were seventy pillars around the hall / Of wreathed gold was each capital / And the roof was fretted with amber and gems / Such as light kingly diadems.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: Gold on her head, and gold on her feet / And gold where the hems of her kirtle meet / And a golden girdle round my sweet / Ah! qu'elle est belle La Marguerite.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: If I were rich I would kiss her feet / I would kiss the place where the gold hems meet / And the golden kirtle round my sweet / Ah! qu'elle est belle La Marguerite.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote:
When every blessed thing you hold / Is made of silver, or of gold / You long for simple pewter. / When you have nothing else to wear
But cloth of gold and satins rare.
quotes.author: William Schwenck Gilbert

quotes.quote: Few environments are more totally regimented than those of black migrant workers on the South African gold mines. These men sign up at the recruiting stations in their home territories and are then conducted great distances, usually hundreds of miles, to work on the mines.
quotes.author: Dunbar Moodie

quotes.quote: The grade of South African gold ore is poor. What makes mine controllers and investors rich is the huge quantity of ore deep beneath the this South African soil, so that colossal capital investment brings forth dividends as long as costs can be kept down.
quotes.author: Dunbar Moodie

quotes.quote: Unlike any other commodity, gold has a guaranteed international market, but until the early 1970s the price was fixed.
quotes.author: Dunbar Moodie

quotes.quote: New Guinea is a land of much gold, of which the natives make chains and bracelets which the men and women wear on necks and arms, and the men on pommels of their swords.
quotes.author: Iain McCalman

quotes.quote: Gold was the lure that took travellers beyond the beaches of New Guinea. Until world wars came to the region it was the maine reason for mass movements.
quotes.author: Iain McCalman

quotes.quote: Gold digging seemed an addiction, provoking a level of excitement which meant that men lost any sense of other goals or values.
quotes.author: Iain McCalman

quotes.quote: Gold generated capital for other industries and the population boom created markets for other produce, fostering the development of whole sectors of the Australian economy.
quotes.author: Iain McCalman

quotes.quote: Champions of the gold culture claimed that it fostered independence, ingenuity and manliness and praised an envirorment in which the advantages of inherited privilege meant nothing to an individual's chances of success.
quotes.author: Iain McCalman

quotes.quote: The gold rushes have attained an iconic status in the pantheon of epic nation-making events.
quotes.author: Iain McCalman

quotes.quote: Land of the gold where wealth is spread / Around our feet wher'ver tread / Where gold is scarce to labor wed.
quotes.author: Iain McCalman

quotes.quote: Gold illuminated a vision of the future based on liberal democracy, industrialisation and commercial prosperity.
quotes.author: Iain McCalman

quotes.quote: Do not do unto others what you would not want others to do unto you.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The Golden Rule works like gravitation.
