quotes.author: Charles Fletcher Dole

quotes.quote: The golden rule has no place in a political campaign.
quotes.author: John James Ingalls

quotes.quote: The Golden Rule finds no limit of application in business.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.quote: Practicing the Golden Rule is not a sacrifice, it's an investment.
quotes.author: Byllye Avery

quotes.quote: We do teach our kids the golden rule - Do as you would be done by.
quotes.author: Stephen Baxter

quotes.quote: We live by the Golden Rule. Those who have the gold make the rules.
quotes.author: Buzzie Bavasi

quotes.quote: The golden rule of friendship is to listen to others as you would have them listen to you.
quotes.author: David W Augsburger

quotes.quote: The golden rule when reading the menu is, if you cannot pronounce it, you cannot afford it.
quotes.author: Frank Muir

quotes.quote: The golden rule to apply in all such cases is resolutely to refuse to have what millions cannot.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Part of obedience to the Golden Rule is knowing how to respond once you've behaved in an unloving way.
quotes.author: Doug McIntosh

quotes.quote: Follow the Golden Rule. Be kind to your neighbors, love them as much as you would love yourself, do unto others....
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: If you contemplate the Golden Rule, it turns out to be an injunction to live by grace rather than by what you think other people deserve.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: To keep the Golden Rule we must put ourselves in other people's places, but to do that consists in and depends upon picturing ourselves in their places.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: The golden rule of conduct is mutual toleration, seeing that we will never all think alike and we shall always see Truth in fragment and from different points of vision.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The era of Christianity peace, brotherhood, the Golden Rule as applied to governmental matters is. yet to come, and when it comes, then, and then only, will the future of nations be sure.
quotes.author: Lajos Kossuth

quotes.quote: You can have the 'golden rule' do unto others as you would have others do unto you. But then you take it one step farther where you just do good unto others, period. Just for the sake of it.
quotes.author: Jennifer Beals

quotes.quote: Nothing in the Golden Rule says that others will treat us as we have treated them. It only says that we must treat others in a way that we would want to be treated.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: Absolutely speaking, Do unto others as you would that they should do unto you is by no means a golden rule, but the best of current silver. An honest man would have but little occasion for it. It is golden not to have any rule at all in such a case.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Try to treat others as you would want them to treat you.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: The reason for our success is no secret. It comes down to one single principle that transcends time and geography, religion and culture. It’s the Golden Rule – the simple idea that if you treat people well, the way you would like to be treated, they will do the same.
quotes.author: Isadore Sharp

quotes.quote: The need to treat ourselves as well as we treat others. It's women's version of the Golden Rule.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: The Golden Rule works. It really does. Treat people the way you want to be treated. Kindness begets kindness.
quotes.author: Michael J. Silverstein

quotes.quote: The duty of lovers is to tarnish the Golden Rule.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: The golden rule is that there are no golden rules.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Golden rule of life: never underestimate your rivals.
quotes.author: Sid Waddell

quotes.quote: The golden rule is to act fearlessly upon what one believes to be right.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The golden rule for understanding in spiritual matters is not intellect, but obedience.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: There's one golden rule to keep before you: laugh about everything and don't bother yourself about the others!
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Do something everyday that you don't want to do; this is the golden rule for acquiring the habit of doing your duty without pain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We must forgive each other our arising, for our existence always torments others. The golden rule in the midst of this mutual misery has always been, not to do no harm, but as little as possible; and not to love one another, but as much as you can.
quotes.author: Ken Wilber

quotes.quote: The Golden Rule will always be good advice!
quotes.author: Jay Asher

quotes.quote: Generosity is the key to all relationships. To friendships and bands. That's the golden rule.
quotes.author: Tina Weymouth

quotes.quote: A few years ago, the city council of Monza, Italy, barred pet owners from keeping goldfish in curved bowls... saying that it is cruel to keep a fish in a bowl with curved sides because, gazing out, the fish would have a distorted view of reality. But how do we know we have the true, undistorted picture of reality?
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Most times a person grows up gradually, but I found myself in a hurry... Hoping to find an answer, I uncovered an article about the common goldfish. 'Kept in a small bowl, the goldfish will remain small. With more space, the fish will double, triple, or quadruple in size.' It occurred to me then that I was intended for larger things. After all, a giant man can't have an ordinary-sized life.
quotes.author: John August

quotes.quote: Goldfish have no memory, I guess their lives are much like mine. And the little plastic castle is a surprise everytime.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Very few of us have any idea whatsoever of what life is like living in a goldfish bowl,except, of course, for those of us who are goldfish.
quotes.author: Graham Taylor

quotes.quote: We all live in a televised goldfish bowl.
quotes.author: Kingman Brewster Jr.

quotes.quote: I might have been a goldfish in a glass bowl for all the privacy I got
quotes.author: H.H.Munro

quotes.quote: We now have, in effect, reality television. You're in a goldfish bowl, everything you do is being watched. In government these days you come to be much more disciplined in giving what I call a 'running commentary'.
quotes.author: Tom Kelly

quotes.quote: He'd failed them, the swimming goldfish of his life's tiny existence whom he held so dear in his heart; he'd turned his muses into mistakes and no one knew the difference but him.
quotes.author: Luke Taylor

quotes.quote: In my early career I was like a goldfish. Rejection didn't affect me; I'd just forget how bad it was and keep going back for more.
quotes.author: Emily Watson

quotes.quote: For all the bad things people say about the river -- and most people see it as a giant sewer -- the goldfish show the river can sustain life. It makes the whole idea more personal.
quotes.author: Ed Reyes

quotes.quote: No one can feel as helpless as the owner of a sick goldfish
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: If you have any interests you can gain a wider audience for those interests while the goldfish bowl is yours.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: One of the downsides of being famous is that folks pay far more attention to you than they should. American celebrities are constantly under surveillance, and every word they say is subject to scrutiny. So, be careful what you wish for if you desire fame. No human being should be a goldfish.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.quote: A goldfish is reason enough for living, if someone needs a reason.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: I have the financial morals of a goldfish, I can resist everything but temptation.
quotes.author: Ruth St. Denis

quotes.quote: Your husband drinks too much if he says he never drinks alone, but considers the goldfish somebody.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: So I went in to a pet shop. I said, 'Can I buy a goldfish?' The guy said, 'Do you want an aquarium?' I said, 'I don't care what star sign it is.'
quotes.author: Tim Vine

quotes.quote: Like a goldfish in tank, encased in televised transparency. Your insecurities were conspicuous. Writhing within the incognito. You locked yoursekf in
quotes.author: Aarsha Sadar

quotes.quote: Like simple minded goldfish, we often believe the boundaries of our bowl to be the entire ocean.
quotes.author: Laren Grey Umphlett

quotes.quote: I sometimes still feel I am living in a goldfish bowl, but I now manage it better. I still have a naughty streak, too, which I enjoy and is how I relate to those individuals who have got themselves into trouble.
quotes.author: Prince Harry

quotes.quote: I worked as hard to perfect my golf game as any other fellow would work in his brokerage office, in his job as a mechanic in a garage, as a lawyer or as a traveling salesman.
quotes.author: Walter Hagen

quotes.quote: Golf is a game whose aim is to hit a very small ball into an even smaller hole, with weapons singularly ill-designed for the purpose.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Golf is a good walk spoiled.
quotes.author: Mark Twain.

quotes.quote: I regard golf as an expensive way of playing marbles.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton.

quotes.quote: Golf isn't like other sports where you can take a player out if he's having a bad day. You have to play the whole game.
quotes.author: Phil Blackmar.

quotes.quote: The most important shot in golf is the next one.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: Hockey is a sport for white men. Basketball is a sport for black men. Golf is a sport for white men dressed like black pimps.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.quote: If you watch a game, it's fun. If you play at it, it's recreation. If you work at it, it's golf.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: GOLF IS A GAME IN WHICH ONE ENDEAVORS TO CONTROL A BALL WITH IMPLEMENTS ILL ADAPTED FOR THE PURPOSE.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Golf is so popular simply because it is the best game in the world at which to be bad.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: Golf, like the measles, should be caught young, for, if postponed to riper years, the results may be serious.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Golf is like a love affair. If you don't take it seriously, it's no fun; if you do take it seriously, it breaks your heart.
quotes.author: Arthur Daley

quotes.quote: They say golf is like life, but don't believe them. Golf is more complicated than that.
quotes.author: Gardner Dickinson

quotes.quote: Golf tips are like aspirin. One may do you good, but if you swallow the whole bottle, you will be lucky to survive.
quotes.author: Harvey Penick

quotes.quote: Golf is like life in a lot of ways - All the biggest wounds are self-inflicted.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: Golf gives you an insight into human nature, your own as well as your opponent's.
quotes.author: Grantland Rice

quotes.quote: Golf is not just an exercise; it's an adventure, a romance... a Shakespeare play in which disaster and comedy are intertwined.
quotes.author: Harold Segall

quotes.quote: Golf is golf. You hit the ball, you go find it. Then you hit it again.
quotes.author: Lon Hinkle

quotes.quote: Golf is the closest game to the game we call life. You get bad breaks from good shots; you get good breaks from bad shots - but you have to play the ball where it lies.
quotes.author: Bobby Jones

quotes.quote: Golf is assuredly a mystifying game. It would seem that if a person has hit a golf ball correctly a thousand times, he should be able to duplicate the performance at will. But such is certainly not the case.
quotes.author: Bobby Jones

quotes.quote: Golf is deceptively simple and endlessly complicated; it satisfies the soul and frustrates the intellect. It is at the same time rewarding and maddening - and it is without a doubt the greatest game mankind has ever invented.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Golf? is the infallible test. The man who can go into a patch of rough alone, with the knowledge that only God is watching him, and play his ball where it lies, is the man who will serve you faithfully and well.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Golf is not, and never has been, a fair game.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Golf is about how well you accept, respond to, and score with your misses much more so than it is a game of your perfect shots.
quotes.author: Dr Bob Rotella

quotes.quote: Golf is a science, the study of a lifetime, in which you can exhaust yourself but never your subject.
quotes.author: David Forgan

quotes.quote: Golf is good for the soul. You get so mad at yourself you forget to hate your enemies.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Golf is like a razor. You get just so sharp and then it begins to dull a little more the more you use it.
quotes.author: Doug Sanders

quotes.quote: Golf isn't a game, it's a choice that one makes with one's life.
quotes.author: Charles Rosin

quotes.quote: Golf is the loneliest sport. You're completely alone with every conceivable opportunity to defeat yourself. Golf brings out your assets and liabilities as a person. The longer you play, the more certain you are that a man's performance is the outward mani
quotes.author: Hale Irwin

quotes.quote: Golf is a compromise between what your ego wants you to do, what experience tells you to do, and what your nerves let you do.
quotes.author: Bruce Crampton

quotes.quote: Golf is a difficult game, but it's a little easier if you trust your instincts. It's too hard a game to try to play like someone else.
quotes.author: Nancy Lopez

quotes.quote: Success golf depends less on strength of body than upon strength of mind and character.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: I get to play golf for a living. What more can you ask for, getting paid for doing what you love.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.quote: There’s no such thing as bad weather, only inappropriate clothing!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A good golfer has the determination to win and the patience to wait for the breaks.
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.quote: Golf is not, on the whole, a game for realists. By its exactitude of measurements it invites the attention of perfectionists.
quotes.author: Heywood Hale Broun

quotes.quote: It took me seventeen years to get 3,000 hits. I did it in one afternoon on the golf course.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: Reverse every natural instinct and do the opposite of what you are inclined to do and you will probably come very close to having a perfect golf swing.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: Aggressive play is a vital asset of the world’s greatest golfers. However, it’s even more important to the average player. Attack this game in a bold, confident, and determined way, and you’ll make a giant leap toward realizing your full potential as a player.
quotes.author: Greg Norman

quotes.quote: The game has such a hold on golfers because they compete not only against an opponent, but also against the course, against par, and most surely against themselves.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Golf is a game that is played on a five-inch course that's the distance between your ears.
quotes.author: Bobby Jones

quotes.quote: A good player who is a great putter is a match for any golfer. A great hitter who cannot putt is a match for no one.
quotes.author: Ben Sayers

quotes.quote: One of the most fascinating things about golf is how it reflects the cycle of life. No matter what you shoot, the next day you have to go back to the first tee and begin all over again and make yourself into something.
quotes.author: Peter Jacobsen

quotes.quote: One reason golf is such an exasperating game is that a thing we learned is so easily forgotten and we find ourselves struggling year after year with faults we had discovered and corrected time and again.
quotes.author: Bobby Jones

quotes.quote: Golf appeals to the idiot in us and the child. Just how childlike golfers become is proven by their frequent inability to count past five.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: I have a tip that can take five strokes off anyone's golf game. It's called an eraser.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Golf is a fascinating game. It has taken me nearly 40 years to discover that I can't play it.
quotes.author: Ted Ray

quotes.quote: Golf combines two favorite American pastimes, taking long walks and hitting things with a stick.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: When I die, bury me on the golf course so my husband will visit.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A passion, an obsession, a romance, a nice acquaintanceship with trees, sand and water.
quotes.author: Bob Ryan

quotes.quote: The ardent golfer would play Mount Everest if somebody put a flag stick on top.
quotes.author: Pete Dye

quotes.quote: If you're caught on a golf course during a storm and are afraid of lightning, hold up a 1-iron. Not even God can hit a 1-iron.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.quote: I know I am getting better at golf because I'm hitting fewer spectators.
quotes.author: Gerald Ford

quotes.quote: My swing is so bad, I look like a caveman killing his lunch.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.quote: Golf is an awkward set of bodily contortions designed to produce a graceful result.
quotes.author: Tommy Armour

quotes.quote: Golf is a game in which you yell 'fore', shoot six and write down five.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.quote: Golf is the most fun you can have without taking your clothes off.
quotes.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

quotes.quote: It is good sportsmanship not to pick up lost balls while they are still rolling.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The only time my prayers are never answered is on the golf course.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: They call it golf because all the other four letter words were taken.
quotes.author: Ray Floyd

quotes.quote: Concentration comes out of a combination of confidence and hunger.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Golf is not, on the whole, a game for realists. By its exactitude's of measurements, it invites the attention of perfectionists.
quotes.author: Heywood Hale Broun

quotes.quote: Golf can best be defined as an endless series of tragedies obscured by the occasional miracle.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't play too much golf. Two rounds a day are plenty.
quotes.author: Harry Vardon

quotes.quote: The golf swing is like a suitcase into which we are trying to pack one too many things.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Golf's three ugliest words. Still your shot.
quotes.author: Dave Marr

quotes.quote: The older you get, the stronger the wind gets and it's always in your face.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Golf is a day spent in a round of strenuous idleness.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: If a lot of people gripped a knife and fork the way they do a golf club, they'd starve to death.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: If a lot of people gripped a knife and fork the way they do a golf club, they'd starve to death.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: Golf is a lot of walking, broken up by disappointment and bad arithmetic.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Man blames fate for other accidents, but feels personally responsible for a hole in one.
quotes.author: Martha Beckman

quotes.quote: Golf is life. If you can't take golf, you can't take life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Correct me if I'm wrong, Sandy, but if I kill all the golfers they'll lock me and up and throw away the key.
quotes.author: Carl Spackler

quotes.quote: Give me the fresh air, a beautiful partner, and a nice round of golf, and you can keep the fresh air and the round of golf.
quotes.author: Jack Benny

quotes.quote: It is almost impossible to remember how tragic a place this world is when one is playing golf.
quotes.author: Robert Lynd

quotes.quote: If profanity had an influence on the flight of the ball, the game of golf would be played far better than it is.
quotes.author: Horace G. Hutchinson

quotes.quote: We need not destroy the past. It is gone.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: The wisdom of age is bitter when those you have failed have gone.
quotes.author: Conn Iggulden

quotes.quote: Not lost, but gone before.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to forget what's gone, appreciate what still remains, and look forward to what's coming next.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Don't make someone your everything because when their gone you have nothing.
quotes.author: Chelse

quotes.quote: The day is gone, and all its sweets are gone!
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: When resistance is gone, the demons are gone.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Gone. The saddest word in the language. In any language.
quotes.author: Mark Slouka

quotes.quote: When its gone, you'll know what a gift love was. you'll suffer like this. So go back and fight to keep it.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: Whatever with the past has gone, The best is always yet to come.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.quote: They are all gone into the world of light, and I alone sit lingering here.
quotes.author: Henry Vaughan

quotes.quote: Nothing is ever the same twice because everything is always gone forever, and yet each moment has infinite photographic possibilities.
quotes.author: Michael Kenna

quotes.quote: Yesterday's gone on down the river and you can't get it back.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.quote: Yesterday is gone and took away its tale. Today we must live a fresh story again.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: I imagine one of the reasons people cling to their hates so stubbornly is because they sense, once hate is gone, they will be forced to deal with pain.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: Don't cry when the sun is gone, because the tears won't let you see the stars.
quotes.author: Violeta Parra

quotes.quote: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The world has always gone through periods of madness so as to advance a bit on the road to reason.
quotes.author: Hermann Broch

quotes.quote: You are nothing but a number of days, and whenever a day passes away, a part of you passes away
quotes.author: Al-Hasan al-Basri

quotes.quote: The past is gone. The future never arrives. In truth, there is no life outside of this moment!
quotes.author: Leonard Jacobson

quotes.quote: It takes time, or does time take it?
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: What's gone, and what's past help, Should be past grief.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Holding onto something that's gone only makes a sickness inside.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: May be you are gone,but that doesn’t make me come back.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: It is queer to be in a place when someone has gone. It is not two other places, the place that they were there in, and the place that was there before they came. I can't get used to this third place or to staying behind.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: People say you don't know what you've got until it's gone...truth is, you knew what you had, you just thought you'd never lose it.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: It’s hard to know when you’ve been holding on to something until you finally let it go, or it leaves of its own accord.
quotes.author: Sara Wolf

quotes.quote: Every second that passes is another grain of sand in your hourglass that is gone, forever lost in time.
quotes.author: Nyki Mack

quotes.quote: If you cry because the sun has gone out of your life, your tears will prevent you from seeing the stars.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Don't part with your illusions. When they are gone, you may still exist, but you have ceased to live.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I've never seen such a hunger in people for spiritual things. People realize the past is gone, the future is uncertain, and the present seems to be hopeless. As a result, many were open to God.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: What I spent, is gone; what I kept, I lost; but what I gave away will be mine forever.
quotes.author: Ethel Percy Andrus

quotes.quote: For shelter is gone when the night is o'ver, and bread lasts only a day / But the touch of the hand and the sound of the voice / Live on in the soul always.
quotes.author: Spencer M. Free

quotes.quote: It's just like magic. When you live by yourself, all your annoying habits are gone!
quotes.author: Merrill Markoe

quotes.quote: Lost, yesterday, somewhere between sunrise and sunset, two golden hours, each set with sixty diamond minutes. No reward is offered, for they are gone forever.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: The worst thing you can do is to try to cling to something that's gone, or to recreate it.
quotes.author: Johnette Napolitano

quotes.quote: Many a friend was lost through a joke, but none was ever gained so.
quotes.author: Czechoslovakian Proverb

quotes.quote: Day is done, gone the sun / From the lake, from the hills, from the sky; / All is well, safely rest, God is nigh.
quotes.author: General Daniel Butterfield

quotes.quote: The bloom is gone, and with the bloom go I!
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: Old age is like being engaged in a war. All our friends are going or gone and we survive amongst the dead and dying as on a battlefield.
quotes.author: Muriel Spark

quotes.quote: The anger of a meek man is like fire struck out of steel, hard to be got out, and when got out, soon gone.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Sensed a wrongness around me, like an alarm clock that had gone off without being set.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Had gone completely bald very young as though to get that over with as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Helen Hudson

quotes.quote: Some businesses are like desert flowers. They bloom overnight, and they're gone.
quotes.author: George Morrow

quotes.quote: We end our years like a sigh... for it is speedily gone, and we fly away.
quotes.author: The Holy Bible/Psalms

quotes.quote: How fading are the joys we dote upon! Like apparitions seen and gone.
quotes.author: John Norris

quotes.quote: Perhaps my best years are gone ... but I wouldn't want them back. Not with the fire that's in me now.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: My days are in the yellow leaf; / The flowers and fruits of love are gone; / The worm, the canker, and the grief / Are mine alone!
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: I have had playmates, I have had companions, / In my days of childhood, in my joyful school-days,— / All, all are gone, the old familiar faces.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Today the man is here; tomorrow he is gone. And when he is 'out of sight', quickly also is he out of mind.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: I couldn't have done it otherwise, gone on I mean. I could not have gone on through the awful wretched mess of life without having left a stain upon the silence.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: I do not know where / Your beautiful face has gone. / There are only peach blossoms / Flying in the spring wind.
quotes.author: Kenneth Rexroth

quotes.quote: Any man may be in good spirits and good temper when he's well dressed.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: It is good to love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is well done.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The evil that men do lives after them;The good is oft interred with their bones.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: This time, like all times, is a very good time - if we but know what to do with it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Good words are worth much, and cost little.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: When a good man is hurt, all who would be called good must suffer with him.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A good horse makes short miles.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: A good king knows when to save his strength and when to destroy his enemies.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: The good of man is the active exercise of his souls faculties in conformity with excellence or virtue, or if there be several human excellences or virtues, in conformity with the best and most perfect among them.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Life comes from physical survival; but the good life comes from what we care about.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: It's good to have money and the things that money will buy, but it's good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven't lost the things that money won't buy.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.quote: Making good judgments when one has complete data, facts, and knowledge is not leadership - it's bookkeeping.
quotes.author: Dee Hock

quotes.quote: Law is order, and good law is good order.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: A good character is the best tombstone. Those who loved you and were helped by you will remember you when forget-me-nots have withered. Carve your name on hearts, not on marble.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Good ideas often take wings and fly beyond our reach, while bad ones will cling to us like barnacles to a vessel.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: A good compromise, a good piece of legislation, is like a good sentence; or a good piece of music. Everybody can recognize it. They say, "Huh. It works. It makes sense.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The good life is a process, not a state of being. It is a direction not a destination.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.quote: A good many things go around in the dark besides Santa Claus.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Wishing good, merely, is a lukewarm charity; but doing good is divine.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.quote: A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The work an unknown good man has done is like a vein of water flowing hidden underground, secretly making the ground green.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: If you can't make it good, at least make it look good.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: At the end of the day it's not â€˜what looks good' that matters, it's â€˜what feels' good.
quotes.author: Maddy Malhotra

quotes.quote: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.
quotes.author: Saint Basil

quotes.quote: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: No beauty shines brighter than that of a good heart.
quotes.author: Shanina Shaik

quotes.quote: That man is good who does good to others; if he suffers on account of the good he does, he is very good; if he suffers at the hands of those to whom he has done good, then his goodness is so great that it could be enhanced only by greater sufferings; and if he should die at their hands, his virtue can go no further: it is heroic, it is perfect.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyère

quotes.quote: If you would not cease to love mankind you must not cease to do them good.
quotes.author: Marie Dubsky

quotes.quote: The afternoon knows what the morning never suspected.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Home may be where the heart is but it's no place to spend Wednesday afternoon.
quotes.author: Walker Percy

quotes.quote: Nobody looks at the moon in the afternoon, and this is the moment when it would most require our attention, since its existence is still in doubt.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: There is nothing so wrong in this world that a sensible woman can't set it right in the course of an afternoon.
quotes.author: Giraudoux

quotes.quote: There is still nothing in life as constant and as changing at the same time as an afternoon at a ballpark.
quotes.author: Larry King

quotes.quote: You cannot plant an acorn in the morning, and expect that afternoon to sit in the shade of an oak.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: A dead afternoon in a dark bar was not the worst of fates.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: A frozen daiquiri of a scorching afternoon is soothing. It makes living more tolerable.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: The afternoon of a human life must also have a significance of its own, and cannot be merely a pitiful appendage to life's morning.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Time pulses from the afternoon like blood from a serious wound.
quotes.author: Hilma Wolitzer

quotes.quote: Mornings belong to whatever is new. The current composition. Afternoons are for naps and letters.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Never draw more in the morning than you can erase in the afternoon.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The afternoon is not only the middle of the day it is the time to complete our essential task and go ahead in life.
quotes.author: Shashikant Shinde

quotes.quote: Be bright like the afternoon sun and let everyone who sees you feel inspired by all the great things you do. You have one life here on earth. Make it count in whatever way you can.
quotes.author: Delna Rose

quotes.quote: Are you stuck again on an afternoon with nothing to do? Start with your dreams, decide where you want to be and create a plan to reach there. Every little step will lead you closer to your destiny.
quotes.author: John Ross

quotes.quote: It is the end of a fine bronze-tinted afternoon with purple shadows and febrile scraps of cloud.
quotes.author: Daniel Arsand

quotes.quote: Leave me a smile just warm enough to spend a million golden afternoons in.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: Good afternoon guys, just remember that no matter where you are right now focus and a positive mindset can lead you to where you want to be in life.
quotes.author: Allan Thicke

quotes.quote: Sometimes I reminisce about the chances I missed on a dull afternoon. Then I remind myself that I am not here by accident and I can still have opportunities to own. I take up a wining attitude and win through the day.
quotes.author: Oregon Mass

quotes.quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best. Good Afternoon.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: I would just like to mention Robert Houdin who in the eighteen century inventented the vanishing birdcage trick and the theater matinee - may he rot and perish. Good afternoon.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: As you climb the ladder of success, check occasionally to make sure it is leaning against the right wall. Good Afternoon and Good Day!
quotes.author: Swati Khare

quotes.quote: You could get a simple idea one afternoon that could completely change your life. Great innovators just needed one idea to change everything. Keep striving and you will reach success.
quotes.author: Doreen Bill

quotes.quote: Learning history is so easy but making history is so difficult. Make a history of yourself and make others to learn it! Good Afternoon!
quotes.author: Vrishab

quotes.quote: Under certain circumstances there are few hours in life more agreeable than the hour dedicated to the ceremony known as afternoon tea.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: If i was a dove i wud daily bring you peace. A sheep I would bring you miracles, an angel I would bring you love, but since I'm only human I can only wish you the best. Good afternoon.
quotes.author: Mundia Andy

quotes.quote: Afternoons are hard. Mornings are pure evil from the pits of hell, which is why I don't do them anymore.
quotes.author: Rachel Caine

quotes.quote: It is the still, yellow kind of afternoon when one is apt to get stuck in a dream if one sits very quiet.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: You'd think with its meteorological history, that the English language could have thought up another greeting, wouldn't you? ' said Larry. 'It's perfectly preposterous to say 'good afternoon' on a day whose climatic conditions could make even Noah worry.
quotes.author: Gerald Durell

quotes.quote: Yes; I remember Adlestrop— / The name because one afternoon / Of heat the express-train drew up there / Unwontedly. It was late June.
quotes.author: Edward Thomas

quotes.quote: Jellicoe was the only man on either side who could lose the war in an afternoon.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Summer afternoon— summer afternoon; the two most beautiful words in the English language.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Millions long for the immortality who don't' know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon.
quotes.author: Susan Ertz

quotes.quote: At five in the afternoon. / It was exactly five in the afternoon. / A boy brought the white sheet / at five in the afternoon.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.quote: Each Friday afternoon, we tasted wines from across the globe and gleaned knowledge from the best instructors and guest lecturers from the wine industry.
quotes.author: Kate Fiduccia

quotes.quote: The afternoon with my parents was a beautiful sunny day that began with a tour of the historic winery in the morning.
quotes.author: Kate Fiduccia

quotes.quote: At the time of day when the afternoon draws close to twilight, my memory floats back to the pristine days of my childhood in the early 1980s.
quotes.author: Jodi-Anne Williams-Rogers

quotes.quote: During this late afternoons, the hot South African sun tinted the day with an ochre hue, as if to hint that the lounge was now sufficiently warmed for us to enjoy a leisurely afternoon in it.
quotes.author: Jodi-Anne Williams-Rogers

quotes.quote: What I most enjoyed about this afternoon tea sessions was it was a time when my grandfather would engage our inquisitive young minds in discussions about anything under the sun.
quotes.author: Jodi-Anne Williams-Rogers

quotes.quote: The afternoon tea tradition is something I hope to carry forward with my own children and perhaps my grandchildren someday.
quotes.author: Jodi-Anne Williams-Rogers

quotes.quote: That's the way we all feel about conservation— it won't come this afternoon, but we ought to get started this afternoon, if it's ever going to come.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: A people without history. / Is not redeemed from time, for history is a pattern / Of timeless moments. So while the light fails / On a winter's afternoon, in a secluded chapel / History is now and England.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: The morning cup of coffee has an exhilaration about it with the cheering influence of the afternoon or evening cup of tea cannot be expected to reproduce.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Bliss...as though you'd suddenly swallowed a bright piece of that afternoon sun and it burned in your bosom, sending out a little shower of sparks into every particle.
quotes.author: Kathine Mansfield

quotes.quote: I felt like I could see and hear everything. When I crossed the finish line that afternoon, I felt glorious, like I was going to live forever.
quotes.author: David Hobler

quotes.quote: Each day brings two low tides and two high tides, but not always at the same time. Low tide shifts forward approximately an hour each day, moving from morning to noon to afternoon to evening over a period of time.
quotes.author: Hal Higdon

quotes.quote: There comes a time late in the afternoon when the light is just so and my circadian rhythms are at exactly at a certain point, when the only solid thought in my mind is to run.
quotes.author: Alison Townsend

quotes.quote: The afternoon glow is brightening the bamboos, the fountains are bubbling with delight, the soughing of the pine is heard in our kettle.
quotes.author: Okakura Kakuzō

quotes.quote: In the afternoon we / returned the same way, / And had the picture in our minds of magnificent regions of space / and mountain not seen before.
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: Alone far in the wilds and mountains I hunt, / Wandering amazed at my own lightness and glee, / In the late afternoon choosing a safe spot to pass the night, / Kindling a fire and broiling the fresh-kill'd game, / Falling asleep on the gather'd leaves with my dog and gun by my side.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: What vague, delicious dreams, / Born of this golden hour of afternoon, / And air balm-freighted, fill the soul with bliss, / Transpierced like yonder clouds with lustrous gleams, / Fantastic, brief as they, and, like them, spun / Of gilded nothingness!
quotes.author: Emma Lazarus

quotes.quote: However, football’s so hard it is almost a sin / Victory takes time / More than flipping a dime / If it were so easy why / Waste a Sunday afternoon.
quotes.author: Robert Curran

quotes.quote: Good mourning, good afternoon, good night / What have you done with your life? / Everybody time comes to be embraced by the light / You only scared to die when you ain't livin right, man / I'm puttin up a hellafied fight.	Good mourning, good afternoon, good night / What have you done with your life? / Everybody time comes to be embraced by the light / You only scared to die when you ain't livin right, man / I'm puttin up a hellafied fight.
quotes.author: Talib Kweli Greene

quotes.quote: Tell me what am I supposed to do / While you got me sitting here waiting on you / Baby hurry hurry come back / And give me some lovin' this afternoon / And give me some lovin' this afternoon / 'Cause I can't wait to see you smile / Could you stay a little while / And do the things that only lovers do.
quotes.author: Meanie F. Hallim

quotes.quote: Good afternoon baby / I sure missed you while I was gone / But you know I got to work honey / Hey, let's just do something later on.
quotes.author: Chris Rogers

quotes.quote: Good mornin', good afternoon / Summer's in the rear, now we crafting tunes / Imagine how many stacks to relax the goons / Who be after that harvest that done lapsed in June.
quotes.author: Raheem De Vaughn

quotes.quote: Inside each of us, there is the seed of both good and evil. It's a constant struggle as to which one will win. And one cannot exist without the other.
quotes.author: Eric Burdon

quotes.quote: Each of us has a vision of good and of evil. We have to encourage people to move towards what they think is good... Everyone has his own idea of good and evil and must choose to follow the good and fight evil as he conceives them. That would be enough to make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Life is neither good or evil, but only a place for good and evil.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The battleline between good and evil runs through the heart of every man.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: I like to see the difference between good and evil as kind of like the foul line at a baseball game. It's very thin, it's made of something very flimsy like lime, and if you cross it, it really starts to blur where fair becomes foul and foul becomes fair.
quotes.author: Harlan Coben

quotes.quote: There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burk

quotes.quote: To see evil and call it good, mocks God. Worse, it makes goodness meaningless. A word without meaning is an abomination, for when the word passes beyond understanding the very thing the word stands for passes out of the world and cannot be recalled.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Lawhead

quotes.quote: Good and Evil are very hard to explain or understand. I'm sure that evil exists, but it is hard to isolate. Good and evil are intertwined and impossible to separate. They are not completely opposites and in fact are often one and the same.
quotes.author: Keith Haring

quotes.quote: Men who believe in good and evil, and who believe that good should win, should watch for those moments when it is possible to play God
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: People aren't evil and people aren't good. They live how they can one day at a time. They come out of dust they go back to dust, dusty feet, no wings, and whose fault is that?
quotes.author: Caryl Churchill

quotes.quote: In many cases, it is very hard to fix the bounds of Good and Evil, because these part, as Day and Night, which are separated by Twilight.
quotes.author: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.quote: There is no reason why good cannot triumph as often as evil. The triumph of anything is a matter of organization. If there are such things as angels, I hope that they are organized along the lines of the Mafia.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.

quotes.quote: Evil is always possible. And goodness is eternally difficult.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: Nature, in her indifference, makes no distinction between good and evil.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Let no man be sorry he has done good, because others have done evil.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.
quotes.author: St. Paul

quotes.quote: Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: In any compromise between good and evil, it is only evil that can profit.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: He who chases monsters must see that he not become a monster himself.
quotes.author: Rafael Perez

quotes.quote: All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is that good men do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Goodness is the only investment which never fails.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The only good is knowledge and the only evil is ignorance.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The web of our life is of a mingled yarn, good and ill together.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Them meaning of good and bad, of better and worse, is simply helping or hurting.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Evil comes at leisure like the disease. Good comes in a hurry like the doctor.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: Non-cooperation with evil is as much a duty as is cooperation with good.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: What would our world be like if we ceased to worry about 'right' and 'wrong,' or 'good' and 'evil,' and simply acted so as to maximize well-being, our own and that of others? Would we lose anything important?
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: For good and evil, man is a free creative spirit. This produces the very queer world we live in, a world in continuous creation and therefore continuous change and insecurity.
quotes.author: Joyce Cary

quotes.quote: Good and evil, reward and punishment, are the only motives to a rational creature: these are the spur and reins whereby all mankind are set on work, and guided
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: The really difficult moral issues arise, not from a confrontation of good and evil, but from a collision between two goods
quotes.author: Irving Kristol

quotes.quote: Willing or preferring is the same with respect to good and evil, that judging is with respect to truth or falsehood.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: All good ends can be worked out by good means. Those that cannot, are bad; and may be counted so at once, and left alone.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: She was beginning to understand that evil is not absolute, and that good is often an occasion more than a condition.
quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

quotes.quote: Are there, infinitely varying with each individual, inbred forces of Good and Evil in all of us, deep down below the reach of mortal encouragement and mortal repression -- hidden Good and hidden Evil, both alike at the mercy of the liberating opportunity and the sufficient temptation?
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.quote: A belief in a supernatural source of evil is not necessary; men alone are quite capable of every wickedness.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: The good ended happily, and the bad unhappily. That is what Fiction means.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, at all the times you can, to all the people you can, as long as ever you can.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: I see the triumph of good over evil as a manifestation of the error-correcting process of evolution.
quotes.author: Jonas Salk

quotes.quote: Evil spreads with the wind; truth is capable of speading even against it.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Men do not differ much about what things they will call evils; they differ enormously about what evils they will call excusable.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: War may sometimes be a necessary evil. But no matter how necessary, it is always an evil, never a good. We will not learn how to live together in peace by killing each other's children.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: There has to be evil so that good can prove its purity above it.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: To know the difference between good and evil, you need to have been through good and evil, therefor be good and evil.
quotes.author: Magdalena Leska

quotes.quote: For every life and every act consequence of good and evil can be shown and as in time results of many deeds are blended so good and evil in the end become confounded.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Life is neither a good nor an evil: it is a field for good and evil
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The sad truth is that most evil is done by people who never make up their minds to be good or evil.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Remember only the good, the bad will never forget you.
quotes.author: Doug Horton

quotes.quote: To rid ourselves of our shadows -- who we are -- we must step into either total light or total darkness. Goodness and evil.
quotes.author: Jeremy P. Johnson

quotes.quote: The Supreme end of education is expert discernment in all things -- the power to tell the good from the bad, the genuine from the counterfeit, and to prefer the good and the genuine to the bad and the counterfeit.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Good and evil appear to be joined in every culture at the spine.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: False words are not only evil in themselves, but they infect the soul with evil.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: What is done out of love always occurs beyond good and evil.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: When you feel you cannot do good, at least desist from doing evil.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: The tree of Knowledge is a Tree of Knowledge of good and evil.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: All governments are in equal measure good and evil. The best ideal is anarchy.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: I could not understand why men who knew all about good and evil could hate and kill each other.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.quote: I am in politics because of the conflict between good and evil, and I believe that in the end good will triumph.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Good and evil, right and wrong were invented for the ordinary average man, the inferior man, because he needs them.
quotes.author: John Dall

quotes.quote: If your religion doesn't teach you the difference between good and evil, your religion is worse than useless.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Everyone has the power of choosing good and evil.
quotes.author: Origen

quotes.quote: A good End cannot sanctify evil Means, nor must we ever do Evil, that Good may come of it.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Wisdom we know is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two.
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.quote: The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Life's neither a good nor an evil, it's a field for good and evil.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: If men were born free, they would, so long as they remained free, form no conception of good and evil.
quotes.author: Benedict de Spinoza

quotes.quote: The most painful moral struggles are not those between good and evil, but between the good and the lesser good.
quotes.author: Barbara Grizzuti Harrison

quotes.quote: Compassion alone stands apart from the continuous traffic between good and evil proceeding within us.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: It was from out the rind of one apple tasted, that the knowledge of good and evil, as two twins cleaving together, leaped forth into the world.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: We are what we are. Nothing more, nothing less. There is good and evil among every kind of people. It's the evil among us who rule now.
quotes.author: Anne Bishop

quotes.quote: You can't be afraid to do good in case evil results.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word in reality. This is why right, temporarily defeated, is stronger than evil triumphant.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: No man chooses evil because it's evil. He only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: Good people know about both good and evil. Bad people do not know about either.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: God didn't give Adam and Eve the right to decide what was good and evil. He gave them the right to choose between good and evil.
quotes.author: Mark Hart

quotes.quote: The world is a dangerous place to live, not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is an old illusion, which is called good and evil.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To reject this inhuman Communist ideology is simply to be a human being. Such a rejection is more than a political act. It is a protest of our souls against those who would have us forget the concepts of good and evil.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Good and evil exist only in terms of the happiness or suffering they create in ourselves or in other people.
quotes.author: Matthieu Ricard

quotes.quote: I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary, the evil it does is permanent.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Good and evil both increase at compound interest.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The battle between good and evil is endlessly fascinating because we are participants every day.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Good and evil thoughts are each a potent power, and they fill the universe.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Good and evil are polar concepts, one can't exist without the other.
quotes.author: Bruno Dumont

quotes.quote: I think that one of the compelling themes of fiction is this confrontation between good and evil.
quotes.author: William Styron

quotes.quote: All names of good and evil are images, they do not speak out, they only hint. He is a fool who seeks knowledge from them.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If there is no God, the labels good and evil are merely opinions. They are substitutes for I like it and I don't like it. They are not objective realities.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Everything good is the transmutation of something evil, every god has a devil for a father.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A good thing which prevents us from enjoying a greater good is in truth an evil.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Let us keep courage and try to be patient and gentle. And let us not mind being eccentric, and make distinction between good and evil.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Life is not happening to you. Life is responding to you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Positive thinking is powerful thinking. If you want happiness, fulfillment, success and inner peace, start thinking you have the power to achieve those things. Focus on the bright side of life and expect positive results.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Feeling good about yourself is not the same thing as doing good. Good policy is more important than good feelings.
quotes.author: Theodore Dalrymple

quotes.quote: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
quotes.author: Herm Albright

quotes.quote: The longer I live, the more I realize the impact of attitude on life.
quotes.author: Charles R Swindoll

quotes.quote: Good attitudes among players do not guarantee a team's success, but bad attitudes guarantee it's failure.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: In the depth of winter I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Live your everyday extraordinary!
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: A good attitude is really important. And a sense of optimism, someone who has ideas and isn't afraid to pitch them no matter what level she is. Someone who is proactive. Someone with efficiency and common sense. They don't always go hand-in-hand, common sense and, well, everything else.
quotes.author: Eva Chen

quotes.quote: Positive thinking is a good attitude to have. But positive thinking without any skills is a load of crap.
quotes.author: Conrad Dobler

quotes.quote: Be yourself and you can be anything.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: If you can quit, quit. If you can't quit, stop complaining this is what you chose.
quotes.author: J.A. Konrath

quotes.quote: It is very important to generate a good attitude, a good heart, as much as possible. From this, happiness in both the short term and the long term for both yourself and others will come.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Our beliefs about what we are and what we can be precisely determine what we can be.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
quotes.author: Joan Lunden

quotes.quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: If your attitude toward the world is good, you will obtain good results. If your attitude is excellent, excellent will your results.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: What is the difference between an obstacle and an opportunity? Our attitude toward it. Every opportunity has a difficulty, and every difficulty has an opportunity.
quotes.author: J. Sidlow Baxter

quotes.quote: A positive attitude may not solve all our problems but that is the only option we have if we want to get out of problems.
quotes.author: Subodh Gupta

quotes.quote: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect It's successful outcome.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Start your day with good intentions and set yourself up for a good attitude. It's not what happens to you that matters but how you respond.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: If you don't get everything you want, think of the things you don't get that you don't want.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: An idea, when lighted, often glows to illuminate other ideas.
quotes.author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quotes.quote: Our attitudes control our lives. Attitudes are a secret power working twenty-four hours a day, for good or bad. It is of paramount importance that we know how to harness and control this great force.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: The only difference between a good day and a bad day is your attitude.
quotes.author: Dennis S. Brown

quotes.quote: The block of granite which was an obstacle in the pathway of the weak, became a stepping-stone in the pathway of the strong.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Never give up. Things may be hard, but if you quit trying they'll never get better. Stop worrying and start trusting God. It will be worth it.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: The one good thing about failure is that it makes you consider doing things a different way.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Your attitude is an expression of your values, beliefs and expectations.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Acceptance is the act of embracing what life presents to you with a good attitude.
quotes.author: Cherie Carter-Scott

quotes.quote: Don't promote negativity online and expect people to treat you with positivity in person.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.quote: Positive thinking is powerful thinking.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a wrong turn to get you to the right place.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Keeping your attitude positive gives you resilience, or bounce back ability, when the tough challenges come along.
quotes.author: William DeFoore

quotes.quote: Your attitude is the basic lens or frame through which you can see yourself, the world, and other people. You can have a positive attitude that shapes your life in positive ways!
quotes.author: Stan Toler

quotes.quote: A credible reputation is often considered another name for good character.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: Character becomes good or bad based upon whether people decide to fashion their decisions and choices around or around hate.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: If someone's character and reputation are fit together like interlocking rings, the part that interlocks is called personality.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: Whatever we do to make us 'be better' (such as through peace and happiness) - and not just 'feel better' - represents a good character trait.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: Good character was founded on a person's proper interactions with people in things such as harmony, fair play and doing what is in the best interest of all concerned.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Bailey

quotes.quote: Kindness is a good character trait, a virtue.
quotes.author: Peter Goldie

quotes.quote: The key to success lies in having a strong personality.
quotes.author: Peter Goldie

quotes.quote: The personality trait is also a key determinant of good leadership.
quotes.author: Peter Goldie

quotes.quote: No magic is required to build a positive personality.
quotes.author: Peter Goldie

quotes.quote: A person of good character is unlikely to do something unethical, immoral or illegal.
quotes.author: Susan K. Maciak

quotes.quote: Good character is having the will power to avoid behavior that would embarrass or reflect negatively on you.
quotes.author: Susan K. Maciak

quotes.quote: A person's reputation most often comes from his or her character.
quotes.author: Susan K. Maciak

quotes.quote: Honesty, integrity and courage are all examples of good character.
quotes.author: Susan K. Maciak

quotes.quote: A person's reputation most often comes from his or her character.
quotes.author: Susan K. Maciak

quotes.quote: Suppressing one's anger is a sign of good character.
quotes.author: Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

quotes.quote: A responsible person always sets a good example for others.
quotes.author: Bruce Glassman.

quotes.quote: Setting a good example is mostly about having your actions reflect on you character-instead of just words.
quotes.author: Bruce Glassman.

quotes.quote: We found habitually happy people have a very distinctive way of looking at the world that fuels their ever present joy and helps them from pain and distress.
quotes.author: Michele Moore

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to be happy and live an enjoyable, fulfilling life. Happiness is a universal human goal and desire.
quotes.author: Michele Moore

quotes.quote: Happiness is just like any other goal, you have to know what it is, how it works and what to do to achieve it.
quotes.author: Michele Moore

quotes.quote: You can't become a happy person or build a happier life without a clear understanding of what happiness is, what it means to you and what steps you can take to be happier.
quotes.author: Michele Moore

quotes.quote: Good attitude involves not only how we see the world around us, but also how we interpret situation, circumstances, and the actions of others.
quotes.author: Roger Fritz

quotes.quote: A positive attitude without interaction is meaningless.
quotes.author: Roger Fritz

quotes.quote: Building a positive attitude begins with having confidence in yourself. Confidence reinforces ability, doubles energy, strengthens mental faculties, and increases power.
quotes.author: Roger Fritz

quotes.quote: Constant affirmation increases courage, and courage is the backbone of confidence.
quotes.author: Roger Fritz

quotes.quote: Maintaining a positive attitude uncovers hidden abilities and calls up untapped resources.
quotes.author: Roger Fritz

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy. But with self-confidence you can succeed.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Those who give up the things they love doing and do well lose their purpose in life.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: It's so important to keep doing things of value, making progress, bringing beauty or utility to others, helping out, and shaping the world around you, even after your 'official' professional activity has ended.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: Less is more when it comes to eating for long life, too. According to the 80 percent rule, in order to stay healthier longer, we should eat a little less than our hunger demands instead of stuffing ourselves.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: Friends are the best medicine, there for confiding worries over a good chat, sharing stories that brighten your day, getting advice, having fun, dreaming. In other words, living.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: The body you move through life in needs a bit of daily maintenance to keep it running for a long time. Plus, exercise releases hormones that make us feel happy.
quotes.author: Héctor García

quotes.quote: Developing a cheerful disposition ca permit as atmosphere wherein one's spirit can be nurtured and encouraged to blossom and bear fruit. Being pessimistic and negative about our experiences will not enhance the quality of our lives. A determination to be of good cheer can help us and those around us to enjoy life more fully.
quotes.author: Barbara Winder

quotes.quote: Instead of worrying, think about good things for our loved ones.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Whatever your path in life, if you can rely on yourself and have self confidence you succeed and be happy.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Keeping your promises is a key of being trustworthy. When you make a promise to someone, you create a reason for that person to rely on you.
quotes.author: Bruce Glassman

quotes.quote: When you make an important promise to yourself, you also have an obligation to fulfill it.
quotes.author: Bruce Glassman

quotes.quote: Making promises can be very easy. Keeping them is the hard part. So what can a trustworthy person do to stay as reliable as possible? For one thing, a reliable person avoids unwise commitments.
quotes.author: Bruce Glassman

quotes.quote: Good character traits are called virtues, and bad ones are called vices.
quotes.author: Christopher Panza

quotes.quote: Most people would like to be admirable and not deplorable.
quotes.author: Christopher Panza

quotes.quote: Having a good character means that you're driven to behave in virtuous ways in situations that call for virtuous responses.
quotes.author: Christopher Panza

quotes.quote: I love positive attitude because I believe having the right attitude in life is what separates winners from losers--those who want to be successful from those who are successful.
quotes.author: Ryan C. Lowe

quotes.quote: If there is anything you want to change in your world, change your attitude toward it.
quotes.author: Ryan C. Lowe

quotes.quote: Being positive is a habit. It takes time to realize all the negative thoughts, words, and actions you use in daily life. You must learn to recognize when you're being negative.
quotes.author: Ryan C. Lowe

quotes.quote: Good behavior is the last refuge of mediocrity.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: Good behavior wins even an enemy.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Good behavior is everybody's business, and good taste can be everyone's goal.
quotes.author: Millicent Fenwick

quotes.quote: Good manners are a part of good morals.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: Observe decorum, and it will open a path to morality.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: To help someone in need is not charity it is proper etiquette.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: The standard of good behavior for the continuance in office of the judicial magistracy is certainly one of the most valuable of the modern improvements in the practice of government.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: Good conduct arises out of good doctrine.
quotes.author: John Stott

quotes.quote: Good manners require space and time.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: Good manners are a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Dick Francis

quotes.quote: Good manners can render even virtue tolerable.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Good manners are not bred in moments, but in years.
quotes.author: Julia McNair Wright

quotes.quote: Good manners spring from just one thing - kind impulses.
quotes.author: Elsa Maxwell

quotes.quote: Good manners will open doors that the best education cannot.
quotes.author: Clarence Thomas

quotes.quote: Good manners without sincerity are like a beautiful dead lady.
quotes.author: Yukteswar Giri

quotes.quote: Making the extra effort to say thanks in a genuine, personal manner goes a long way. It is pleasurable to do, and it encourages more of the same good behavior.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Etiquette means behaving yourself a little better than is absolutely essential.
quotes.author: Will Cuppy

quotes.quote: Etiquette is the ceremonial code of polite life, more voluminous and minute in each portion of society according to its rank.
quotes.author: John Ramsay McCulloch

quotes.quote: In Buddhism we have a great deal of etiquette. Etiquette is simply ways of living to conserve energy. Etiquette allows people to live in harmony with their environment.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: People are always good company when they are doing what they really enjoy.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Good company and good discourse are the very sinews of virtue.
quotes.author: Izaak Walton

quotes.quote: A man has to live with himself, and he should see to it that he always has good company.
quotes.author: Charles Evans Hughes

quotes.quote: A book is good company. It is full of conversation without loquacity. It comes to your longing with full instruction, but pursues you never.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Good company, lively conversation, and the endearments of friendship fill the mind with great pleasure.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Keep good company, and you shall be of the number.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: A man should think less of what he eats and more with whom he eats because no food is so satisfying as good company.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Good company will always be found much less expensive than bad.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Books are good company, in sad times and happy times, for books are people-- people who have managed to stay alive by hiding between the covers of a book.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: The shortest way to get anywhere is to have good company.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: In good company, the individuals merge their egotism into a social soul exactly co-extensive with the several consciousnesses there present.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Good taste is as tiring as good company.
quotes.author: Francis Picabia

quotes.quote: Roads are long; make them short with a good company!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Always keep good company. Never waste an hour with anyone who doesn't lift you up and encourage you.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: It is with a good book as it is with good company.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In good company your thoughts run, in solitude your thought is still ... In talk your mind can be stretched, widened, exhilarated to heights, but it cannot be deepened; you have to deepen it yourself.
quotes.author: Rumer Godden

quotes.quote: Good-breeding is the art of showing men, by external signs, the internal regard we have for them. It arises from good sense, improved by conversing with good company.
quotes.author: Cato the Younger

quotes.quote: Children...will never go astray while they are in good company.
quotes.author: Francis M. Lyman

quotes.quote: Books are always good company if you have the right sort.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Great deeds are usually wrought at great risks.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Big words seldom accompany good deeds.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: Good deeds are seldom remembered; bad deeds are seldom forgotten.
quotes.author: Ernie J Zelinski

quotes.quote: The good deed you do today, for a brother or sister in need will come back to you some day, for humanity's a circle in deed.
quotes.author: Robert Alan Aurthur

quotes.quote: Good deeds from good intentions flow; but good intentions only; build for us a place below.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every time you do a good deed you shine the light a little farther into the dark. And the thing is, when you're gone that light is going to keep shining on, pushing the shadows back.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: When you are kind to others, it not only changes you, it changes the world.
quotes.author: Harold Kushner

quotes.quote: Thinking good thoughts is not enough, doing good deeds is not enough, seeing others follow your good examples is enough.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: A good deed hidden in silence dies.
quotes.author: Pindar

quotes.quote: Seek to do good, and you will find that happiness will run after you.
quotes.author: James Freeman Clarke

quotes.quote: There is a sort of gratification in doing good which makes us rejoice in ourselves.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: If you do one good deed, your reward is to be set to do another and harder and better one.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A good deed is like peeing in your pants. Everyone knows you did it, but only you can feel it's warmth.
quotes.author: Zoroaster

quotes.quote: The smallest good deed is better than the grandest intention.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Men do not value a good deed unless it brings a reward.
quotes.author: Ovid Poet

quotes.quote: Good deeds are no less good because their object is unworthy.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: According to the Sutras, evil deeds result in hardships and good deeds result in blessings.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: It takes many good deeds to build a good reputation, and only one bad one to lose it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Good deeds should be done with intention, not for attention.
quotes.author: Sayed Hadi al-Qazwini

quotes.quote: It's much better to do good in a way that no one knows anything about it.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: To be doing good deeds is man's most glorious task.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The nicest feeling in the world is to do a good deed anonymously-and have somebody find out.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
