quotes.quote: I had many teachers that were great, positive role models, and taught me to be a good person and stand up and be a good man. A lot of the principles they taught me still affect how I act sometimes and it's 30 years later.
quotes.author: Kevin James

quotes.quote: As you grow older, you will discover that you have two hands. One for helping yourself, one for helping others.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: One who attempts to please places his or her sense of self-worth completely in the hands of others.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Even if it is a little thing, do something for those who have need of help, something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing it.
quotes.author: Dr. Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Be a good person, it is easier than pretending to be a good person.
quotes.author: Nitin Namdeo

quotes.quote: A good person has no religion, he is simply a good person who treats everyone well.
quotes.author: Nitin Namdeo

quotes.quote: There is zero chance of being a good person without doing good for others!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Good people are always beautiful.
quotes.author: Luffina Lourduraj

quotes.quote: Never regret being a good person, to the wrong people. Your behavior says everything about you, and their behavior says enough about them.
quotes.author: Marc & Angel

quotes.quote: I'm surrounded by nothing but great people. I've been blessed with that, so really, I've got no choice but to be an all-around good person.
quotes.author: Tim Duncan

quotes.quote: Be good to people. You will be remembered more for your kindness than any level of success you could possibly attain.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Success to me is being a good person, treating people well.
quotes.author: David LaChapelle

quotes.quote: Surround yourself with really good people. I think that's an important thing. Because the people you surround yourself are a reflection of you.
quotes.author: Aaron Rodgers

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the oil of all relationships.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every good relationship, especially marriage, is based on respect. If it's not based on respect, nothing that appears to be good will last very long.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.quote: You know you have a good relationship with someone when you are just perfectly happy to be quiet and just hang out and do nothing.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.quote: A good relationship is like fireworks: loud, explosive, and liable to maim you if you hold on too long.
quotes.author: Jeph Jacques

quotes.quote: In good relationships, we are happy to grow as the other person becomes part of us and who we are.
quotes.author: Miroslav Volf

quotes.quote: Do not bring people in your life who weigh you down. And trust your instincts ... good relationships feel good. They feel right. They don't hurt. They're not painful. That's not just with somebody you want to marry, but it's with the friends that you choose. It's with the people you surround yourselves with.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Most people try to escalate a relationship too quickly. Trust is built slowly, over time. Good relationships are built little by little, and there are no shortcuts, so do not try to push the relationship to progress faster than is natural. Because relationships are progressions, follow-ups are important.
quotes.author: Adam Rifkin

quotes.quote: A good relationship is a competition of generosity.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: In any solid, good relationship, it takes a while to trust someone.
quotes.author: Minka Kelly

quotes.quote: It is important to value the individual, to have good health, a loving family and good relationships, to have community ties, leisure pursuits. These are all part of our lives. It is important to keep all of our parts in working order.
quotes.author: Helen Lynch

quotes.quote: Everybody has bad relationships and, at the end of the day, they are just a great way to set yourself up for a good relationship.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.quote: One of the better guarantors of ending up in a good relationship: an advanced capacity to be alone.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Distance is a bad excuse for not having a good relationship with somebody. It's the determination to keep it going or let it fall by the wayside; that's the real reason that the relationships continue.
quotes.author: James McAvoy

quotes.quote: Self-mastery and self-discipline are the foundation of good relationships with others.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Good relationships make people happy, and happy people enjoy more and better relationships than unhappy people.... Conflicts in relationships--having an annoying office mate or roommate, or having chronic conflict with your spouse--is one of the surest ways to reduce your happiness. You never adapt to interpersonal conflict; it damages every day, even days when you don't see the other person but ruminate about the conflict nonetheless.
quotes.author: Jonathan Haidt

quotes.quote: A good relationship is with someone who knows all your insecurities and imperfections but still loves you for who you are.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: A good relationship doesn't need promises, terms and conditions. Just needs a she who can trust and he who can be loyal.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Conflict can and should be handled constructively; when it is, relationships benefit. Conflict avoidance is *not* the hallmark of a good relationship. On the contrary, it is a symptom of serious problems and of poor communication.
quotes.author: Harriet B. Braiker

quotes.quote: The most important factors in a relationship are communication, acceptance, patience, compromise and forgiveness. A good relationship should have three mantras, eyes that would not cry, lips that would not lie and love that would not die. Trust the one who can see three things in you, sorrow behind your smile. Love behind your anger & reason behind your silence.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kumar Sinha

quotes.quote: People who have good relationships at home are more effective in the marketplace.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It only takes one clear person to have a good relationship.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: To know when to go away and when to come closer is the key to any lasting relationship.
quotes.author: Domenico Cieri Estrada

quotes.quote: The fact is that you can't have a good relationship with a girl who hasn't settled things with her father.
quotes.author: Mort Sahl

quotes.quote: I'd say the key to a good relationship is communication
quotes.author: Mandy Moore

quotes.quote: Well-being cannot exist just in your own head. Well-being is a combination of feeling good as well as actually having meaning, good relationships and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Martin Seligman

quotes.quote: A good relationship is based on a good friendship.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Honesty is always one of the best keys to make a good relationship.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A lack of trust can doom a perfectly good relationship to failure!
quotes.author: Glen Rambharack

quotes.quote: A good song gathers the years in. It's why you can sing it with such conviction 40 years after it's been written.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: If it's a good song, it doesn't really matter if it's trendy or not. It will hit.
quotes.author: Tablo

quotes.quote: A good song's a good song, and well known songs take on meaning in people's lives.
quotes.author: Ty Segall

quotes.quote: If it is a good song, it is a good song. The Beatles were pop, the beach boys were pop and it's the best music of all time.
quotes.author: William Fitzsimmons

quotes.quote: One good song with a message can bring a point more deeply to more people than a thousand rallies.
quotes.author: Phil Ochs

quotes.quote: A good song reminds us what we're fighting for.
quotes.author: Pete Seeger

quotes.quote: A good song stays in your head because it's catchy, a great song stays because it means something to you.
quotes.author: Tove Lo

quotes.quote: A good song is a nice set of chords and some good lyrics; a great song is a song that reinvents itself over time. That you can always find something interesting in the more you listen to it - it keeps revealing something to you.
quotes.author: Bryce Dessner

quotes.quote: A good song is like a mannequin - its form makes sense, but there's no life. There should be memorable melody, thoughtful lyric, appropriate arrangement.
quotes.author: Greta Salpeter

quotes.quote: There are simply two kinds of music, good music and the other kind ... the only yardstick by which the result should be judged is simply that of how it sounds. If it sounds good it's successful; if it doesn't it has failed.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Good music is wine turned to sound
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: All good music resembles something. Good music stirs by its mysterious resemblance to the objects and feelings which motivated it.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: A good song takes on more meaning as the years pass by.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: A good song should give you a lot of images; you should be able to make your own little movie in your head to a good song.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: Good songs are what a good band is all about. When you have a good song that stands up to the test of the time, that is the most important thing.
quotes.author: Joey Kramer

quotes.quote: A good song can make you smile, or it can make you dance or laugh or remind you of a moment.
quotes.author: Charli XCX

quotes.quote: A good song is a good song, and good musicians can play all different styles.
quotes.author: John Doe

quotes.quote: A good song receives love forever.
quotes.author: Kim Jong-hyun

quotes.quote: That is the difference between a good song and a bad song lyrically - if you can listen to it and put yourself in that place, or see that person in that place, normally it is a pretty good song.
quotes.author: Ne-Yo

quotes.quote: A good song and good musicians can really move mountains.
quotes.author: Joey Tempest

quotes.quote: Good music is good no matter what kind of music it is.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: Good music is good music and that should be enough for anybody.
quotes.author: Bradley Nowell

quotes.quote: Good music can act as a guide to good living.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: All music is good music, if it touches your soul.
quotes.author: DJ Premier

quotes.quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: A good teacher, like a good entertainer, first must hold his audience's attention, then he can teach his lesson.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.quote: A good teacher must be able to put himself in the place of those who find learning hard.
quotes.author: Eliphas Levi

quotes.quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The test of a good teacher is not how many questions he can ask his pupils that they will answer readily, but how many questions he inspires them to ask which he finds it hard to answer.
quotes.author: Alice Wellington Rollins

quotes.quote: Teachers, who educate children, deserve more honor than parents, who merely gave them birth; for the latter provided mere life, while the former ensured a good life.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The best education is not given to students; it is drawn out of them.
quotes.author: Gerald Belcher

quotes.quote: Those who know, do. Those that understand, teach.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A good teacher is like a candle – it consumes itself to light the way for others.
quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

quotes.quote: A good teacher protects his pupils from his own influence.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: When our students fail, we, as teachers, too, have failed.
quotes.author: Marva Collins

quotes.quote: The good teacher makes the poor student good and the good student superior.
quotes.author: Marva Collins

quotes.quote:
A good teacher sees the commonality of all human beings
and helps each individual find his uniqueness.
quotes.author: T. K. V. Desikachar

quotes.quote: A good teacher is a master of simplification and an enemy of simplism.
quotes.author: Louis A. Berman

quotes.quote: You can teach a student a lesson for a day; but if you can teach him to learn by creating curiosity, he will continue the learning process as long as he lives.
quotes.author: Clay P. Bedford

quotes.quote: The teacher who is indeed wise does not bid you to enter the house of his wisdom but rather leads you to the threshold of your mind.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: A teacher is no longer just a teacher, but a tutor, therapist, guru, nurse practitioner, Dutch uncle, minister without portfolio and cop on the beat.
quotes.author: David McCullough Jr.

quotes.quote: Our job is obvious: We need to get out of the way, shine a light, and empower a new generation to teach itself and to go further and faster than any generation ever has.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Don’t just teach your children to read. Teach them to question what they read. Teach them to question everything.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Experience is a good teacher, but she sends in terrific bills.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.quote: The best teachers don't give you the answers. They just point the way and let you make your own choices, your own mistakes. That way you get all the glory. And you deserve it.
quotes.author: Mr. Schuester

quotes.quote: It takes a big heart to help shape little minds.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best teachers teach from the heart not from the book.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A good teacher offers practice, a bad one offers theories.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: One good teacher in a lifetime may sometimes change a delinquent into a solid citizen.
quotes.author: Philip Wylie

quotes.quote: A good teacher is a good student first. By repeating his lessons, he acquires excellence.
quotes.author: M. K. Soni

quotes.quote: Good teachers are those who know how little they know. Bad teachers are those who think they know more than they don't know.
quotes.author: R. Verdi

quotes.quote: All good things are wild and free.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Good things soon find a purchaser.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: Good things come to those who hustle.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Good things, when short, are twice as good.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Good things are not necessarily God things.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: Good things are often birthed from adversity.
quotes.author: Robert A. Schuller

quotes.quote: Good things never last, bad things never die.
quotes.author: John Darnielle

quotes.quote: The excess of all good things is mischievous.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: Good things come to those with no expectations.
quotes.author: David X. Cohen

quotes.quote: Whatever good things we build end up building us.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: All good things are cheap: all bad are very dear.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I believe that good things come to those who work.
quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

quotes.quote: All good things in life are fragile and easily lost
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: Too many good things all seem the same after a while.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: Good things come slow, especially in distance running.
quotes.author: Bill Dellinger

quotes.quote: All good things which exist are the fruits of originality.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Good things do not come easy. The road is lined with pitfalls.
quotes.author: Desi Arnaz

quotes.quote: Whatever good things people say of us, they tell us nothing new.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Good things happen to the human spirit when it is left alone.
quotes.author: John Taylor Gatto

quotes.quote: Good things are always appreciated, bad things deserve ignorance.
quotes.author: Ritesh Shrivastav

quotes.quote: The good things of prosperity are to be wished; but the good things that belong to adversity are to be admired.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: In life, all good things come hard, but wisdom is the hardest to come by.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: There are two good things in life - freedom of thought and freedom of action.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The good things never stay in your head. Only the bad things live on.
quotes.author: Jake Abel

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart, so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: If good things lasted forever, would we appreciate how precious they are?
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Good things happen when you take action. Bad things happen when you neglect.
quotes.author: John Addison

quotes.quote: All good things pass away.
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.quote: Good things should be praised.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Good things come in good time.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: Good things come to those who wait.
quotes.author: Jess C Scott

quotes.quote: Good things come in small packages.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: All good things must come to an end.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: Good things happen when you go for it!
quotes.author: Alan Webb

quotes.quote: Good things happen when you meet strangers.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: Most good things come with the risk of something bad.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: Good things happen when you get your priorities straight.
quotes.author: Scott Caan

quotes.quote: When you think positive, good things happen.
quotes.author: Matt Kemp

quotes.quote: When you get things right, good things happen.
quotes.author: Steve Easterbrook

quotes.quote: Good things will come from self-expression.
quotes.author: John Cho

quotes.quote: When good things come along, you end up saying yes to them. Because they're rare.
quotes.author: John Lithgow

quotes.quote: All the good things a man can do for a woman is against her religion
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: All good things, all godly things, have been counterfeited by the devil.
quotes.author: Jeff Iorg

quotes.quote: Really good things take time to grow. Foundation is not built over night.
quotes.author: Iggy Azalea

quotes.quote: Most good things have been said far too many times and just need to be lived.
quotes.author: Shane Claiborne

quotes.quote: Good things don't happen to "good people"; good things happen to happy people.
quotes.author: Vivian Amis

quotes.quote: Good things happen in your life when you surround yourself with positive people.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: More good things in life are lost by indifference than ever were lost by active hostility.
quotes.author: Robert Menzies

quotes.quote: When you are joyful, when you say yes to life and have fun and project positivity all around you, you become a sun in the center of every constellation, and people want to be near you.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: and our few good times will be rare because we have the critical sense, and are not easy to fool with laughter
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: It doesn't have to be the last good time. But sooner or later the last good time would come around. It does for all of us.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Good times are a reminder and a reward for dealing with the difficult and challenging times we all go through. The trick is to celebrate the good times in advance of the difficult times. Always remember, good times await you after the difficult times pass.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: One day everything that you worried about before will be gone and all that you will be thinking about is the good times that you had back then.
quotes.author: Lena Karesh

quotes.quote: Thank you for the good times, the days you filled with pleasure. Thank you for fond memories, and for feelings I'll always treasure.
quotes.author: Karl Fuchs

quotes.quote: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Unless you have bad times, you can't appreciate the good times.
quotes.author: Joe Torre

quotes.quote: In good times, people want to advertise; in bad times, they have to.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Strange, how the best moments of our lives we scarcely notice except in looking back.
quotes.author: Joe Abercrombie

quotes.quote: Good times become good memories and bad times become good lessons in life.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Time will all change and neither bad times norgood times last forever. Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory. When all is lost, there is still a memory.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: We all have our time machines. Some take us back, they're called memories. Some take us forward, they're called dreams.
quotes.author: Jeremy Irons

quotes.quote: But every memory of friendship shared, even for a short time, is a treasure, like sunshine and warmth in our lives, like a cool breeze on a humid day, like a shower of rain refreshing the earth.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Memory is a way of holding onto the things you love, the things you are, the things you never want to lose
quotes.author: The Wonder Years

quotes.quote: If we could all just laugh at ourselves, in hard times or good times, it would be an incredible world.
quotes.author: Jena Malone

quotes.quote: Watch for good times to retreat into yourself. Frequently meditate on how good God is to you.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: When times are good, be happy, but when time are bad consider; God has made the one as well as the other.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Pleasure is the flower that passes; remembrance, the lasting perfume.
quotes.author: Jean de Boufflers

quotes.quote: It's surprising how much memory is built around things unnoticed at the time.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: The best things in life are the People we love, the Places we've been, and the Memories we've made along the way.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A place in thy memory, dearest, Is all that I claim; To pause and look back when thou hearest The sound of my name
quotes.author: Gerald Griffin

quotes.quote: Life is a rough biography. Memories smooth out the edges.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: At the end of a year remember the good and leave the rest, knowing it just gets better and better.
quotes.author: A Monika

quotes.quote: Everybody has problems. Everybody has bad times. Do we sacrifice all the good times because of them?
quotes.author: Enchanted

quotes.quote: That man is the richest whose pleasures are the cheapest.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Pleasure is very seldom found where it is sought. Our brightest blazes are commonly kindled by unexpected sparks.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Everything that's fun in life is dangerous.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: There are going to be good times and bad times, but lighten up.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.quote: Let's take the good times as they go, and I'll meet you further on up the road...
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Good times are when people make debts to pay in bad times
quotes.author: Robert Quinlin

quotes.quote: Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: When all is lost, there is still a memory.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Memory is a way of holding on to the things you love, the things you are, the things you never want to lose.
quotes.author: Kevin Arnold

quotes.quote: Memory is the diary that we all carry about with us.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We don't remember days; we remember moments. The richness of life lies in memories we have forgotten.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Memories are the treasures that we keep locked deep within the storehouse of our souls, to keep our hearts warm when we are lonely.
quotes.author: Becky Aligada

quotes.quote: Someday many years from nowWe'll sit beside the candles glowExchanging tales about our pastAnd laughing as the memories flowAnd when that distant day arrivesI know it will be understoodThat friendship is the key to liveAnd we were friends and it was good.
quotes.author: Eileen Hehl

quotes.quote: Just trust in a good time no matter how long it takes.
quotes.author: Diana Ross

quotes.quote: You can have it all. You just can't have it all at one time.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Nothing is so good as it seems beforehand.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Happiness is unrepentant pleasure.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: The surest way to happiness is to lose yourself in a cause greater than yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The happier the moment the shorter.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.quote: Tranquil pleasure constitutes human beings' supreme good
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Good timeas and crazy friends make the best memories.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The good times are what drives our lives. Good times are what we remember, look forward to, and long for.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Good times makes us do positive things in order to have more of those good feelings.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: Good times are a reminder and a reward for dealing with the difficult and challenging times we all go through. The trick is to celebrate the good times in advance of the difficult times. Always remember, good times await you after the difficult times pass..
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: The trick to having more good times, is to do your best to focus on what you've learned from your past life challenges.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: In every age 'the good old days' were a myth. No one ever thought they were good at the time. For every age has consisted of crises that seemed intolerable to the people who lived through them.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: Either possibility could account for a growing sense that the good times were behind me, and the serious times ahead.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: Good times, though, are not the best times for a reporter.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: Companies experiencing the best of times through unprecedented prosperity and growth are struggling through the worst of times trying to staff entry-level positions.
quotes.author: T. Scott McTague

quotes.quote: I firmly agree with those who say you can't recognize the good times if you haven't experienced the opposite.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: I know we've had some hard times, I know we've had some tears, but we've also had some good times and laughter over the years.
quotes.author: Audrey Newell

quotes.quote: But first, before our mentor chimes / The hour of jubilee, / Let's drink a health to good old times, / And good times yet to be!
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: He remembered her love / Looking at her so sad / All he can think of / Is the good times they had.
quotes.author: Ragen S. Rogers

quotes.quote: As far as this life is concerned, / As best as I can tell, / Consists of this: / To be able to watch the world go by / On a sunny summer day, / And to know that good times are ahead, / And to wake up each day / As if it was Christmas morning.
quotes.author: J.W. Emanuelson

quotes.quote: Through the good times and bad, / I held onto my anger / Either happy or sad, / it was never a stranger.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Now the hopes and dreams, they fade.Please remember all the good times.Love could last a lifetime.But you're too blind to see.When you turned to walk away, you've walked away from me.
quotes.author: Jesus Penaranda

quotes.quote: You need to spend time crawling alone through shadows to truly appreciate what it is to stand in the sun.
quotes.author: Shaun Hick

quotes.quote: It struck her how eating was a comfort during a hard time because it reminded you that there had been other days, good days, when you’d eaten the same thing. Reminded you there were good days in life, when precious little else did.
quotes.author: Ron Rash

quotes.quote: There must be bad times in order to appreciate the good ones.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Duarte

quotes.quote: There will be tears in the best of times and laughter in the worst.
quotes.author: Marty Rubins

quotes.quote: Building a rainy-day fund during good times may not be politically popular, but it can pay off during the bad times.
quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

quotes.quote: Life is like a camera. Focus on what's important. Capture the good times. And if things don't work out, just take another shot.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: we always knew that good times came with termination contracts even if we weren't quite ready to sign it.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: When good times turn out way bigger than you first expected, that's when you know you're on a roll!
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: You can have good times with anyone, but it's really different and much more interesting when you look at how you get through the bad times with someone.
quotes.author: Kenya Barris

quotes.quote: If you wait for the right time or the good times to start a business, you wait all your life.
quotes.author: Fran Tarkenton

quotes.quote: Successful people decide how they are going to live; they are not victims of circumstance. In good times or bad times, they know where they are going and they know that they are going to get there.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: There’s something wonderful about entertaining people on vacation. Everyone is there to have a good time.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudson

quotes.quote: There are few women whose charm survives their beauty.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: You can be an absolute woman and also be smart and tough and not lose your femininity.
quotes.author: Priyanka Chopra

quotes.quote: Women are wiser than men because they know less and understand more.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Women are never so strong as after their defeat.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: An elegant woman is a woman who despises you and has no hair under her arms.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: The path of a good woman is indeed strewn with flowers; but they rise behind her steps, not before them.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Women are in league with each other, a secret conspiracy of hearts and pheromones.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: A woman can't do anything about her appearance. Either she's pretty or she isn't. But her character is quite another matter.
quotes.author: Julie Garwood

quotes.quote: A good woman's arms round a man's neck is a lifebelt thrown out to him from heaven.
quotes.author: Jerome K Jerome

quotes.quote: Most good women are hidden treasures who are only safe because nobody looks for them.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Find a woman who makes you feel more alive. She won't make life perfect but she'll make it infinitely more interesting. And then love her with all that's in you.
quotes.author: Gayle Roper

quotes.quote: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: Cheating on a good woman is like choosing trash over treasure.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Marry a good woman, and be happy the rest of your life. Or, marry a bad, and become a good philosopher
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Woman is sacred; the woman one loves is holy.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: If a woman is successful, she'd better duck, because they'll be out to get her.
quotes.author: Leona Helmsley

quotes.quote: Honor a good woman because she is virtuous and honorable.
quotes.author: Delano Johnson

quotes.quote: Don't take a good woman for granted. Someday, someone will come along and appreciate what you didn't.
quotes.author: Darkskin

quotes.quote: A good woman is like a tea bag. You never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.
quotes.author: Harold MacMillan

quotes.quote: One should never trust a woman who tells her real age. If she tells that, she'll tell anything.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Women are seldom silent. Their beauty is forever speaking for them.
quotes.author: Philip Moeller

quotes.quote: From birth to eighteen, a girl needs good parents, from eighteen to thirty-five she needs good looks, from thirty-five to fifty-five she needs a good personality, and from fifty-five on she needs cash.
quotes.author: Sophie Tucker

quotes.quote: A good woman inspires a man, a brilliant woman interests him, a beautiful woman fascinates him, but a sympathetic woman gets him.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Women are made to be loved, not understood.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A good woman would rather be the mother of a genius than the wife of a hero
quotes.author: Gelett Burgess

quotes.quote: Don't be the girl who fell. Be the girl who got back up.
quotes.author: Jenette Stanley

quotes.quote: A sensible woman can never be happy with a fool.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the ability to create, nurture, and transform.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.quote: And these blessings, no gift equals the gentle, trusting love and companionship of a good woman.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A good woman is one who loves passionately, has guts, seriousness and passionate convictions, takes responsibility, and shapes society.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: What is better than wisdom? Woman. And what is better than a good woman? Nothing.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: God's rarest blessing is, after all, a good woman!
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: A man is truly a man when he wins the love of a good woman, earns her respect, and keeps her trust. Until you can do that, you're not a man.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.quote: Only love of a good woman will make a man question every choice, every action. Only love makes a warrior hesitate for fear that his lady will find him cruel. Only love makes a man both the best he will ever be, and the weakest. Sometimes all in the same moment.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Man is at his best when complemented by a good woman's natural influence.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: A man gains no possession better than a good woman, nothing more horrible than a bad one.
quotes.author: Simonides

quotes.quote: A handsome woman is a jewel, a good woman is a treasure.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: It takes a thoroughly good woman to do a thoroughly stupid thing.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If I were a girl, I'd despair. The supply of good women far exceeds that of the men who deserve them.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: There are few good women who do not tire of their role.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: What men owe to the love and help of good women can never be told.
quotes.author: Coolidge

quotes.quote: Fulfillment in life involves loving a good woman and killing a bad man.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: A good woman is a hidden treasure. Who discovers her will do well not to boast about it.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Good women always think it is their fault when someone else is being offensive. Bad women never take the blame for anything.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: I have thought that a sufficient measure of civilization is the influence of good women.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: To be married to a good woman is to live with tender surprise.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: What is civilization? I answer, the power of good women.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Good women tell all their lives, and by day and by hour and by minute, such things that angels can read.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: Until every good man is brave, we must expect to find many good women timid too timid even to believe in the correctness of their own best promptings, when these would place them in a minority.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A good woman is known by what she does. A good man by what he doesn't.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: He believed in it, as certain good women believe in the leviathan-by faith, not by reason.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.quote: A woman may be as wicked as she likes, but if she isn't pretty it won't do her much good.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: A good cook is not necessarily a good woman with an even temper. Some allowance should be made for artistic temperament.
quotes.author: Marcel Boulestin

quotes.quote: How sweetly sounds the voice of a good woman! It is so seldom heard that, when it speaks,it ravishes all senses.
quotes.author: Massinger

quotes.quote: Good women are rarely clever and clever women are rarely good.
quotes.author: Adah Isaacs Menken

quotes.quote: They say fortune is a woman and capricious. But sometimes she is a good woman, and gives to those who merit.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: If you would have a good wife, marry one who has been a good daughter.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: A true woman loves a strong man because she knows his weaknesses. She protects as much as she is protected.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: It’s not that geese can fly. It’s that they choose to.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: The goose that lays the golden eggs likes to lay where there are eggs already.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Even if your goose habitually lays golden eggs, it will still be cooked.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: What is sauce for the goose is sauce for the gander.
quotes.author: Marcus Terentius Varro

quotes.quote: What's good for the goose is good for the gander.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.quote: A fox should not be on the jury at a goose's trial.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: If you feel the urge, don't be afraid to go on a wild goose chase. What do you think wild geese are for anyway?
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The snow goose need not bathe to make itself white. Neither need you do anything but be yourself.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: There are no golden geese. There are only fat geese eating the food that could nourish more athletic opportunities for women.
quotes.author: Donna Lopiano

quotes.quote: You beat the liver out of a goose to get a pâté; you pound the muscles of a man's cardia to get a philosopher.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: Then the geese replaced themselves with six pigs and vanished.
quotes.author: Diana Wynne Jones

quotes.quote: The goose lays the golden egg. Payrolls make consumers.
quotes.author: George M. Humphrey

quotes.quote: Don't kill the golden goose.
quotes.author: Malcolm McLaren

quotes.quote: Geese are white, crows are black. No argument will change this.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Feather by feather the goose is plucked.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.quote: To want to meet an author because you like his books is as ridiculous as wanting to meet the goose because you like pate de foie gras.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: True effectiveness is a function of two things: what is produced (the golden eggs) and the producing asset (the goose).
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: The art of plucking the goose without making it cry out has been developed to a high state of perfection at the hands of the war makers.
quotes.author: Frederic C. Howe

quotes.quote: Certain gorillas are more evolved than certain human beings I know.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.quote: The more you learn about the dignity of the gorilla, the more you want to avoid people.
quotes.author: Dian Fossey

quotes.quote: I feel more comfortable with gorillas than people. I can anticipate what a gorilla's going to do, and they're purely motivated.
quotes.author: Dian Fossey

quotes.quote: Adult gorillas will fight to the death defending their families. This is why poachers who may be seeking only one infant for the zoo trade must often kill all the adults in the family to capture the baby.
quotes.author: Sy Montgomery

quotes.quote: Gorillas have a belch vocalization, which is sort of like, 'I'm OK, you're OK.' They do a pig grunt, which is reprimanding. They sing, they laugh, and they hoot, which grows into a chest-beating display.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.quote: The monkey and gorilla may claim kinship, but the monkey is a monkey and the gorilla is a gorilla.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: It is hard for the ape to believe he descended from man.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: A mere ape in our world may be a scholar in its own, and the low life of any beast may be a source of deep satisfaction for the beast itself.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: The most beautiful ape is ugly when compared to a human. The wisest human will seem like an ape when compared to a god with respect to wisdom, beauty, and everything else.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: If apes are given the right to humane treatment, it just might become harder to deny that same right to their human cousins.
quotes.author: Adam Cohen

quotes.quote: Gorillas remind me of my father. He was a very big, physically strong man but also very sensitive.
quotes.author: Anthony Browne

quotes.quote: Gorillas are still wild creatures. That's made very clear when you observe them in nature. They charge and perform other displays that are terrifying by design. But they don't attack unless they feel threatened.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.quote: Apes beat their chests so they don't have to fight 24 hours a day.
quotes.author: David Milch

quotes.quote: The ape, vilest of beasts, how like to us.
quotes.author: Quintus Ennius

quotes.quote: Orangutan are very weird animals but they look very soulful.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Orangutans teach us that looks are not everything-but warned near it.
quotes.author: Will Cuppy

quotes.quote: Orangutans look straight into your soul.
quotes.author: Willie Smits

quotes.quote: Chimpanzees can be quite political.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: Male chimpanzees have an extraordinarily strong drive for dominance. They're constantly jockeying for position.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: A chimpanzee who is really gearing up for a fight doesn't waste time with gestures but just goes ahead and attacks.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: One cannot watch chimpanzee infants for long without realizing that they have the same emotional need for affection and reassurance as human children.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: When it comes to social interaction, the chimpanzees appear to be just as intelligent as we are.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: It is hardly an exaggeration to say that a chimpanzee kept in solitude is not a real chimpanzee at all.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Kohler

quotes.quote: Wild groups of chimpanzees attack their enemies like gangs. What they completely lack, precisely because of their strong territorial behavior, is a friendly relationship with their neighbors.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: The best relationship you can have with a chimpanzee is total mutual trust.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: If chimpanzees have consciousness, if they are capable of abstractions, do they not have what until now has been described as 'human rights'? How smart does a chimp have to be before killing him constitutes murder?
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Chimpanzees, more than any other living creature, have helped us to understand that there is no sharp line between humans and the rest of the animal kingdom. It's a very blurry line, and it's getting more blurry all the time.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: A baboon in a forest is a matter of legitimate speculation; a baboon in a zoo is an object of public curiosity; but a baboon in your wife's bed is a cause of the gravest concern.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Orangutan babies are like human babies: helpless.
quotes.author: Willie Smits

quotes.quote: Anyone who will gossip to you, will gossip about you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Words have no wings but they can fly a thousand miles.
quotes.author: Korean (on gossip)

quotes.quote: Gossip is just a tool to distract people who have nothing better to do from feeling jealous of those few of us still remaining with noble hearts.
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: Believe nothing of what you hear and only half of what you see.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Four horses cannot overtake the tongue.
quotes.author: Chinese (on gossip)

quotes.quote: It is easier to dam a river than to stop gossip.
quotes.author: Moro (Filipino) (on gossip)

quotes.quote: Not everything you hear is good for talk.
quotes.author: Japanese (on gossip)

quotes.quote: The house of the loud talker, leaks.
quotes.author: African proverb Zulu Tribe

quotes.quote: You can't sew buttons on your neighbor's mouth.
quotes.author: Russian (on gossip)

quotes.quote: What you don't see with your eyes, don't witness with your mouth.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: What is told in the ear of a man is often heard 100 miles away.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Gossip is saying behind their back what you would not say to their face. Flattery is saying to their face what you would not say behind their back.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you reveal your secrets to the wind, you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: If it's very painful for you to criticize your friends, you're safe in doing it. But if you take the slightest pleasure in it, that's the time to hold your tongue.
quotes.author: Alice Duer Miller

quotes.quote: A cruel story runs on wheels, and every hand oils the wheels as they run.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: It is just as cowardly to judge an absent person as it is wicked to strike a defenseless one. Only the ignorant and narrow-minded gossip, for they speak of persons instead of things.
quotes.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quotes.quote: Gossip is when you hear something you like about someone you don't.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Gossip is what no one claims to like, but everybody enjoys.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Gossip needn't be false to be evil - there's a lot of truth that shouldn't be passed around.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas. Average minds discuss events. Small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Henry Thomas Buckle

quotes.quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: It is always assumed by the empty-headed, who chatter about themselves for want of something better, that people who do not discuss their affairs openly must have something to hide.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Often those that criticise others reveal what he himself lacks.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Insecure people only eclipse your sun because they're jealous of your daylight and tired of their dark, starless nights.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Gossip is sometimes referred to as halitosis of the mind.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: He gossips habitually; he lacks the common wisdom to keep still that deadly enemy of man, his own tongue
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We cannot control the evil tongues of others; but a good life enables us to disregard them.
quotes.author: Cato the Elder

quotes.quote: Gossip is a sort of smoke that comes from the dirty tobacco-pipes of those who diffuse it; it proves nothing but the bad taste of the smoker.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: How much time he gains who does not look to see what his neighbour says or does or thinks, but only at what he does himself, to make it just and holy.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Doesn't matter what you do, or how you do it, your neighbors are gonna talk about you anyway.
quotes.author: Felder Rushing

quotes.quote: If I maintain my silence about my secret it is my prisoner... if I let it slip from my tongue, I am its prisoner.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Discretion of speech is more than eloquence; and to speak agreeably to him with whom we deal is more than to speak in good words or in good order.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: It isn't what they say about you, it's what they whisper.
quotes.author: Errol Flynn

quotes.quote: Some secrets are fires so scorching, the only way to quench the burn is to tell someone.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Who brings a tale takes two away.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Every man is surrounded by a neighborhood of voluntary spies.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: It is presumptuous to draw conclusions about a person from what one has heard.
quotes.author: Jude Morgan

quotes.quote: The worst thing about talk ... is that there's no way to lay it to rest. Every fresh breeze brings a new speculation.
quotes.author: Susan Wittig Albert

quotes.quote: A boomerang returns back to the person who throws it. But first, while moving in a circle, it hits its target. So does gossip.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: A dog that will fetch a bone, will carry a bone.
quotes.author: R. Forby

quotes.quote: If you can't say anything nice, then don't say anything at all.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Little said is soonest mended.
quotes.author: George Wither

quotes.quote: Where there is smoke there is fire.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Words once spoken can never be recalled.
quotes.author: Wentworth Dillon

quotes.quote: Words spoken are like eggs broken.
quotes.author: Sheri Glewen

quotes.quote: Nothing travels faster than light, with the possible exception of bad news, which follows its own rules.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Fire and swords are slow engines of destruction, compared to the tongue of a Gossip.
quotes.author: Richard Steele

quotes.quote: To a philosopher all news, as it is called, is gossip, and they who edit and read it are old women over their tea.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When it comes to gossip, I have to readily admit men are as guilty as women.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: While gossip among women is universally ridiculed as low and trivial, gossip among men, especially if it is about women, is called theory, or idea, or fact.
quotes.author: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.quote: When you gossip, it’s self-hexing. Because when you do it, it comes back to you. Everything starts with the word. The word is demonstrating a condition of the mind. If it’s in your mind and comes out of your mouth, it will be created.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: People want to hear the gossip. They don't want to hear about the shots.
quotes.author: Jamie Kennedy

quotes.quote: Concerto grosso, blackest heart, / A mystifying natal chart— / All ignite the metaphoric art. / A planetful of pure desire / Is all poet should require / To set the commonplace afire. / The heart that hides inside the form / Observes the words that fume and swarm: / No one lives above the storm.
quotes.author: Sidney Wade

quotes.quote: Half the world is composed of people who have something to say but can't, and the other half of people who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Gossip is always a personal confession, either of malice or imbecility.
quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.quote: Gossip is like a fired bullet—once you hear the sound, you can't take it back.
quotes.author: Lori Palatnik

quotes.quote: Whispered insinuations are the rhetoric of the devil.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Never listen to accounts of the frailties of others; and if anyone should complain to you of another, humbly ask him not to speak of him at all.
quotes.author: St. John of the Cross

quotes.quote: We should have great peace if we did not busy ourselves with what others say and do.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: Do not listen gleefully to gossip at your neighbor's expense or chatter to a person who likes to find fault.
quotes.author: Maximus the Confessor

quotes.quote: If all men knew what each said of the other, there would not be four friends in the world.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Believe nothing against another, but upon good authority; nor report what may hurt another, unless it be a greater hurt to others to conceal it.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Rumor is a loud liar, like a snowball that gathers as it goeth.
quotes.author: John Trapp

quotes.quote: What is it to thee what they whisper there? Come after me and let the people talk.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Enter Rumour, painted full of tongues.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: How these curiosities would be quite forgot, did not such idle fellows as I am put them down.
quotes.author: John Aubrey

quotes.quote: Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: It is a matter of great interest what sovereigns are doing; but as to what Grand Duchesses are doing— Who cares?
quotes.author: Napoleon I

quotes.quote: Everyone in a crowd has the power to throw dirt: nine out of ten have the inclination.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: There is only one thing in the world worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It takes your enemy and your friend, working together, to hurt you to the heart: the one to slander you and the other to get the news to you.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Like all gossip—it's merely one of those half-alive things that try to crowd out real life.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: No one gossips about other people's secret virtues.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Blood sport is brought to its ultimate refinement in the gossip columns.
quotes.author: Bernard Ingham

quotes.quote: If you can't say something good about someone, sit right here by me.
quotes.author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quotes.quote: Show me someone who never gossips, and I'll show you someone who isn't interested in people.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: Gossip is the opiate of the oppressed.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: A gossip is someone who talks to you about others, a bore is someone who talks to you about himself, and a brilliant conversationalist is one who talks to you about yourself.
quotes.author: Lisa Kirk

quotes.quote: Gossip is just news running ahead of itself in a red satin dress.
quotes.author: Liz Smith

quotes.quote: Another good thing about gossip is that it is within everybody's reach, / And it is much more interesting than any other form of speech.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: A little bit of gossip does me good.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: I can feel a desire to gossip coming over me. I don't want to give in to it; narrative style should always be brief.
quotes.author: Madame de Sevigne

quotes.quote: Make it a habit to shut down conversations that are aimed at tearing others down.
quotes.author: Natalie Tomlinson

quotes.quote: You can tell more about a person by what he says about others than you can by what others say about him.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If there's one thing I've learned it's that there would be no gossip without secrets. You might be brave enough to reveal your secret only to have it used against you. Or someone else's secret might affect you in unexpected ways. There are some secrets you are only to happy to keep. Others surface only to be buried away deeper than they were before. But the most powerful secrets are the truths you thought you could never reveal. That once spoken, change everything.
quotes.author: Gossip Girl

quotes.quote: Gossip is alright. It's the moralizing that is in poor taste.
quotes.author: Lord Darlington

quotes.quote: Oh, a tongue can accuse and carry bad news / Gossip is cheap and it's lo-o-ow / So unless you've made no mistakes in your life / Just be careful of stones that you throw
quotes.author: Bonnie Dodd

quotes.quote: Rumor has it she has you / Rumor has it you love her too / Talk is cheap but the price is high when it's true / Rumor has it she has you
quotes.author: Bruce Burch

quotes.quote: The power of gossip is always strengthen / When it finds a respected ear / If you listen the chances are greater / That a thread of doubt may appear / Evil tongues in town continue / Evil tongues in town / Continue to prat aloud / Their evil news / You'll have to take my word / When I tell you I love you / I love you I love you / Take my word I love you
quotes.author: Nelson

quotes.quote: Rumour has it you're an angel / Let's see if the gossip's true / Force of will or force of nature / It's only a point of view / I've seen you dancing on the floor / They don't make them like you no more / Bye, bye for now, I'll check you later / See you in a week or two
quotes.author: Mary Frances Ambrose

quotes.quote: The mouthpiece of ignorance / is gossip / The wellspring of gossip / —is lies
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don't speak evil of someone if you don't know for certain, and if you do know ask yourself, why am I telling it?
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: The things most people want to know about are usually none of their business.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Fire and swords are slow engines of destruction, compared to the tongue of a Gossip.
quotes.author: Sir Richard Steele

quotes.quote: Gossip is a sort of smoke that comes from the dirty tobacco-pipes of those who diffuse it: it proves nothing but the bad taste of the smoker.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: And all who told it added something new, And all who heard it made enlargements too.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The only time people dislike gossip is when you gossip about them.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: No one gossips about other people's secret virtues.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Gossip is what no one claims to like, but everybody enjoys.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Gossiping and lying go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Whoever gossips to you will gossip about you.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Lettin' the cat outta the bag is a whole lot easier 'n puttin' it back in.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Count not him among your friends who will retail your privacies to the world.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Loose tongues are worse than wicked hands.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: What you don't see with your eyes, don't witness with your mouth.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Gossip needn't be false to be evil - there's a lot of truth that shouldn't be passed around.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Gossip about a person and his shadow will appear.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: If you reveal your secrets to the wind, you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: How awful to reflect that what people say of us is true!
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: When of a gossiping circle it was asked, What are they doing? The answer was, Swapping lies.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: Conversation is three women stand on the corner talking. Gossip is when one of them leaves.
quotes.author: Herb Shriner

quotes.quote: Who speaks ill of others to you will speak ill of you to others.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: There are a terrible lot of lies going about the world, and the worst of it is that half of them are true.
quotes.author: Winston Churchil

quotes.quote: Gossip needs no carriage.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: He gossips habitually; he lacks the common wisdom to keep still that deadly enemy of man, his own tongue.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Gossip is sometimes referred to as halitosis of the mind.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Of every ten persons who talk about you, nine will say something bad, and the tenth will say something good in a bad way.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: Your friend has a friend, and your friend's friend has another friend so know when to keep quiet.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: If someone cannot even keep his own secrets, don't count on him to keep someone else's.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Alas! they had been friends in youth; but whispering tongues can poison truth.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: It's sad to know I'm done. But looking back, I've got a lot of great memories.
quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

quotes.quote: You got to go down a lot of wrong roads to find the right one.
quotes.author: Bob Parsons

quotes.quote: Anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Never pick a fight with an ugly person, they've got nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: If you're losing your soul and you know it, then you've still got a soul left to lose.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: It's not enough to be nice in life. You've got to have nerve.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: If you shoot for the stars and hit the moon, it's OK. But you've got to shoot for something. A lot of people don't even shoot.
quotes.author: Robert Townsend

quotes.quote: If you can't appreciate what you have got then get what you appreciate.
quotes.author: Source Unknown

quotes.quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Don't compromise your self, you're all you got.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: A good name is seldom got by giving it oneself.
quotes.author: William Wycherley

quotes.quote: It's impossible to give it all you got and fail unless you fail to give it all you got to do the impossible.
quotes.author: Behdad Sami

quotes.quote: As long as the day lasts, let’s give it all we got.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: It’s easy to be independent when you’ve got money. But to be independent when you haven’t got a thing-that’s the Lord’s test.
quotes.author: Mahalia Jackson

quotes.quote: You can’t just sit there and wait for people to give you that golden dream. You’ve got to get out there and make it happen for yourself.
quotes.author: Diana Ross

quotes.quote: We've got to live, no matter how many skies have fallen.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: No one would ever have crossed the ocean if he could have gotten off the ship in a storm.
quotes.author: Source Unknown

quotes.quote: Well, if everything stays the same forever, you stop enjoying what you've got. And stop appreciating people.
quotes.author: Paul Blackwell

quotes.quote: If you want to make good use of your time, you've got to know what's most important and then give it all you've got.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: I got you to look after me, and you got me to look after you, and that's why.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: A real friend's got your back, while the fake ones are sticking knives in it.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: If you do what you always did, you will get what you always got.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.quote: If you want to do something, go for it—you’ve got nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Louis Tomlinson

quotes.quote: Southern Gothic is alive and well. It's not just a genre, it is a way of life.
quotes.author: Greg Iles

quotes.quote: The Gothic tradition was begun by Ann Radcliffe, a rare example of a woman creating an artistic style.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: The gothic reminds us that we are mainly driven by our passions; the Gothic deals in illicit desires, in what is prohibited by society.
quotes.author: David Punter

quotes.quote: Most gothics are overplotted novels whose success or failure hinges on the author's ability to make you believe in the characters and partake of the mood.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The gothic is singular in this; one seems easily at home in the renaissance; one is not too strange in the Byzantine; as for the Roman, it is ourselves; and we could walk blindfolded through every chink and cranny of the Greek mind; all these styles seem modern when we come close to them; but the gothic gets away.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: The Gothic cathedral is a blossoming in stone subdued by the insatiable demand of harmony in man.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The principle of the Gothic architecture is infinity made imaginable.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Mention the gothic, and many readers will probably picture gloomy castles and an assortment of sinister Victoriana. However, the truth is that the gothic genre has continued to flourish and evolve since the days of Bram Stoker, producing some of its most interesting and accomplished examples in the 20th century - in literature, film and beyond.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: When the theater is gothic it matches the sensibility of the show. Its also very intimate. The audience is very close to the performers. The show is scary and the scary stuff always works best with an intimacy with the audience. And the show is erotic, and I think erotic always works best when its close to the audience, as well.
quotes.author: Frank Wildhorn

quotes.quote: The word Gothic, in the sense in which it is generally employed, is wholly unsuitable, but wholly consecrated. Hence we accept it and we adopt it, like all the rest of the world, to characterize the architecture of the second half of the Middle Ages, where the ogive is the principle which succeeds the architecture of the first period, of which the semi-circle is the father.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: In one point of view, Gothic is not only the best, but the only rational architecture, as being that which can fit itself most easily to all services, vulgar or noble.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: A Gothic building engenders true religion ... The light, falling through colored glass, the singular forms of the architecture, unite to give a silent image of that infinite mystery which the soul for ever feels, and never comprehends.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Often in gothic novels there's a large house, an estate, and it's symbolic of that culture. Usually it's sort of moldering or rotted or something, and sometimes it's a whole community.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: At the time Gothic cathedrals were designed, most people lived in dark huts, so just walking into a space vastly larger than what they were habituated to, lit by stained glass windows, was literally awe-inspiring. Today, we're not as impressed by big buildings, so we have to go to very large mountains to experience that 'diminutive effect.'
quotes.author: Michael Persinger

quotes.quote: The principle of the Gothic architecture is infinity made imaginable. It is no doubt a sublimer effort of genius than the Greek style; but then it depends much more on execution for its effect.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: If you look at Gothic detailing right down to the bottom of a column or the capital of a column, it's a small version of the whole building; that's why, like dating the backbones of a dinosaur, a good historian can look at a detail of a Gothic building and tell you exactly what the rest of the building was, and infer the whole from the parts.
quotes.author: Charles Jencks

quotes.quote: Too bad all the people who know how to run this country are busy running taxicabs or cutting hair.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: People shouldn't be afraid of their government. Governments should be afraid of their people.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: Government exists to protect us from each other. Where government has gone beyond its limits is in deciding to protect us from ourselves.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The heaviest penalty for declining to rule is to be ruled by someone inferior to yourself.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: A government big enough to give you everything you want is a government big enough to take from you everything you have.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.quote: A nation of sheep will beget a government of wolves.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: To form a new government requires infinite care and unbounded attention; for if the foundation is badly laid, the superstructure must be bad.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: As soon as we abandon our own reason, and are content to rely upon authority, there is no end to our troubles.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russel

quotes.quote: Governments have a tendency not to solve problems, only to rearrange them.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: When a country is well governed, poverty and a mean condition are something to be ashamed of. When a country is ill governed, riches and honors are something to be ashamed of.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.quote: That government is best which governs the least, because its people discipline themselves.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: It is not the function of the government to stop the citizen from falling into error; it is the function of the citizen to keep the government from falling into error.
quotes.author: Justice Robert Jackson

quotes.quote: To be governed is to be watched, inspected, spied upon, directed, law-driven, numbered, regulated, enrolled, indoctrinated, preached at, controlled, checked, estimated, valued, censured (and) commanded, by creatures who have neither the right nor the wisdom nor the virtue to do so.
quotes.author: Pierre Joseph Prouhon

quotes.quote: Surely by now there can be few here who still believe the purpose of government is to protect us from the destructive activities of corporations. At last most of us must understand that the opposite is true: that the primary purpose of government is to protect those who run the economy from the outrage of injured citizens.
quotes.author: Derrick Jensen

quotes.quote: Governments constantly choose between telling lies and fighting wars, with the end result always being the same. One will always lead to the other.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The purpose of government is to enable the people of a nation to live in safety and happiness. Government exists for the interests of the governed, not for the governors.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Government is nothing more than the combined force of society, or the united power of the multitude, for the peace, order, safety, good and happiness of the people.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Governments should fear weariness above all. Once it sets in, it is hard to dispel and almost invariably presages decline and eventual defeat.
quotes.author: The Economist

quotes.quote: Governments need armies to protect them from their enslaved and oppressed subjects.
quotes.author: Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to live at the expense of the State. They forget that the State wants to live at the expense of everyone.
quotes.author: Fredrick Bastiat

quotes.quote: When government accepts responsibility for people, then people no longer take responsiblitiy for themselves.
quotes.author: George Pataki

quotes.quote: Government, even in its best state, is but a necessary evil; in its worst state, an intolerable one.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Relying on the government to protect your privacy is like asking a peeping tom to install your window blinds.
quotes.author: John Perry Barlow

quotes.quote: Government is not reason; it is not eloquent; it is force. Like fire, it is a dangerous servant and a fearful master.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Whenever the people are well-informed, they can be trusted with their own government.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: No man is good enough to govern another man without that other's consent.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Government is like a baby. An alimentary canal with a big appetite at one end and no sense of responsibility at the other.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: In framing a government which is to be administered by men over men the great difficulty lies in this: You must first enable thegovernment to control the governed, and in the next place, oblige it to control itself.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: Always vote for principle, though you may vote alone, and you may cherish the sweetest reflection that your vote is never lost.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: The punishment which the wise suffer who refuse to take part in the government, is to live under the government of worse men.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Only a virtuous people are capable of freedom. As nations become corrupt and vicious, they have more need of masters.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A patriot must always be ready to defend his country against his government.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: There is danger from all men. The only maxim of a free government ought to be to trust no man living with power to endanger the public liberty.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: As the happiness of the people is the sole end of government, so the consent of the people is the only foundation of it.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: A government, for protecting business only, is but a carcass, and soon falls by its own corruption and decay.
quotes.author: A. Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: The best government rests on the people and not on the few, on persons and not on property, on the free development of public opinion and not on authority
quotes.author: George Bancroft

quotes.quote: The government cannot afford to have a country made up entirely of rich people, because rich people pay so little tax that the government would quickly go bankrupt. This is why government men always tell us that labor is man's noblest calling. Government needs labor to pay its upkeep.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: The art of governmentis the organization of idolatry.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The final end ofgovernment is not to exert restraint but to do good.
quotes.author: Rufus Choate

quotes.quote: What is government but an arrangement by which the many accept the authority of the few?
quotes.author: Barbara Tuchman

quotes.quote: When there is a lack of honor in government, the morals of the whole people are poisoned.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: You can't run a government solely on a business basis ... Government should be human. It should have a heart.
quotes.author: Herbert Henry Lehman

quotes.quote: A government is the only known vessel that leaks from the top.
quotes.author: James Reston

quotes.quote: Wherever you have an efficient government you have a dictatorship.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Good government is no substitute for self-government.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Which is the best government? That which teaches us to govern ourselves.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Government is an evil; it is only the thoughtlessness and vices of men that make it a necessary evil. When all men are good and wise, government will of itself decay.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: An oppressive government is more to be feared than a tiger.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The essence of Government is power; and power, lodged as it must be in human hands, will ever be liable to abuse.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: While all other sciences have advanced, that of government is at a standstill - little better understood, little better practiced now than three or four thousand years ago.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Nothing appears more surprising to those who consider affairs with a philosophical eye, than the ease with which the many are governed by the few.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: I don't know what people have got against the government—they've done nothing.
quotes.author: Bob Hope
