quotes.quote: I'm not a fan of the government doing anything. But I've got to ask: Why isn't the government doing anything? Maybe this Ag jobs bill will help. I don't know. Like most members of Congress, I haven't read it.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: I always say gridlock's a good thing...it's what the founding fathers had in mind when they created the Senate.
quotes.author: Bob Dole

quotes.quote: The government's solution to a problem is usually as bad as the problem.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: Government doesn't solve problems, it subsidizes them.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: If you have ten thousand regulations you destroy all respect for the law
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The government is unresponsive to the needs of the little man. Under 5'7", it is impossible to get your congressman on the phone.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Our goal is to shrink the government to the size where we can drown it in the bathtub.
quotes.author: Grover Norquist

quotes.quote: The government: What we can as citizens do to reform our tax system? As you know, under our three-branch system of government, the tax laws are created by Satan. But he works through the Congress, so that's where we must focus our efforts.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: A government that robs Peter to pay Paul can always depend on the support of Paul.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Bureaucracy gives birth to itself and then expects maternity benefits.
quotes.author: Dale Dauten

quotes.quote: Government's view of the economy could be summed up in a few short phrases: If it moves, tax it. If it keeps moving, regulate it. And if it stops moving, subsidize it.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: In general, the art of government consists of taking as much money as possible from one party of the citizens to give to the other.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: All governments suffer a recurring problem: Power attracts pathological personalities.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The basis of our governments being the opinion of the people, the very first object should be to keep that right; and were it left to me to decide whether we should have a government without newspapers, or newspapers without a government, I should not hesitate a moment to prefer the latter.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A government big enough to give you everything you need is government big enough to take away everything you have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Government is a contrivance of human wisdom to provide for human wants.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: In all forms of government, the people are the true legislators
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The less government we have, the better—the fewer laws, and the less confided power.
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: That is the best government which desires to make the people happy and knows how to make them happy.
quotes.author: Lord Macaulay

quotes.quote: A government leaving it to a man to do his duty, or not, as he pleases, would be a new species of government, or rather new government at all.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: The very idea of the power and the right of the people to establish government presupposes the duty of every individual to obey established government.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: I think every nation has a right to establish that form of government under which it conceives it shall live most happy, provided it infracts no right or is not dangerous to others.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The government is the strongest of which every man feels himself a part.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: In all great changes of established governments, forms ought to give way to substance.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: A good government implies two things: fidelity to the object of government, which is the happiness of the people; secondly, a knowledge of the means by which that object can be best attained.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: We must settle this question now—whether in a free government the minority have the right to break it up whenever they choose. If we fail, it will go far to prove the incapability of the people to govern themselves.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A government can be no better than the public opinion which sustains it.
quotes.author: Franklin Delano Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The second office of the government is honorable and easy; the first is but a splendid misery.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Government is an association of men who do violence to the rest of us.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Grace isn't a little prayer you chant before receiving a meal. It's a way to live. The law tells me how crooked I am. Grace comes along and straightens me out.
quotes.author: Dwight Lyman Moody

quotes.quote: Grace is free sovereign favor to the ill-deserving.
quotes.author: Benjamin B. Warfield

quotes.quote: The grace of the spirit comes only from heaven, and lights up the whole bodily presence.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Abounding sin is the terror of the world, but abounding grace is the hope of mankind.
quotes.author: A. W. Tozer

quotes.quote: For grace is given not because we have done good works, but in order that we may be able to do them.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine Of Hippo

quotes.quote: Grace is the love that gives, that loves the unlovely and the unlovable.
quotes.author: Oswald C. Hoffmann

quotes.quote: Grace comes into the soul, as the morning sun into the world; first a dawning, then a light; and at last the sun in his full and excellent brightness.
quotes.author: Thomas Adams

quotes.quote: The law detects, grace alone conquers sin.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine Of Hippo

quotes.quote: You must pay for everything in this world one way and another. There is nothing free except the Grace of God. You cannot earn that or deserve it.
quotes.author: Charles Portis

quotes.quote: When grace moves in... guilt moves out.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Only those who are truly aware of their sin can truly cherish grace.
quotes.author: C.J. Mahaney

quotes.quote: If I'm not showing grace . . . have I forgotten the grace I've been shown'
quotes.author: John F. Macarthur Jr.

quotes.quote: Grace in women has more effect than beauty.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Grace is available for each of us every day - our spiritual daily bread - but we've got to remember to ask for it with a grateful heart and not worry about whether there will be enough for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: What gives me the most hope every day is God's grace; knowing that his grace is going to give me the strength for whatever I face, knowing that nothing is a surprise to God.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: The meaning of life. The wasted years of life. The poor choices of life. God answers the mess of life with one word: 'grace.'
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: I am redeemed and saved by grace.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Amazing grace! (how sweet the sound)That sav'd a wretch like me!I once was lost, but now am found,Was blind, but now I see.
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.quote: That is the mystery of grace: it never comes too late.
quotes.author: Franois Mauriac

quotes.quote: We cannot "psychologize" the grace of God. God's actions are outside and above our human sciences.
quotes.author: John Powell

quotes.quote: Grace means undeserved kindness. It is the gift of God to man the moment he sees he is unworthy of God's favor.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: Grace is the voice that calls us to change and then gives us the power to pull it off.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Grace is not simply leniency when we have sinned. Grace is the enabling gift of God not to sin. Grace is power, not just pardon.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: It is grace at the beginning, and grace at the end. So that when you and I come to lie upon our death beds, the one thing that should comfort and help and strengthen us there is the thing that helped us in the beginning. Not what we have been, not what we
quotes.author: D. Martyn Lloyd-Jones

quotes.quote: Your worst days are never so bad that you are beyond the reach of God's grace. And your best days are never so good that you are beyond the need of God's grace.
quotes.author: Jerry Bridges

quotes.quote: Grace needs to be the air we breathe, the atmosphere we live in, whether in church or in the home.
quotes.author: Allen Snapp

quotes.quote: Grace... expresses two complementary thoughts: God's unmerited favor to us through Christ, and God's divine assistance to us through the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: Jerry Bridges

quotes.quote: Nothing but grace makes a man so humble and, at the same time, so glad.
quotes.author: C.H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Grace can neither be bought, earned, or won by the creature. If it could be, it would cease to be grace.
quotes.author: Arthur W. Pink

quotes.quote: Grace is the very opposite of merit... Grace is not only undeserved favor, but it is favor, shown to the one who has deserved the very opposite.
quotes.author: Harry Ironside

quotes.quote: Grace is sufficient even though we huff and puff with all our might to try and find something or someone that it cannot cover. Grace is enough.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.quote: If grace is an ocean, we're all sinking.
quotes.author: John Mark Mcmillan

quotes.quote: Grace, like water, flows to the lowest part.
quotes.author: Philip Yancey

quotes.quote: We are born broken. We live mending. The grace of God is the glue.
quotes.author: Eugene O'Neill

quotes.quote: Grace saves us from life without God?even more it empowers us for life with God.
quotes.author: Richard Foster

quotes.quote: Grace is not opposed to effort; it's opposed to earning.
quotes.author: Dallas Willard

quotes.quote: God's grace, quite simply, is God's mercy and goodness toward us.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Grace is the good pleasure of God that inclines him to bestow benefits on the undeserving.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: Grace is the overflowing favor of God, and you can always count on it being available to draw upon as needed.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: Grace, then, is grace,?that is to say, it is sovereign, it is free, it is sure, it is unconditional, and it is everlasting.
quotes.author: Alexander Whyte

quotes.quote: Grace releases and affirms. It doesn't smother.Grace values the dignity of individuals. It doesn't destroy.Grace supports and encourages. It isn't jealous or suspicious.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: The grace of God means something like: Here is your life. You might never have been, but you are because the party wouldn't have been complete without you.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: Grace means the free, unmerited, unexpected love of God, and all the benefits, delights, and comforts which flow from it. It means that while we were sinners and enemies we have been treated as sons and heirs.
quotes.author: R. P. C. Hanson

quotes.quote: Grace is knowing that there is nothing you can do to make God love you more. And there is nothing you could ever do that would make God love you less.
quotes.author: Robert Brow

quotes.quote: Where God's grace takes you, grace will increase your capability and your capacity. Grace will empower you.
quotes.author: Edmond Sanganyado

quotes.quote: Grace is a message of unconditional love from the Father of the universe. It's the free offer of the eternal life. And we can experience it all in the gritty now as well as in the sweet by and by.
quotes.author: Dudley Hall

quotes.quote: Grace puts its hand on the boasting mouth, and shuts it once for all.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Grace is something you can never get but can only be given. There's no way to earn it or deserve it or bring it about anymore than you can deserve the taste of raspberries and cream or earn good looks.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: The higher a man is in grace. The lower he will be in his own esteem.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Grace means undeserved kindness. It is the gift of God to man the moment he sees he is unworthy of God's favor.
quotes.author: D.L. Moody

quotes.quote: Grace is love that cares and stoops and rescues.
quotes.author: John Stott

quotes.quote: God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that having all sufficiency in all things at all times, you may abound in every good work.
quotes.author: 2 Corinthians 9:8

quotes.quote: Grace and truth came through Jesus Christ. You are not under the law but under grace.
quotes.author: Romans 6:14

quotes.quote: Be strengthened by the grace that is in Christ Jesus.
quotes.author: 2 Timothy 2:1

quotes.quote: May grace and peace be multiplied to you.
quotes.author: 1 Peter 1:2

quotes.quote: When I speak of a person growing in grace, I mean simply this - that his sense of sin is becoming deeper, his faith stronger, his hope brighter, his love more extensive, and his spritual mindedness more marked.
quotes.author: J.C Ryle

quotes.quote: Grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ
quotes.author: 2 Peter 3:18

quotes.quote: We are saved by grace through faith but "unto good works".
quotes.author: Ephesians 2:8-10

quotes.quote: God's grace, that principle of his new birth, gives him continual dislike to sin.
quotes.author: Hammond

quotes.quote: That grace will carry us, if we do not wilfully betray our succours, victoriously through all difficulties.
quotes.author: Hammond

quotes.quote: But the grace of God is pleased to move us by ways suitable to our nature, and to sanctify these sensible helps to higher purposes.
quotes.author: South

quotes.quote: Every degree of recession from the state of grace Christ first put us in is a recession from our hopes.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: Grace is in a great measure a natural gift; elegance implies cultivation, or something of more artificial character.
quotes.author: Whately

quotes.quote: The general rule is, that elegance is the characteristic of art, and grace of nature.
quotes.author: Whately

quotes.quote: Grace, like beauty, is one of those spontaneous inherent qualities which, through felt and acknowledged by all, yet have never been satisfactorily explained.
quotes.author: Winckelman

quotes.quote: Grace can never properly be said to exist without beauty, for it is only in the elegant proportions of beautiful forms that can be found that harmonious variety of line and motion which is the essence and charm of grace.
quotes.author: Winckelman

quotes.quote: Grace is to the body what good sense is to the mind.
quotes.author: Rochefoucald

quotes.quote: The word of the truth of the gospel is bringing forth fruit since the day you heard and knew the grace of God in truth.
quotes.author: Colossians 1:5-6

quotes.quote: The word of the truth of the gospel is bringing forth fruit since the day you heard and knew the grace of God in truth.
quotes.author: Colossians 1:5-6

quotes.quote: This is still the age of grace.
quotes.author: 2 Corithian 6:2

quotes.quote: When you pick up the cross of unpopularity, wherever you may be, you will find God's grace is there, more than sufficient to meet your every need.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: May God give you grace to "triumph in affliction".
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: We are living in an age of grace, in which God promises that "whosever will" may come and receive His son. But this period of grace will not go on idefinitely.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Only as we bow in contrition, confession, and repetance at the foot of the cross, can we find forgiveness. There is the grace of God.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The motive of grace is the infinite.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Whatever is unlike Christ in conduct, speech, or disposition grieves the Spirit of grace.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Grace must find expression in life, otherwise it is not Grace.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.quote: Grace means more than gifts.
quotes.author: B.C. Aronson

quotes.quote: In grace something is transcended, once and for all overcome.
quotes.author: B.C. Aronson

quotes.quote: Grace happens in spite of something; it happens in spite of separateness and alienation.
quotes.author: B.C. Aronson

quotes.quote: Grace means that life is once again united with life, self is reconciled with self.
quotes.author: B.C. Aronson

quotes.quote: Grace means accepting the abandoned one.
quotes.author: B.C. Aronson

quotes.quote: Grace transform fate into a meaningful vocation. It transforms guilt to trust and courage. The word grace has something triumphant in it.
quotes.author: Yrjo Kallinen

quotes.quote: Grace is an attribute of God rather than a gfit from God.
quotes.author: Louis Cassels

quotes.quote: Grace in the theological sense is that force that infuses our lives, that keeps letting us off the hook.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Grace is the light or electricity or juice or breeze that takes you from that isolated place and puts you with others who are startled and embarassed and eventually grateful as you are to be there.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Grace is the refinement of your soul through time.
quotes.author: Jewel

quotes.quote: I guess grace doesn't have to be logical. If it did, it wouldn't be grace.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The daily bread of grace, without which nothing can be achieved, is given to the extent to which we ourselves give and forgive.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: We need grace in order to be able to live in such a way as to qualify ourselves to receive grace.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Spritual grace can't be received continuously or in its fullness, except by those who have willed away their self-will to the point of being able truthfully to say, "Not I, but God in me."
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: It was Grace that taught my heart to fear, and Grace my fears relieved; how precious did that Grace appear the hour I first believed.This Grace hath brought me safe thus far and Grace will lead me home.
quotes.author: B.C. Aronson

quotes.quote: Sometimes we get so caught up in the future, we forget to take pleasure in what we have. We becomes so obsessed with "I want, I want, I want," there is no room left to notice that we are already standing neck deep in grace.
quotes.author: Carolyn Hobbs

quotes.quote: The reality of grace encompasses many elements, and different elements need to be highlighted in different historical periods, depending on the needs of time.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Dreyer

quotes.quote: What better way to have grace with ourselves and others than to laugh and let go when life gets too uptight?
quotes.author: Emily Ley

quotes.quote: When we show God's love and grace to ourselves and the people around us, we become living, breathing examples of His perfect love.
quotes.author: Emily Ley

quotes.quote: Live a life of grace, not perfection.
quotes.author: Emily Ley

quotes.quote: We each have the freedom to live the good life if we choose to embrace grace, not perfection.
quotes.author: Emily Ley

quotes.quote: What is so amazing about grace is that it is free - free for imperfect and unworthy people like us.
quotes.author: Emily Ley

quotes.quote: God gave us His free gift of grace through out faith in Him.
quotes.author: Emily Ley

quotes.quote: Grace and only grace offers, a deep breath, a place to rest and the opportunity to slow down and savor what truly matters.
quotes.author: Emily Ley

quotes.quote: Be gracious to all men, but choose the best to be your friends.
quotes.author: Isocrates

quotes.quote: Gracious self is the divinity within.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Kindness is gracious demonstrate sensitivity and human warmth.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: The people who tend to be the most gracious are those who know how badly they need grace.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: God is gracious to some very peculiar people.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: A sweet lie is more gracious for us than a virulent but real truth.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: The real champions in life are so humble and gracious. They just continue doing what they do without all the posturing. If you've got the real thing, you don't have to flaunt a loud imitation.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: How gracious to forgive the people who hurt you.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Gracious words refresh, restore and revive the soul.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Gracious living is felt whether it is created in small or big ways.
quotes.author: Emilie Barnes

quotes.quote: Your graciousness is what carries you. It isn't how old you are, how young you are, how beautiful you are, or how short your skirt is. What it is, is what comes out of your heart. If you are gracious, you have won the game.
quotes.author: Stevie Nicks

quotes.quote: It is compassion, the most gracious of virtues, Which moves the world.
quotes.author: Thiruvalluvar

quotes.quote: A gracious soul may look through the darkest cloud and see God smiling on him.
quotes.author: Thomas Brooks

quotes.quote: Gracious acceptance is an art—an art which most never bother to cultivate. We think that we have to learn how to give, but we forget about accepting things, which can be much harder than giving... Accepting another person's gift is allowing him to express his feelings for you.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: Be pretty if you can, be witty if you must, but be gracious if it kills you.
quotes.author: Elsie de Wolfe

quotes.quote: God is gracious beyond the power of language to describe.
quotes.author: Francis Asbury

quotes.quote: There is hardly a more gracious gift that we can offer somebody than to accept them fully, to love them almost despite themselves.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: If a man be gracious and courteous to strangers, it shows he is a citizen of the world.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Be gracious in your giving for as long as you're living. The blessings will come back on an unexpected day, and present themselves in an unexpected way.
quotes.author: Joan Marques

quotes.quote: God is gracious to always give a warning before He sends judgment.
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: To refuse graciously is to confer a favor.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Hope is a gracious expectation.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Life is a gracious gift.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: We can graciously survive life by faith.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: It is gracious to have old people full of vitality and endowed with wisdom in our society.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You learn how to be a gracious winner and an outstanding loser.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.quote: The man who graduates today and stops learning tomorrow is uneducated the day after.
quotes.author: Newton D. Baker

quotes.quote: We don't stop going to school when we graduate.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: When you graduate from college, they tell you to follow your dreams. Does anyone say you have to wake up first?
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Life is my college. May I graduate well, and earn some honors!
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Graduation is only a concept. In real life every day you graduate. Graduation is a process that goes on until the last day of your life. If you can grasp that, you'll make a difference.
quotes.author: Arie Pencovici

quotes.quote: Every year, many, many stupid people graduate from college. And if they can do it, so can you.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Graduating college in four years is like leaving a party at 10:30
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The day you graduate is not the end of your school career, but, it is the beginning of a new life full of adventure and excitement.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Time is not measured by the passing of years but by what one does, what one feels, and what one achieves.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: You are educated. Your certification is in your degree. You may think of it as the ticket to the good life. Let me ask you to think of an alternative. Think of it as your ticket to change the world.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: God will not look you over for medals degrees or diplomas, but for scars.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The fireworks begin today. Each diploma is a lighted match. Each one of you is a fuse.
quotes.author: Edward Koch

quotes.quote: To those of you who received honors, awards and distinctions, I say well done. And to the C students, I say you too may one day be president of the United States.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: All real education is the architecture of the soul.
quotes.author: William Bennett

quotes.quote: You're not going to get very far in life based on what you already know. You're going to advance in life by what you're going to learn after you leave here.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Education is the best provision for old age.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The important thing is the educational experience itself how to survive it.
quotes.author: Donald Barthelme

quotes.quote: One half who graduate from college never read another book.
quotes.author: G. M. Trevelyan

quotes.quote: I'm going to graduate on time, no matter how long it takes.
quotes.author: Joe Theismann

quotes.quote: Successful graduates from the school of life thrive on failed attempts.
quotes.author: Kamil Ali

quotes.quote: People who enroll themselves in the schools of pride, eventually graduate with and high degree of fall. Failure employs prides scholars. Get rusticated now!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: There is a good reason they call these ceremonies commencement exercises. Graduation is not the end; it's the beginning.
quotes.author: Orrin Hatch

quotes.quote: All that stands between the graduate and the top of the ladder is the ladder
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.
quotes.author: Wendy Wasserstein

quotes.quote: Your schooling may be over, but remember that your education still continues.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The trouble with learning from experience is that you never graduate.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: I think sleeping was my problem in school. If school had started at 4:00 in the afternoon, I'd be a college graduate today.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.quote: If you feel that you have both feet planted on level ground, then the university has failed you.
quotes.author: Robert Goheen

quotes.quote: Just about a month from now I'm set adrift, with a diploma for a sail and lots of nerve for oars.
quotes.author: Richard Halliburton

quotes.quote: It's so important to understand your good attendance ups your chances of graduating.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: Students graduating with high debt encounter difficulties in qualifying for home and automobile loans.
quotes.author: Hank Johnson

quotes.quote: You are graduating from college. That means that this is the first day of the last day of your life. No, that's wrong. This is the last day of the first day of school. Nope, that's worse. This is a day.
quotes.author: Andy Samberg

quotes.quote: For many, graduation marks the end of formal student life - the end of long spring breaks and of thinking that a 10 A.M. class is far too early.
quotes.author: Alexa Von Tobel

quotes.quote: There is nothing more beautiful than finding your course as you believe you bob aimlessly in the current. Wouldn’t you know that your path was there all along, waiting for you to knock, waiting for you to become. This path does not belong to your parents, your teachers, your leaders, or your lovers. Your path is your character defining itself more and more everyday like a photograph coming into focus.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: The best thing about graduating from the university was that I finally had time to sit on a log and read a good book.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: If knowledge is power and power is knowledge, then how so many idiots be graduating from college?
quotes.author: Coolio

quotes.quote: The cost of college education today is so high that many young people are giving up their dream of going to college, while many others are graduating deeply in debt.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: Not graduating high school on time leads to fewer chances of attending college and obtaining good paying jobs, and creates instead higher chances of incarceration and unemployment.
quotes.author: Al Sharpton

quotes.quote: Congratulations! You made it! It's time to celebrate all the hard work that led to this joyful occasion. The road to graduation is a long, steep climb, so take a moment at the summit to be proud of your accomplishments.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: You did it, even when you didn't feel like studying - you did it. Congratulations!
quotes.author: Kate Summers

quotes.quote: Graduation is a time of completion, of finishing, of an ending, however, it is also a time of celebration of achievement and a beginning for you.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Use your achievement that we are celebrating tonight to launch yourselves … maybe into other education opportunities, personal goals or career job prospects. This is just the beginning. You have the guts and you have the dedication and you have the skill, obviously, to achieve what you achieved today.
quotes.author: Francine St. Amand

quotes.quote: Now the first suggestion is to aim high, but be aware that even before you have reached your ultimate professional destination, if you always strive for excellence, you can and should have a substantial impact on the world in which you live.
quotes.author: Sandra Day O’Connor

quotes.quote: My dear, terrified graduates, you are about to enter the most uncertain and thrilling period of your lives.
quotes.author: Lin-Manuel Miranda

quotes.quote: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: A graduation ceremony is an event where the commencement speaker tells thousands of students dressed in identical caps and gowns that 'individuality' is the key to success.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: There are serious questions over the mix of qualifications being obtained. In total 23% of all graduating students want to work in media or marketing. I should think the true demand for such graduates is a tenth of that. Yet there are desperate shortages of pharmacists, dentists, chefs, plumbers and the like. We are producing thousands of graduates with unrealistic expectations and irrelevant qualifications.
quotes.author: Luke Johnson

quotes.quote: Behind every kid who completes four years of college there stand two parents who are also graduating—magna cum bankrupt.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: You're leaving college now, and going out into real life. And you have to realize that real life is not like college. Real life is like high school.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: Summing up, it is clear the future holds great opportunities. It also holds pitfalls. The trick will be to avoid the pitfalls, seize the opportunities, and get back home by six o'clock.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Graduation day—the high point of college. The commencement speech—the low point of graduation day.
quotes.author: Robert Novak

quotes.quote: As you take leave of your school, as you graduate into a new life of the mind, may each of you ask yourself this: What am I doing to increase the sum of hope of the world? What am I doing to teach someone else what I have learned?
quotes.author: Arthur Burns

quotes.quote: Here's to the graduate. Although your life in school is now complete, the school of life is just beginning!
quotes.author: Jennifer Rahel Conover

quotes.quote: We want students and graduates to recognize that America's colleges have not been built up, have not been developed, merely to advance the private economic interest of its graduates. They have a greater purpose in mind. No college graduate can go out from any college today without being a man of his Nation and a man of his time, without pursuing in his own life, not only his private interest, but the welfare of his country.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Graduation is not a signal that one is prepared to practice for a career lifetime. It's simply a license to hit the turf running and to keep learning.
quotes.author: Betsy Plank

quotes.quote: A hundred years ago, it was inconceivable for a woman to *be* a college graduate! I think, perhaps, you should look back to see how far we've come!
quotes.author: Jocelyn Carr

quotes.quote: No one wants to think at graduation! It's graduation, the time when we celebrate being done with thinking.
quotes.author: Haley Dunphy

quotes.quote: It’s a day for celebrating, that moment y’all been waiting / Hats up in the air, it’s time for graduation / Diplomas and you planned, long summer vacation / Let’s toast to graduating, let’s toast to graduating.
quotes.author: Byron Jones

quotes.quote: 6 Years ago / The best thing occurred / I got in a school that I had never heard / It all seemed so real / I honestly could feel / My life turning like a steering wheel / And I know we all have these feelings in life / Where you feel like you just don't know where you're going / Thank God / He takes you where you're meant to be going / And now we're here, right here / Graduating right here / Thank God, Thank God / Were graduating.
quotes.author: Lily Antonini

quotes.quote: At times like this it’s very hard / to know just what to say / for friends would like to comfort you / and take your grief away. / But may it reassure you / to keep within your mind / the thought held dear in memory / of school days left behind. / Lazy days are over, / no classes left to skip, / for if you miss a day of work / your foreman cracks the whip. / Our sympathies are with you / on Graduation Day / for it’s time to face reality; / you’ve played….it’s time to pay! / Yes, laugh lines turn to wrinkles / as the world grinds you down. / It’s sad to see, I’m here to tell, / when you pack your cap and gown. / Outside the ivy covered walls / life’s woes are cruel to see… / so maybe you should think about / A Post Graduate Degree!!!
quotes.author: Don Stephens

quotes.quote: Don't always worry what your next line is going to be.
quotes.author: Dick Costolo

quotes.quote: You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition. What you'll discover will be wonderful. What you'll discover is yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: As you start your journey, the first thing you should do is throw away that store-bought map and begin to draw your own.
quotes.author: Michael Dell

quotes.quote: You are educated. Your certification is in your degree. You may think of it as the ticket to the good life. Let me ask you to think of an alternative. Think of it as your ticket to change the world.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: Graduation is only a concept. In real life every day you graduate. Graduation is a process that goes on until the last day of your life. If you can grasp that, you'll make a difference.
quotes.author: Arie Pencovici

quotes.quote: When you leave here, don't forget why you came.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.quote: The fireworks begin today. Each diploma is a lighted match. Each one of you is a fuse.
quotes.author: Edward Koch

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Take pride in how far you've come. Have faith in how far you can go. But don't forget to enjoy the journey.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to take a big step if one is indicated. You can't cross a chasm in two small jumps.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: The morning after my high-school graduation found me up early job hunting. The dream of college I put on the back burner.
quotes.author: Martha Reeves

quotes.quote: Just remember, you can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: For the most important decisions in your life, trust your intuition, and then work with everything you have, to prove it right.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: Life has a very simple plot: first you're here and then you're not.
quotes.author: Eric Idle

quotes.quote: That diploma you hold in your hands today is really just your learner's permit for the rest of the drive through life. Remember, you don't have to be smarter than the next person, all you have to do is be willing to work harder than the next person.
quotes.author: Jimmy Iovine

quotes.quote: Life is an improvisation. You have no idea what's going to happen next and you are mostly just making things up as you go along.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Graduation is a time of completion, of finishing, of an ending, however, it is also a time of celebration of achievement and a beginning for the new graduate.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: At commencement you wear your square-shaped mortarboards. My hope is that from time to time you will let your minds be bold, and wear sombreros.
quotes.author: Paul Freund

quotes.quote: There is a good reason they call these ceremonies ' commencement exercises'. Graduation is not the end; it's the beginning.
quotes.author: Orrin Hatch

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: I will reach for the stars no matter how hard it seems, and fly like a bird with the knowledge this journey brings.
quotes.author: Semetra C. Vanison

quotes.quote: You can accomplish wonders through focus and persistence. Over time, the fruits of your efforts will multiply to yield a luxuriant carpet of achievement.
quotes.author: Gina Mohammed, Ph. D.

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A graduation ceremony is an event where the commencement speaker tells thousands of students dressed in identical caps and gowns that "individuality" is the key to success.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: The first of many graduations of life. From elementary school to senior school, each one holds successes for you to enjoy.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Be aware that even before you have reached your ultimate professional destination, if you always strive for excellence, you can and should have a substantial impact on the world in which you live.
quotes.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

quotes.quote: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The unfortunate, yet truly exciting thing about your life, is that there is no core curriculum. The entire place is an elective.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: Follow your passion. Stay true to yourself. Never follow someone else’s path unless you’re in the woods and you’re lost and you see a path. By all means, you should follow that.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Instruction ends in the schoolroom, but education ends only with life.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Robertson

quotes.quote: Not graduating high school on time leads to fewer chances of attending college and obtaining good paying jobs, and creates instead higher chances of incarceration and unemployment.
quotes.author: Al Sharpton

quotes.quote: Graduating high school was really emotional for me. I'd obviously made a huge thing out of what that experience was for me, and saying goodbye to it was very weird. So I had to be like, boom, onward and upward.
quotes.author: Tavi Gevinson

quotes.quote: Look in the mirror tonight. Who is that man? Who is that woman? She is the work of your life. He is its greatest glory.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Young ladies and gentlemen, this is not your world yet. You have to make it.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: It is indeed ironic that we spend our school days yearning to graduate and our remaining days waxing nostalgic about our school days.
quotes.author: Isabel Waxman

quotes.quote: It is critical that you continually assess where you are in all facets of your life, determine where you want to go, and set goals that you wish to achieve. But remember, achieving your goals is not your destination, just part of your journey.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.quote: Gaining knowledge is our only hope for survival. Passing that knowledge on to future generations is our most important challenge.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: My job is to bore you and let the hardness of your seat and the warmth of your robe prepare you for what is to come.
quotes.author: William McNeill

quotes.quote: People will frighten you about a graduation. They use words you don't hear often: "And we wish you Godspeed." It is a warning, Godspeed. It means you are no longer welcome here at these prices.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: You cannot help but learn more as you take the world into your hands. Take it up reverently, for it is an old piece of clay, with millions of thumbprints on it.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: As you take leave of your school, as you graduate into a new life of the mind, may each of you ask yourself this: What am I doing to increase the sum hope of the world? What am I doing to teach someone else what I have learned?
quotes.author: Arthur Burns

quotes.quote: Education should be a lifelong process, the formal period serving as a foundation on which life's structure may rest and rise.
quotes.author: Robert H. Jackson

quotes.quote: Education is what survives when what has been learned has been forgotten.
quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

quotes.quote: Your families are extremely proud of you. You can't imagine the sense of relief they are experiencing. This would be a most opportune time to ask for money.
quotes.author: Gary Bolding

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: Incredible as it may sound, of the over 3.7 million high school graduates this year, less than 2% can tell you what a fax machine is, name a Caucasian president, or know who Derek Zoolander was!
quotes.author: Matt Lauer

quotes.quote: It's a time for joy, a time for tears / A time we'll treasure through the years / We'll remember always / Graduation day. / Though we leave in sorrow / All the joys we've known / We can face tomorrow / Knowing we'll never walk alone. / When the ivy walls are far behind / No matter where our paths may wind / We'll remember always / Graduation day.
quotes.author: Miri Ben-Ari; Kanye Omari West; John R. Stephens

quotes.quote: It's your Graduation Day today / And you look so happy / Today is the day / Cheer and dance with your friends (go ahead) / Today is your special day / Your tears and sweat are at an end / Today marks your arrival / You sacrificed so many nights / You deserve that giant title / You have earned the right.
quotes.author: Sam Speron

quotes.quote: It's a revelation, / Celebration, / Graduation, / Times collide, / Watch the world awaken / All the past regrets from days gone by, / Let it go, / Let it die.
quotes.author: Adam Wakeman; John Osbourne; Kevin Churko

quotes.quote: As a lot of us have found out, graduation only means that you are ready to keep learning, to keep your skills advanced and growing because you never know when you will find yourself out on the street.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Graduation, a conclusion of one chapter, a beginning of another.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The man who graduates today and stops learning tomorrow is uneducated the day after.
quotes.author: Newton D. Baker

quotes.quote: Commencement speeches were invented largely in the belief that outgoing college students should never be released into the world until they have been properly sedated.
quotes.author: Garry Trudeau

quotes.quote: Graduation is just the spark to a fire, in order to keep it going you have build up a stack of knowledge logs.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is a good reason they call these ceremonies ' commencement exercises'. Graduation is not the end; it's the beginning.
quotes.author: Orrin Hatch

quotes.quote: The first of many graduations of life. From elementary school to senior school, each one holds successes for you to enjoy.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Life is my college. May I graduate well, and earn some honours!
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Your graduation is a milestone in your life.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Graduation is not the end but the beginning of our bigger life and bigger challenges in life to face.
quotes.author: May Ann

quotes.quote: It is indeed ironic that we spend our school days yearning to graduate and our remaining days waxing nostalgic about our school days.
quotes.author: Isabel Waxman

quotes.quote: Just about a month from now I'm set adrift, with a diploma for a sail and lots of nerve for oars.
quotes.author: Richard Halliburton

quotes.quote: Graduation is a time of completion, of finishing, of an ending, however, it is also a time of celebration of achievement and a beginning for the new graduate.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Graduation is an exciting time. It's both an ending and a beginning; it's warm memories of the past and big dreams for the future.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are educated. Your certification is in your degree. You may think of it as the ticket to the good life. Let me ask you to think of an alternative. Think of it as your ticket to change the world.Â
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: Graduation is only a concept. In real life every day you graduate. Graduation is a process that goes onÂ  until the last day of your life. If you can grasp that, you'll make a difference.
quotes.author: Arie Pencovici

quotes.quote: Graduation is the beginning of knowing who you are, what you are, why you are, and always knowing where you are going.
quotes.author: Dr. Lydia Patton

quotes.quote: Graduation is the end of therotical knowledge and the start of practical life.
quotes.author: Geetha Laxman

quotes.quote: Every year, many, many stupid people graduate from college. And if they can do it, so can you.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: A graduation ceremony is an event where the commencement speaker tells thousands of students dressed in identical caps and gowns that "individuality" is the key to success.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: For many, graduation marks the end of formal student life - the end of long spring breaks and of thinking that a 10 A.M. class is far too early.
quotes.author: Alexa Von Tobel

quotes.quote: At graduation you wear your square-shaped mortarboards. My hope is that from time to time you will let your minds be bold, and wear sombreros.
quotes.author: Paul Freund

quotes.quote: That diploma you hold in your hands today is really just your learner's permit for the rest of the drive through life. Remember, you don't have to be smarter than the next person, all you have to do is be willing to work harder than the next person.
quotes.author: Jimmy Iovine

quotes.quote: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Graduation isn't the closing of a door, It's the opening of a thousand.
quotes.author: Dan Schultz

quotes.quote: Graduation is not the end; it's the beginning.
quotes.author: Senator Orrin Hatch

quotes.quote: The fireworks begin today. Each diploma is a lighted match, each one of you is a fuse.
quotes.author: Ed Koch

quotes.quote: Graduation is like the day of reckoning! you will be judge based on what you have planted. Graduation day is not a victory to celebrate! But a day to start again another beginning!
quotes.author: Mark Alonzo

quotes.quote: The tassel's worth the hassle!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Rehearsal's over. You're going out there now, you're going to do this thing. How you live matters. You're going to fall down, but the world doesn't care how many times you fall down, as long as it's one fewer than the number of times you get back up.
quotes.author: Aaron Sorkin

quotes.quote: Graduation is the first step to truly living. Graduation is also the first time you are able to do what you want with your life, without anyone holding you back or telling you no.
quotes.author: Michael Pipper

quotes.quote: As you start your journey, the first thing you should do is throw away that store-bought map and begin to draw your own.
quotes.author: Michael Dell

quotes.quote: If you walk out of here with a diploma in your hand, you better walk out of here with something these professors put in your heads, too. And retain it, or you're going to be in bad trouble.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: As we look around here today at all of the people who helped make us who we are, I know it feels like we're saying goodbye, but we will carry a piece of each other into everything that we do next to remind us of who we are, and who we're meant to be.
quotes.author: Gwen Stacey (Emma Stone)

quotes.quote: You've got the makings of greatness in you, but you gotta take the helm and chart your own course. Stick to it, no matter the squalls! And when the time comes, you get the chance to really test the cut of your sails, and show what you're made of...well, I hope I'm there, catching some of the light coming off you that day.
quotes.author: John Silver (Brian Murray)

quotes.quote: The journey is what brings us happiness, not the destination.
quotes.author: Dan Millman (Scott Mechlowicz)

quotes.quote: What do we leave behind when we cross each frontier? Each moment seems split in two; melancholy for what was left behind and the excitement of entering a new land.
quotes.author: Ernesto Guevara de la Serna (Gael Garcia Bernal)

quotes.quote: But from this afternoon onward, you relinquish all your immunities. Within an hour, you will be on your own. Good luck. I have a feeling that some of you will need it.
quotes.author: Andrew Hacker

quotes.quote: I just wanted to say that you're all winners. And I could not be happier that this school year's ending.
quotes.author: Mr. Duvall (Tim Meadows)

quotes.quote: If you never do anything, you never become anyone.
quotes.author: Jenny Mellor (Carey Mulligan)

quotes.quote: My friends, I address you all tonight as you truly are, wizards, mermaids, travelers, adventurers, magicians. Come and dream with me.
quotes.author: Georges Melies (Ben Kingsley)

quotes.quote: I am on my way / I can go the distance / I don't care how far / Somehow I'll be strong / I know every mile / Will be worth my while / I would go most anywhere / To find where I must belong.
quotes.author: Hercules(Robert Bart)

quotes.quote: You just can't stay seventeen forever.
quotes.author: Steve Bollander (Ron Howard)

quotes.quote: Well, what can I say? I graduated. It's over; I did it. I know most of you are saying, 'Hey any idiot could do that,' Well... it was tough for me, so BACK OFF!'
quotes.author: Billy Madison (Adam Sandler)

quotes.quote: You cannot help but learn more as you take the world into your hands. Take it up reverently, for it is an old piece of clay, with millions of thumbprints on it.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Find a partner to love and a job you adore so much you would do for free—although you really do have to demand that they pay you.
quotes.author: Gail Collins

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: It is good to have an end to journey toward, but it is the journey that matters in the end.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: I am learning all the time. The tombstone will be my diploma.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: Instruction ends in the schoolroom, but education ends only with life.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Robertson

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: My dear terrified graduates, you are about to enter the most uncertain and thrilling period of your lives. The stories you are about to live are the ones you will be telling your children, and grandchildren, and therapists.
quotes.author: Lin Manuel Miranda

quotes.quote: The only thing that ever sat its way to success was a hen.
quotes.author: Sarah Brown

quotes.quote: To those of you who received honors, awards and distinctions, I say well done. And to the C students, I say you too may one day be president of the United States.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car, but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Education is the key to unlocking the world, a passport to freedom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Now go, and make interesting mistakes, make amazing mistakes, make glorious and fantastic mistakes. Break rules. Leave the world more interesting for you being here. Make good art.
quotes.author: Neil Gaimann

quotes.quote: Your life is your story, and the adventure ahead of you is the journey to fulfill your own purpose and potential.
quotes.author: Kerry Washington

quotes.quote: The writer who neglects punctuation, or mispunctuates, is liable to be misunderstood for the want of merely a comma, it often occurs that an axiom appears a paradox, or that a sarcasm is converted into a sermonoid.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: A man's grammar, like Caesar's wife, should not only be pure, but above suspicion of impurity.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Every language has a grammar, a set of rules that govern usage and meaning, and literary language is no different. It's all more or less arbitrary of course, just like language itself.
quotes.author: Thomas C. Foster

quotes.quote: It's perfectly obvious that there is some genetic factor that distinguishes humans from other animals and that it is language-specific. The theory of that genetic component, whatever it turns out to be, is what is called universal grammar.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Every English poet should master the rules of grammar before he attempts to bend or break them.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: Grammar is politics by other means.
quotes.author: Donna J. Haraway

quotes.quote: Damn the subjunctive. It brings all our writers to shame.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is like a grammar lesson: you find the present tense, but the past perfect!
quotes.author: Owens Lee Pomeroy

quotes.quote: Arguments over grammar and style are often as fierce as those over IBM versus Mac, and as fruitless as Coke versus Pepsi and boxers versus briefs
quotes.author: Jack Lynch

quotes.quote: It is well to remember thatÂ grammarÂ is common speech formulated.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: If Language is a Flower then without Grammar it will not smell.
quotes.author: Purushottam Muley

quotes.quote: Like everything metaphysical the harmony between thought and reality is to be found in the grammar of the language.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: Moods are adjectives of the grammar of life.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: When a thought takes one's breath away, a lesson in grammar seems an impertinence.
quotes.author: Thomas W. Higginson

quotes.quote: Grammar, which knows how to control even kings.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: In grammar, as in war, there is strength in numbers.
quotes.author: Martin Worthington

quotes.quote: Forming grammatically correct sentences is for the normal individual the prerequisite for any submission to social laws. No one is supposed to be ignorant of grammaticality; those who are belong in special institutions. The unity of language is fundamentally political.
quotes.author: Gilles Deleuze

quotes.quote: Descriptive grammar is an attempt to give an account of what the current system is for either a society or an individual, whatever you happen to be studying.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Grammar is the grave of letters.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Grammar stops at love, and at art.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Social criticism begins with grammar and the re-establishing of meanings.
quotes.author: Octavio Paz

quotes.quote: Grammar is the greatest joy in life, don't you find?
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Perfect grammar--persistent, continuous, sustained--is the fourth dimension, so to speak: many have sought it, but none has found it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Grammar is a piano I play by ear. All I know about grammar is its power.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: The past, the present, and the future walked into a bar. It was tense.
quotes.author: Lex Martin

quotes.quote: It is only in grammar that the mighty can be bound by rules made by the humble.
quotes.author: Agona Apell

quotes.quote: Grammar Checker â€“ A software program that is not needed by those who know grammar and virtually useless for those who don't.
quotes.author: Richard E. Turner

quotes.quote: Grammar is like a strive for perfection. It's useless really.
quotes.author: S. Khemka

quotes.quote: A preposition is a terrible thing to end a sentence with.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Each letter of the alphabet is a steadfast loyal soldier in a great army of words, sentences, paragraphs, and stories. One letter falls, and the entire language falters.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Historical grammar is a study of how, say, modern English developed from Middle English, and how that developed from Early and Old English, and how that developed from Germanic, and that developed from what's called Proto-Indo-European, a source system that nobody speaks, so you have to try to reconstruct it.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Grammar to a writer is to a mountaineer a good pair of hiking boots or, more precisely, to a deep-sea diver an oxygen tank.
quotes.author: A.A. Patawaran

quotes.quote: There's a fine line between funny and annoying â€“ and it's exactly the width of a quotation mark. But it's not the quotation mark that deserves our wrath. It's our bad habitsâ€¦
quotes.author: Martha Brockenbrough

quotes.quote: Grammar, n. A system of pitfalls thoughtfully prepared for the feet of the self-made man, along the path by which he advances to distinction.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Ill-fitting grammar are like ill-fitting shoes. You can get used to it for a bit, but then one day your toes fall off and you can't walk to the bathroom.
quotes.author: Jasper Fforde

quotes.quote: Grammar is the breathing power for the life of language.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: The past is always tense, the future perfect.
quotes.author: Zadie Smith

quotes.quote: Do not be surprised when those who ignore the rules of grammar also ignore the law. After all, the law is just so much grammar.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Grammar is to a writer what anatomy is to a sculptor or the scales to a musician. You may loathe it, it may bore you, but nothing will replace it, and once mastered it will support you like a rock.
quotes.author: B.J. Chute

quotes.quote: To be loose with grammar is to be loose with the worst woman in the world.
quotes.author: Otis C. Edwards

quotes.quote: Your grammar is a reflection of your image. Good or bad, you have made an impression. And like all impressions, you are in total control.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: Grammar is like your overarching compulsion. It's math with words.
quotes.author: Thomm Quackenbush

quotes.quote: Grammar and logic free language from being at the mercy of the tone of voice.
quotes.author: Rosenstock Huessy

quotes.quote: Language, never forget, is more fashion than science, and matters of usage, spelling, and pronunciation tend to wander around like hemlines.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: People do not invent languages by writing grammars, they write grammars â€“ at least, the first grammars to be written for any given language â€“ by observing the tacit, largely unconscious, rules that people seem to be applying when they speak. Yet once a book exists, and especially once it is employed in schoolrooms, people feel that the rules are not just descriptions of how people do talk, but prescriptions for how they should talk.
quotes.author: David Graeber

quotes.quote: Grammar is not a time of waste.
quotes.author: Nancy Cartwright

quotes.quote: There is a satisfactory boniness about grammar which the flesh of sheer vocabulary requires before it can become a vertebrate and walk the earth.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: Only in grammar can you be more than perfect.
quotes.author: William Safire

quotes.quote: Grammar is the logic of speech, even as logic is the grammar of reason.
quotes.author: Richard C. Trench

quotes.quote: Not only humble but umble which I look upon to be the comparative, or, indeed, superlative degree.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: Whenever the literary German dives into a sentence, that is the last you are going to see of him till he emerges on the other side of his Atlantic with his verb in his mouth.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Why care for grammar as long as we are good?
quotes.author: Artemus Ward

quotes.quote: A Grammar book does not attempt to teach people how they ought to speak, but on the contrary, unless it is a very bad or very old work, it merely states how, as a matter of fact, certain people do speak at the time at which it is written.
quotes.author: H.C. Wyld

quotes.quote: I never made a mistake in grammar but once in my life and as soon as I done it I seen it.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: English Grammar is the art of speaking and writing the English language with propriety.
quotes.author: Lindley Murray

quotes.quote: A certain young man never knew / Just when to say whom and when who; / 'The question of choosing,' / He said, 'is confusing; / I wonder if which wouldn't do?'
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Irregularity in grammar seems like the epitome of human eccentricity and quirkiness.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: There can be no correctness apart from usage.
quotes.author: C.C. Fries

quotes.quote: Purism, whether in grammar or in vocabulary, almost always means ignorance. Language was made before grammar, not grammar before language.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: I am still studying verbs and the mystery of how they connect nouns. I am more suspicious of adjectives than at any other time in all my born days.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: I demand that my books be judged with the utmost severity, by knowledgeable people who know the rules of grammar and of logic, and who will seek beneath the footsteps of my commas the lice of my thought in the head of my style.
quotes.author: Louis Aragon

quotes.quote: Sentence structure is innate but whining is acquired.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: You can be a little ungrammatical if you come from the right part of the country.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: I thought the conjugation of verbs meant saying, 'Drink, drank, drunk.' I asked Kaplan to conjugate 'fail,' and he said 'Fail, failed, bankrupt.'
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.quote: A school child should be taught grammar—for the same reason that a medical student should study anatomy. Having learned about the exciting mysteries of an English sentence, the child can then go forth and speak and write any damn way he pleases.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: Write with nouns and verbs, not with adjectives and adverbs. The adjective hasn't been built that can pull a weak or inaccurate noun out of a tight place.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: I respect a man who knows how to spell a word more than one way.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: This is the sort of English up with which I will not put.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I will not go down to posterity talking bad grammar.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Save the gerund and screw the whale.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: I don't want to talk grammar, I want to talk like a lady.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Every sentence he manages to utter scatters its component parts like pond water from a verb chasing its own tail.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: I was born to be a punctuation vigilante.
quotes.author: Lynn Truss

quotes.quote: The only person entitled to use the imperial 'we' in speaking of himself is a king, an editor, and a man with a tapeworm.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Good intentions are invariably ungrammatical.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I had someone correct my grammar once on a blind date, and within the first ten minutes, the date was over. You just don't correct somebody's grammar. That's just not okay. I'm from Tennessee so I probably say everything wrong. I might have said ain't, or something like that.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: Grammar OR Grammar, the English language body armour. / The time of prudence and sagacity, saw your rise in virility, voracity. / The disdain rampant in any day and age, and the sentence stands troubled and enraged.
quotes.author: Arun Serrao

quotes.quote: There were two cheerful pronouns / And naught did them disturb: / Until they met, out walking. / A conjugative verb.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The pronouns, child, were You and I, / We might as well confess; / But, ah, the mischief-making verb / I leave to you to guess!
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The life is like / A grammar where / Present is ‘tense' / Past is not ‘perfect' / And the future is ‘indefinite' / Still don't worry / Enjoy every moment of your life!
quotes.author: Ashwani Roy

quotes.quote: Don't speak English with your elders / Living in the village with no pen or a paper / You don't disrespect your elders by smearing grammar all over their faces.
quotes.author: Suzy Q.

quotes.quote: I'm not that good in / my grammar but thank / you for tell me. That why I love you. / Some people will / put me down but / not you. You are sweet / person to me and / I thank God For / you. Thank you!
quotes.author: Talesha G. McCray

quotes.quote: The greater part of the world's troubles is due to questions of grammar.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: His sentences didn't seem to have any verbs, which was par for a politician. All nouns, no action.
quotes.author: Jennifer Crusie

quotes.quote: It's hard to take someone seriously when they leave you a note saying, 'Your ugly.' My ugly what? The idiot didn't even know the difference between your and you're.
quotes.author: Cara Lynn Shultz

quotes.quote: I don't know the rules of grammar. If you're trying to persuade people to do something, or buy something, it seems to me you should use their language.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: People who start a sentence with personally (and they're always women) ought to be thrown to the lions. It's a repulsive habit.
quotes.author: Georgette Heyer

quotes.quote: I love you. You are the object of my affection and the object of my sentence.
quotes.author: Mignon Fogarty

quotes.quote: Grammatical correctness, after all, has a powerful symbolic value: getting your language right implies that you can obey rules and respect authority.
quotes.author: Michael Swan

quotes.quote: Climbing K2 or floating the Grand Canyon in an inner tube; there are some things one would rather have done than do.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: It's not at all naturally human to see something like the Grand Canyon as beautiful.
quotes.author: David Roberts

quotes.quote: Every season has its peaks and valleys. What you have to try to do is eliminate the Grand Canyon.
quotes.author: Andy Van Slyke

quotes.quote: There will never be a photograph of the Grand Canyon that can adequately describe its depth, breadth, and true beauty.
quotes.author: Stefanie Payne

quotes.quote: Baseball, it is said, is only a game. True. And the Grand Canyon is only a hole in Arizona. Not all holes, or games, are created equal.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: The Grand Canyon is carven deep by the master hand; it is the gulf of silence, widened in the desert; it is all time inscribing the naked rock; it is the book of earth.
quotes.author: Donald C. Peattie

quotes.quote: In the Grand Canyon, Arizona has a natural wonder which is in kind absolutely unparalleled throughout the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Trying to fill the God-sized hole in our hearts with things other than God is ike trying to fill the Grand Canyon with marbles.
quotes.author: Peter Kreeft

quotes.quote: The elements that unite to make the Grand Canyon the most sublime spectacle in nature are multifarious and exceedingly diverse.
quotes.author: John Wesley Powell

quotes.quote: The glories and beauties of form, color and sound unite in the Grand Canyon - forms unrivaled even by the mountains, colors that vie with sunsets, and sounds that span the diapason from tempest to tinkling raindrop; from cataract to bubbling fountain.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: You cannot see the Grand Canyon in one view, as if it were a changeless spectacle from which a curtain might be lifted, but to see it you have to toil from month to month through its labyrinths.
quotes.author: John Wesley Powell

quotes.quote: The wonders of the Grand Canyon cannot be adequately represented in symbols of speech, nor by speech itself. The resources of the graphic art are taxed beyond their powers in attempting to portray its features. Language and illustration combined must fail.
quotes.author: John Wesley Powell

quotes.quote: You can't say you're going to jump the Grand Canyon and then jump some other canyon.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: Publishing a volume of verse is like dropping a rose petal down the Grand Canyon and waiting for the echo.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: It's like trying to describe what you feel when you're standing on the rim of the Grand Canyon or remembering your first love or the birth of your child. You have to be there to really know what it's like.
quotes.author: Harrison Schmitt

quotes.quote: The Grand Canyon is living evidence of the power of water over a period of time. The power may not manifest immediately. Water can be very powerful, like a tidal wave.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: If you are working, almost like with layers of the Grand Canyon, there's history within those layers.
quotes.author: Leonardo Drew

quotes.quote: Majestic doesn't appeal to us. We like the Grand Canyon better with Clarence and Arlene parked in front of it, smiling.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: The Grand Canyon which yawns between the writer's concept of what he wants to capture in words and what comes through is a cruel abyss.
quotes.author: Fannie Hurst

quotes.quote: Nobody can do for little children what grandparents do. Grandparents sort of sprinkle stardust over the lives of little children.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: Being grandparents sufficiently removes us from the responsibilities so that we can be friends.
quotes.author: Allan Frome

quotes.quote: A grandchild is like a fine jewel set in an old ring.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: I go to my grandchildren. They keep their grandpa informed on what's going on.
quotes.author: Ben Vereen

quotes.quote: What is it about grandparents that is so lovely? I’d like to say that grandparents are God’s gifts to children. And if they can but see, hear and feel what these people have to give, they can mature at a fast rate.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The only people interested in hearing about your grandchildren are other grandparents who want to tell you about theirs.
quotes.author: Bryna Nelson Paston

quotes.quote: A child needs a grandparent, anybody’s grandparent, to grow a little more securely into an unfamiliar world.
quotes.author: Charles And Ann Morse

quotes.quote: It is as grandmothers that our mothers come into the fullness of their grace.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The best babysitters, of course, are the baby’s grandparents. You feel completely comfortable entrusting your baby to them for long periods, which is why most grandparents flee to Florida.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Surely, two of the most satisfying experiences in life must be those of being a grandchild or a grandparent.
quotes.author: Donald A. Norberg

quotes.quote: Few things are more satisfying than seeing your children have teenagers of their own.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Just about the time a woman thinks her work is done, she becomes a grandmother.
quotes.author: Edward H. Dreschnack

quotes.quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She’s ninety-seven now, and we don’t know where the hell she is.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: There is no greater achievement than being a grandfather who tells fairy tales to grandchildren.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: Uncles and aunts, and cousins, are all very well, and fathers and mothers are not to be despised; but a grandmother, at holiday time, is worth them all.
quotes.author: Fanny Fern

quotes.quote: Do you know why grandchildren are always so full of energy? Because they suck it out of their grandparents.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: My grandkids believe I’m the oldest thing in the world. And after two or three hours with them, I believe it, too.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Grandparents are there to help the child get into mischief they haven’t thought of yet.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: I like to do nice things for my grandchildren like buy them those toys I’ve always wanted to play with.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Grandchildren: the only people who can get more out of you than the IRS.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Never have children, only grandchildren.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: My grandmother is over eighty and still doesn’t need glasses. Drinks right out of the bottle.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: You’ve got to do your own growing, no matter how tall your grandfather was.
quotes.author: Irish Saying

quotes.quote: Young people need something stable to hang on to — a culture connection, a sense of their own past, a hope for their own future. Most of all, they need what grandparents can give them.
quotes.author: Jay Kesler

quotes.quote: A Grandmother thinks of her grandchildren day and night, even when they are not with her. She will always love them more than anyone would understand.
quotes.author: Karen Gibbs

quotes.quote: With your own children, you love them immediately – and with grandchildren, it’s exactly the same.
quotes.author: Kevin Whately

quotes.quote: You are the sun, Grandma, you are the sun in my life.
quotes.author: Kitty Tsui

quotes.quote: Every generation revolt against its fathers and makes friends with its grandfathers.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: If God had intended us to follow recipes, He wouldn’t have given us grandmothers.
quotes.author: Linda Henley

quotes.quote: Soon I will be an old, white-haired lady, into whose lap someone places a baby, saying, “Smile, Grandma!” — I, who myself so recently was photographed on my grandmother’s lap.
quotes.author: Liv Ullmann

quotes.quote: A mother becomes a true grandmother the day she stops noticing the terrible things her children do because she is so enchanted with the wonderful things her grandchildren do.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: Everyone needs to have access both to grandparents and grandchildren in order to be a full human being.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: When grandparents enter the door, discipline flies out the window.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Becoming a grandmother is wonderful. One moment you’re just a mother. The next you are all-wise and prehistoric.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: We should all have one person who knows how to bless us despite the evidence, Grandmother was that person to me.
quotes.author: Phyllis Theroux

quotes.quote: You do not really understand something unless you can explain it to your grandmother.
quotes.author: Proverbs

quotes.quote: Grandchildren are the crown of the aged, and the glory of children is their fathers.
quotes.author: Proverbs 17:6 (ESV)
