quotes.quote: If a child is to keep alive his inborn sense of wonder, he needs the companionship of at least one adult who can share it, rediscovering with him the joy, excitement and mystery of the world we live in.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: What children need most are the essentials that grandparents provide in abundance. They give unconditional love, kindness, patience, humor, comfort, lessons in life. And, most importantly, cookies.
quotes.author: Rudolph Giuliani

quotes.quote: The reason grandchildren and grandparents get along so well is that they have a common enemy.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The simplest toy, one which even the youngest child can operate, is called a grandparent.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The great thing about baseball is when you're done, you'll only tell your grandchildren the good things. If they ask me about 1989, I'll tell 'em I had amnesia.
quotes.author: Sparky Anderson

quotes.quote: I loved their home. Everything smelled older, worn but safe; the food aroma had baked itself into the furniture.
quotes.author: Susan Strasberg

quotes.quote: A grandmother is a safe haven.
quotes.author: Suzette Haden Elgin

quotes.quote: A grandchild fills a space in your heart that you never knew was empty.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandmas are moms with lots of frosting.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are fathers who do not love their children; there is no grandfather who does not adore his grandson.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Perfect love sometimes does not come until grandchildren are born.
quotes.author: Welsh Proverb

quotes.quote: Varicose veins are the result of an improper selection of grandparents.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: Grandchildren are the dots that connect the lines from generation to generation.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: Children's children are a crown to the aged.
quotes.author: Proverbs 17:6

quotes.quote: Dearer than our children are the children of our children.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandchildren restore our zest for life, and our faith in humanity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Elephants and grandchildren never forget.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Your sons weren't made to like you. That's what grandchildren are for.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: The grandchildren should not bear the debts of the grandparents.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Grandchildren are God's way of compensating us for growing old.
quotes.author: Mary H. Waldrip

quotes.quote: Grandchildren don't stay young forever, which is good, because Pop-pops have only so many horsey rides in them.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Our grandchildren accept us for ourselves, without rebuke or effort to change us, as no one in our entire lives has ever done, not our parents, siblings, spouses, friends - and hardly ever our own grown children.
quotes.author: Ruth Goode

quotes.quote: What a bargain grandchildren are! I give them my loose change, and they give me a million dollars worth of pleasure.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: One of the most powerful handclasps is that of a new grandbaby around the finger of a grandfather.
quotes.author: Joy Hargrove

quotes.quote: Posterity is the patriotic name for grandchildren.
quotes.author: Art Linkletter

quotes.quote: An hour with your grandchildren can make you feel young again. Anything longer than that, and you start to age quickly.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Few things are more delightful than grandchildren fighting over your lap.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: The idea that no one is perfect is a view most commonly held by people with no grandchildren.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Grandkids bring you into a sweeter, slower present. They show you the future at a time when a lot of your friends are thinking about the past. And they take you back to childhood--theirs, the Parent's, your own: a three-time admittance to wonderland.
quotes.author: Adair Lara

quotes.quote: If I had known how wonderful it would be to have grandchildren, I'd have had them first.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: The secret of life is to skip having children and go directly to grandchildren.
quotes.author: Mel Lazarus

quotes.quote: They say genes skip generations. Maybe that is why grandparents find their grandchildren so likeable.
quotes.author: Joan Mcintosh

quotes.quote: Children are the rainbow of life. Grandchildren are the pot of gold.
quotes.author: Irish Blessing

quotes.quote: Grandchildren are loving reminders of what we're really here for.
quotes.author: Janet Lanese

quotes.quote: Grandchildren are their grandparents' toys.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Holding a great-grandchild makes getting old worthwhile.
quotes.author: Evalyn Rikkers

quotes.quote: My grandchild has taught me what true love means. It means watching Scooby-Doo cartoons while the basketball game is on another channel.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Have children while your parents are still young enough to take care of them.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: When you have a grandchild, you have two children.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Grandma's listen because they care and helpful advice always willing to share.
quotes.author: anitapoems.com

quotes.quote: A grandma is warm hugs and sweet memories. She remembers all of your accomplishments and forgets all of your mistakes.
quotes.author: Barbara Cage

quotes.quote: I look out the window sometimes to seek the color of the shadows and the different greens in the trees, but when I get ready to paint I just close my eyes and imagine a scene.
quotes.author: Grandma Moses

quotes.quote: Grandmothers are wonderful ladies who always seem to place others in front of themselves.
quotes.author: anitapoems.com

quotes.quote: A Grandmother is someone special in your life Someone who always has time, Time to listen, time to play Time to visit the zoo Time to linger and look at the things I want to do Time to laugh, time to sing,Time for me, her grandchild, just to be Time to read, time to walk Time to let me just play at the dock.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A Grandmother thinks of her grandchildren day and night, even when they are not with her.She will always love them more than anyone would understand.
quotes.author: Karen Gibbs

quotes.quote: Grandma always made you feel she had been waiting to see just you all day and now the day was complete.
quotes.author: Marcy Demaree

quotes.quote: Becoming a grandmother is wonderful. One moment you're just a mother. The next you are all-wise and prehistoric.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Few things are more delightful than grandchildren fighting over your lap.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: There aren't too many things that are more comforting on this earth than a hug from grandma.
quotes.author: anitapoems.com

quotes.quote: Perfect love sometimes does not come until the first grandchild.
quotes.author: Welsh Proverb

quotes.quote: Grandmothers always have time to talk and make you feel special.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We should all have one person who knows how to bless us despite the evidence, Grandmother was that person to me.
quotes.author: Phyllis Theroux

quotes.quote: It is as grandmothers that our mothers come into the fullness of their grace.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: When grandparents enter the door, discipline flies out the window.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Grandmothers are voices of the past and role models of the present. Grandmothers open the doors to the future.
quotes.author: Helen Ketchum

quotes.quote: A grandmother is one of those rare individuals who you may always depend on.
quotes.author: anitapoems.com

quotes.quote: Grandmotherâ€ doesn't mean that you have gray hair and you retire and stay home cooking cakes for your grandchildren.
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.quote: Truth be told, being a grandma is as close as we ever get to perfection. The ultimate warm sticky bun with plump raisins and nuts. Clouds nine, ten, and eleven.
quotes.author: Bryna Nelson Paston

quotes.quote: Nobody can do for little children what grandparents do. Grandparents sort of sprinkle stardust over the lives of little children.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: Since the beginning of time, grandmothers have been the negotiators and peacemakers in their families. Grandmothers are voices of the past and role models of the present. Grandmothers open the doors to the future.
quotes.author: Helen Ketchum

quotes.quote: A grandmother pretends she doesn't know who you are on Halloween.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: You are the sun, Grandma, you are the sun in my life.
quotes.author: Kitty Tsui

quotes.quote: My grandmother always used to say, "If you know your past and you know where you have to go, why do you rehearse?" I always remember this and it's true. You have to start each day again - you can't repeat what you did.
quotes.author: Marian Seldes

quotes.quote: Having a grandmother is like having an army. This is a grandchild's ultimate privilege: knowing that someone is on your side, always, whatever the details. Even when you are wrong. Especially then, in fact. A grandmother is both a sword and a shield.
quotes.author: Fredrik Backman

quotes.quote: If becoming a grandmother was only a matter of choice, I should advise every one of you straight away to become one. There is no fun for old people like it!
quotes.author: Hannah Whithall Smith

quotes.quote: Uncles and aunts, and cousins, are all very well, and fathers and mothers are not to be despised; but a grandmother, at holiday time, is worth them all.
quotes.author: Fanny Fern

quotes.quote: The thoughts of becoming a grandmother is one which one cannot hold the excitement. It is a great experience. One that replaces no other!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A grandmother is a little bit parent, a little bit teacher, and a little bit best friend.
quotes.author: Rachel Appleton

quotes.quote: A mother becomes a true grandmother the day she stops noticing the terrible things her children do because she is so enchanted with the wonderful things her grandchildren do.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: Grandmothers hold their grandchildren in a special place in their heart.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: What a wonderful contribution our grandmothers and grandfathers can make if they will share some of the rich experiences and their testimonies with their children and grandchildren.
quotes.author: Vaughn J. Featherstone

quotes.quote: A grandmother always has time for you, even if the rest of the world is busy.
quotes.author: G. Saunders

quotes.quote: If I had known how wonderful it would be to have grandchildren, I'd have had them first.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: You do not really understand something unless you can explain it to your grandmother.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: What children need most are the essentials that grandparents provide in abundance. They give unconditional love, kindness, patience, humor, comfort, lessons in life. And, most importantly, cookies.
quotes.author: Rudolph Giuliani

quotes.quote: Everyone needs to have access both to grandparents and grandchildren in order to be a full human being.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: A grandparent is old on the outside but young on the inside.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If your baby is beautiful and perfect, never cries or fusses, sleeps on schedule and burps on demand, an angel all the time, you're the grandma.
quotes.author: Teresa Bloomingdale

quotes.quote: A grandma's name is little less in love than is the doting title of a mother.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The simplest toy, one which even the youngest child can operate, is called a grandparent.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: A conservative is someone who makes no changes and consults his grandmother when in doubt.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: What a bargain grandchildren are! I give them my loose change, and they give me a million dollars' worth of pleasure.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: A home without a grandmother is like an egg without salt.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: When the grandmothers of today hear the word Chippendales, they don't necessarily think of chairs.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: If you would civilize a man, begin with his grandmother.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: When a child is born, so are grandmothers.
quotes.author: Judith Levy

quotes.quote: Her grandmother, as she gets older, is not fading but rather becoming more concentrated.
quotes.author: Paulette Alden

quotes.quote: Grandparents are there to help the child get into mischief they haven't thought of yet.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: This is a place where grandmothers hold babies on their laps under the stars and whisper in their ears that the lights in the sky are holes in the floor of heaven.
quotes.author: Rick Bragg

quotes.quote: As I learned from growing up, you don't mess with your grandmother.
quotes.author: Prince William

quotes.quote: To become a grandparent is to enjoy one of the few pleasures in life for which the consequences have already been paid.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Through a grandmother's voice and hands the end of life is known at the beginning.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Grandmother-grandchild relationships are simple. Grandmas are short on criticism and long on love.
quotes.author: Janet Lanese

quotes.quote: There are grandmothers out there who would move heaven and earth for their grandchildren.
quotes.author: Janice Elliott-Howard

quotes.quote: When it seems the world can’t understand, your grandmother’s there to hold your hand.
quotes.author: Joyc K. Allen Logan

quotes.quote: A garden of love grows in a grandmother's heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandparents, like heroes, are as necessary to a child’s growth as vitamins.
quotes.author: Joyce Allston

quotes.quote: Grandmother opens up a new world of change, challenge, and celebration in a woman’s life.
quotes.author: Rebecca Barlow Jordan

quotes.quote: Sometimes our grandmas and grandpas are like grand angels.
quotes.author: Lexie Saige

quotes.quote: Grandmas hold our tiny hands for just a little while, but our hearts forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every house needs a grandmother in it.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: It’s such a grand thing to be a mother of a mother. That’s why the world calls her grandmother.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandmas are moms with lots of frosting.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandmother a wonderful mother with lots of practice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A grandmother is a babysitter who watches the kids instead of the television.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There’s no place like home except Grandma’s.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It’s impossible for a grandmother to understand that few people, and maybe none, will find her grandchild as endearing as she does.
quotes.author: Janet Lanese

quotes.quote: A grandma’s heart is a patchwork of love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandmothers always have time to talk and make you feel special.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: If nothing is going well, call your grandmother.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: A house needs a grandma in it.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the hell she is.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: I know what it is like to be brought up with unconditional love. In my life that came from my grandmother.
quotes.author: Andre Leon Talley

quotes.quote: A mother becomes a true grandmother the day she stops noticing the terrible things her children do because she is so enchanted with the wonderful things her grandchildren do.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: Becoming a grandmother is wonderful. One moment you're just a mother. The next you are all-wise and prehistoric.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Grandma always made you feel she had been waiting to see just you all day and now the day was complete.
quotes.author: Marcy Demaree

quotes.quote: If becoming a grandmother was only a matter of choice, I should advise every one of you straight away to become one. There is no fun for old people like it!
quotes.author: Hannah Whithall Smith

quotes.quote: Grandmothers are just antique little girls.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: A grandmother is a babysitter who watches the kids instead of the television.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It is as grandmothers that our mothers come into the fullness of their grace.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: A grandmother is a little bit parent, a little bit teacher, and a little bit best friend.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: You do not really understand something unless you can explain it to your grandmother.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: If nothing is going well, call your grandmother.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Just about the time a woman thinks her work is done, she becomes a grandmother.
quotes.author: Edward H. Dreschnack

quotes.quote: Grandmothers are the people who take delight in hearing babies breathing into the telephone.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Grandmas hold our tiny hands for just a little while, but our hearts forever.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: A grandma is warm hugs and sweet memories. She remembers all of your accomplishments and forgets all of your mistakes.
quotes.author: Barbara Cage

quotes.quote: My grandmother is over eighty and still doesn't need glasses. Drinks right out of the bottle.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: My grandmother was a very tough woman. She buried three husbands and two of them were just napping.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: My grandmother was a Jewish juggler: she used to worry about six things at once
quotes.author: Richard Lewis

quotes.quote: "Grandmother" doesn't mean that you have gray hair and you retire and stay home cooking cakes for your grandchildren.
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.quote: Grandmother-grandchild relationships are simple. Grandmas are short on criticism and long on love.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: We should all have one person who knows how to bless us despite the evidence, grandmother was that person to me.
quotes.author: Phyllis Theroux

quotes.quote: When a child is born, so are grandmothers.
quotes.author: Judith Levy

quotes.quote: A grandmother is a mother who has a second chance.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Grandma serves kisses, counsel and cookies daily.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Grandmas don't just say "that's nice" -- they reel back and roll their eyes and throw up their hands and smile. You get your money's worth out of grandmas.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: To reform a man, you must begin with his grandmother.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Grandpa got us up early, otherwise we might miss something. Sunsets, he loved 'em. Made us love 'em.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Grandfathers know a lot. I know this because I am a grandfather and I feel like I know a lot of things, and frankly I'm rarely wrong.
quotes.author: Blaine Pardoe

quotes.quote: Turn up your hearing aid 'Grandpa', because I'm only going to say this once!
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: The first door in the hall leads to youth, the second door leads to middle age, and the third door leads to the bathroom. But knock first, because I think grandpa’s in there.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: In a strange way, becoming a grandfather is like starting your life over.
quotes.author: Kenny Wallace

quotes.quote: There are flying grandfathers. But I intend to be an orbiting grandfather.
quotes.author: Wernher von Braun

quotes.quote: Our grandfathers had to run, run, run. My generation's out of breath. We ain't running no more.
quotes.author: Stokely Carmichael

quotes.quote: My grandfather always said that living is like licking honey off a thorn.
quotes.author: Louis Adamic

quotes.quote: It’s interesting that I had such a close relationship with my grandfather. Because your parents always judge you: they say, ’You shouldn’t do this, you shouldn’t do that.’ But with your grandparents you have a feeling that you can say anything or you can do anything, and they will support you. That’s why you have this kind of connection.
quotes.author: Novak Djokovic

quotes.quote: Good old grandsire ... we shall be joyful of thy company.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Grandchildren don't make a man feel old; it's the knowledge that he's married to a grandmother.
quotes.author: J. Norman Collie

quotes.quote: I'm going to be your grandpa! / I have the biggest smile. / I've been waiting to meet you for such a long, long while.
quotes.author: Billy Crystal

quotes.quote: A grandfather shares his wisdom, his stories, and most importantly a love that is different from all other loves.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: There is no greater achievement than being a grandfather who tells fairy tales to grandchildren.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: Just as a father feels it is all ending... in midlife, Dad may experience his second 'fatherhood' as a grandparent.
quotes.author: Alvin Francis Poussaint

quotes.quote: A baby boy has a special way of bringing out... the little boy in his grandfather.
quotes.author: Tanya Masse

quotes.quote: My granddaughter said... 'Granddad, were you in the Ark?' 'Of course not!' I replied. 'Then why weren't you drowned?'
quotes.author: James Potter

quotes.quote: Externally, the jollity of aged men has much in common with the mirth of children.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: His head was silver'd o'er with age, / And long experience / made him sage.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: I'm very proud of my gold pocket watch. My grandfather, on his deathbed, sold me this watch.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: My grandfather was the kind of man who could follow someone into a revolving door and come out first.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: My grandfather lived to 103-years-old. Every morning, he would eat a raw onion and smoke a cigar. You know what his dying words were? No one does, they couldn't get near the guy.
quotes.author: Jonathan Katz

quotes.quote: My grandfather always said, 'Don't watch your money, watch your health.' So one day while I was watching my health, someone stole my money. It was my grandfather.
quotes.author: Jackie Mason

quotes.quote: When I was little, my grandfather used to make me stand in a closet for five minutes without moving. He said it was elevator practice.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: My grandfather's a little forgetful, but he likes to give me advice. One day, he took me aside and left me there.
quotes.author: Ron Richards

quotes.quote: Grandpa, you're the handsomest man in the world, after my dad. And, Grandpa, you're the best storyteller ever.
quotes.author: Lara

quotes.quote: He is tender and wary with his grandson, this messenger of life and his mortality.
quotes.author: Michael Ignatieff

quotes.quote: Yet my great-grandfather was but a waterman, looking one way, and rowing another.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: When I die, I want to die like my grandfather who died peacefully in his sleep. Not screaming like all the passengers in his car.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Grandpa, you are the worlds' oldest goofball!
quotes.author: Herman Munster

quotes.quote: You're very old grandfather and you think very old things.
quotes.author: Priscilla

quotes.quote: My grandfather's great. He's a great-grandfather.
quotes.author: Chico

quotes.quote: There’s a grandpa in my pocket / There’s a grandpa in my shoe / There’s a grandpa in my socket / Oh no i got the flu / Grandpa got me here i guess / Grandpa in my face i’ll bless / Grandpa in my mum success / Grandpa number one play chess
quotes.author: David Zakhary

quotes.quote: Underneath that Alabama sky / Grandpa told me 'bout the things he'd seen / Underneath that Alabama sky / I listened to my Grandpa's memories / At times he mentions Grandma / Turn his head and wipe away a tear / Sometimes we'd take her picture down / And sit and pretend that she's still here / Three girls and two boys he raised on love / And simple honesty / And when they fin'lly have to carry him away / They'll take a lot of me
quotes.author: Larry Shell

quotes.quote: Grandpa, tell me 'bout the good old days / Sometimes it feels like this world's gone crazy / And Grandpa, take me back to yesterday / When the line between right and wrong / Didn't seem so hazy / Grandpa, everything is changing fast / We call it progress, but I just don't know / And Grandpa, let's wander back into the past / And paint me the picture of long ago
quotes.author: Jamie O'Hara

quotes.quote: The other day I saw... / What did you see, Grandpa? / I saw a billy goat / In a bright red overcoat / Boxing with a blue kangaroo / Oh! You tell a good story / But it can't be true / Silly Grandpa, I know it's not true
quotes.author: Michelle Campagne

quotes.quote: Oh, grandpa wore his suit to dinner / Nearly every day / No particular reason / He just dressed that way / Brown necktie and a matching vest / Both his wingtip shoes / He built a closet on our back porch / And put a penny in a burned-out fuse / Grandpa was a carpenter / He built houses, stores and banks / Chain-smoked Camel cigarettes / And hammered nails in planks / He was level on the level / And shaved even every door / And voted for Eisenhower 'cause Lincoln won the war / Well, he used to sing me "Blood On The Saddle" / And rock me on his knee / And let me listen to the radio / Before we got T.V. / Well, he'd drive to church on Sunday / And he'd take me with him too! / Stained glass in every window / Hearing aids in every pew
quotes.author: John Prine

quotes.quote: In his great cushioned chair by the fender / An old man sits dreaming to-night, / His withered hands, licked by the tender, / Warm rays of the red anthracite, / Are folded before him, all listless; / His dim eyes are fixed on the blaze, / While over him sweeps the resistless / Flood-tide of old days.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Grand-daughter of the Painted Nails, / As if they had been dipped in gore, / I'd like to set you lugging pails / And make you scrub the kitchen floor. / I'm old and crotchety of course, / And on this point my patience fails; / I'd sue my old girl for divorce / If she showed up with painted nails.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: My father's grandfather lives still, / His age is fourscore years and ten; / He looks a monument of time, / The agedest of aged men. / Though years lie on him like a load, / A happier man you will not see / Than he, whenever he can get / His great grandchildren on his knee.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: We waited commonly for sleep or even death. / The instances were wearisome as ages. / But suddenly the wind's refreshing breath / Touched through the window the Holy Bible's pages: / An old man goes there - who's now all white-haired - / With rapid steps and merry eyes, alone, / He smiles to us, and often calls with hand, / And leaves us with a gait, that is well-known. / And suddenly we all, who watched the old man's track, / Well recognized just him who now lay before us, / And turning in a sudden rapture back, / Beheld a corpse with eyes forever closed ... / And it was good for us the soul's way to trace, / And, in the leaving one, to find the glee it's forming. / The time had come. Recall and love in grace, / And celebrate another house-warming!
quotes.author: Aleksandr Aleksandrovich Blok

quotes.quote: Great Grandfather was ninety-nine / And so it was our one dread, / That though his health was superfine / He'd fail to make the hundred. / Though he was not a rolling stone / No moss he seemed to gather: / A patriarch of brawn and bone / Was Great Grandfather.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: My Grandfather was a Poet, / my Father was a thief / Their spirits fight to own my soul / —my Son in cradle sleeps / My Grandfather spoke of beauty, / my Father spoke of sin / The truth now locked within a voice / —whose key I leave to him
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: I go to my grandchildren. They keep their grandpa informed on what's going on.
quotes.author: Ben Vereen

quotes.quote: My grandpa was an amateur stand-up comic when I was growing up. ... He'd have me come up onstage with him to deliver a punch line: 'Why is your nose in the middle of your face?' 'Because it's the scenter.'
quotes.author: Rachel Bloom

quotes.quote: There are fathers who do not love their children; there is no grandfather who does not adore his grandson.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: To a small child, the perfect granddad is unafraid of big dogs and fierce storms but absolutely terrified of the word boo.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: One of the most powerful handclasps is that of a new grandbaby around the finger of a grandfather.
quotes.author: Joy Hargrove

quotes.quote: You have to do your own growing no matter how tall your grandfather was.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: One becomes a grandfather and one sees the world a little differently. Certainly the world becomes a more vulnerable place when one has a grandchild, or now I have two. And I think that possibly there's some tenderness that came out of just time and age and being a parent and grandparent.
quotes.author: C. K. Williams

quotes.quote: To be able to watch your children's children grow up is truly a blessing from above.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A child's eyes light up when they see their Grandpa.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: A grandfather is someone with silver in his hair and gold in his heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandchildren don't stay young forever, which is good because grandfathers have only so many horsy rides in them.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: Grandfathers are for loving and fixing things.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every generation revolts against its fathers and makes friends with its grandfathers.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: Great fathers get promoted to grandfathers.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A family with an old person has a living treasure of gold.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A grandpa is someone you never outgrow your need for..
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandfathers do have a special place in the lives of their children's children. They can delight and play with them and even indulge them in ways that they did not indulge their own children. Grandfather knows that after the fun and games are over with his adorable grandchildren he can return to the quiet of his own home and peacefully reflect on this phenomenon of fatherhood.
quotes.author: Alvin F. Poussaint

quotes.quote: Grandpas have the patience and time to teach you how to sail a model boat or take you to a football match.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My grandfather was a wonderful role model. Through him I got to know the gentle side of men.
quotes.author: Sarah Long

quotes.quote: More and more, when I single out the person out who inspired me most, I go back to my grandfather.
quotes.author: James Earl Jones

quotes.quote: My grandfather once told me that there are two kinds of people: those who work and those who take the credit. He told me to try to be in the first group; there was much less competition.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: My grandfather was a man, when he talked about freedom, his attitude was really interesting. His view was that you had obligations or you had responsibilities, and when you fulfilled those obligations or responsibilities, that then gave you the liberty to do other things.
quotes.author: Clarence Thomas

quotes.quote: I don't know who my grandfather was; I am much more concerned to know what his grandson will be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If the grandfather of the grandfather of Jesus had known what was hidden within him, he would have stood humble and awe-struck before his soul.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: My grandpa taught me how to live off the land.
quotes.author: Hank Williams Jr

quotes.quote: I think our culture needs more grandpas ridin along with grandson and girlfriend.
quotes.author: Duck Dynasty

quotes.quote: Sometimes our grandmas and grandpas are like grand-angels.
quotes.author: Lexie Saige

quotes.quote: Young people need something stable to hang on to a culture connection, a sense of their own past, a hope for their own future. Most of all, they need what grandparents can give them.
quotes.author: Jay Kesler

quotes.quote: What children need most are the essentials that grandparents provide in abundance. They give unconditional love, kindness, patience, humor, comfort, lessons in life. And, most importantly, cookies.
quotes.author: Rudolph Giuliani

quotes.quote: When the chips are down, grandmothers can be counted on to do whatever's necessary. When the chips are down for grandfathers, we just go into the kitchen and get more chips.
quotes.author: Michael Milligan

quotes.quote: A baby has a way of making a man out of his father and a boy out of his grandfather.
quotes.author: Angie Papadakis

quotes.quote: Nobody can do for little children what grandparents do. Grandparents sort of sprinkle stardust over the lives of little children.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: Truth be told, being a grandma is as close as we ever get to perfection. The ultimate warm sticky bun with plump raisins and nuts. Clouds nine, ten, and eleven.
quotes.author: Bryna Nelson Paston

quotes.quote: When grandparents enter the door, discipline flies out the window.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Grandparents should play the same role in the family as an elder statesman can in the government of a country. They have the experience and knowledge that comes from surviving a great many years of life's battles and the wisdom, hopefully, to recognize how their grandchildren can benefit from this.
quotes.author: Geoff Dench

quotes.quote: The simplest toy, one which even the youngest child can operate, is called a grandparent.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Why do grandparents and grandchildren get along so well? They have the same enemy - the mother.
quotes.author: Claudette Colbert

quotes.quote: Just about the time a woman thinks her work is done, she becomes a grandmother.
quotes.author: Edward H. Dreschnack

quotes.quote: If nothing is going well, call your grandmother
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Uncles and aunts, and cousins, are all very well, and fathers and mothers are not to be despised; but a grandmother, at holiday time, is worth them all.
quotes.author: Fanny Fern

quotes.quote: Grandma always made you feel she had been waiting to see just you all day and now the day was complete.
quotes.author: Marcy Demaree

quotes.quote: If God had intended us to follow recipes,He wouldn't have given us grandmothers.
quotes.author: Linda Henley

quotes.quote: Being grandparents sufficiently removes us from the responsibilities so that we can be friends.
quotes.author: Allan Frome

quotes.quote: If your baby is 'beautiful and perfect, never cries or fusses, sleeps on schedule and burps on demand, an angel all the time,' you're the grandma.
quotes.author: Teresa Bloomingdale

quotes.quote: Surely, two of the most satisfying experiences in life must be those of being a grandchild or a grandparent.
quotes.author: Donald A. Norber

quotes.quote: What is it about grandparents that is so lovely' I'd like to say that grandparents are God's gifts to children. And if they can but see, hear and feel what these people have to give, they can mature at a fast rate.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Grandparents are a delightful blend of laughter, caring deeds, wonderful stories and love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandparents are there to help the child get into mischief they haven't thought of yet.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is nothing more wonderful than the love and guidance a grandparent can give his or her grandchild.
quotes.author: Edward Fays

quotes.quote: If becoming a grandmother was only a matter of choice, I should advise every one of you straight away to become one. There is no fun for old people like it.
quotes.author: Hannah Whithall Smith

quotes.quote: We should all have one person who knows how to bless us despite the evidence, Grandmother was that person to me.
quotes.author: Phyllis Theroux

quotes.quote: The history of our grandparents is remembered not with rose petals but in the laughter and tears of their children and their children's children. It is into us that the lives of grandparents have gone. It is in us that their history becomes a future.
quotes.author: Charles And Ann Morse

quotes.quote: Grandparents, like heroes, are as necessary to a child's growth as vitamins.
quotes.author: Joyce Allston

quotes.quote: The old are the precious gem in the center of the household.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: To keep the heart unwrinkled, to be hopeful, kindly, cheerful, reverent that is to triumph over old age.
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: Beautiful young people are accidents of nature / But beautiful old people are works of art.
quotes.author: Marjory Barslow-Greenbie

quotes.quote: As you are now so once were we.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Some of the world's best educators are grandparents.
quotes.author: Dr. Charlie W. Shedd

quotes.quote: The reason grandparents and grandchildren get along so well is that they have a common enemy.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: If you're lucky enough to still have grandparents, visit them, cherish them and celebrate them while you can.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: What appeals to me? There are things, points of view, uses of the language, habits of dress, ways of thought and believing that came to me from my grandparents and came to them from theirs. Things that are of good use in any situation, no matter what the future may hold.
quotes.author: Tommy Lee Jones

quotes.quote: From my observation, the older you get, the more you like the word cozy. That's why most of the elderly wear pants with elastic waistbands. If they wear pants at all. This may explain why grandparents are in love with buying grand kids pajamas and bathrobes.
quotes.author: Holly Goldberg Sloan

quotes.quote: Flipping burgers is not beneath your dignity. Your grandparents had a different word for burger flipping; they called it opportunity.
quotes.author: Charles J. Sykes

quotes.quote: My grandkids believe I'm the oldest thing in the world. And after two or three hours with them, I believe it, too.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: What children need most are the essentials that grandparents provide in abundance. They give unconditional love, kindness, patience, humor, comfort, lessons in life. And, most importantly, cookies.
quotes.author: Rudy Giuliani

quotes.quote: It's funny what happens when you become a grandparent. You start to act all goofy and do things you never thought you'd do. It's terrific.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: Grandparenthood is one of life's rewards for surviving your own children.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: In the presence of grandparent and grandchild, past and future merge in the present.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: To become a grandparent is to enjoy one of the few pleasures in life for which the consequences have already been paid.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Grandparents are there to help the child get into mischief they haven't thought of yet.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: If you look deeply into the palm of your hand, you will see your parents and all generations of your ancestors. All of them are alive in this moment. Each is present in your body.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Something magical happens when parents turn into grandparents.
quotes.author: Paul Linden

quotes.quote: The only people interested in hearing about your grandchildren are other grandparents who want to tell you about theirs.
quotes.author: Bryna Nelson Paston

quotes.quote: Maybe there is no actual place called hell. Maybe hell is just having to listen to our grandparents breathe through their noses when they're eating sandwiches.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: In order to influence a child, one must be careful not to be that child's parent or grandparent.
quotes.author: Donald Robert Perry Marquis

quotes.quote: Thinking over their prospects, they saw plainly that they had better be cautious with their grandparents.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The first time I deceived my grandparents I felt rather shabby, perhaps even the second time, but I soon ceased to think about it.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: Not so likely to be perpetuated, at the outset; for the new form tends to resemble a grandparent and a long line of similar ancestors, as well as to resemble its immediate progenitors.
quotes.author: Asa Gray

quotes.quote: Bear with your aged grandparents.
quotes.author: Cosmo Hamilton

quotes.quote: A child needs a grandparent, anybody's grandparent, to grow a little more securely into an unfamiliar world.
quotes.author: Charles And Ann Morse

quotes.quote: The best babysitters, of course, are the baby's grandparents. You feel completely comfortable entrusting your baby to them for long periods, which is why most grandparents flee to Florida.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Becoming a grandparent is a second chance. For you have a chance to put to use all the things you learned the first time around and may have made mistakes on. It's all love and no discipline. There's no thorn in the rose.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: My grandparents gave me scratch and cough books when I was growing up. Scene of the accident coloring books.
quotes.author: Richard Lewis

quotes.quote: There's one thing about children—they never go around showing snapshots of their grandparents.
quotes.author: Leopold Fechtner

quotes.quote: Grandparents range from infantile to mature, like everybody else.
quotes.author: Jean Marzollo

quotes.quote: When you teach your son, you teach your son's son.
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: When you've done something inexcusable, you try to ease your conscience by telling yourself that someone, somewhere would forgive you. You think of old people, perhaps indulgent grandparents, who are convinced that whatever you do is right.
quotes.author: Alain-Fournier

quotes.quote: Grandparents can be very special resources. Just being close to them reassures a child, without words, about change and continuity, about what went before and what will come after.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Grandparents are both our past and our future. In some ways they are what has gone before, and in others they are what we will become.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Being a grandparent is the greatest racket there is.
quotes.author: Tim McCarver

quotes.quote: Grandparents are a treasure in the family. Please, take care of your grandparents: love them and let them talk to your children!
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Our grandparents created those sacred spaces, we protect them for our grandchildren.
quotes.author: Regina Lopez-Whiteskunk

quotes.quote: Love your parents and your children will have loving grandparents.
quotes.author: Stephen Ramjewan

quotes.quote: You wanna get those brownies? Send this video to your grandparents.
quotes.author: Bobby Budnick

quotes.quote: Oh please, with my mother's 3 marriages I'm an expert on grandparents. When they all come over at Christmastime, it sounds like a bunch of antique cars warming up.
quotes.author: Blair Warner

quotes.quote: Well, back then we were parents. Now we're grandparents. We have to be grand. It's in the title.
quotes.author: Pat Spence

quotes.quote: A dear old couple my grandparents were, / And kind to all dumb things; they saw in Heaven / The lamb that Jesus petted when a child; / Their faith was never draped by Doubt: to them / Death was a rainbow in Eternity, / That promised everlasting brightness soon.
quotes.author: William Henry Davies

quotes.quote: My grandparents retired from nine to fives / Then paid for my hospital bills when mama was doin' lines / I wasn't raised up like the model American / But I love what it made me, life is all about where and whens / Who's and hows that ultimately create my heritage
quotes.author: Michael Wayne Atha

quotes.quote: Going to see my grandparents was the highlight of my childhood summers.... I was doted upon, admired, entertained and overfed. I was never more content and happy.
quotes.author: Carolyn Anthony

quotes.quote: Grandparents are always being told that they are living history to their grandchildren, that they give the children the reassurance of their roots. For me and many grandmothers I have talked to, it works the other way as well. They give us continuity.
quotes.author: Ruth Goode

quotes.quote: Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Grant me thirty years of equal division of inheritances and a free press, and I will provide you with a republic.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: Whatever a person may pray for, that person prays for a miracle. Every prayer comes down to this - Almighty God, grant that two times two not equal four.
quotes.author: Ivan Turgenev

quotes.quote: Grant graciously what you cannot refuse safely and conciliate those you cannot conquer.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Fate is never too generous even to its favorites. Rarely do the gods grant a mortal more than one immortal deed.
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: Time grants a unique perspective which allows us to see events through a filter of accumulated wisdom.
quotes.author: Christopher Earle

quotes.quote: Only prisoners were ever granted easy passage into a prison.
quotes.author: Scott Lynch

quotes.quote: Grant that the true organ with which the beautiful is apprehended is the imagination, and it follows that all arts are likely to affect the feelings indirectly.
quotes.author: Eduard Hanslick

quotes.quote: The recognition that no knowledge can be complete, no metaphor entire, is itself humanizing. It counteracts fanaticism. It grants even to adversaries the possibility of partial truth, and to oneself the possibility of error.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: Still this planet's soil for noble deeds grants scope abounding.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I keep my friends as misers do their treasure, because, of all the things granted us by wisdom, none is greater or better than friendship.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: Grant what thou commandest and then command what thou wilt.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: The sea will grant each man new hope.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: God grant, that not only the Love of Liberty, but a thorough Knowledge of the Rights of Man, may pervade all the Nations of the Earth, so that a Philosopher may set his Foot anywhere on its Surface, and say, This is my Country.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: The inscrutable wisdom through which we exist is not less worthy of veneration in respect to what it denies us than in respect to what it has granted.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Each man must grant himself the emotions that he needs and the morality that suits him.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: The race of mankind would perish did they cease to aid each other. We cannot exist without mutual help. All therefore that need aid have a right to ask it from their fellow-men; and no one who has the power of granting can refuse it without guilt.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Grant that I may not pray alone with the mouth; help me that I may pray from the depths of my heart.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Grant yourself permission to have all that life has to offer, and you will discover it has more to offer than you've ever imagined.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Cease to ask what the morrow will bring forth. And set down as gain each day that Fortune grants.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: If success attend me, grant me humility; If failure, resignation to Thy will.
quotes.author: David Livingstone

quotes.quote: The greatest blessing granted to mankind come by way of madness, which is a divine gift.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Trust cannot be commanded and yet it is also correct that the only one who earns trust is the one who is prepared to grant trust.
quotes.author: Gustav Heinemann

quotes.quote: Fate has this weird way of making your wish come true by supplementing it with ten other spiteful things.
quotes.author: Pawan Mishra

quotes.quote: God grants liberty only to those who love it, and are always ready to guard and defend it.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: Let us grant that the pursuit of mathematics is a divine madness of the human spirit, a refuge from the goading urgency of contingent happenings.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: While we may open the books of the past, we may but grant flying glances of the future, through the mist that veils it.
quotes.author: Robert E. Howard

quotes.quote: It is not knowledge, but the act of learning, not possession but the act of getting there, which grants the greatest enjoyment.
quotes.author: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.quote: The genial optimist who praises much scatters flowers in our way. Grant that he over-praises, or that he applauds where he might condemn, still he makes--no mean result--the world to appear better than it is. A pleasant illusion is better than a harsh reality.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Break a vase, and the love that reassembles the fragments is stronger than that love which took its symmetry for granted when it was whole.
quotes.author: Derek Walcott

quotes.quote: The only legitimate right to govern is an express grant of power from the governed.
quotes.author: William Henry Harrison

quotes.quote: God grants an easy death only to the just.
quotes.author: Svetlana Alliluyeva

quotes.quote: A happy home is one in which each spouse grants the possibility that the other may be right, though neither believes it.
quotes.author: Donald M. Fraser

quotes.quote: People aren't grapes - you can't weigh them in a bunch, but I guess it's easier than dealing with people as individuals.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: One day you are drinking the wine, and they next day you are picking the grapes.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: People pretend not to like grapes when the vines are too high for them to reach
quotes.author: Marguerite de Navarre

quotes.quote: When we are crushed like grapes, we cannot think of the wine we will become.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: The heart, like the grape, is prone to delivering its harvest in the same moment it appears to be crushed.
quotes.author: Roger Housden

quotes.quote: The juice of the grape is the liquid quintessence of concentrated sunbeams.
quotes.author: Thomas Love Peacock

quotes.quote: A man makes no noise over a good deed, but passes on to another as a vine to bear grapes again in season.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Grapes become wine only when they have been squeezed.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: The older the grapes, sweeter the wine.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: It's true, some wine improves with age. But only if the grapes were good in the first place.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: Nothing great is created suddenly, any more than a bunch of grapes or a fig.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: If the grape is made of wine, then perhaps we are the words that tell who we are.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.quote: Seek more strength for weaker spine. No grape grows on sinner’s vine
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Always eat grapes downwards - that is, always eat the best grape first; in this way there will be none better left on the bunch, and each grape will seem good down to the last.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: There is a great abundance of vines in many parts... Of these hedge grapes we made neere twentie gallons of wine, which was like our British wine, but certainly they would prove good well they were manured.
quotes.author: Captain John Smith

quotes.quote: Ordinarily the crushing of the grapes was done by 'well-washed Indians,' their hair tied-up and wearing only a zapata...who trashed about in the mass of fresh grapes until these were sufficiently macerated and...fermented into wine in big leather bags.
quotes.author: Philip M. Wagner

quotes.quote: Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord: / He is trampling out the vintage where the grapes of wrath are stored; / He hath loosed the faithful lightning of his terrible swift sword: / His truth is marching on.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: Unlike many other fruit crops, grapes do not ripen after they have been taken off the vine.
quotes.author: Glen L. Creasy

quotes.quote: The grapevine is cultivated all over the world and the grape itself is used for a myriad of products. many of which are well known to all of us.
quotes.author: Glen L. Creasy

quotes.quote: Raisins or dried grapes, may have also occurred in nature as berries that had not been eaten by predators and left to dry on the vine to create a very sweet and decay-resistant product.
quotes.author: Glen L. Creasy

quotes.quote: Table grapes must be picked by hand. Pickers must be trained to select well-shaped clusters of mature grapes.
quotes.author: Glen L. Creasy

quotes.quote: Every single grape variety is the result of a single vine grown from a single seed,and this seed is the result of sexual reproduction between two parent varieties.
quotes.author: Julia Harding

quotes.quote: When fertilized, the flower clusters develop into clusters of grapes.
quotes.author: Ted Goldammer

quotes.quote: Grapes are among the first fruit species to be domesticated and today are the world's most economically important fresh fruit crop used to make a variety of fresh, dried, and processed products such as wine.
quotes.author: Ted Goldammer

quotes.quote: Growing high-quality grapes for premium wine requires the grower to fully understand the principles of viticulture.
quotes.author: Ted Goldammer

quotes.quote: A man who was fond of wine was offered some grapes at dessert after dinner. 'Much obliged' said he, pushing the plate aside. 'I am not accustomed to take my wine in pills.'
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: I stroll along a vineyard path, And there I see the Grapes of Math! / Overhead the sun is blazin', Soon each grape will be a raisin. / How many grapes are on the vine? Counting each takes too much time. Never fear I have a hunch, There is a match for every bunch.
quotes.author: Greg Tang

quotes.quote: Handle the vine like a man, the wine like a woman.
quotes.author: Ed Lino

quotes.quote: Grapes are among the most desirable and the best fruits known on earth, prized for their beauty, their place in classical legend and mythology, their succulence and varied flavors as luxury table fruits, their noble metamorphosis into wine, and their more utilitarian roles as sources of fresh juice and tasty jellies.
quotes.author: Annie E. Proulx

quotes.quote: For most growers, the triumph for harvesting fragrant clusters of dusky-bloomed grapes in rose, blue-black, amber, purple, or light red bunches is its own reward— a test of gardening skill.
quotes.author: Annie E. Proulx

quotes.quote: Grapes are labor-intensive specialty crop, best grown by a patient, careful gardener with a feeling for the vine.
quotes.author: Annie E. Proulx

quotes.quote: Our feet are grape-squashed in memories, our skins are still flushed from the touch of summer's lips.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: You are but a tiny cluster upon the vines of heaven, where the grapes are worlds; yet you hold the power to ripen your bitter berries and add to the eternal vintage of cosmic sweetness if so you will.
quotes.author: Eden Phillpotts

quotes.quote: Wine had to be grapes first. Diamonds had to be rocks first. Butterflies had to be caterpillars first. Rainbows had to be storms first.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: I think we all men are like fine wine. We start out as grapes, and it's up to women to stomp the crap out of us until we are turned into something acceptable to have dinner with.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: Fresh grapes and wine are perhaps the most luscious foods we mortals encounter during our sojourn here.
quotes.author: Jeff Cox

quotes.quote: The grape becomes tinted from the grape it comes in contact with.
quotes.author: Jevenal

quotes.quote: The vine bears three kinds of grapes: the first of pleasure, the second of intoxication, the third of disgust.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: The fight is never about grapes or lettuce. It is always about people.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.quote: If you think good design is expensive, you should look at the cost of bad design.
quotes.author: Ralf Speth

quotes.quote: Effective problem solving in design requires a balance of strategy and spontaneity, intelligence and creativity.
quotes.author: Maggie Macnab

quotes.quote: Because the eye has seen, thoughts are structured upon images and not upon ideas.
quotes.author: David Consuegra

quotes.quote: A distinctive appearance and a simple set of characteristics lead to an extremely flexible brand.
quotes.author: Woodrow Phoenix

quotes.quote: A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Graphic Design for its own sake will never happen, because the concept cancels itself out, a poster about nothing other than itself is not Graphic Design, it's, makin' art.
quotes.author: Chip Kidd

quotes.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.
quotes.author: Joe Sparano

quotes.quote: Graphic design is the paradise of individuality, eccentricity, heresy, abnormality, hobbies and humors.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values determine the future.
quotes.author: Robert L. Peters

quotes.quote: Commercial Art tries to make you buy things. Graphic Design gives you ideas.
quotes.author: Chip Kidd

quotes.quote: When I studied graphic design, I learned a valuable lesson: There's no perfect answer to the puzzle, and creativity is a renewable resource.
quotes.author: Biz Stone

quotes.quote: Content precedes design. Design in the absence of content is not design, it's decoration.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

quotes.quote: I've never had a problem with a dumb client. There is no such thing as a bad client. Part of our job is to do good work and get the client to accept it.
quotes.author: Bob Gill

quotes.quote: Graphic design will save the world right after rock and roll does.
quotes.author: David Carson

quotes.quote: You don't think your way to creative work. You work your way to creative thinking.
quotes.author: George Nelson

quotes.quote: Design is not for philosophy it's for life.
quotes.author: Issey Miyake

quotes.quote: Directive design gives an either or choice, similar to a traffic sign. Interpretive design allows for personal choice, in the same way symbolism allows for individual meaning.
quotes.author: Maggie Macnab

quotes.quote: Good design is all about making other designers feel like idiots because that idea wasn't theirs.
quotes.author: Frank Chimero

quotes.quote: Art is nothing more than creating an emotion in your own form.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: You have power as a designer to change the relationship someone has with an object. Your challenge is to keep people looking. Build in those little details. To some people, they might mean a lot.
quotes.author: David Pearson

quotes.quote: Practice safe design. Use a concept.
quotes.author: Petrula Vrontikis

quotes.quote: There are three responses to a piece of design yes, no, and WOW! Wow is the one to aim for.
quotes.author: Milton Glaser

quotes.quote: Graphic designers judge a cover by its book.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: I strive for two things in design: simplicity and clarity. Great design is born of those two things.
quotes.author: Lindon Leader

quotes.quote: Bad design is smoke, while good design is a mirror.
quotes.author: Jaun-Carlos Fernandez

quotes.quote: Everything is designed. Few things are designed well.
quotes.author: Brian Reed

quotes.quote: Design is, literally, purposeful planning. Graphic Design, then, is the form those plans will take.
quotes.author: Chip Kidd

quotes.quote: You can have an art experience in front of a Rembrandt or in front of a piece of graphic design.
quotes.author: Stefan Sagmeister

quotes.quote: Digital design is like painting, except the paint never dries.
quotes.author: Neville Brody

quotes.quote: Styles come and go. Good design is a language, not a style.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: Design can be art. Design can be aesthetics. Design is so simple, that's why it is so comlicated.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote: Good design’s not about what medium you’re working in. It’s about thinking hard about what you want to do and what you have to work with before you start.
quotes.author: Susan Kare

quotes.quote: The public is more familiar with bad design than good design. It is, in effect, conditioned to prefer bad design, because that is what it lives with. The new becomes threatening, the old reassuring.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.quote: To be a good artist / letterer / designer / guitar player, it takes practice. A lot of it. More than you can even fathom when you’re starting out.
quotes.author: Jessica Hische

quotes.quote: The life of a designer is a life of fight. Fight against the ugliness. Just like a doctor fights against disease. For us, the visual disease is what we have around, and what we try to do is cure it somehow with design.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: You can do a good ad without good typography, but you can’t do a great ad without good typography.
quotes.author: Herb Lubalin

quotes.quote: The function of design is letting design function.
quotes.author: Micha Commeren

quotes.quote: Where you innovate, how you innovate, and what you innovate are design problems.
quotes.author: Tim Brown

quotes.quote: Design adds value faster than it adds costs.
quotes.author: Joel Spolsky

quotes.quote: Good design is like a refrigerator—when it works, no one notices, but when it doesn’t, it sure stinks.
quotes.author: Irene Au

quotes.quote: Whitespace is like air: it is necessary for design to breathe.
quotes.author: Wojciech Zieliński

quotes.quote: It is possible to speculate that a 'role requirement' of the President in the future might become 'visual communication.'
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Design is thinking made visual.
quotes.author: Saul Bass

quotes.quote: Painting is the exploration of visual space.
quotes.author: Kevin Woolsey

quotes.quote: Attractive form enhances function and function portrays beauty through its effect.
quotes.author: Andy Kirk

quotes.quote: Bloody great visual design is non negotiable.
quotes.author: Harish Sivaramakrishnan

quotes.quote: Both graphic and visual designers are invited to create a visual graphic and define its aesthetic. In both cases, the goal is to find a creative solution to communicate what it is supposed to be communicated. I would say that perhaps one of the main differences is the medium being focused on. More specifically, graphic design is about a great range of deliverables, both print and web designs, while visual design is strictly about digital applications.
quotes.author: Tina Touli

quotes.quote: Like all forms of design, visual design is about problem-solving, not about personal preference or unsupported opinion.
quotes.author: Bob Baxley

quotes.quote: Design is a plan for arranging elements in such a way as best to accomplish a particular purpose.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: Problems with visual design can turn users off so quickly that they never discover all the smart choices you made with navigation or interaction design.
quotes.author: Jesse James Garrett

quotes.quote: Graphic design is not decoration. It is visual communication.
quotes.author: Kerry Clark

quotes.quote: Good design is about executing a desired outcome through visual communication.
quotes.author: Bhavesh

quotes.quote: Of all of our inventions for mass communication, pictures still speak the most universally understood language.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Visual storytelling of one kind or another has been around since caveman were drawing on the walls.
quotes.author: Frank Darabont

quotes.quote: Graphic design, visual communication is a massive part of good user experience! Our expectations as cognitive human beings is based on what we see. That’s how the brain works.
quotes.author: Joe Natoli

quotes.quote: Graphical excellence is that which gives to the viewer the greatest number of ideas in the shortest time with the least ink in the smallest space.
quotes.author: Edward Tufte

quotes.quote: Graphic design is the process of visual communication and problem-solving using one or more of typography, photography, and illustration. The field is considered a subset of visual communication and communication design, but sometimes the term “graphic design” is used synonymously.
quotes.author: Trista Liu

quotes.quote: Graphic Design is the communication framework through which these messages about what the world is now, and what we should aspire to. It's the way they reach us. The designer has an enormous responsibility. Those are the people, you know, putting their wires into our heads.
quotes.author: Rick Poynor

quotes.quote: The details are not the details. They make the design.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: Look at all those great names in graphic design history; Tschichold, Schleger, Rand, Fletcher, Aicher, Muller-Brockmann; and look at their beautiful type. They understood the need to understand it.
quotes.author: Richard Weston

quotes.quote: Graphic design is the art and science of combining text and graphics to communicate an effective message in the design of websites, logos, graphics, brochures, newsletters, posters, signs, and other types of visual communication. Designers achieve their goals by combining the elements and principles of graphic design.
quotes.author: Jacci Howard Bear

quotes.quote: Grass grows at last above all graves.
quotes.author: Julia Caroline Dorr

quotes.quote: The grass isn’t always greener on the other side. What the younger generation didn’t understand was that the grass was greenest where it’s watered.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The grass is always greener around the fire hydrant.
quotes.author: Jeff Rich

quotes.quote: The landscape looks different from every blade of grass.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Parks are but pavement disguised with a growth of grass.
quotes.author: George Gissing

quotes.quote: A single gentle rain makes the grass many shades greener.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The grass is always greener once you don't have to mow a lawn anymore.
quotes.author: Randy K. Milholland

quotes.quote: Be tough in the way a blade of grass is: rooted, willing to lean, and at peace with what is around it.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: In the plains the grass grows tall, since there is no one to cut it. There is no one to water it either.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The soil under the grass is dreaming of a young forest, and under the pavement the soil is dreaming of grass.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Every blade of grass is a study; and to produce two, where there was but one, is both a profit and a pleasure.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The warm green of the grass, sprinkled with flowers of many hues, is a carpet whereon we walk with noiseless tread.
quotes.author: William Wendt

quotes.quote: It's not that the grass is greener on the other side, it's that you can never be on both sides of the lawn at the same time.
quotes.author: Laura Fraser

quotes.quote: Crabgrass can grow on bowling balls in airless rooms, and there is no known way to kill it that does not involve nuclear weapons.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: My intuition told me that it was the grass that was important. Now it glows parrot-green, cool as mint, soft as moss, lying there like a cashmere blanket.
quotes.author: W. P. Kinsella

quotes.quote: Even if the grass is greener on the other side of the fence, keep to your own side; it's where you belong. There you can plant your own grass and tend to it.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: If the grass is greener on the other side it’s probably getting better care. Success is a matter of sticking to a set of common sense principles anyone can master.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Each blade of grass has its spot on earth whence it draws its life, its strength; and so is man rooted to the land from which he draws his faith together with his life.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: When the wind blows, the grass bends.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Green grass grows where dry desert ends.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: No one thinks of winter when the grass is green.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Grass is hard and lumpy and damp, and full of dreadful black insects.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Nothing is more pleasant to the eye than green grass kept finely shorn.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Natural grass is a wonderful thing for little bugs and sinkerball pitchers.
quotes.author: Dan Quisenberry

quotes.quote: A blade of grass is always a blade of grass, whether in one country or another.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Every blade of grass has its Angel that bends over it and whispers, "Grow, grow.".
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: Crabgrass is aptly descriptive of this hated weed, for it does scuttle quickly through a lawn.
quotes.author: Allen Lacy

quotes.quote: You could cover the whole earth with asphalt, but sooner or later green grass would break through.
quotes.author: Ilya Ehrenburg

quotes.quote: A need to concentrate on each sound, so that every blade of grass would be as important as a flower.
quotes.author: Arvo Part

quotes.quote: All things such as grass and trees are soft and supple in life. At their death they are withered and dry.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The grass as bristly and stout as chives and me wondering when the ground will break and me wondering how anything fragile survives
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: There are myriads of forms and hundreds of grasses throughout the entire earth, yet each grass and each form itself is the entire earth.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: Next time you see an unblemished expanse of grass, think about the chemicals that probably got dumped in your vicinity to create it. Are you grateful for that?
quotes.author: Robert Wright

quotes.quote: The restless grasshopper only finds rest in the gizzard of a bird.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: The grasshopper is dear to the grasshopper, the ant loves the ant.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: A grasshopper is nothing, but a mosquito turned hulk.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A fight between grasshoppers is a joy to the crow.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: One can't give a grasshopper to a child if one has not caught it yet.
quotes.author: Malagasy Proverb

quotes.quote: If a grasshopper tries to fight a lawnmower, one may admire his courage but not his judgement.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: A grasshopper shrilled in a tuft at her feet and was answered by other shrillings among the gorse bushes; a solitary rook flapped heavily overhead, and a pair of goldfinches twittered among the thistle-down; there was no other sound except the scarcely perceptible never-ceasing sighing of the wind in the pines and its rustling of acres of heath-bells.
quotes.author: Flora Thompson

quotes.quote: Grasshopper always wrong in argument with chicken.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: And the grasshopper shall be a burden.
quotes.author: The Bible

quotes.quote: Ride an elephant to catch a grasshopper.
quotes.author: Thai Proverb

quotes.quote: A restless grasshopper eventually ends up in a birds teeth.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: A grasshopper that sleeps about will be soon awake in a lizard's mouth.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: The grasshopper flies about, but the kingfisher watches him.
quotes.author: Samoan Proverb

quotes.quote: I've learnt to gather simplicity from grasshoppers. I like their naive indecisive minds never knowing exactly when to stop chirping, and I envy their ability to be able to mingle with the greenâ€¦
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: A grasshopper in the mouth is worth two in the grass.
quotes.author: Road Runner

quotes.quote: If the hill is on fire the grasshoppers are roasted.Â
quotes.author: Malagasy Proverb

quotes.quote: The grasshopper which is always near its mother eats the best food.
quotes.author: Ghanaian Proverb

quotes.quote: No means yes in grasshopper language.
quotes.author: Noel Fielding

quotes.quote: A grasshopper jumps into it: the summer dusk.
quotes.author: Michael McClintock

quotes.quote: The heaven of a grasshopper is the wheat field; the heaven of man is the same place, the very earth itself where we get our food and build our happiness!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: You are unique, and this is a beautiful, beautiful thing, grasshopper.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: How narrow is the vision that exalts the busyness of the ant above the singing of the grasshopper.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Giddy grasshopper Take care. Do not leap and crush These pearls of dewdrop.
quotes.author: Kobayashi Issa

quotes.quote: I miss the grasshoppers much, but suppose it is all for the best. I should become too much attached to a trotting world.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Feeling well that breathed words Would all be lost, unheard, and vain as swords Against the enchased crocodile, or leaps Of grasshoppers against the sun.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Crowds of bees are giddy with clover Crowds of grasshoppers skip at our feet, Crowds of larks at their matins hang over, Thanking the Lord for a life so sweet.
quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

quotes.quote: Nature will bear the closest inspection. She invites us to lay our eye level with her smallest leaf, and take an insect view of its plain.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Green little vaulter, in the sunny grass, Catching your heart up at the feel of June, Sole noise that's heard amidst the lazy noon, When ev'n the bees lag at the summoning brass.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: Happy insect! what can be In happiness compared to thee? Fed with nourishment divine, The dewy morning's gentle wine! Nature waits upon thee still, And thy verdant cup does fill; 'Tis fill'd wherever thou dost tread, Nature's self's thy Ganymede.
quotes.author: Abraham Cowley

quotes.quote: All things come to those who wait.
quotes.author: Violet Fane

quotes.quote: Twere better far That gods should quaff their nectar merrily, And men sing out the day like grasshoppers, So may they haply lull the watchful thunder.
quotes.author: Hartley Coleridge

quotes.quote: Insect life was so loud that when you parked the car and got out it sounded as if you had suddenly tuned into a radio frequency from another planet.
quotes.author: David Samuels

quotes.quote: Nature makes the locust with an appetite for crops; man would have made him with an appetite for sand.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The frost which kills the harvest of a year saves the harvest of a century, by destroying the weevil or the locust.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In summer the empire of insects spreads.
quotes.author: Adam Zagajewski

quotes.quote: The Planet drifts to random insect doom.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Grass is hard and lumpy and damp, and full of dreadful black insects.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The whole tree itself is but one leaf, and rivers are still vaster leaves whose pulp is intervening earth, and towns and cities are the ova of insects in their axils.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Grasshopper to grasshopper, ant to ant is dear, hawks love hawks, but I the muse and song.
quotes.author: Theocritus

quotes.quote: The water in music the oar forsakes. The air in music the wing forsakes. All things move in music and write it. The mouse, lizard, and grasshopper sing together on the Turlock sands, sing with the morning stars.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Blue water extends in rows of gentle ripples to a thin line of barely visible cottonwoods on the far side. The wind dies to a whisper and it's quiet, almost perfectly still except for the snap of grasshoppers leaping from the weeds. To the west the mountains rise suddenly, almost violently from the sandy brown of the plains, layered silhouettes of blue and green and gray rising to a turquoise sky. My heart is filled with the beauty of it all.
quotes.author: Kristen Iversen

quotes.quote: Chiefs who no more in bloody fights engage, But wise through time, and narrative with age, In summer days like grasshoppers rejoice. A bloodless race, that send a feeble voice.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope
