quotes.quote: Three hundred trout are required to support one man for a year. The trout, in turn, must consume 90,000 frogs, which must consume 27 million grasshoppers, which live off of 1,000 tons of grass.
quotes.author: Jeremy Rifkin

quotes.quote: Their laughter was like the stridulation of the ghosts of grasshoppers.
quotes.author: John Collier

quotes.quote: When God pleads his people's cause he can deal with giants as with grasshoppers.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: The white people were as thick and numerous and aimless as grasshoppers, moving always in a hurry but never seeming to get to whatever place it was they were going to.
quotes.author: Dee Brown

quotes.quote: Count your blessings.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't kill the goose that lays the golden egg.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Enough is as good as a feast.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Malory

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: He that is hard to please, may get nothing in the end.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: If you think your bundle of clothes too heavy, try picking up your neighbor's.
quotes.author: Virgin Islander (on comparable worth)

quotes.quote: It pays to be content with your lot.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: It pays to be nice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's the little things that count.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Make do with what you have.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never look a gift horse in the mouth.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Never take anything for granted.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Play the hand you're dealt.
quotes.author: Jawahareal Nehru

quotes.quote: Since we cannot get what we like, let us like what we can get.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Thanks cost nothing.
quotes.author: Creole (on gratitude)

quotes.quote: The one being carried does not realize how far away the town is.
quotes.author: Nigerian (on gratitude)

quotes.quote: When eating fruit, remember the one who planted the tree.
quotes.author: Vietnamese (on gratitude)

quotes.quote: When you drink water, remember the mountain spring.
quotes.author: Chinese (on gratitude)

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought; and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Gratitude is a currency that we can mint for ourselves, and spend without fear of bankruptcy.
quotes.author: Fred De Witt Van Amburgh

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the completion of thankfulness. Thankfulness may consist merely of words. Gratitude is shown in acts.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as gratitude unexpressed. If it is unexpressed, it is plain, old-fashioned ingratitude.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Gratitude is an art of painting an adversity into a lovely picture.
quotes.author: Kak Sri

quotes.quote: Two kinds of gratitude: The sudden kind we feel for what we take; the larger kind we feel for what we give.
quotes.author: Edwin Arlington Robinson

quotes.quote: Gratitude is a quality similar to electricity: it must be produced and discharged and used up in order to exist at all.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Feeling grateful or appreciative of someone or something in your life actually attracts more of the things that you appreciate and value into your life.
quotes.author: Northrup Christiane

quotes.quote: The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To speak gratitude is courteous and pleasant, to enact gratitude is generous and noble, but to live gratitude is to touch Heaven.
quotes.author: Johannes Gaertner

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the state of mind of thankfulness. As it is cultivated, we experience an increase in our sympathetic joy, our happiness at another's happiness. Just as in the cultivation of compassion, we may feel the pain of others, so we may begin to feel their joy as well. And it doesn't stop there.
quotes.author: Stephen Levine

quotes.quote: We often take for granted the very things that most deserve our gratitude.
quotes.author: Cynthia Ozick

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Gratitude is one of the sweet shortcuts to finding peace of mind and happiness inside. No matter what is going on outside of us, there's always something we could be grateful for.
quotes.author: Barry Neil Kaufman

quotes.quote: No one who achieves success does so without the help of others. The wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Do not indulge in dreams of having what you have not, but reckon up the chief of the blessings you do possess, and then thankfully remember how you would crave for them if they were not yours.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Gratitude goes beyond the 'mine' and 'thine' and claims the truth that all of life is a pure gift. In the past I always thought of gratitude as a spontaneous response to the awareness of gifts received, but now I realize that gratitude can also be lived as a discipline. The discipline of gratitude is the explicit effort to acknowledge that all I am and have is given to me as a gift of love, a gift to be celebrated with joy.
quotes.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all the others.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the moral memory of mankind.
quotes.author: Georg Simmel

quotes.quote: To live a life of gratitude is to open our eyes to the countless ways in which we are supported by the world around us. Such a life provides less space for our suffering because our attention is more balanced. We are more often occupied with noticing what we are given, thanking those who have helped us, and repaying the world in some concrete way for what we are receiving.
quotes.author: Gregg Krech

quotes.quote: At times our own light goes out and is rekindled by a spark from another person. Each of us has cause to think with deep gratitude of those who have lighted the flame within us.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Gratitude is merely the secret hope of further favors.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the best attitude. There is not a more pleasing exercise of the mind than gratitude. It is accompanied with such an inward satisfaction that the duty is sufficiently rewarded by the performance.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: To the generous mind the heaviest debt is that of gratitude, when it is not in our power to repay it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: As each day comes to us refreshed and anew, so does my gratitude renew itself daily. The breaking of the sun over the horizon is my grateful heart dawning upon a blessed world.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: You simply will not be the same person two months from now after consciously giving thanks each day for the abundance that exists in your life. And you will have set in motion an ancient spiritual law: the more you have and are grateful for, the more will be given you.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: When we become more fully aware that our success is due in large measure to the loyalty, helpfulness, and encouragement we have received from others, our desire grows to pass on similar gifts. Gratitude spurs us on to prove ourselves worthy of what others have done for us. The spirit of gratitude is a powerful energizer.
quotes.author: Wilferd A. Peterson

quotes.quote: But the value of gratitude does not consist solely in getting you more blessings in the future. Without gratitude you cannot long keep from dissatisfied thought regarding things as they are.
quotes.author: Wallace Wattles

quotes.quote: Gratitude is a vaccine, an antitoxin, and an antiseptic.
quotes.author: John Henry Jowett

quotes.quote: Gratitude is one of the least articulate of the emotions, especially when it is deep.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.quote: Let us rise up and be thankful, for if we didn't learn a lot today, at least we learned a little, and if we didn't learn a little, at least we didn't get sick, and if we got sick, at least we didn't die; so, let us all be thankful.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: A man's indebtedness is not virtue; his repayment is. Virtue begins when he dedicates himself actively, to the job of gratitude.
quotes.author: Ruth Benedict

quotes.quote: Graves aren't for the dead. They're for the loved ones the dead leave behind them. Once those loved ones have gone, once all the lives that have touched the occupant of any given grave had ended, then the grave's purpose was fulfilled and ended.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Never the grave gives back what it has won!
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: The grave Is but the threshold of eternity.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: All roads end at the grave, which is the gate to nothingness.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Everybody dies, but some spend a whole life digging their grave.
quotes.author: Shon Mehta

quotes.quote: There will be sleeping enough in the grave.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Some people die and you realize that the only mark they left on earth are the tomb stones under which they lie.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: A tomb now suffices him for whom the whole world was not sufficient.
quotes.author: Alexander The Great

quotes.quote: Grave was the man in years, in looks, in word, his locks were grey, yet was his courage green.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.quote: Every man is grave alone.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Even in the grave, all is not lost.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Grave is a journey not a destination.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: Don't go to the grave with life unused.
quotes.author: Bobby Bowden

quotes.quote: The paths of glory lead but to the grave.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: The grave will fall in upon him who digs it.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: There is plenty of time to sleep in the grave.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The graveyard is the everlasting home of every man.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Only where there are graves are there resurrections.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If you live in a graveyard, you can't weep for everyone.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Most people go to their grave with their music inside them.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The grave is a common treasury, to which we must all be taken.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: No one can escape the grave.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: To say what you feel is to dig your own grave.
quotes.author: Sinead O'Connor

quotes.quote: The grave has a door on its inner side.
quotes.author: Alexander Maclaren

quotes.quote: A grave is such a quiet place.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: Build castles, don't dig graves.
quotes.author: David J. Schwartz

quotes.quote: Only on the edge of the grave can man conclude anything.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: The last excessive feelings of delight are always grave.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: Gravity is a habit that is hard to shake off.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchet

quotes.quote: There is no gravity in the Planet of Love; everything floats in the air.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you believe in gravity, you already believe in something higher than yourself.
quotes.author: Chelsey Philpot

quotes.quote: If you blame gravity for falling in love, even God has the right to laugh at you.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: There is gravity in human affairs as in the heavenly bodies. It seems anyone who wants to go up is always pulled down.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Gravity may put the planets into motion, but without the divine Power, it could never put them into such a circulating motion as they have about the Sun; and therefore, for this as well as other reasons, I am compelled to ascribe the frame of this System to an intelligent Agent.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Because there is a law such as gravity, the universe can and will create itself from nothing.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Not believing in force is the same as not believing in gravity.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: Everything every day here on Earth is based on gravity, and you don't realize it until you don't have it anymore.
quotes.author: Peggy Whitson

quotes.quote: Gravity is only the bark of wisdom's tree, but it preserves it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It's only when gravity starts to take over you begin to think about your body.
quotes.author: David Soul

quotes.quote: The fatal flaw of gravity; when you are down, everything falls down on you.
quotes.author: Sylvia Townsend Warner

quotes.quote: What makes a man heavy is the gravity of virtue. Without it, man will be so light that he will be drifted in the winds of immorality.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Gravity is love and every turn is a leap of faith.
quotes.author: Warren Miller

quotes.quote: Everything does fall. It must be gravity.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Gravity is why there are suns and planets in the first place. It is practically God.
quotes.author: Mary Roach

quotes.quote: Gravity proves that the whole universe is filled with Love.
quotes.author: Ankala V Subbarao

quotes.quote: Gravity overcomes grace and form at a certain mass level.
quotes.author: Sara Stark

quotes.quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Nobody escapes age and gravity.
quotes.author: Harlan Ellison

quotes.quote: The gravity is the first thing which you don't think
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Gravity is one variable in a lot of scientific processes. If you can remove gravity or minimize its effect, then you can understand the other processes that are going on.
quotes.author: Laurel Clark

quotes.quote: Gravity wins over all other known forces.
quotes.author: Andrea M. Ghez

quotes.quote: It's the gravity that shapes the large scale structure of the universe, even though it is the weakest of four categories of forces
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Tis a short sight to limit our faith in laws to those of gravity, of chemistry, of botany, and so forth.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Gravity doesn't lie.
quotes.author: Brie Bella

quotes.quote: Life isn't black and white. It's a million gray areas, don't you find?
quotes.author: Ridley Scott

quotes.quote: Gray is the queen of colors, because she makes everyone else look good.
quotes.author: Helen Van Wyk

quotes.quote: A gray day provides the best light.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Color is the essence of painting, which the subject always killed.
quotes.author: Kasimir Malevich

quotes.quote: The gray silence, the gray waves, the gray wastes of the sea.
quotes.author: William Sharp

quotes.quote: Most consequential choices involve shades of gray, and some fog is often useful in getting things done.
quotes.author: Timothy Geithner

quotes.quote: Gray is the color... the most important of all... absent of opinion, nothing, neither/nor.
quotes.author: Gerhard Richter

quotes.quote: Gray hairs seem to my fancy like the soft light of the moon, silvering over the evening of life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: The color of truth is gray.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Color is the language of the poets. It is astonishingly lovely. To speak it is a privilege.
quotes.author: Keith Crown

quotes.quote: The gray has no chance against that smile. It vanishes in a wonderful haze of bright color.
quotes.author: Harlan Coben

quotes.quote: Life is not black and white; there is some gray nuance to it.
quotes.author: Pilou Asbaek

quotes.quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.quote: The tones of gray, pale turquoise and pink will prevail.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: Gray skies are just clouds passing over.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Gray hairs are signs of wisdom if you hold your tongue, speak and they are but hairs, as in the young.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: When men get gray hair, they look distinguished. When women get gray hair, they look old.
quotes.author: John Lithgow

quotes.quote: I can't stand Marge's gray hair. It's like I'm married to Richard Gere.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: Oh, Marge. Don't worry. Lots of movie stars have gray hair, like all those women we loved in the eighties.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: This is where our usual comfort level of black and white is now in a crappy little gray area.
quotes.author: Christian Sesma

quotes.quote: One day I saw you smile, and it really knocked me out. You smiled. It was like the sun breaking out on a gray day.
quotes.author: Jane Bernstein

quotes.quote: They wait for us. Let them wait. Men with gray hair are very patient.
quotes.author: Tom T. Chamales

quotes.quote: Grandpa means someone who is old and gray.
quotes.author: Jeff Franklin

quotes.quote: You did that on purpose! You're going away till you're gray! I got the evidence!
quotes.author: Hal Needham

quotes.quote: At Christmas tide your hair was gray, But memories chased your cares away, Now lovingly in my simple way, I send you love on Mutter's Day. Mutter's Day, number 16.
quotes.author: Laird Doyle

quotes.quote: My god, look at this place! It's like a coloring book if the only crayon available was gray.
quotes.author: Doug Walker

quotes.quote: This jail's so neat; all the colors match! Gray, gray, and gray!
quotes.author: Jamie Greenberg

quotes.quote: Time is what gives a man gray hair.
quotes.author: Luke Short

quotes.quote: When you're mature, your hair turns gray.
quotes.author: Mitchell Kriegman

quotes.quote: The world is not black and white but gray.
quotes.author: Mladen Reljanovic

quotes.quote: You worry too much, Harry. It's turning you gray.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: So wake me when the sun goes down / Tonight's my last night in town / I pledge to a flag so grey / No matter what time, the skies are grey.
quotes.author: Jacques Webster

quotes.quote: One man on a lonely platform / One case sitting by his side / Two eyes staring cold and silent / Show fear as he turns to hide / Aaah, we fade to grey
quotes.author: Chris Payne

quotes.quote: As the cold gray light of gone / When waking up and finding out / She's never coming home
quotes.author: Bill Anderson

quotes.quote: The house was deathly quiet / I knew something was wrong / Then suddenly it dawned on me / The cold gray light of gone
quotes.author: Bill Anderson

quotes.quote: No, there's nothing quite as lonely / As the cold gray light of gone / When waking up and finding out / She's never coming home
quotes.author: Bill Anderson

quotes.quote: The gray dawn slaughters / the promise of Spring / Winter’s desperate last goodbye
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: If you were shocked by a gray hair or two at thirty, you may have felt they were premature, but, technically, they were right on schedule.
quotes.author: Diana Lewis Jewell

quotes.quote: How early we gray is determined by our genes, or more specifically, the family code for 'turning off' the metabolism of menocytes.
quotes.author: Diana Lewis Jewell

quotes.quote: Age may not be the most reliable indicator of when gray hair will appear, but the aging process is the number-one suspect.
quotes.author: Diana Lewis Jewell

quotes.quote: We tend to associate gray with what is boring, but there are a thousand kinds of gray, and when combined with colors its varieties are endless.
quotes.author: Krisztina Fehérváry

quotes.quote: People don't understand us. They don't understand me. They think it's so black and white, that he makes me miserable and that I should be with someone else and that I deserve something else. But it's not black and white at all. It's gray. It's a never ending world of gray
quotes.author: Amanda Grace

quotes.quote: The color gray is a peculiar color for a city because the color is not definite.
quotes.author: Philip Bachman

quotes.quote: The color gray is a reference to ambiguity, speculation, and nebulous deconstruction without solution.
quotes.author: Philip Bachman

quotes.quote: Storm gray delivers the floods.
quotes.author: Philip Bachman

quotes.quote: Gun metal gray or pewter gray is the color of the ocean on an overcast day.
quotes.author: Philip Bachman

quotes.quote: The color of truth is gray.
quotes.author: Darla Ferrara

quotes.quote: Color cards must have absolutely accurate colors and gray levels, so purchase them from a reputable professional camera.
quotes.author: Ken Milburn

quotes.quote: The gray color is completely free to express.
quotes.author: Osama Blal Abd Elfatah

quotes.quote: The color gray, a mixture of black and white in equal proportions.
quotes.author: Adelle Bradford

quotes.quote: Whether we realize it or not, in the battle arena we call life most of our time is spent in one gray area or the another.
quotes.author: Adelle Bradford

quotes.quote: Life is full of gray areas of compromise where the gray banner is far stronger than all the others because it is all the others combined.
quotes.author: Adelle Bradford

quotes.quote: Gray market goods, however, are sold outside the normal distribution channels and, in some cases, were not intended for sale in the United States.
quotes.author: Seth E. Lipner

quotes.quote: Gray market sales nevertheless constitute a vigorous industry.
quotes.author: Seth E. Lipner

quotes.quote: Gray day. Everything is gray. I watch. But nothing moves today.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: I like these cold, gray winter days. Days like these let you savor a bad mood.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: A great work demands a great sacrifice, and who is not capable of a great sacrifice is not capable of a great work.
quotes.author: Muriel Strode

quotes.quote: Great things start from small beginnings.
quotes.author: Marcus Tulius Cicero

quotes.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: A great obstacle to happiness is to anticipate too great a happiness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Every great achievement is the victory of a flaming heart.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The small truth has words that are clear; the great truth has great silence.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: None think the great unhappy, but the great.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Where the willingness is great, the difficulties cannot be great.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Lives of great men all remind us, we can make our lives sublime, and, departing, leave behind us, footprints on the sands of time.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Nature's great masterpiece, an elephant; the only harmless great thing.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: No great mind has ever existed without a touch of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: All great soul-winners have been men of much and mighty prayer, and all great revivals have been preceded and carried out by persevering, prevailing knee-work in the closet.
quotes.author: Samuel Logan Brengle

quotes.quote: Great souls by instinct to each other turn, demand alliance, and in friendship burn.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: Great men are rarely isolated mountain-peaks; they are the summits of ranges.
quotes.author: Thomas Wentworth Higginson

quotes.quote: There may be a great fire in our soul, yet no one ever comes to warm himself at it, and the passers-by see only a wisp of smoke.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: I find the great thing in this world is, not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Half a truth is often a great lie.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A great soul will be strong to live as well as think.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A great soul serves everyone all the time. A great soul never dies. It brings us together again and again.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Great truths are portions of the soul of man; Great souls are portions of eternity.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
quotes.author: Francesco Petrarca

quotes.quote: For a great willpower, no road has length!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Great people are meteors designed to burn so that the earth may be lighted.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We can do no great things, only small things with great love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: There never was a great soul that did not have some divine inspiration.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: I just feel like I'm the luckiest person in the world being able to do what I love and be able to do it all day every day if I like, you know, I mean it's great, I love it.
quotes.author: Faith Ringgold

quotes.quote: Have a great day. Note: does not apply to my enemies.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: I have learned over the years that the nicest thing I can do is to just say to myself, "Good Morning Darling, I love you; we're going to have a really great day today.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: We don't "have" a great day, we "make it" a great day!
quotes.author: Frosty Westering

quotes.quote: It's a great day to be alive. I know the sun's still shining when I close my eyes.
quotes.author: Travis Tritt

quotes.quote: A bad day for your ego is a great day for your soul.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: Sometimes I have a great day of filming and sometimes the theater strikes me better. It just depends.
quotes.author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.quote: When you're wide awake say it for goodness sake, it's gonna be a great day.
quotes.author: Paul Mccartney

quotes.quote: Today, is a great day to make a difference for someone. 'I have a dream'.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: I take nothing for granted. I now have only good days, or great days.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Every day is a good day to be alive, whether the sun's shining or not.
quotes.author: Marty Robbins

quotes.quote: Don't expect a great day; create one.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: It has happened to me to meet many of the men of my day whom the world agreed to call great.
quotes.author: Rebecca Harding Davis

quotes.quote: Do not let us speak of darker days, let us speak rather of sterner days. These are not dark days: these are great days-the greatest days our country has ever lived; and we must all thank God that we have been allowed, each of us according to our stations, to play a part in making these days memorable in the history of our race.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You can have a Great Day, or a Lousy Day; it's totally up to you.
quotes.author: Ed Foreman

quotes.quote: It's a great day in America when white people, black people and Latinos can all come together and pick on another minority.
quotes.author: George Lopez

quotes.quote: Today is the great day of one of the revelations of this world. The interrelationships of these individual realms were illumined as by a flash of lightning; they burst unexpected, frightening, and joyous out of the darkness. Never were they so strongly tied together and never so sharply divided.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Everyday above ground is a great day, remember that.
quotes.author: Pitbull

quotes.quote: This will be a great day in our history; the date of a New Revolution - quite as much needed as the old one. Even now as I write they are leading old John Brown to execution in Virginia for attempting to rescue slaves! This is sowing the wind to reap the whirlwind which will come soon!
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: These are not dark days: these are great days - the greatest days our country has ever lived.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I get up every morning and it's going to be a great day. You never know when it's going to be over so I refuse to have a bad day.
quotes.author: Paul Henderson

quotes.quote: Today's a great day to change a life. Starting with yours.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Every day is a great day to give love, spread joy, and SPARKLE!
quotes.author: Sheri Fink

quotes.quote: Make each day a masterpiece. Don't think your best days are out there somewhere. Why not today? Why can't today be a great day? It can if you believe it will.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Every day is a good day. There is something to learn, care and celebrate.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Any day above ground is a good day. Before you complain about anything, be thankful for your life and the things that are still going well.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Joyful morning, good morning, good day.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Good days, bad days, halfway days. But I'm still looking for a great day in the morning.
quotes.author: D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Let's not waste this time. Cause today is a great day for falling in love.
quotes.author: Taio Cruz

quotes.quote: It's a great day for the valleys. It's a great day for them all.
quotes.author: Doves

quotes.quote: If there's one great day, if there's one great height. Let it be the time for peace, let it be the time of right.
quotes.author: Big Country

quotes.quote: It's gonna be a great day while you're standing there. Get up and grab a chair.
quotes.author: Pure McCartney

quotes.quote: When you're down and out. Lift up your head and shout.There's gonna be a great day. Angels in the sky. Promise that by and by there's gonna be a great day.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: And it's a great day to be alive. I know the sun's still shining. When I close my eyes.
quotes.author: Travis Tritt

quotes.quote: We're gonna swing and sway till that great day. So lace up your shoes, throw 'way your blues.
quotes.author: Cab Calloway

quotes.quote: Oh I believe one great day the rain will come and wash this mess away.
quotes.author: Simple Minds

quotes.quote: Oh, what a great day to feel alive. Guess I must be livin' right.
quotes.author: Rhett Akins

quotes.quote: These days are great there's work to do.
quotes.author: Alien Ant Farm

quotes.quote: Great day in the morning my choir sing a pretty song.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: On that great day I'm going home to live forever more, just over on heaven's shore.
quotes.author: Hank Williams

quotes.quote: It's a great day. Be thankful. Put a smile on your face and nothing but blue skies.
quotes.author: R. Kelly

quotes.quote: A great day is coming, it's not far away. Don't wait the last minute my brother to pray.
quotes.author: Kitty Wells

quotes.quote: But oh, what a great day it was we lived, we loved and it all just sped up around the end.
quotes.author: John Michael Montgomery

quotes.quote: Believe me, been there, done that but every day around here is great day, remember that.
quotes.author: Kidz Bop Kids

quotes.quote: When soon or later you recognise your fate that will be your great, great day. On the wings of the morning with your own true love.
quotes.author: Pet Shop Boys

quotes.quote: I see a great day dawning you better heed my warning. Stay on the right side of the road.
quotes.author: The Dorsey Brothers

quotes.quote: Our Generation has had no Great war, no Great Depression. Our war is spiritual. Our depression is our lives.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: No one can possibly have lived through the Great Depression without being scarred by it. No amount of experience since the depression can convince someone who has lived through it that the world is safe economically.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: World War II ended the Great Depression with one of the great public-private industrial collaborations in the history of man.
quotes.author: Jon Meacham

quotes.quote: The remedy [for the Great Depression] is to give the workers access to the means of production, and let them produce for themselves, not for others, . . . the American way.
quotes.author: Upton Sinclair

quotes.quote: The Great Depression in the United States, far from being a sign of the inherent instability of the private enterprise system, is a testament to how much harm can be done by mistakes on the part of a few men when they wield vast power over the monetary system of the country.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: The Great Depression was going on, so that the station and the streets teemed with homeless people, just as they do today. The newspapers were full of stories of worker layoffs and farm foreclosures and bank failures, just as they are today. All that has changed, in my opinion, is that, thanks to television, we can hide a Great Depression. We may even be hiding a Third World War.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: An entire nation, it seemed, was standing in one long breadline, desperate for even the barest essentials. It was a crisis of monumental proportions. It was known as the Great Depression.
quotes.author: Kathi Appelt

quotes.quote: Your grandparents came of age in the Great Depression, when everyday life was about deprivation and sacrifice, when the economic conditions of the time were so grave and so unrelenting it would have been easy enough for the American dream to fade away.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: The Great Depression, like most other periods of severe unemployment, was produced by government mismanagement rather than by any inherent instability of the private economy.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: The 24% unemployment reached at the depths of the Great Depression was no picnic.
quotes.author: Barry Eichengreen

quotes.quote: Men and women whose early youth was shaped in the ordeal of the Great Depression showed the values formed in that crucible when tyranny threatened a world.
quotes.author: Steve Buyer

quotes.quote: We beat the Great Depression without lotteries and legalized gambling.
quotes.author: John Warren Kindt

quotes.quote: It is reported that about 30% of the world's population is unemployed. That's worse than the Great Depression, but it's now an international phenomenon.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: America had been a boom-and-bust economy going into the Great Depression - just over and over and over, fortunes were wiped out, ordinary families were crushed under it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.quote: The greatest generation was formed first by the Great Depression. They shared everything - meals, jobs, clothing.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: America has always built ourselves out of adversity. All the way back to the Great Depression.
quotes.author: Jim Gray

quotes.quote: Grandmothers and grandchildren have a lot in common. They are inclined to straggle behind on walks. They doze off at unexpected moments. They like fancy cakes. They are very fond of cats and know how to talk to them. They are given to falling over. They get the giggles.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Grandma always made you feel she had been waiting to see just you all day and now the day was complete.
quotes.author: Marcy Demaree

quotes.quote: Mommy knows a lot, but Grandma knows everything
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When the grandmothers of today hear the word 'Chippendales,' they don't necessarily think of chairs.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Happiness is being a great-grandmother!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A grandma is warm hugs and sweet memories. She remembers all of your accomplishments and forgets all of your mistakes.
quotes.author: Barbara Cage

quotes.quote: I never knew how much love my heart could hold until I became a Great-Grandmother!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A great-grandmother's heart is a patchwork of love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't eat anything your great grandmother wouldn't recognize as food
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: Having a grandmother is like having an army. This is a grand-child's ultimate privilege: knowing that someone is on your side, always, whatever the details.
quotes.author: Fredrik Backman

quotes.quote: We rarely know who our ancestors were. Who can even remember the names of their great-grandparents? They have vanished into the dim and distant past
quotes.author: Dmitri Volkogonov

quotes.quote: Great Grandmaâ€ doesn't mean OLD â€“ It means BLESSED and LOVED!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandmother-grandchild relationships are simple... Grandmas are short on criticism and long on love.
quotes.author: Janet Lanese

quotes.quote: Just when grandparents think their work is finished someone calls them "great"
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Children are often spoiled because no one will spank Grandma.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What children need most are the essentials that grandparents provide in abundance. They give unconditional love, kindness, patience, humor, comfort, lessons in life. And, most importantly, cookies.
quotes.author: Rudy Giuliani

quotes.quote: Only the best Grandmas get promoted to Great-Grandma!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Grandmothers always have time to talk and make you feel special.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Grandmothers are voices of the past and role models of the present. Grandmothers open the doors to the future.
quotes.author: Helen Ketchum

quotes.quote: Grandparents in the parenting role are often overwhelmed by their children, grandchildren, and social milieu in which they live in.
quotes.author: Carole B. Cox

quotes.quote: As grandparents raising grandchildren, you may feel very 'unempowered.' These feelings are likely to happen when you feel that you are being taken advantage of, or that you have little control over your own life or that of your children or grandchildren.
quotes.author: Carole B. Cox

quotes.quote: Parents cannot choose to be grandparents any more than children can choose to be born.
quotes.author: Arthur Kornhaber

quotes.quote: For grandparents, it is a gift of a new connection between all who have preceded them and all who proceed from them.
quotes.author: Arthur Kornhaber

quotes.quote: No matter how grandparents act, they affect the emotional well-being of their grandchildren, for better or worse, simply because they exist.
quotes.author: Arthur Kornhaber

quotes.quote: The normal conflicts that occur between children and grandparents.
quotes.author: Arthur Kornhaber

quotes.quote: The emotional attachment between grandparents and grandchildren, in sum, confers a natural form of social immunity on children that they cannot get from any other person or institution.
quotes.author: Arthur Kornhaber

quotes.quote: Parents and grandparents should support the child emotionally, letting her know that she is appreciated, supported and loved, whatever her interests or gender orientation.
quotes.author: James T. Webb

quotes.quote: Grandparents can be more relaxed with grandchildren, which the luxury of knowing that they will be sending the child back to his or her parents.
quotes.author: James T. Webb

quotes.quote: Most grandparents will say they never expected to feel this strongly about a grandchild, but now that they have one, they absolutely delight in the experience.
quotes.author: James T. Webb

quotes.quote: They say genes skip generations. Maybe that's why grandparents find their grandchildren so likeable.
quotes.author: Joan Mcintosh

quotes.quote: Grandparents who are involved in the lives of their grandchildren are truly needed in families all over the world.
quotes.author: James T. Webb

quotes.quote: A positive grandparent can be a major influence in helping grandchildren feel accepted, love, and safe.
quotes.author: James T. Webb

quotes.quote: It's not that being a grandparent today is better or worse, it's just different.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: A big part of our grandparent job is expressing ecstatic.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Grandparents are a source of timeless gifts. They teach, entertain and nurture the younger generation.
quotes.author: Karen Tewhey

quotes.quote: A visit to grandparents is a great opportunity to explore a new environment and participate in new activities.
quotes.author: Karen Tewhey

quotes.quote: It is as grandmothers that our mothers come into the fullness of their grace. when a man's mother holds his child in her gladden arms he is aware of the roundness of life's cycle; of the mystic harmony of life's ways.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: The birth of a child in the family can be the greatest leveler of differences, bringing everyone together.
quotes.author: Grandma Jan

quotes.quote: Grandma's home is her grandchildren's second home, a sort of security blanket they can escape to when the world is unfriendly.
quotes.author: Grandma Jan

quotes.quote: Parent-child relationships are complex. Grandmother-grandchild relationships are simple. Grandmas are short on criticism and long on love.
quotes.author: Grandma Jan

quotes.quote: What's so simple even a small child can manipulate it? Why, a grandmother, of course!
quotes.author: Janet Lanese

quotes.quote: If you would civilize a man, begin with his grandmother.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The Queen Mother, with a lifetime's popularity, seemed incapable of a bad performance as a national grandmother warm, smiling, human, understanding, she embodied everything the public could want of its grandmother.
quotes.author: John Pearson

quotes.quote: Since the beginning of time grandmothers have been negotiators and peacemakers in their families.
quotes.author: Grandma Jan

quotes.quote: The closest friends I have made all through life have been people who also grew up close to a loved and loving grandmother or grandfather.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Id-fashioned grandmothers take their grandchildren by the hand and lead them into the future. They are safe and kind, and wiser than the child's mother.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: The person who has lived the most is not the one with the most years, but the one with the richest experiences.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Whether she is a homemaker or career woman, all a grandmother wants is her family's love and respect as a productive individual who has much to contribute.
quotes.author: Grandma Jan

quotes.quote: My grandma's life was so exciting, it would make a great TV miniseries.
quotes.author: Nathan

quotes.quote: My great-grandmama told my grandmama the part she lived through that my grandmama didn't live through and my grandmama told my mama what they both lived through and my mama told me what they all lived through and we're supposed to pass it down like that from generation to generation so we'll never forget.
quotes.author: Gayl Jones

quotes.quote: Oh, spare me the grandma stuff. Grandma excuses are older than grandmas themselves.
quotes.author: Loren Bouchard

quotes.quote: We fill our childhood memories with sweet stories spent with our grandparents.
quotes.author: Rahul Salam

quotes.quote: As we grow older, our childishness is also being lost. And we are forgetting to show love to our elders, but they never change. Their love remains the same.
quotes.author: Rahul Salam

quotes.quote: At an old age, our grandparents need only some love, care, and respect.
quotes.author: Shirisha G

quotes.quote: Grandparents love is unconditional, they never expect anything from us in return. They want to spend their days with us.
quotes.author: Shirisha G

quotes.quote: Spend time with your grandparents, because we never know when they will leave, they want to spend their time with us, and They want to see us, and they will be waiting for us.
quotes.author: Shirisha G

quotes.quote: A Grandmother thinks of her grandchildren day and night, even when they are not with her. She will always love them more than anyone would understand.
quotes.author: Karen Gibbs

quotes.quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the heck she is.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: When she smiles, the lines in her face become epic narratives that trace the stories of generations that no book can replace.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: A few great minds are enough to endow humanity with monstrous power, but a few great hearts are not enough to make us worthy of using it.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: As great minds have the faculty of saying a great deal in a few words, so lesser minds have a talent of talking much, and saying nothing.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Great minds always tend to see virtue in misfortune.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Failures and mistakes are definitely the greatest teachers to all great minds.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Every great mind seeks to labor for eternity. All men are captivated by immediate advantages; great minds alone are excited by the prospect of distant good.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: No great mind has ever existed without a touch of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Great minds think alike, but lovers think as one.
quotes.author: Pyreglide

quotes.quote: High aims form high characters, and great objects bring out great minds.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Great minds that are healthy are never considered geniuses, while this sublime qualification is lavished on brains that are often inferior but are slightly touched by madness.
quotes.author: Guy de Mauppasant

quotes.quote: Oblivion is a second death, which great minds dread more than the first.
quotes.author: Jean de Boufflers

quotes.quote: Great minds find beauties and appreciate it. Average minds find commonalities and compare. Small minds find the problems and criticize.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: While small minds were bragging about their material possessions, great minds were busy expanding their assets.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Great minds with great ideas usually share in the midst of their persecution
quotes.author: Jeremy Aldana

quotes.quote: A great mind is not sharpened by consorting with lesser minds.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Great minds tend toward banality. It is the noblest effort of individualism. But it implies a sort of modesty, which is so rare that it is scarcely found except in the greatest, or in beggars.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Great advantages are often attended with great inconveniences, and great minds called to severe trials.
quotes.author: Mercy Otis Warren

quotes.quote: Great errors seldom originate but with men of great minds.
quotes.author: Petrarch

quotes.quote: The most characteristic mark of a great mind is to choose some one important object, and pursue it for life.
quotes.author: Anna Letitia Barbauld

quotes.quote: Small mind competes, big mind collaborates and great mind encompasses.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Little minds try to solve the matters through violence and darkness; great minds try to solve the matters through love and light!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Silence is sometimes more significant and sublime than the most noble and most expressive eloquence, and is on many occasions the indication of a great mind.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: It is the sign of a great mind to dislike greatness, and prefer things in measure to things in excess.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: To live for a time close to great minds is the best kind of education.
quotes.author: John Buchan

quotes.quote: Great minds must be ready not only to take opportunities, but to make them.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Only great minds can afford a simple style.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: A great mind becomes a great fortune.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: The great mind knows the power of gentleness.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It's better to have a great team than a team of greats.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Good teams beat you with speed. Great teams beat you with spacing and timing.
quotes.author: Jason Kidd

quotes.quote: One of the things about a great team is that the whole exceeds the sum of its partners.
quotes.author: Tracy Hickman

quotes.quote: Great teams always have a Plan B. Look at Barcelona. Their Plan B is to stick to Plan A.
quotes.author: Johnny Giles

quotes.quote: On good teams coaches hold players accountable, on great teams players hold players accountable
quotes.author: Joe Dumars

quotes.quote: When a great team loses through complacency, it will constantly search for new and more intricate explanations to explain away defeat.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Great teams are not made up of many well-rounded players. Great teams are made up of a variety of players, each having their own strengths.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: It's stunning to me what kind of an impact even one person can have if they have the right passion, perspective and are able to align the interest of a great team.
quotes.author: Steve Case

quotes.quote: Any team can be a miracle team. The catch is that you have got to go out and work for your miracles. Effort is what ultimately separates great teams from ordinary teams.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Great teams do not hold back with one another. They are unafraid to air their dirty laundry. They admit their mistakes, their weaknesses, and their concerns without fear of reprisal.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: A great team doesn't mean that they had the smartest people. What made those teams great is that everyone trusted one another. It can be a powerful thing when that magic dynamic exists.
quotes.author: Gene Kim

quotes.quote: In great teams, conflict becomes productive. The free flow of conflicting ideas is critical for creative thinking, for discovering new solutions no one individual would have come to on his own.
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.quote: The most successful entrepreneurs tell you they have a great team. Lots of small-business owners let ego get in the way. Many people helped me along the way. You've got to remember the people who were loyal to you, and don't forget them when you become successful.
quotes.author: Bill Rancic

quotes.quote: The strength of individual greatness makes a great team.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Great teamwork is the only way we create the breakthroughs that define our careers.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Great players and great teams want to be driven. They want to be pushed to the edge. They don't want to be cheated. Ordinary players and average teams want it to be easy
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: I think people have different definitions of team unity. My definition is doing whatever it takes to win, what makes a great team; it's performance on the field, respect on the field.
quotes.author: Hope Solo

quotes.quote: It's the most pleasurable experience in the world! When you're on a great team and you get hot, your teammates milk you dry - they wear you out and there's nothing like being on a great team.
quotes.author: Bill Walton

quotes.quote: The great teams find a way to win.
quotes.author: Ray Allen

quotes.quote: Great teams work harder after a tough loss.
quotes.author: Ron Brown

quotes.quote: To me, there's no great chef without a great team.
quotes.author: Daniel Boulud

quotes.quote: Your biggest challenge will be building a great team.
quotes.author: John Doerr

quotes.quote: Great teams have players who understand their responsibilities.
quotes.author: Bruce Brown

quotes.quote: Having a great idea is important. But having a great team is also important.
quotes.author: Steve Case

quotes.quote: Of course, there will be few people who are sympathetic but you don't become a great team overnight, no matter how much money you have at your disposal.
quotes.author: Frank Lampard

quotes.quote: Halfway through the decade, we realized that we had a great team and that we could do great things, and that we could probably have something here that we believed we had a chance to reach greatness.
quotes.author: Franco Harris

quotes.quote: It is great to do what you love but greater with the great team.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Every great work, every big accomplishment, has been brought into manifestation through holding to the vision, and often just before the big achievement, comes apparent failure and discouragement.
quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quotes.quote: The Great Work is, before all things, the creation of man by himself, that is to say, the full and entire conquest of his faculties and his future; it is especially the perfect emancipation of his will.
quotes.author: Eliphas Levi

quotes.quote: A Great Work of Art is one that truly moves and inspires you. You yourself must be moved. Don't look at art with others' eyes. Don't listen to music with others' ears. You must react to art with your own feelings, your own heart and mind.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: It is not just the Great Works of mankind that make a culture. It is the daily things, like what people eat and how they serve it.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: The moment you think you understand a great work of art, it's dead for you.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Every great work makes the human face more admirable and richer, and that is its whole secret.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Great work comes from great joy. Leave the angst for the movies; do art – that is fun.
quotes.author: Jack White

quotes.quote: Seeing other people do great work is its own form of inspiration and far more powerful than borrowing their ideas.
quotes.author: Kody Chamberlain

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Your greatest creation is yourself. Like any great work of art, creating a great self means putting in hard work, every day, for years.
quotes.author: Vi Hart

quotes.quote: Great works are performed, not by strength, but by perseverance. Those that walk with vigor, three hours a day, will pass in seven years a space equal to the circumference of the globe.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Every great work of art should be considered like any work of nature. First of all from the point of view of its aesthetic reality and then not just from its development and the mastery of its creation but from the standpoint of what has moved and agitated its creator.
quotes.author: Amedeo Modigliani

quotes.quote: As you've probably discovered, great work makes us uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Always give your best; today's great work is tomorrow's benchmark.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: There is no place for little minds in a great work
quotes.author: Manly Hall

quotes.quote: Only when the heart loves can the intellect do great work.
quotes.author: Newell Dwight Hillis

quotes.quote: Great work is the result of seeking out tension, not avoiding it.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Perhaps only silence and love do justice to a great work of art.
quotes.author: Dominique De Menil

quotes.quote: To create great work, here's how you must spend your time: 1% Inspiration 9% Perspiration 90% Justification
quotes.author: George Lois

quotes.quote: It is better to begin a great work than to finish a small one.
quotes.author: Janet Erskine Stuart

quotes.quote: It seems to be a characteristic of all great work that it creators wear a cloak of imprecision.
quotes.author: Fred Hoyle

quotes.quote: Every great work of art has two faces, one towards its own time and one towards future, towards eternity.
quotes.author: Daniel Barenboim

quotes.quote: Great work is done by people who are not afraid to be great.
quotes.author: Fernando Flores

quotes.quote: The Great Work – the work of ensuring a just, healthy, beautiful, and sustainably life-giving world for future generations of all species.
quotes.author: Thomas Berry

quotes.quote: Genius begins great works labor alone finishes them.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: All great work is preparing yourself for the accident to happen.
quotes.author: Sidney Lumet

quotes.quote: A great work is made out of a combination of obedience and liberty.
quotes.author: Nadia Boulanger

quotes.quote: The only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: No great work has ever been produced except after a long interval of still and musing meditation.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Great work requires great and persistent effort for a long time. … Character has to be established through a thousand stumbles.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Every great work of art has two faces, one toward its own time and one toward the future, toward eternity.
quotes.author: Daniel Barenboim

quotes.quote: The great work must inevitably be obscure, except to the very few, to those who like the author himself are initiated into the mysteries. Communication then is secondary: it is perpetuation which is important. For this only one good reader is necessary.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Great work is always shunned at first.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: No great work of art is ever finished.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: May the Lord strengthen you for every great work.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: There is an overflowing grace, for every great work.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Don't wait to be compelled to do great work.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as great work without longevity.
quotes.author: Johnny Hunt

quotes.quote: The instinct to produce great work doesn't require a fancy notebook.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Ultimately, if you are doing great work, the money will come.
quotes.author: Lee Clow

quotes.quote: The strength of every individual is the grace for great work.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A great work always leaves us in a state of musing.
quotes.author: Isaac D'Israeli

quotes.quote: No man ever did or can do a great work alone.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A great work of art is one that continues to repay attention.
quotes.author: Christopher Ricks

quotes.quote: The intellectual architecture means focusing on doing great work instead of focusing on agency politics.
quotes.author: Jay Chiat

quotes.quote: Families mean work,but they are our great work,and we are not afraid of work.
quotes.author: Julie B. Beck

quotes.quote: It's not about my career now. It's just about finding great work and having a good time.
quotes.author: Melanie Griffith

quotes.quote: Regardless of your ethnicity or anything, if you do great work, people will notice and you'll get hired.
quotes.author: Aziz Ansari

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The price of greatness is responsibility.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: A grateful heart is a beginning of greatness. It is an expression of humility.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: A great man is always willing to be little.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Great men are not born great, they grow great . . .
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Creativity means believing you have greatness.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: There are no great men, only great challenges that ordinary men are forced by circumstances to meet.
quotes.author: William F. Halsey

quotes.quote: No great man lives in vain. The history of the world is but the biography of great men.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Man is only truly great when he acts from his passions
quotes.author: Benjamin Disreali

quotes.quote: Show me a man who cannot bother to do little things and I'll show you a man who cannot be trusted to do big things
quotes.author: Lawrence D. Bell

quotes.quote: The good news is that the moment you decide that what you know is more important than what you have been taught to believe, you will have shifted gears in your quest for abundance. Success comes from within, not from without.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Everybody can be great... because anybody can serve.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: There is a great man who makes every man feel small. But the real great man is the man who makes every man feel great.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The first step toward greatness is to be honest.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: All great deeds and all great thoughts have a ridiculous beginning.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion.
quotes.author: Hebbel

quotes.quote: If there is no passion in your life, then have you really lived? Find your passion, whatever it may be. Become it, and let it become you and you will find great things happen FOR you, TO you and BECAUSE of you.
quotes.author: T. Alan Armstrong

quotes.quote: To become truly great, one has to stand with people, not above them.
quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Be good and you will be lonely.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Forget about likes and dislikes. They are of no consequence. Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness but it is greatness.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Greatness is a spiritual condition.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: We shall never resolve the enigma of the relation between the negative foundations of greatness and that greatness itself.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Great men are not always wise.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: The greatness of a man's power is the measure of his surrender.
quotes.author: William Booth

quotes.quote: Greatness be nothing unless it be lasting.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Men are only as great as they are kind.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who does him absolutely no good.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Great hope makes great men
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Deeds, not stones, are the true monuments of the great.
quotes.author: John L. Motley

quotes.quote: Each of us is great insofar as we perceive and act on the infinite possibilities which lie undiscovered and unrecognized about us.
quotes.author: James Harvey Robinson

quotes.quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Great works are performed, not by strength, but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Greatness lies not in being strong, but in the right use of strength.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: You will become as small as your controlling desire; as great as your dominant aspiration.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Great men are true men, the men in whom nature has succeeded. They are not extraordinary -- they are in the true order. It is the other species of men who are not what they ought to be.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: The great must submit to the dominion of prudence and of virtue, or none will long submit to the dominion of the great.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Great men are the guideposts and landmarks in the state.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: A great person is one who affects the mind of their generation.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: People do not decide to become extraordinary. They decide to accomplish extraordinary things.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: Greatness is not measured by what a man or woman accomplishes, but by the opposition he or she has overcome to reach his goals.
quotes.author: Dorothy Height

quotes.quote: If we cannot see the possibility of greatness, how can we dream it?
quotes.author: Lee Strasberg

quotes.quote: No man is truly great who is great only in his lifetime. The test of greatness is the page of history.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: To seek greatness is the only righteous vengeance.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: There never was a truly great man that was not at the same time truly virtuous.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If there is not the war, you don't get the great general, if there is not a great occasion, you don't get a great statesman, if Lincoln had lived in a time of peace, no one would have known his name.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Winning is great, sure, but if you are generally going to do something in life, the secret is learning how to lose. Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: Lives of great men all remind us, we can make our lives sublime, and, departing, leave behind us, footprints on the sands of time.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Everyone who achieves success in a great venture, solves each problem as they came to it. They helped themselves. And they were helped through powers known and unknown to them at the time they set out on their voyage. They keep going regardless of the obstacles they met.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: It is those who concentrate on but one thing at a time who advance in this world. The great man or woman is the one who never steps outside his or her specialty or foolishly dissipates his or her individuality.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: The greatest man is he who chooses the right with the most invincible resolution, who resists the sorest temptation from within and without; who bears the heaviest burdens cheerfully; who is calm in storms; and most fearless under menaces and frowns; whose reliance on truth, on virtue, and on God is most unfaltering.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: What makes greatness is starting something that lives after you.
quotes.author: Ralph Sockham

quotes.quote: I want to be thoroughly used up when I die, for the harder I work the more I love. I rejoice in life for its own sake. Life is no brief candle to me; it is a sort of splendid torch which I've got a hold of for the moment and I want to make it burn as brightly as possible before handing it on to future generations.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The call and need of a new era is for Greatness. Tapping into the higher reaches of human genius and motivation requires leaders to have a new mind-set, skill-set, and tool-set.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: There is never any easy way to greatness; greatness is always the product of toil.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: A man is seldom ashamed of feeling that he cannot love a woman so well when he sees a certain greatness in her: nature having intended greatness for men.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Is it so bad, then, to be misunderstood? Pythagoras was misunderstood, and Socrates, and Jesus, and Luther, and Copernicus, and Galileo, and Newton, and every pure and wise spirit that ever took flesh. To be great is to be misunderstood.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A man does not attain the status of Galileo merely because he is persecuted; he must also be right.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: The glory of great men should always be measured against the means they used to acquire it.
quotes.author: Duc de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Everything we think of as great has come to us from neurotics. It is they and they alone who found religions and create great works of art. The world will never realise how much it owes to them and what they have suffered in order to bestow their gifts on it.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: The first test of a truly great man is his humility.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: All the world's great have been little boys who wanted the moon.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: In me there dwells / No greatness, save it be some far-off touch / Of greatness to know well I am not great.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Difficulty is a nurse of greatness-a harsh nurse, who rocks her foster children roughly, but rocks them into strength and athletic proportions. The mind, grappling with great aims and wrestling with mighty impediments, grows by a certain necessity to the stature of greatness.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.quote: If any man seeks for greatness, let him forget greatness and ask for truth, and he will find both.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: A nation's greatness resides not in her material resources, but in her will, faith, intelligence, and moral forces.
quotes.author: J.M. Hoppin

quotes.quote: No man has come to true greatness who has not felt in some degree that his life belongs to his race, and that what God gives him he gives him for mankind.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: The greatest men in all ages have been lovers of their kind. All true leaders of men have it. Faith in men and love to men are unfailing marks of true greatness.
quotes.author: Sir William Jones

quotes.quote: If I am asked who is the greatest man? I answer the best; and if I am required to say who is the best? I reply he that has deserved most of his fellow-creatures.
quotes.author: Sir William Jones

quotes.quote: A really great man is known by three signs—generosity in the design, humanity in the execution, moderation in success.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: He only is great who has the habits of greatness; who, after performing what none in ten thousand could accomplish, passes on like Samson, and "tells neither father nor mother of it."
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: In the truly great, virtue governs with a scepter of knowledge and wisdom.
quotes.author: Sir Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: Great truths are portions of the soul of man; Great souls are portions of Eternity.
quotes.author: J.R. Lowell

quotes.quote: Greed is a bottomless pit which exhausts the person in an endless effort to satisfy the need without ever reaching satisfaction.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Greed is a fat demon with a small mouth and whatever you feed it is never enough.
quotes.author: Janwillem Van De Wetering

quotes.quote: Greed is not a financial issue. It's a heart issue.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: There is a sufficiency in the world for man's need but not for man's greed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Greed is so destructive. It destroys everything.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: Greed is the lack of confidence of one's own ability to create.
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others. Unsuccessful people are always asking, "What's in it for me
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: He who is not contented with what he has, would not be contented with what he would like to have.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Growth for the sake of growth is the ideology of the cancer cell.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Be Fearful When Others Are Greedy and Greedy When Others Are Fearful
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: There is a very fine line between loving life and being greedy for it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It is preoccupation with possessions, more than anything else, that prevents us from living freely and nobly.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: Any so-called material thing that you want is merely a symbol: you want it not for itself, but because it will content your spirit for the moment.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: For greed all nature is too little.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: From the first day to this, sheer greed was the driving spirit of civilization.
quotes.author: Friedrich Engels
