quotes.quote: Greed has taken the whole universe, and nobody is worried about their soul.
quotes.author: Little Richard

quotes.quote: Greed is the inventor of injustice as well as the current enforcer.
quotes.author: Julian Casablancas

quotes.quote: Lust and greed are more gullible than innocence.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: A greedy person and a pauper are practically one and the same.
quotes.author: Swiss Proverb

quotes.quote: There are many things that we would throw away if we were not afraid that others might pick them up.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is no calamity greater than lavish desires. There is no greater guilt than discontent. And there is no greater disaster than greed.
quotes.author: Lau Tzu

quotes.quote: Experience demands that man is the only animal which devours his own kind, for I can apply no milder term to the general prey of the rich on the poor.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Wealth is like sea-water; the more we drink, the thirstier we become; and the same is true of fame.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Avarice has ruined more souls than extravagance.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: We tend to forget that happiness doesn't come as a result of getting something we don't have, but rather of recognizing and appreciating what we do have.
quotes.author: Frederick Keonig

quotes.quote: A greedy father has thieves for children
quotes.author: Serbian Proverb

quotes.quote: He who is greedy is always in want
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: The lust of avarice as so totally seized upon mankind that their wealth seems rather to possess them than they possess their wealth.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Perhaps when we find ourselves wanting everything, it is because we are dangerously close to wanting nothing.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Oh, don't let's ask for the moon. We've already got the stars.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Everywhere in life, the true question is not what we gain, but what we do.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Man is the only animal whose desires increase as they are fed; the only animal that is never satisfied.
quotes.author: Henry George

quotes.quote: He that is of the opinion money will do everything may well be suspected of doing everything for money.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It has been said that the love of money is the root of all evil. The want of money is so quite as truly.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: If thou wilt make a man happy, add not unto his riches but take away from his desires.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: None of the quick fixes to the world's problems are going to work, unless we change the dream of greed and scarcity that the world is dreaming.
quotes.author: John Perkins

quotes.quote: All the money you make will never buy back your soul.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: If your desires be endless, your cares and fears will be so too.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The avarice person is ever in want; let your desired aim have a fixed limit.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Most men pursue pleasure with such breathless haste that they hurry past it.
quotes.author: Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: The saddest thing I can imagine is to get used to luxury
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: It is not good to be too free. It is not good to have everything one wants.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: The man who has won millions at the cost of his conscience is a failure.
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Big mouthfuls often choke.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: The average man does not know what to do with this life, yet wants another one which will last forever.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: It is greed to do all the talking but not to want to listen at all
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: Indeed, man wishes to be happy even when he so lives as to make happiness impossible.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's needs, but not every man's greed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The world says: 'You have needs' -- satisfy them. You have as much right as the rich and the mighty. Don't hesitate to satisfy your needs; indeed, expand your needs and demand more." This is the worldly doctrine of today. And they believe that this is freedom. The result for the rich is isolation and suicide, for the poor, envy and murder.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: There is more in you of good than you know, child of the kindly West. Some courage and some wisdom, blended in measure. If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote:
Manifest plainness,
Embrace simplicity,
Reduce selfishness,
Have few desires.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Declare your jihad on thirteen enemies you cannot see -egoism, arrogance, conceit, selfishness, greed, lust, intolerance, anger, lying, cheating, gossiping and slandering. If you can master and destroy them, then you will be read to fight the enemy you can see.
quotes.author: Al-Ghazzali

quotes.quote: I find it odd- the greed of mankind. People only like you for as long as they perceive they can get what they want from you. Or for as long as they perceive you are who they want you to be. But I like people for all of their changing surprises, the thoughts in their heads, the warmth that changes to cold and the cold that changes to warmth... for being human. The rawness of being human delights me.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: There is no fire like passion, there is no shark like hatred, there is no snare like folly, there is no torrent like greed.
quotes.author: Siddharta Gautama

quotes.quote: I am afraid that our eyes are bigger than our stomachs, and that we have more curiosity than understanding. We grasp at everything, but catch nothing except wind.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote:
So the unwanting soul
sees what's hidden,
and the ever-wanting soul
sees only what it wants.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Our labour preserves us from three great evils -- weariness, vice, and want.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: When morality comes up against profit, it is seldom that profit loses.
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.quote: The Master said, “If your conduct is determined solely by considerations of profit you will arouse great resentment.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Most of the mess that is called history comes about because kings and presidents cannot be satisfied with a nice chicken and a good loaf of bread.
quotes.author: Jennifer Donnelly

quotes.quote: We have always known that heedless self interest was bad morals, we now know that it is bad economics.
quotes.author: Franklin Delano Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In a society governed passively by free markets and free elections, organized greed always defeats disorganized democracy.
quotes.author: Matt Taibbi

quotes.quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really WANT is only what you really NEED.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: Of all the icy blasts that blow on love, a request for money is the most chilling.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: The Master said, “The gentleman understands what is right, whereas the petty man understands profit.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It is the privilege of the gods to want nothing, and of godlike men to want little.
quotes.author: Diogenes of Sinope

quotes.quote: The difference between greed and ambition is a greedy person desires things he isn't prepared to work for.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: I'm fat because I'm greedy, and if my mind is fat it's because I'm curious.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: Getting money is not all a man's business: to cultivate kindness is a valuable part of the business of life.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A house built on greed cannot long endure.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: We cannot negotiate with people who say what's mine is mine and what's yours is negotiable.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: If we define an American fascist as one who in case of conflict puts money and power ahead of human beings, then there are undoubtedly several million fascists in the United States.
quotes.author: Henry Wallace

quotes.quote: Stealing to eat ain’t criminal—stealing to be rich is.
quotes.author: Andrew Vachss

quotes.quote: It was not curiosity that killed the goose who laid the golden egg, but an insatiable greed that devoured common sense.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Even the most beautiful scenery is no longer assured of our love after we have lived in it for three months, and some distant coast attracts our avarice: possessions are generally diminished by possession.
quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Money is like a child—rarely unaccompanied. When it disappears, look to those who were supposed to be keeping an eye on it while you were at the grocery store. You might also look for someone who has a lot of extra children sitting around, with long, suspicious explanations for how they got there.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Again we have the problem that whether you’re moral or not is a matter of whether it's cost-effective.
quotes.author: Rebecca McNutt

quotes.quote: Are you not ashamed of caring so much for the making of money and for fame and prestige, when you neither think nor care about wisdom and truth and the improvement of your soul?
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Greed indiscriminately penalizes / Selflessness is the ultimate panacea; for uniting all / innocuously harmonious; for centuries immemorial and alike.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed baselessly tyrannizes / Selflessness is an Omnipotent fabric; which irrefutably / transcends you above the resplendent heavens; to be the / unequivocal favorite of the divine.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed ruthlessly snatches / Selflessness is the only road to everlasting prosperity / treacherous with the / scent of the bountifully bestowing soil.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed manipulatively stagnates / Selflessness is the most priceless core of enthralling / existence; enlightening unassailable beams of hope; in all / those dwellings miserably impoverished / without optimism and light.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed horrendously massacres / Selflessness is an Omnisciently miraculous ointment / which heals the most bizarre wounds of the overwhelming rich / and pathetically destitute; alike.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed uncouthly divests / Selflessness is a enchantingly silken flower / which disseminates the true spirit of mankind / to even the most infinitesimal parts / of this fathomless globe.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed lethally poisons / Selflessness is a grandiloquently mesmerizing sky / which relentlessly showers the blessings of the Almighty / upon all philanthropically benign.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed pulverizes beyond recognition / Selflessness is a unendingly radiating horizon / which brilliantly sparkles all night and day / with the rainbow of unconquerable righteousness.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed maliciously obfuscates all truth / Selflessness is the most Omnipresent harbinger of celestial peace / unstoppably heading towards the paradise of scintillating success.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed insidiously cripples / Selflessness is a majestically flapping bird that hoists even the most devastatingly deprived / making one perpetually realize his ultimate mission in destined life.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Greed enters your home very silently / Finally it becomes your master / And you become slave of your own greed / Oneday it will drag you to an unknown grave.
quotes.author: Devil Poet

quotes.quote: When I watch folks of this world and see how widespread / It is for those, that pile up treasure and put on fat, to chafe / At the bit and grasp for more, the way they hunger for a safe
quotes.author: Giuseppe Gioacchino Belli

quotes.quote: Greed is eternal
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: Greed makes people want more and more power - power over the Earth, power over each other.
quotes.author: Nicholas Boxer

quotes.quote: Greed leads to misjudgment. And that can result in a loss of profits.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: Greed almost got me killed. Then poverty almost got me killed. If I'm gonna get it either way, I might as well be rich!
quotes.author: Doug Langdale

quotes.quote: Greed will imprison us all.
quotes.author: Ross LaManna

quotes.quote: You can't realize your dreams without greed.
quotes.author: Hideo Kojima

quotes.quote: Our society is already a metaphorical wasteland of political ghouls and vampires sucking the world dry with their greed and ignorance.
quotes.author: Kôsuke Fujishima

quotes.quote: It is not by my own power that I am resurrected. It is the greed of humanity which calls me back, and thus, by might, I rule. Might becomes the one and only justice in this world!
quotes.author: Toru Hagihara

quotes.quote: Greed is the only snake that cannot be charmed.
quotes.author: Luc Besson

quotes.quote: [Jesus] said, 'Beware! Guard against every kind of greed. Life is not measured by how much you own.
quotes.author: Luke 12:15

quotes.quote: Envy and greed always-always-exact a terrible price.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: I have never met an envious or greedy person who was at peace.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The Bible sees greed as a form of idolatry, because a greedy person worships things instead of God.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Greed and envy have their roots in selfishness.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Envy and greed starve on a steady diet of thanksgiving.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Life is not a matter of dollars and cents, houses and lands, earning capacity and financial achievement.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Greed must not be allowed to make man the slave of wealth.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: We have seen the results of unrestrained greed, corruption, and manipulation on Wall Street, financial mismanagement in the halls of government, fraud and perversion at the highest levels of both church and state.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Greed is an unreasonable all-absorbing desire to acquire things or wealth.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: One test of greed is that it is never satisfied.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The greatest need in the world is the transformation of human nature. We need a new heart that will not have lust and greed and hate in it.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Three great forces rule the world; stupidity, fear, and greed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Even Cronus, the Titan who literally had his kids for breakfast, would find these facts hard to swallow.
quotes.author: Tai Odunsi

quotes.quote: The Greek gods had personalities like those of humans and struggled with one another for position and power. They did not love humans (although some had favorites) and did not ask to be loved by them. They did not impose codes of behavior. They expected respect and honor but coud act contrary to human needs and desires.
quotes.author: Barry B. Powell

quotes.quote: But the seraphs that watched from above knew the tale: Gods and mortals may change their skies, but not their souls, who rush across the sea.
quotes.author: Grace Curley

quotes.quote: I guess darkness serves a purpose: to show us that there is redemption through chaos. I believe in that. I think that's the basis of Greek mythology.
quotes.author: Brendan Fraser

quotes.quote: According to Greek mythology, humans were originally created with four arms, four legs and a head with two faces. Fearing their power, Zeus split them into two separate parts, condemning them to spend their lives in search of their other halves.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: In Greek mythology, Antaeus was a giant who was strong as long as he had contact with the earth. When he was lifted from the earth he lost strength. So it is with engineers. They must not become isolated from the real world...
quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

quotes.quote: In Greek mythology, the hero wants to be great, but the very concept does not exist in the Indian vocabulary. Yet it has become the global template. And it's a template that won't fit in India.
quotes.author: Devdutt Pattanaik

quotes.quote: To a degree, the Greek and Roman mythological heroes are just the first superheroes. They appeal to children for much the same reason. These gods and heroes may have powers, but they get angry and they do the wrong thing. They are human too.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Without a knowledge of mythology much of the elegant literature of our own language cannot be understood and appreciated.
quotes.author: Thomas Bulfinch

quotes.quote: For Mythology is the handmaid of literature; and literature is one of the best allies of virtue and promoters of happiness.
quotes.author: Thomas Bulfinch

quotes.quote: Memory in Greek mythology is the mother of the muses, and it is so for me. Both personal and societal memory move me strongly, and that is one of the sources of my writing
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: Every human society possesses a mythology which is inherited, transmitted and diversified by literature
quotes.author: Northrp Frye

quotes.quote: The sun, the moon, the ocean– these were all the children of Ouranos and Gaia. They had hundreds more, and they were the grandparents of the gods and of human beings. Ouranos didn’t make any of this out of nothing, and neither did God. There had to be a wife.
quotes.author: Erin O'Riordan

quotes.quote: In every one of Greek Mythology tales there is this: A man chasing a woman, or a woman chasing a man. There is never a meeting in the middle.
quotes.author: Jesmyn Ward

quotes.quote: Narcissistic personality disorder is named for Narcissus, from Greek Mythology, who fell in love with his own reflection.
quotes.author: Donald W. Black

quotes.quote: Beauty, strength, youth, are flowers but fading seen. Duty, faith, love, are roots, and ever green.
quotes.author: George Peele

quotes.quote: Green is the fresh emblem of well founded hopes. In blue the spirit can wander, but in green it can rest.
quotes.author: Mary Webb

quotes.quote: When you're green, your growing. When you're ripe, you rot.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: Nature in her green, tranquil woods heals and soothes all afflictions.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Green is a process, not a status. We need to think of 'green' as a verb, not an adjective.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Nature's first green is gold.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Green fingers are the extension of a verdant heart.
quotes.author: Russell Page

quotes.quote: Learn of the green world what can be thy place in scaled invention or true artistry.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: Green was the silence, wet was the light, the month of June trembled like a butterfly.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Green makes me think of silence, or maybe it's loneliness. I get the feeling of a terribly distant star.
quotes.author: Kobo Abe

quotes.quote: In the hierarchy of colors, green represents the social middle class, self-satisfied, immovable, narrow.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: Green calm below, blue quietness above.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Life is a green madness just now, trying to squeeze the last bit of warmth from the season.
quotes.author: Vernor Vinge

quotes.quote: A meter of green is greener than a centimeter.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: Green in nature is one thing, green in literature another. Nature and letters seem to have a natural antipathy bring them together and they tear each other to pieces.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: With the gun you can make the earth red but if you have a plough you can make the earth green.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: A man who contemplates revenge keeps his wounds green.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Green does not have to mean the sort of hair-shirt, wood-burning-stove sensibility of the '70s. Green can and should be sleek and modern.
quotes.author: Graydon Carter

quotes.quote: Our green valleys will be greener once we fully grasp the infinite vitality of the green!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Green in nature is one thing, green in literature another. Nature and letters seem to have a natural antipathy; bring them together and they tear each other to pieces.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: All our wisdom is stored in the trees.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: If your knees aren't green by the end of the day, you ought to seriously re-examine your life.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Colorless green ideas sleep furiously.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: The future is green energy, sustainability, renewable energy.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Going green doesn't start with doing green acts, it starts with a shift in consciousness.
quotes.author: Ian Somerhalden

quotes.quote: Up here my eyes are green leaves, unseeing.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Her eyes were olive green―incisive and clear.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: The green-eyed angel came in less than a half hour and fell docile as a lamb into my arms.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.quote: O, beware, my lord, of jealousy; It is the green-ey'd monster, which doth mock The meat it feeds on.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I saw something in his pretty green eyes that I had never seen before: Anger. They were like emerald fire
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: The magician was studying her face with his green eyes. Your face is wet," he said worriedly.
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: Try to overcome your doubt. Believe you are beautiful. Look at yourself through someone else's green eyes.
quotes.author: Max Bermis

quotes.quote: Your green eye is a reducing chamber. If I look into it long enough, I wil become as small as my own reflection, I will diminish to a point and vanish.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: He pleaded with those sea-green eyes, like a cute baby seal that needed help.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: She smiled at him, though her hazel-green eyes were wary beneath the brim of a sodden hat.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: Look...at...me..." he whispered. The green eyes found the black, but after a second, something in the depths of the dark pair seemed to vanish, leaving them fixed, blank, and empty.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: When you're 25 or 30, you know, you can't wear lime-green eye shadow anymore.	When you're 25 or 30, you know, you can't wear lime-green eye shadow anymore.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Emerald green eyes studied us from a face that could have been sculpted by one of the classical artists I so admired.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: The grief in her green eyes slips then hardens.
quotes.author: Ilsa J. Bick

quotes.quote: Jealousy's eyes are green.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: And jestingly he told him then that nothing else would do but the green eye of the little yellow god.
quotes.author: John Milton Hayes

quotes.quote: I feel so lucky when I look in those green eyes.
quotes.author: Husker Du

quotes.quote: Your green eyes just hypnotize me And I just love your flashy ways don't know my love is here.
quotes.author: Nick Cave & the Bad Seeds

quotes.quote: Hey there green eyes sunshine and apple pie how you're so shy?
quotes.author: Cub

quotes.quote: And you're green eyes turn to blue and you're always always fishing for the truth.
quotes.author: The Twilight Sad

quotes.quote: Your green eyes with their soft lights, your eyes that promise sweet nights bring to my soul a longing a thirst for love.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dorsey

quotes.quote: Green eyes are better than blue I ain't trying to be mean.
quotes.author: Joe Purdy

quotes.quote: That green eyes yeah the spotlight shines upon you.
quotes.author: The Flaming Lips

quotes.quote: No green eyes no blue nights no jealous heart and no little white lies.
quotes.author: Suzy Bogguss

quotes.quote: Feelings I can't disguise my heart beats fast when I see your green eyes.
quotes.author: Simple Forces

quotes.quote: Well would be a shame eyes of blue and eyes of green green green eyes are haunting.
quotes.author: Gorky's Zygotic Mynci

quotes.quote: Green eyes I'd run away with you green eyes cause I'm a fool I try running away.
quotes.author: Wavves

quotes.quote: Come in disguise green eyes under a red brimmed hat steal into class and sit beside me.
quotes.author: Unbeknownst

quotes.quote: Giving me all of that green eye never let me out of your sight cause i'll give more than you plan.
quotes.author: Uriah Heep

quotes.quote: When the tea is brought at five o'clock And all the neat curtains are drawn with care, The little black cat with bright green eyes Is suddenly purring there.
quotes.author: Harold Monro

quotes.quote: The green eyes in the carefully sweet face were turbulent, willful, lusty with life, distinctly at variance with her decorous demeanor. Her manners had been imposed upon her. her eyes were her own.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: And his eyes were so green they could turn carbon dioxide into oxygen.
quotes.author: Eleanor & Park

quotes.quote: But for your eyes. Green as spring grass, and sparkling like dew in the morning sun.
quotes.author: S.M. CarriÃ¨re

quotes.quote: Her green eyes came unafraid to his. The connection was so intense that it threatened to drain his sense of self. He felt that he had always known her, that she had always been a part of him, that her needs were his needs.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: Those green eyes mocked her, and the ass leaned into her blade as if daring her to slice him.
quotes.author: Tamara Hughes

quotes.quote: Now her eyes meet mine like green lightning-they are green, these eyes of hers, whose power is so indescribable-green, but as are precious stones, or deep unfathomable mountain lakes.
quotes.author: Leopold Von Sacher-Masoch

quotes.quote: HelloÂ and good-bye are not as simple as everyone thinks.
quotes.author: Cecil Castellucci

quotes.quote: A voice ofÂ greetingÂ from the wind was sent; The mists enfolded me with soft white arms; The birds did sing to lap me in content, The rivers wove their charms, â€” And every little daisy in the grass Did look up in my face, and smile to see me pass!
quotes.author: Richard Henry Stoddard

quotes.quote: Don't send funnyÂ greetingÂ cards on birthdays or at Christmas. Save them for funerals when their cheery effect is needed.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Greet every morning with open arms and say thanks every night with a full heart. Each day is a precious gift to be savored and used, not left unopened and hoarded for a future that may never come.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: When greeting others, we usually ask them how they are doing, not because we sincerely care about how they are doing, but only because we want to be asked how we are doing.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: When someone stopsÂ saying hello, I don't see that there's any need to say good-bye.
quotes.author: Nafisa Haji

quotes.quote: Happy Thursday!Â GreetÂ your problems and decisions with peace and calm. Use your inner wisdom to evaluate and make smart decisions for yourself! You got this !
quotes.author: Tracey Edmonds

quotes.quote: To be able toÂ greetÂ the sun with the sounds from all of Nature is a great blessing, and it helps us to remember Who is the real provider of all of our benefits.
quotes.author: Thomas Yellowtail

quotes.quote: May weÂ greetÂ each other with a smile, hug and speak kind words.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Send out a cheerful, positive greeting, and most of the time you will get back a cheerful, positive greeting. It's also true that if you send out a negative greeting, you will, in most cases, get back a negative greeting.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: IÂ greetÂ you. Not quite as the world sendsÂ greetings, but with profound esteem and with the prayer that for you now and forever, the day breaks, and the shadows flee away.
quotes.author: Fra Giovanni Giocondo

quotes.quote: IÂ greetÂ you from the other side of sorrow and despair, with a love so vast and shattered it will reach you everywhere.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: Keep sayingÂ helloÂ to people. They will be the differentiator for you for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Try sayingÂ helloÂ to someone who wouldn't expect you to - today would be good.
quotes.author: John Avery

quotes.quote: SayingÂ helloÂ doesn't have an ROI. It's about building relationships.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: If you are greeted then return the greetings more warmly. If you are favoured, then repay the obligation manifold; but he who takes the initiative will always excel in merit.
quotes.author: Ali bin Abu-Talib

quotes.quote: SayingÂ helloÂ to something new means saying good-bye to something old and loved.
quotes.author: Phyllis Reynolds Naylor

quotes.quote: OneÂ HELLO? can change a life.OneÂ HELLO? can save a life.
quotes.author: Liza M. Wiemer

quotes.quote: If weÂ greetÂ situations with a positive attitude, we will eventually create positive returns. If we respond with a negative attitude, negative things will eventually come our way.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: Salutations; it's just my fancy way of saying hello or good morning
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: As a man's salutations, so is the total of his character; in nothing do we lay ourselves so open as in our manner of meeting and salutation.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: Simple smile, a cheerfulÂ helloÂ or a word of encouragement It's amazing what an impact you will have.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Give warmÂ greetings and farewells. I was surprised by how much this resolution changed the atmosphere of my home.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: I willÂ greetÂ this day with love in my heart.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: IÂ greetÂ you all in the name of peace, democracy and freedom for all.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: You never know what kind of impact you can have on someone by just saying hello.
quotes.author: Manti Te'o

quotes.quote: You will lose someone you can't live without, and your heart will be badly broken, and the bad news is that you never completely get over the loss of your beloved. But this is also the good news. They live forever in your broken heart that doesn't seal back up. And you come through. It's like having a broken leg that never heals perfectly that still hurts when the weather gets cold, but you learn to dance with the limp.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Only people who are capable of loving strongly can also suffer great sorrow, but this same necessity of loving serves to counteract their grief and heals them.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: And we wept that one so lovely should have a life so brief.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: Deep grief sometimes is almost like a specific location, a coordinate on a map of time. When you are standing in that forest of sorrow, you cannot imagine that you could ever find your way to a better place. But if someone can assure you that they themselves have stood in that same place, and now have moved on, sometimes this will bring hope
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: The reality is that we don't forget, move on, and have closure, but rather we honor, we remember, and incorporate our deceased children and siblings into our lives in a new way. In fact, keeping memories of your loved one alive in your mind and heart is an important part of your healing journey.
quotes.author: Harriet Schiff

quotes.quote: No one ever told me that grief felt so much like fear.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: You give yourself permission to grieve by recognizing the need for grieving. Grieving is the natural way of working through the loss of a love. Grieving is not weakness nor absence of faith. Grieving is as natural as crying when you are hurt, sleeping when you are tired or sneezing when your nose itches. It is nature's way of healing a broken heart.
quotes.author: Doug Manning

quotes.quote: For some moments in life there are no words.
quotes.author: David Seltzer

quotes.quote: There is no grief like the grief that does not speak.
quotes.author: Henry Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Grieving is a journey that teaches us how to love in a new way now that our loved one is no longer with us. Consciously remembering those who have died is the key that opens the hearts, that allows us to love them in new ways.
quotes.author: Tom Attig

quotes.quote: He wept, and it felt as if the tears were cleansing him, as if his body needed to empty itself.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: While grief is fresh, every attempt to divert only irritates. You must wait till it be digested, and then amusement will dissipate the remains of it.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Give sorrow words; the grief that does not speak whispers the o'er-fraught heart and bids it break.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: He sought to transform the grief that looks down into the grave by showing it the grief that looks up to the stars.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Even hundredfold grief is divisible by love.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Sorrow makes us all children again - destroys all differences of intellect. The wisest know nothing.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I measure every grief I meet with narrow, probing eyes - I wonder if it weighs like mine - or has an easier size.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Grieving is a necessary passage and a difficult transition to finally letting go of sorrow - it is not a permanent rest stop.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: No one can keep his griefs in their prime; they use themselves up.
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Grief is a species of idleness.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Grief is itself a medicine.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: If you suppress grief too much, it can well redouble.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Our trials, our sorrows, and our grieves develop us.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Grief is light that is capable of counsel.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: All things grow with time, except grief.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: The display of grief makes more demands than grief itself. How few men are sad in their own company.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Nothing becomes so offensive so quickly as grief. When fresh it finds someone to console it, but when it becomes chronic, it is ridiculed, and rightly.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Grief fills the room up of my absent child, lies in his bed, walks up and down with me, puts on his pretty looks, repeats his words.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Grief at the absence of a loved one is happiness compared to life with a person one hates.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Grief is only the memory of widowed affections.
quotes.author: James Martineau

quotes.quote: Grief is the agony of an instant. The indulgence of grief the blunder of a life.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Grief knits two hearts in closer bonds than happiness ever can; and common sufferings are far stronger links than common joys.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: One often calms one's grief by recounting it.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: She was no longer wrestling with the grief, but could sit down with it as a lasting companion and make it a sharer in her thoughts.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Since grief only aggravates your loss, grieve not for what is past.
quotes.author: Walker Percy

quotes.quote: The only cure for grief is action.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewis

quotes.quote: Time takes away the grief of men.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: When the heart grieves over what is has lost, the spirit rejoices over what it has left.
quotes.author: Sufi Epigram

quotes.quote: Grief will happen either as an open healing wound or a closed festering wound, either honestly or dishonestly, either appropriately or inappropriately. But emotions will be expressed.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler Ross

quotes.quote: No one is immune to grief. There are those amongst us today who have grieved deeply in the past, and there are those who are grieving deeply now and sadly. All of us will grieve at some time in the future.
quotes.author: Lorraine Kember

quotes.quote: One of the most important things we can do for people who are grieving is to give them a safe place in which to experience and express their pain
quotes.author: J. Nelson

quotes.quote: Most people move though grief at their own unique pace and many eventually find a peaceful acceptance. This does not mean that this terrible loss is "OK", but rather that one is no longer battling reality and has come to a place of acceptance of what is.
quotes.author: Marsha Barnosky

quotes.quote: Grief - Happiness is to feel that one's soul is good; there is no other, in truth, and this kind of happiness may exist even in sorrow, so that there are griefs perfable to every joy, and such as would be preferred by all those who have felt them.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: As much as it hurts, suppressing how you feel is like putting a lid on a pressure cooker and turning off the steam valve, eventually it will blow. By expressing your emotions, you start the healing process
quotes.author: M. Hunter

quotes.quote: Grief is love not wanting to let go.
quotes.author: Earl A. Grollman

quotes.quote: Grief seems to me like a winter house: guarded, sheltered against an outside world that's expected to be difficult. The windows are small to keep out the cold, and little light gets in. The darkness and warmth make a cozy place to hide, to nurse wounds, to incubate what is not yet ready to be exposed.
quotes.author: Janet Cedar Spring

quotes.quote: Grief, as I read somewhere once, is a lazy Susan. One day it is heavy and underwater, and the next day it spins and stops at loud and rageful, and the next day at wounded keening, and the next day numbness, silence.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Grief is like the wind. When it's blowing hard, you adjust your sails and run before it. If it blows too hard, you stay in the harbor, close the hatches and don't take calls. When it's gentle, you go sailing, have a picnic, take a swim."
quotes.author: Barbara Lazear Ascher

quotes.quote: Grief is a sign that we loved something more than ourselves. . . . Grief makes us worthy to suffer with the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Joan Chittister

quotes.quote: The deeper that sorrow carves into your being the more joy you can contain. Is not the cup that holds your wine the very cup that was burned in the potter's oven?
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Grief is in two parts. The first is loss. The second is the remaking of life.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.quote: Grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: Grief is perhaps an unknown territory for you. You might feel both helpless and hopeless without a sense of a 'map' for the journey. Confusion is the hallmark of a transition. To rebuild both your inner and outer world is a major project.
quotes.author: Anne Grant

quotes.quote: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: In times of grief and sorrow I will hold you and rock you and take your grief and make it my own. When you cry I cry and when you hurt I hurt. And together we will try to hold back the floods to tears and despair and make it through the potholed street of life
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Only people who are capable of loving strongly can also suffer great sorrow, but this same necessity of loving serves to counteract their grief and heals them.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: They say time heals all wounds, but that presumes the source of the grief is finite.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Grief is not as heavy as guilt, but it takes more away from you.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Grieving is a journey that teaches us how to love in a new way now that our loved one is no longer with us. Consciously remembering those who have died is the key that opens the hearts, that allows us to love them in new ways.
quotes.author: Tom Attig

quotes.quote: There is no grief like the grief that does not speak.
quotes.author: Henry Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Grief is not a disorder, a disease or a sign of weakness. It is an emotional, physical and spiritual necessity, the price you pay for love. The only cure for grief is to grieve.
quotes.author: Earl Grollman

quotes.quote: All things grow with time -- except grief.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Grief is light that is capable of counsel.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Mourning is not forgetting... It is an undoing. Every minute tie has to be untied and something permanent and valuable recovered and assimilated from the dust. The end is gain, of course. Blessed are they that mourn, for theyshall be made strong, in fact. But the process is like all other human births, painful and long and dangerous.
quotes.author: Margery Allingham

quotes.quote: Grief is hard on friendships, but it doesn't have to be. Sometimes, all it takes is a little honesty between friends. If we gently and lovingly explain what we need from the relationship during our time of grief, and what we are willing to do in return, we can turn even a lukewarm friendship into something special.
quotes.author: Margaret Brownley

quotes.quote: One often calms one's grief by recounting it.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Tears are the silent language of grief.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Grief makes one hour ten.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: There is no pain so great as the memory of joy in present grief.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: We all want to do something to mitigate the pain of loss or to turn grief into something positive, to find a silver lining in the clouds. But I believe there is real value in just standing there, being still, being sad.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: But grieving people are selfish. They won't let you comfort them and they say you don't understand and they make you feel useless when all your life you've been functional to them.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: That was the hard thing about grief, and the grieving. They spoke another language, and the words we knew always fell short of what we wanted them to say.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Grieving, like being blind, is a strange business; you have to learn how to do it. We seek company in mourning, but after the early bursts of tears, after the praises have been spoken, and the good days remembered, and the lament cried, and the grave closed, there is no company in grief. It is a burden borne alone.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Deep grief sometimes is almost like a specific location, a coordinate on a map of time. When you are standing in that forest of sorrow, you cannot imagine that you could ever find your way to a better place. But if someone can assure you that they themselves have stood in that same place, and now have moved on, sometimes this will bring hope.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: It is true that the grief journey is very lonely, but it is also up to you to decide just how lonely you will make it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berrien

quotes.quote: To spare oneself from grief at all cost can be achieved only at the price of total detachment, which excludes the ability to experience happiness.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: While grief is fresh, every attempt to divert only irritates. You must wait till it be digested, and then amusement will dissipate the remains of it.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The time you spend grieving over a man should never exceed the amount of time you actually spent with him.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Since every death diminishes us a little, we grieve - not so much for the death as for ourselves.
quotes.author: Lynn Caine

quotes.quote: He that conceals his grief finds no remedy for it.
quotes.author: Turkish Proverb

quotes.quote: Tearless grief bleeds inwardly.
quotes.author: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.quote: There is no grief like the grief that does not speak.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: If you suppress grief too much it can well redouble.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Grief can take care of itself, but to get the full value of joy must have somebody to divide it with.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In private grief with careless scorn. In public seem to triumph and not to mourn.
quotes.author: John C. Granville

quotes.quote: You don't go around grieving all the time, but the grief is still there and always be.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: There's a general impulse to distract the grieving person - as if you could.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: The littlest thing can have the strongest connection when you're grieving. Your proustian, poetic nerve is turned up to ten.
quotes.author: Mike Mills

quotes.quote: I think grieving is the same for everybody that lost someone you love deeply. It's the same. You know, you're really no different than anybody else who's lost somebody they adored.
quotes.author: Lee Radziwill

quotes.quote: When people are grieving, it's kind of like a storm, and you need something to grab onto, but often you have to brave it on your own.
quotes.author: Clare Bowen

quotes.quote: Grief is not a disorder, a disease or sign of weakness. It is an emotional, physical and spiritual necessity, the price you pay for love. The only cure for grief is to grieve.
quotes.author: Earl Grollman

quotes.quote: Grief is like the ocean; it comes on waves ebbing and flowing. Sometimes the water is calm, and sometimes it is overwhelming. All we can do is learn to swim.
quotes.author: Vicki Harrison

quotes.quote: Give sorrow words; the grief that does not speak whispers the o'er~fraught heart and bids it break.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Emotionally, grief is a mixture of raw feelings such as sorrow, anguish, anger, regret, longing, fear, and deprivation. Grief may be experienced physically as exhaustion, emptiness, tension, sleeplessness, or loss of appetite.
quotes.author: Judy Tatelbaum

quotes.quote: Grief is a passage, not a place to stay. Grief is not a sign of weakness, nor a lack of faith...it is the price of love.
quotes.author: Author Unkonwn

quotes.quote: Grieving is not a short-term process; it's not even a long-term process; it's a lifelong process. 'Having a future' now means that although your life will flow again, it will flow differently as a result of the loss. Your grief will become incorporated into your life history, become a part of your identity. And you will continue now, and forever, to redefine your relationship with your deceased loved one. Death doesn't end the relationship, it simply forges a new type of relationship - one based not on physical presence but on memory, spirit, and love.
quotes.author: Ashley Davis Bush

quotes.quote: Grieve not for that which is irreparably lost.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: One grieves sincerely who grieves unseen.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Too late to grieve when the chance is past.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: What the eye does not see, the eye does not grieve.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The one who grieves before it is necessary grieves more than necessary.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: The grief which is not dealt with properly can cause us to lose our perspective on life.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Grief turns us inward, but compassion turns out outward, and that's what we need when grief threatens to crush us.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Grieving is not weakness nor absence of faith. Grieving is as natural as crying when you are hurt., sleeping when you are tired, or sneezing when your nose itches. It is nature's way of healing a broken heart.
quotes.author: Doug Manning

quotes.quote: Only people who are capable of loving strongly can also suffer great sorrow, but this same necessity of loving serves to counteract their grief and heals them.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: No truth can cure the sorrow we feel from losing a loved one. No truth, no sincerity, no strength, no kindness can cure that sorrow. All we can do is see it through the end and learn something from it, but what we learn will be no help in facing the next sorrow that comes to us without warning.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Crying does not indicate that you are weak. Since birth, it has always been a sign that you are alive.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: She was no longer wrestling with the grief but could sit down with it as a lasting companion and make it a sharer in her thoughts.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: it is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: The source of sorrows lies not in leaving life, but in living that which gives it meaning.
quotes.author: Raymond Radiguet

quotes.quote: And we wept that one so lovely should have a life so brief.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: I know now that we never get over great losses, we absorb them, and they carve us into different, often kinder, creatures.
quotes.author: Gail Caldwell

quotes.quote: There is grace in grief and strength in sorrow.
quotes.author: Annie Dougherty

quotes.quote: Between grief and nothing, I will take grief.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Grieving is as much a part of life as falling in love or giving birth.
quotes.author: June Cotner

quotes.quote: Grief, I've learned is really just love. It's all the love you want to give but cannot. All that unspent love gathers up in the corners of your eyes, the lump in your throat, and in that hollow part of your chest. Grief is just love with no place to go.
quotes.author: Jamie Anderson

quotes.quote: Grief, sorrow, and mourning for irremediable events are useless to the living as to the dead, except as they produce reflection, consideration, and correct errors or reform vices. Remember the best philosophy, the beloved is chastened.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with their heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: There is no death, only a change of the world.
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.quote: Death may be the greatest of all human blessings.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Absence and death are the same— only that in death there is no suffering.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Death— the last sleep? No, it is the final awakening.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Death is not a journey into an unknown land; it is a voyage home.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Grieving is a necessary passage and a difficult transition to finally letting go of sorrow - it is not a permanent rest stop.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: Dying is nothing to fear. It can be the most wonderful experience of your life. It all depends on how you've lived.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: I will not say: do not weep; for not all tears are an evil.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: The darker the night, the brighter the stars, the deeper the grief the closer is God.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: The grill is the summer equivalent of a fireplace; everyone gravitates to it.
quotes.author: Katie Lee

quotes.quote: People get a little bolder and more wild in summer. You've got things going on kabobs, things cooking on the bone. There's something about standing over a grill or outside with the family that inspires us.
quotes.author: Guy Fieri

quotes.quote: I love the culture of grilling. It creates an atmosphere that is festive but casual.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.quote: Everybody says, 'I have problems overcooking steak on the grill,' but just take it off earlier! Grilling is really common sense. It's very simple. You should think of a grill as a burner - it just happens to have grates. You shouldn't be intimidated by it.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.quote: When I figured out how to work my grill, it was quite a moment. I discovered that summer is a completely different experience when you know how to grill.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: I still love making hamburgers on the grill. I guess whenever I eat them childhood memories come up for me.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.quote: People often think they can't grill seafood, because they grilled the wrong seafood.
quotes.author: Kevin Steele

quotes.quote: The simplest fix for better grilling is to line the inside of your barbecue with tin foil. It dramatically affects how evenly the heat is distributed. That crusty black hibachi or Weber grill is doing your food no favors.
quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

quotes.quote: While there are many varieties of grills, each with their own virtues to be sure, I prefer the standard Weber kettle grill. Don't be fooled into thinking that you need any fancy gadgets in order to take advantage of cooking over a live fire. Just a good set of tongs and you're set.
quotes.author: Barton Seaver

quotes.quote: I'm not a fan of grilling meat, since that tends to dry it out, and I find grill marks leave a bitter taste. A good steak house will offer different options for preparation, and I would ask them to broil or pan-roast the steak and finish it with butter. It ends up a dark chocolate color and stays very juicy.
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.quote: Seafood on the grill can be intimidating if you don't know what you are doing. It's really quite easy.
quotes.author: Kevin Steele

quotes.quote: It is very important that when you put something on the grill, you leave it in place to cook. If you move it around too quickly, chances are it is going to stick.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.quote: Standing around the grill is fine, but I like to have my friends come in and out of the house. Movement makes the party more exciting.
quotes.author: Jose Andres Puerta

quotes.quote: Pull out your table and chairs and get the grill going, then just sit back and wait for people to wander over to you. We've met so many wonderful people over the years that way.
quotes.author: Jeanette Morisse

quotes.quote: Heat is more even on a gas grill. On a charcoal grill the flame varies so much that it takes a very skilled hand to grill things properly.
quotes.author: Bobby Flay

quotes.quote: Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven't planted.
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.quote: It can be a grind, training and fighting and waiting for your chance. But when that opportunity presents itself, you have to be ready because you never know if or when you'll get another shot.
quotes.author: Tyron Woodley

quotes.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: You have to stay focused and be mentally tough. That's what I've really learned: every day is a grind, and you have to go hard.
quotes.author: Chris Gronkowski

quotes.quote: Hard work opens doors and shows the world that you are serious about being one of those rare - and special - human beings who use the fullness of their talents to do their very best.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: Time and again we have learned that the best way to achieve growth and create jobs is for hardworking people to keep more of their own money in their own pockets
quotes.author: Chris Chocola

quotes.quote: Never expect appreciation for your hardwork. Make sure you are doing the right thing and just continue..
quotes.author: Janaki Sooriyarachchi

quotes.quote: It takes time, it's a grind. There are no shortcuts. You've got to grind and grind.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Anything lost, can be found again, except for time wasted. A vision without action is merely a dream. Action, it's the grind, it's the hustle, it's the persistence.
quotes.author: Kevin Gates

quotes.quote: Shooting a season can be a grind. It can be seven to eight months of work. Once you stop, it slows down any momentum you had.
quotes.author: Cress Williams

quotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a man's determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: As long as you're having fun, that's the key. The moment it becomes a grind, it's over.
quotes.author: Barry Gibb

quotes.quote: You've gotta learn to love the grind. Because life IS the grind.
quotes.author: John Calipari

quotes.quote: Life is a grindstone. Whether it grinds us down or polishes us up depends on us.
quotes.author: Thomas Holcroft

quotes.quote: Let them sleep while you grind. Let them party while you work. The difference will show.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Steady grind and in time you'll be sure to find like a star in the sky you were born to shine.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can't cheat the grind. It knows how much you've invested. It won't give you nothing you haven't worked for.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Invest in your dreams. Grind now. Shine later.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Without hard work and discipline it is difficult to be a top professional.
quotes.author: Jahangir Khan

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work. Never give up. Never stop believing. Never stop fighting.
quotes.author: Hope Hicks

quotes.quote: Just being able to grind, day in and day out. You have to be a different kind of person to not just do the workouts, but to not make money for months at a time.
quotes.author: Robbie Lawler

quotes.quote: It is not enough to be a hardworking person. Equally important is the job you are working at
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Nothing worth having comes easy.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It was taunted as reality. It was dangled as a carrot. In terms of people's hopes and dreams, to say that that is less of a reality than the daily grind they find themselves in is maybe not correct.
quotes.author: Martin Mull

quotes.quote: In any profession it gets to be a grind.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: A smart man can't beat a hardworking man and a hard working man can't beat a happy working man
quotes.author: Taeyang

quotes.quote: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily. The secret of your success is found in your daily routine.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Don't stay in bed unless you can make money in bed.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: What makes you grind? You have to always be chasing something.
quotes.author: Ray Lewis

quotes.quote: Our actions may be impeded..but there can be no impeding our intentions or dispositions. Because we can accommodate and adapt. The mind adapts and converts ot its own purposes the obstacle to our acting.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: Satisfaction and ventures in life lie in doing your best and enjoy what you wish to do or are engaged in doing.
quotes.author: Joginder Singh

quotes.quote: Being financially well off is a reward for our achievement, but they follow our triumphs and not before it.
quotes.author: Joginder Singh

quotes.quote: Nothing is free in life and we have to pay the price in the form of dedication and hard work.
quotes.author: Joginder Singh

quotes.quote: Always bear in mind that with determination, discipline, and hardwork all dreams can become a reality.
quotes.author: Joginder Singh

quotes.quote: We all have to pass through the slush before we can thrive. But while we are alive we should cultivate and develop the best of qualities latent in us.
quotes.author: Joginder Singh

quotes.quote: Those who desire good life never be in bed at the rising of the sun.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: You cannot beat hard time, but hard times bears fools and scatters their destiny.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: If you allow condition to get rid of you, you are not worthy of a good life.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: Do not fail in life, do not disappoint yourself, seek to know the hidden treasures of life; and you will live longer than your ancestors.
quotes.author: Chukwuemeka E. Onyejinduaka

quotes.quote: The doing is usually more important than the outcome. Not everyone can be Number 1.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The things you want are always possible; it is just that the way to get them is not always apparent.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The only real obstacle in your path to a fulfilling life is you, and that can be a considerable obstacle because you carry the baggage of insecurities and past experience.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: We're born with success. It is only others who point out our families, and what they attribute to us as failure.
quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

quotes.quote: Success can also cause misery. The trick is not to be surprised when you discover it doesn't bring you all the happiness and answers you thought it would.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: Success is completion--accomplishing what we set out to do, whether a task, a call, an errand, or a dream.
quotes.author: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.quote: Success is deletion--knowing when not to do, when to say no, when to eliminate habits, methods, or relationships.
quotes.author: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.quote: The most joyous part of success is also the most challenging. To create what we want, we need to stop looking back to blame others.
quotes.author: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.quote: Success is feeling satisfied and fulfilled by what you choose to do and be on a daily basis.
quotes.author: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.quote: Feeling successful is an inner process each one of us needs to learn. To master this process, you need ten skills. Redefining success for yourself while learning to self-acknowledge is the first skill you need to begin leading your life..skillfully.
quotes.author: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.quote: From the word go, those who win the race of success and legacy started with the lifestyle of humility, audacity, integrity, sagacity and prosperity-mentality.
quotes.author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

quotes.quote: Every experience you have experienced were necessary to enable you see-through the responsibility in maturity.
quotes.author: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

quotes.quote: No matter the challenges you are going through, great people went through it and came out of it. You are coming out a success; you are a success.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart . Who looks inside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Let yourself picture everything being better than you've ever dreamed.
quotes.author: Eve Menezes Cunningham

quotes.quote: You build on your successes in life to gain confidence to gain confidence and self-esteem.
quotes.author: Shelley Howe

quotes.quote: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Success is the degree or measure of attaining some desired object or end.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: If you stop trying to succeed, it's like trying to live the rest of your life off the last breath of air.
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Work can--and should--be part of you are, what you are, and what you want for the future of the world.
quotes.author: Alexandra Cavoulacos

quotes.quote: Man must work hard, without trusting his fate. If you do so, you force even your fate to come to its knees.
quotes.author: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.quote: Those people, who work hard to achieve their goal, are treated nicely in life. When a person decides to become successful, the entire creation starts working to make him so.
quotes.author: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.quote: Nature helps those who work very hard. Trust hard work, not fate, to achieve success.
quotes.author: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.quote: Whenever you accept with full determination for achieving success in life making your efforts successful, hard work is the only way, then progress, fame and prosperity follows.
quotes.author: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.quote: Success is achieved only through efforts,not by longing for it alone. Just like a deer does not go into the mouth of a lion just because the lion desires, it has to kill its prey, the deer.
quotes.author: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.quote: People become successful the minute they decide to.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: To be a winner, all you have to give is all you have.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: Successful people tend to become more successful because they are always thinking about their successes.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: I have tried ninety nine times and have failed, but on the hundredth time came success.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Grit is choosing to lean in & work on your Art when the world thinks it's already good enough.
quotes.author: Rob Beaudreault

quotes.quote: Grit is the grain of character. It may generally be described as heroism materialized, spirit and will thrust into heart, brain, and backbone, so as to form part of the physical substance of the man.
quotes.author: Edwin Percy Whipple

quotes.quote: Keep your hands open, and all the sands of the desert can pass through them. Close them, and all you can feel is a bit of grit.
quotes.author: Taisen Deshimaru

quotes.quote: The man who has grit enough to bring about the afforestation or the irrigation of a country is not less worthy of honor than its conqueror.
quotes.author: J. Arthur Thomson

quotes.quote: Over time, grit is what separates fruitful lives from aimlessness.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: A grit mind strengthens all of your strengths.
quotes.author: Pearl Zhu

quotes.quote: Grit is the persistence in following your own destiny.
quotes.author: Paul Bradley Smith

quotes.quote: Grit is knowing who you are and where you are headed, moving determinedly forward with eyes fixed on the mark, rather than the obstacles that lie in wait.
quotes.author: Christine Bisch

quotes.quote: The grit that we have, the depth that we have, the intensity that we have throughout the hockey game that's crucial. It's believing and knowing that we can fight through a little adversity and find ways to win.
quotes.author: Ryan Smyth

quotes.quote: Grit is having the courage to do the right thing, regardless of the popularity or consequences.
quotes.author: Joan Hall

quotes.quote: Grit is not just simple elbow-grease term for rugged persistence. It is an often invisible display of endurance that lets you stay in an uncomfortable place, work hard to improve upon a given interest, and do it again and again.
quotes.author: Sarah Lewis

quotes.quote: Grit is passion and perseverance for very long-term goals. Grit is having stamina. Grit is sticking with your future, day-in, day-out. Not just for the week, not just for the month, but for years. And working really hard to make that future a reality. Grit is living life like it's a marathon, not a sprint.
quotes.author: Dr. Angela Lee Duckworth

quotes.quote: True Grit is making a decision and standing by it, doing what must be done. No moral man can have peace of mind if he leaves undone what he knows he should have done.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: Heroes are never perfect, but they're brave, they're authentic, they're courageous, determined, discreet, and they've got grit.
quotes.author: Wade Davis

quotes.quote: Grit is that extra something that separates the most successful people from the rest. It's the passion, perseverance, and stamina that we must channel in order to stick with our dreams until they become a reality.
quotes.author: Travis Bradberry

quotes.quote: A little grit in the eye destroyeth the sight of the very heavens, and a little malice or envy a world of joys. One wry principle in the mind is of infinite consequence.
quotes.author: Thomas Traherne

quotes.quote: Grit is having the courage to push through, no matter what the obstacles are, because it's worth it.
quotes.author: Chris Morris

quotes.quote: Grit is picking yourself up and moving forward even when you think you can't take one more step.
quotes.author: Christy Mossburg

quotes.quote: Grit is a measurement of sandpaper, and determination. In both cases it defines an ability to change surroundings, and not be changed.
quotes.author: Mike Loomis

quotes.quote: What is grit? Grit is refusing to give up. It's persistence. It's making your own luck.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: Grit is not synonymous with hard work. It involves a certain single-mindedness. An ungritty prison inmate will mount a daring new escape attempt every month, but a gritty prison inmate will tunnel his way out one spoonful of concrete at a time. Grit
quotes.author: Chip Heath

quotes.quote: Grit is the stubborn refusal to quit.
quotes.author: Jonah Lehrer

quotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a man's determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: A grindstone that had not grit in it, how long would it take to sharpen an ax? And affairs that had not grit in them, how long would they take to make a man?
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Just draw on your grit; it's so easy to quit. It's the keeping your chin up that's hard.
quotes.author: Robert W. Service

quotes.quote: No man can fight his way to the top and stay at the top without exercising the fullest measure of grit, courage, determination, resolution.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Sticking with a marriage. That's true grit, man.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: It is very easy to forgive others their mistakes. It takes more grit and gumption to forgive them for having witnessed your own.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: God honors a beautiful blend of gift and grit! He gives the gift, and He expects us to have the grit to practice and learn how to use it effectively.
quotes.author: Beth Moore

quotes.quote: Success comes to the man who grits his teeth, squares his jaw and says, there is a way for me and, by jingo, I'll find it.
quotes.author: Cliff Sloan

quotes.quote: You think intelligence and grit can succeed by themselves, but I'm telling you that's a pretty illusion.
quotes.author: Nancy Kress

quotes.quote: There is nothing like tasting the grit of fear for rediscovering that the umbilical cord is made of piano wire.
quotes.author: Moss Hart

quotes.quote: Unless man has the wit and the grit to build his civilization on something better than material power, it is surely idle to talk of plans for a stable peace.
quotes.author: Francis Bowes Sayre

quotes.quote: Sacredness grew like a pearl, sometimes around the most unlikely bits of grit.
quotes.author: S.M. Stirling

quotes.quote: If you want anything done right you will have to see to it yourself every time.
quotes.author: Charles Portis

quotes.quote: Grit is sticking with your future day in, day out and not just for the week, not just for the month, but for years.
quotes.author: Angela Lee Duckworth

quotes.quote: There is no failure. Only feedback.
quotes.author: Robert Allen

quotes.quote: Above everything else I've done, I've always said I've had more guts than I've got talent.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: To be grounded in an attitude of compassion is to be capable of receiving and welcoming the suffering, which the other is giving us. This does not mean that we suffer for them, but that we offer them possibility of going beyond the separate self in which suffering is harbored.
quotes.author: Jean-Yves Leloup

quotes.quote: Get yourself grounded and you can navigate even the stormiest roads in peace.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Keep your feet firmly planted on the ground...don't let your ego run out of control and convince you that you are better than anyone else.
quotes.author: Jerry Gladstone

quotes.quote: And it’s easy to stay grounded. The ground is very close. And we walk on it every day.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.quote: Be like a tree. Stay grounded. Connect with your roots. Turn over a new leaf. Bend before you break. Enjoy your unique natural beauty. Keep growing.
quotes.author: Joanne Raptis

quotes.quote: Flying starts from the ground. The more grounded you are, the higher you fly.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: Grounding is most effective when you have some place to go. When you know where you are going, grounding brings strength and confidence, when you’re stagnant you get caught in the past.
quotes.author: Tony Curl

quotes.quote: There is nothing to seek and nothing to find. We leap into the dark only to discover how firmly we are rooted in the ground.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: What does it mean to be grounded? It means no unkind being is taking up space rent free in your body. It also means you love deeply without need for revenge. It means digging beneath the machine mind to understand and see the beauty in each human being.
quotes.author: Deborah Bravandt

quotes.quote: It’s your purpose that keeps you grounded and growing throughout your process.
quotes.author: Melissa Steginus

quotes.quote: But it turns out that people who are grounded and secure don't change much under stress. That's what being grounded means.
quotes.author: Michael Gruber

quotes.quote: What I try to tell young people is that if you come together with a mission, and its grounded with love and a sense of community, you can make the impossible possible.
quotes.author: John Lewis

quotes.quote: To dwell in the here and now does not mean you never think about the past or responsibly plan for the future. The idea is simply not to allow yourself to get lost in regrets about the past or worries about the future. If you are firmly grounded in the present moment, the past can be an object of inquiry, the object of your mindfulness and concentration. You can attain many insights by looking into the past. But you are still grounded in the present moment.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: When adversity strikes, that's when you have to be the most calm. Take a step back, stay strong, stay grounded and press on.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.quote: We can go through our five senses in about a minute’s time to become grounded in the present; and we can do this anytime we find ourselves in worry or speculation. Becoming grounded in our present makes us available to happiness.
quotes.author: Jeff Kober

quotes.quote: The one who remained grounded is the one who reached heights.
quotes.author: AnShii

quotes.quote: Don't get too high, when you reach the top, hold on, and try to remain grounded, as highs and lows are twins, you never know who is in front of you.
quotes.author: Dos Corazone

quotes.quote: Gravity is not the reason that I'm anchored in this place, It was my decision to not float up that grounded me here.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The hardest thing to find in life is balance - especially the more success you have, the more you look to the other side of the gate. What do I need to stay grounded, in touch, in love, connected, emotionally balanced? Look within yourself.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: Unless you are really grounded and have a true sense of reality, you can get lost in that and a lot of people do and that's why you see so many people with successful careers but with destructive lives.
quotes.author: Morris Chestnut

quotes.quote: Always stay grounded and enjoy everything that comes your way, whether it's the chance to go for a opportunity or getting one.
quotes.author: Chandler Canterbury
