quotes.quote: Nowhere is wisdom more necessary than in the guidance of charitable impulses. Meaning well is only half our duty. Thinking right is the other, and equally important, half.
quotes.author: Samuel Gridley Howe

quotes.quote: Every time you don't follow your inner guidance, you feel a loss of energy, loss of power, a sense of spiritual deadness.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Homelife, home teaching, parental guidance is the panacea for all the ailments, a cure for all diseases, a remedy for all problems.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: Let your heart guide you, it whispers so listen closely.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: If a belief is not realized immediately in open deeds, it is stored up for the guidance of the future.
quotes.author: William Kingdon Clifford

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If the impulse to daring and bravery is too fierce and violent, stay it with guidance and instruction.
quotes.author: Xunzi

quotes.quote: Life is an echo. What you send out comes back. What you sow, you reap. What you give, you get. What you see in others, exists in you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: People know they are lacking something, they are constantly wanting some kind of spiritual guidance.
quotes.author: Douglas Hurd

quotes.quote: Let your conscience be your guide when you are lost.
quotes.author: Salam Al Shereida

quotes.quote: Shepherds also need shepherds simply because everyone needs to be guided, maybe not always but surely one day!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: My Soul is my Guide, for my Soul is of that Abode I will not Speak of the Earthly, I am of the Unknown.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Unless you learn to lead, you will always be at the mercy of someone else to guide you.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: We have all a better guide in ourselves, if we would attend to it, than any other person can be.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: It is reason, and not passion, which must guide our deliberations, guide our debate, and guide our decision.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.quote: Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: Goals are only ever a guide; a winding, changing path. It's your heart that will really keep you on track... and nourished along the way.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: When you leave the light behind you, shadows and darkness become your guide!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: We are not here to curse the darkness, but to light the candle that can guide us thru that darkness to a safe and sane future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The conscience can be a strong guide in life if we allow it.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: It is not reason which is the guide of life, but custom.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Experience is a truer guide than the words of others.
quotes.author: Leonardo DaVinci

quotes.quote: It is better to guide people than try to hammer them into a line.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: The Constitution is the guide which I never will abandon.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Never go to excess, but let moderation be your guide.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Clearly the person who accepts the Church as an infallible guide will believe whatever the Church teaches.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: He that takes truth for his guide, and duty for his end, may safely trust to God's providence to lead him aright.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Don't use your brain to play it, let your feelings guide your fingers.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Guilt is not a response to anger; it is a response to one's own actions or lack of action.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Guilt is also a way for us to express to others that we are a person of good conscience.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.quote: Guilt is a useless feeling. It's never enough to make you change direction--only enough to make you useless.
quotes.author: Daniel Nayeri

quotes.quote: Guilt is a destructive and ultimately pointless emotion.
quotes.author: Lynn Crilly

quotes.quote: No guilt is forgotten so long as the conscience still knows of it.
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: Every man is guilty of all the good he didn't do.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Guilt is the very nerve of sorrow.
quotes.author: Horace Bushnell

quotes.quote: Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Guilt is the price we pay willingly for doing what we are going to do anyway.
quotes.author: Isabelle Holland

quotes.quote: Guilt is a rope that wears thin.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Successful guilt is the bane of society.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: He declares himself guilty who justifies himself before accusation.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Guilt: the gift that keeps on giving.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Guilt is to danger, what fire is to gunpowder; a man need not fear to walk among many barrels of powder, if he have no fire about him.
quotes.author: John Flavel

quotes.quote: He that is conscious of guilt cannot bear the innocence of others: So they will try to reduce all others to their own level.
quotes.author: Charles James Fox

quotes.quote: Guilt alone, like brain-sick frenzy in its feverish mood, fills the light air with visionary terrors, and shapeless forms of fear.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: Guilt upon the conscience, like rust upon iron, both defiles and consumes it, gnawing and creeping into it, as that does which at last eats out the very heart and substance of the metal.
quotes.author: Bishop Robert South

quotes.quote: Guilt is always hungry, don't let it consume you.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Guilt is oftentimes the strongest witness against itself.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: The guilt you feel finally comes to an end when you fully express how it came into your consciousness.
quotes.author: Luke Garne

quotes.quote: Guilt is the sum total of:All the negative feelings we have ever had about ourselves!Any form of self-hatred, self-rejection, feelings of worthlessness,sinfulness, inferiority, incompetence, failure, or emptiness.The feeling that there are things in us that are lacking or missing or incomplete.
quotes.author: Ken Wapnick

quotes.quote: What is guilt? It is moral self-reproach--I did wrongwhen it was possible to have done otherwise.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: Make friends with guilt. Guilt is a beautiful emotion that alerts us when something is wrong so that we may achieve peace with our conscience. Without conscience there would be no morality. So we can greet guilt cordially and with acceptance, just as we do all other emotions. After we respond to guilt, it has done its job and we can release it.
quotes.author: Glenn R. Schiraldi

quotes.quote: Guilt hath very quick ears to an accusation.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: Guilt is something small people feel when they run out of excuses for their behavior.
quotes.author: Gaius Baltar

quotes.quote: Repentant tears wash out the stain of guilt.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Guilt: punishing yourself before God doesn't.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Guilt is ever at a loss, and confusion waits upon it; when innocence and bold truth are always ready for expression.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: Where guilt is, rage and courage doth abound.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Guilt is an indulgence, it entangles you in the past.
quotes.author: Gregg Hurwitz

quotes.quote: Guilt once harbored in the conscious breast, intimidates the brave, degrades the great.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Guilt has always its horrors and solicitudes; and, to make it yet more shameful and detestable, it is doomed often to stand in awe of those to whom nothing could give influence or weight but their power of betraying.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Guilt is a poor, helpless, dependent being. Without the alliance of able, diligent, and let me add, fortunate fraud, it is inevitably undone. If the guilty culprit be obstinately silent, it forms a deadly presumption against him; if he speaks, talking tends only to his discovery, and his very defence often furnishes the materials for his conviction.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: Guilt was never a rational thing; it distorts all the faculties of the human mind, it perverts them, it leaves a man no longer in the free use of his reason, it puts him into confusion.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: People incapable of guilt usually do have a good time.
quotes.author: Rust Cohle

quotes.quote: The guilty think all talk is of themselves.
quotes.author: Chaucer

quotes.quote: Guilt is abscent when the act is justified.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Guilt is anything you did and fear others to know about.
quotes.author: Mohammad

quotes.quote: Guilt is the source of sorrows, the avenging fiend that follows us behind with whips and stings.
quotes.author: Nicholas Rowe

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of guilt: the kind thatdrowns you until you're useless, and the kind that fires your soul to purpose.
quotes.author: Sabaa Tahir

quotes.quote: You're making yourself too important. Guilt comes from feeling we're at the center of the universe. We're not.
quotes.author: Gloria Whelan

quotes.quote: Guilt's just your ego's way of tricking you into thinking that you're making moral progress. Don't fall for it, my dear.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Like hatred, guilt can't be locked in the silence of forgetting, without taking part of your soul with it.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: You won't be free from guilt if you are constantly replaying the negative memories of your past. If you're going to replay anything, replay your victories!
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Releasing guilt is like removing a huge weight from your shoulders. Guilt is released through the empowering thought of love and respect for yourself. Let go of standards of perfection and refuse to use up the precious currency of your life, the now, with thoughts that continue to frustrate and weaken you. Instead, vow to be better than you used to be, which is the true test of nobility.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Guilt is a lazy feeling that takes no action; the wings of integrity are the only thing that sets it free.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Guilt can interfere with our desires to move forward, to heal properly and to become a person who has the mental health and means of proper recompense.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Guilt is a waste of time unless you learn how to be more loving the next time a similar situation presents itself.
quotes.author: Annette Vaillancourt

quotes.quote: Guilt is a manifestation of condemnation or aversion towards oneself, which does not understand the changing transformative quality of mind.
quotes.author: Joseph Goldstein

quotes.quote: Guilt is really self- condemnation and self-invalidation of our worth and value as a human being.
quotes.author: David R. Hawkins

quotes.quote: Fear is the tax that conscience pays to guilt.
quotes.author: George Sewell

quotes.quote: There is no greater guilt than discontentment.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: So full of artless jealousy is guilt, / It spills itself in fearing to be spilt.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare (Hamlet)

quotes.quote: The only art her guilt to cover, / To hide her shame from every eye, / To give repentance to her lover, / And wring his bosom, is — to die.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: By the sympathy of your human hearts for sin ye shall scent out all the places — whether in church, bedchamber, street. field, or forest — where crime has been committed, and shall exult to behold the whole earth one stain of guilt, one mighty blood spot
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: What is our innocence, / what is our guilt? All are / naked, none is safe.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: Remorse sleeps during a prosperous period but wakes up in adversity.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: But, R - e - m - o - r - s - e! / The water-wagon is the place for me; . . . / It is no time for mirth and laughter, / The cold, gray dawn of the morning after!
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: In former days, everyone found the assumption of innocence so easy; today we find fatally easy the assumption of guilt.
quotes.author: Amanda Cross

quotes.quote: Of all means to regeneration Remorse is surely the most wasteful. It cuts away healthy tissue with the poisoned. It is a knife that probes far deeper than the evil.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: True guilt is guilt at the obligation one owes to oneself to be oneself. False guilt is guilt felt at not being what other people feel one ought to be or assume that one is.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: Guilt feelings so often arise from accusations rather than from crimes.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Here’s the smell of the blood still: all the perfumes of Arabia will not sweeten this little hand.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare (Macbeth)

quotes.quote: What hangs people ... is the unfortunate circumstance of guilt.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: If something makes you cry, you have to do something about it. That’s the difference between politics and guilt.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: I have many regrets, and I’m sure everyone does. The stupid things you do, you regret if you have any sense, and if you don’t regret them, maybe you’re stupid.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: O conscience, upright and stainless, how bitter a sting to thee is a little fault!
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: There is only one way to achieve happiness on this terrestrial ball, and that is to have either a clear conscience or none at all.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: In former days, everyone found the assumption of innocence so easy; today we find fatally easy the assumption of guilt.
quotes.author: Carolyn Heilbrun

quotes.quote: When lovely woman stoops to folly / And finds too late that men betray, / What charm can soothe her melancholy, / What art can wash her guilt away?
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: My doctrine is this, that if we see cruelty or wrong that we have the power to stop, and do nothing, we make ourselves sharers in the guilt.
quotes.author: Anna Sewell

quotes.quote: Remorse begets reform.
quotes.author: Wiliam Cowper

quotes.quote: We can always get along better ty reason and love of truth than by worry of conscience and remorse Harmful are these, and evil.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Mothers, food, love, and career: the four major guilt groups.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.quote: Conscience reigns but it does not govern.
quotes.author: Paul Valéry

quotes.quote: What the devil loves is that vague cloud of unspecified guilt feeling or unspecified virtue by which he lures us into despair or presumption. 'Details, please?' is the answer.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: All men alike stand condemned, not by alien codes of ethics, hut by their own, and all men therefore arc conscious of guilt.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: When we grieve, tears and guilt get mixed together.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: Conscience is thoroughly well-bred and soon leaves off talking to those who do not wish to hear it.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: The fact that human conscience remains partially infantile throughout life is the core of human tragedy.
quotes.author: Erik H. Erikson

quotes.quote: Each man’s soul is a menagerie where Conscience, the animal-tamer, lives with a collection of wild beasts.
quotes.author: Austin O’Malley

quotes.quote: The voice of conscience is so delicate that it is easy to stifle; but it is also so clear that it is impossible to mistake.
quotes.author: Germaine De Staël

quotes.quote: What we call real estate — the solid ground to build a house on — is the broad foundation on which nearly all the guilt of this world rests.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: How extraordinary it is that one feels most guilt about the sins one is unable to commit.
quotes.author: V.S. Pritchett

quotes.quote: An excuse not requested betrays the guilt of him who makes it.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: He confesses his guilt who flees from his trial.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: He declares himself guilty who justifies himself before being accused.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: He who is guilty believes that all men speak ill of him.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: How difficult it is not to betray guilt by our looks.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: How near to guilt a man may approach without being guilty.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Measure your guilt, then stretch your legs.
quotes.author: Arabian Proverb

quotes.quote: The act does not make the person guilty, unless the mind be guilty.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: The innocent are free from fear; but the guilty have always the dread of punishment before their eyes.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: A mind conscious of guilt is its own accuser.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: The one who secretly meditates a crime bears all the guilt of the deed.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: A guilty conscience needs to confess. A work of art is a confession.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: If a dog will not come to you after having looked you in the face, you should go home and examine your conscience.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Enjoying someone else’s smell—the most modest form of guilt there is.
quotes.author: Francesco Pacifico

quotes.quote: You may not be able to change the world, but at least you can embarrass the guilty.
quotes.author: Jessica Mitford

quotes.quote: I think that everything he did, feeding the poor, giving money to friends in need, it was all a way of redeeming himself. And that, I believe, is what true redemption is, Amir jan, when guilt leads to good.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: Everyone’s conscience in religion is between God and themselves, and it belongs to none other.
quotes.author: Margaret Cavendish

quotes.quote: Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they're big, flashing signs that something needs to change.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: No amount of guilt can solve the past. No amount of anxiety can change the future.
quotes.author: Bruce Van Horn

quotes.quote: Guilt before we act is called morality.
quotes.author: Jesse Fisher

quotes.quote: Without the sensation of guilt, the hierarchy are afraid the individual would run free and there would be no order. Without order, there is no power. Guilt forces each of us to surrender our will, our souls to those who should not possess them.
quotes.author: Alessandro Farnese

quotes.quote: Fear and guilt are sisters.
quotes.author: Trish Park

quotes.quote: Hey, hey, hey. Come on. I know what guilt is. It's one of those touchy-feely words that people throw around that don't really mean anything... You know, like 'maternal' or 'addiction.'
quotes.author: Karen Walker

quotes.quote: I'm only human baby / Ain't I allowed to make mistakes / You put your guilt on me / And it's causing my poor heart to break, yeah / Making me the human that I am
quotes.author: Marcus Miller; Luther Vandross

quotes.quote: There's a war between guilt and grace / And they're fighting for a sacred space / But I'm living proof / Grace wins every time
quotes.author: Matthew West

quotes.quote: Words can't describe the way it feels / When mercy floods a thirsty soul / A broken side begins to heal / And grace returns what guilt has stole
quotes.author: Matthew West

quotes.quote: Oh! load of guilt! relentless misery! / Still, ever still the same where'er I fly; / No peace, no hope, not one poor moment's glimpse / Through all the blackness of eternity!
quotes.author: Thomas Oldham

quotes.quote: Guilty feelings about clothes are totally unnecessary. A lot of people earn their living by making clothes, so you should never feel bad.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Guilt is just as powerful as shame, but its influence is positive, while shame's is destructive.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: The guilty are always the most prone to establish complementary guilt, and the most unforgiving thereafter.
quotes.author: Tanith Lee

quotes.quote: Every man is guilty of all the good he did not do.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The most guilty people are the most generous ones-this is the common law.
quotes.author: Pierre Beaumarchais

quotes.quote: You may succeed in making another feel guilty about something by blaming him, but you won't succeed in changing whatever it is about you that is making you unhappy.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: If you make someone feel guilty about their mistake, then you have not forgiven them. That guilt is itself punishment.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: Every guilty person is his own hangman.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Don't feel guilty for a crime you have not committed, commit it and be guilt free.
quotes.author: Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: True guilt is guilt at the obligation one owes to oneself to be oneself. False guilt is guilt felt at not being what other people feel one ought to be or assume that one is.
quotes.author: R.D. Laing

quotes.quote: Pity for the guilty is treason to the innocent.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: In law a man is guilty when he violates the rights of others. In ethics he is guilty if he only thinks of doing so.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Don't feel guilty about driving somewhere nice to run. If people can drive to a park to eat hot dogs, you can drive there to run.
quotes.author: Bill Rodgers

quotes.quote: A guilty conscience needs no accuser.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When one person makes an accusation, check to be sure he himself is not the guilty one. Sometimes it is those whose case is weak who make the most clamour.
quotes.author: Piers Anthony

quotes.quote: When you are guilty, it is not your sins you hate but yourself.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: He who is present at a wrongdoing and does not lift a hand to prevent it is as guilty as the wrongdoers.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: You were never created to live depressed, defeated, guilty, condemned, ashamed or unworthy. You were created to be victorious.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: You're guilty until proven innocent. Perception is reality, that's the way that it is in this world.
quotes.author: Chris Webber

quotes.quote: Some people feel guilty about their anxieties and regard them as a defect of faith but they are afflictions, not sins. Like all afflictions, they are, if we can so take them, our share in the passion of Christ.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Guilt is not a response to anger; it is a response to one's own actions or lack of action.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Guilt is always hungry - don't let it consume you.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The guilty think all talk is of themselves.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: No amount of guilt can change the past and no amount of worrying can change the future.
quotes.author: Umar Ign al-Khattab

quotes.quote: He who helps the guilty, shares the crime.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A guilty conscience needs to confess. A work of art is a confession.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Guilty people answer questions with a question.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Guilt is the source of sorrow, 'tis the fiend, Th' avenging fiend, that follows us behind, With whips and stings.
quotes.author: Nicholas Rowe

quotes.quote: Today, let's set our minds and hearts on feeling more thankful for what we are than guilty for what we're not. Let's cut the threads of guilt with grace.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: Whether life finds us guilty or not guilty, we ourselves know we are not innocent.
quotes.author: Sandor Marai

quotes.quote: Guilt is the mind's way of suicide when you suppress your values.
quotes.author: Prabakaran Thirumalai

quotes.quote: A guitar is a very personal extension of the person playing it. You have to be emotionally and spiritually connected to your instrument. I'm very brutal on my instruments, but not all the time.
quotes.author: Eddie Van Halen

quotes.quote: The guitar is the instrument most complete and richest in its harmonic and polyphonic possibilities.
quotes.author: Manuel de Falla

quotes.quote: Guitar is just something I can do. So much of it now is muscle memory, just instinct.
quotes.author: St. Vincent

quotes.quote: Any guitar solo should reflect the music that it's soloing over and not just be existing in its own sort of little world.
quotes.author: John Frusciante

quotes.quote: My guitar is not a thing. It is an extension of myself. It is who I am.
quotes.author: Joan Jett

quotes.quote: But that guitar is the perfect companion to the human voice. You rest it against your gut, against your heart, and when you strum it the vibrations go outwards for all to hear, but the vibration also hits you on your body.
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.quote: Guitars have been the obsession of my life. I first picked one up at the age of four and Ive been a guitar junkie ever since.
quotes.author: Johnny Marr

quotes.quote: The guitar is a small orchestra. It is polyphonic. Every string is a different color, a different voice.
quotes.author: Andres Segovia

quotes.quote: Guitar is the best form of self-expression I know. Everything else, and I'm just sort of tripping around, trying to figure my way through life.
quotes.author: Slash

quotes.quote: The guitar has a kind of grit and excitement possessed by nothing else.
quotes.author: Brian May

quotes.quote: A guitar is like an old friend that is there with me.
quotes.author: B B King

quotes.quote: His heart was like a battered guitar; worn and scuffed from a life spent out on the road, but still capable of bringing forth beautiful music.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: The guitar is the easiest instrument to play and the hardest to play well.
quotes.author: Andres Segovia

quotes.quote: Guitar playing is both extremely easy for me and extremely difficult for me at the same time.
quotes.author: Kirk Hammett

quotes.quote: To me a guitar is kind of like a woman. You don't know why you like em but you do.
quotes.author: Waylon Jennings

quotes.quote: The guitar part is the pivot of everything we do, so if you change the guitar part you no longer have what it is.
quotes.author: Robin Trower

quotes.quote: A guitar is just theoretically built wrong. Each string is an interval of fourths, and then the B string is off. Theoretically, that's not right, all the strings should be off.
quotes.author: Eddie Van Halen

quotes.quote: The guitar is like a cuisine and you can't expect people to eat the same thing all the time.
quotes.author: Richard Lloyd

quotes.quote: Guitar playing is just something that came to me and is really second nature now.
quotes.author: Dave Navarro

quotes.quote: The string slices into the skin of his fingers and no matter how tough the calluses, it tears. But this beat is fast and even though his joints are aching, his arm's out of control like it has a mind of its own and the sweat that drenches his hair and face seems to smother him, but nothing's going to stop Tom. He's aiming for oblivion.
quotes.author: Melina Marchetta

quotes.quote: The guitar is a wonderful instrument which is understood by few.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.quote: The guitar was my weapon, my shield to hide behind.
quotes.author: Brian May

quotes.quote: With a guitar I would be able to express the things I felt in sounds.
quotes.author: William Christopher Handy

quotes.quote: A guitar riff played on a piano doesn't come close to the purity of it being played on a guitar but I faked it enough to get by.
quotes.author: Barry Mann

quotes.quote: The guitar I now have is permanently out in my house, which my wife loves. But now my kids are interested in it. They definitely thought the old man was much cooler once I started playing again.
quotes.author: Michael Bland Wife

quotes.quote: I think a guitar solo is how my emotion is most freely released, because verbal articulation isn't my strongest communication strength. My wife thinks that I should do interviews by listening to the questions and playing the answer on guitar.
quotes.author: David Gilmour

quotes.quote: The guitar is something you kind of embrace, and the piano is something you kind of when you play it, you sort of push it away. It feels very different.
quotes.author: Nick Cave

quotes.quote: But the guitar, when you think about it, is the most versatile, really. I mean you can pick it up and take it with you wherever you go.
quotes.author: Eric Clapton

quotes.quote: The guitar is a meditative tool to touch God and find love within yourself.
quotes.author: Pepe Romero

quotes.quote: The guitar is your first wings. It's assigned and designed to unfold your vision and imagination.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: Sometimes the nicest thing to do with a guitar is just look at it.
quotes.author: Thom Yorke

quotes.quote: Guitar playing isn't really for everybody.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: The guitar's not all that expensive either, when you compare it to gettin' a toothpulled or something.
quotes.author: Merle Haggard

quotes.quote: The heavy guitars are the ones that sound good. They are not that comfortable, but they do sound great.
quotes.author: Neal Schon

quotes.quote: The guitar is a much more efficient machine than a computer. More responsive.
quotes.author: Colin Greenwood

quotes.quote: The guitar is the coolest instrument in the world.
quotes.author: Steve Vai

quotes.quote: Just as with a guitar, you can improvise a guitar solo, and they'd probably be similar each time, but they won't be exactly the same. With the word, it's probably a bit freer than that. I probably repeat myself more musically than I do verbally.
quotes.author: Robyn Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Unless the guitar works as a color, then I don't use it, so I haven't been playing guitar too much lately.
quotes.author: Trevor Rabin

quotes.quote: The guitar is a miniature orchestra in itself.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: My guitar only has five strings 'cause the top one broke and I decided not to put it back on: when I play chords I only play bar chords, and the top one always used to cut me there.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: Experimenting with different sounds is great, but when it comes down to it, you're still playing a guitar.
quotes.author: Scott Putesky

quotes.quote: Guitars are kind of just, you know, sexy, especially old vintage ones.
quotes.author: Andrew Bird

quotes.quote: A guitar for me is pretty much strictly in the context of writing songs for my band, coming up with ideas with my band, and then being able to perform those songs as best as I can on stage that's what the guitar for me has always been.
quotes.author: Scott Ian

quotes.quote: Guitar comes more out of its limitations for me, like putting it in a weird tuning and then just go places.
quotes.author: Sam Amidon

quotes.quote: The guitar is featured in a lot of popular music on the radio, on TV, and in films.
quotes.author: Anna Claybourne

quotes.quote: A guitar is basically a box with strings are played instruments similar to guitars for thousands of years. They did not all look like a modern guitar, but they worked in the same way.
quotes.author: Anna Claybourne

quotes.quote: Humans have been singing, dancing, and playing instruments for thousands of years. Music can cheer you up, pass the time, inspire you, and help you have fun with others.
quotes.author: Anna Claybourne

quotes.quote: You probably hear music often. It seems to be everywhere, from your dentist's office to the supermarket.
quotes.author: Anna Claybourne

quotes.quote: People sing songs at religious services, at school, and at celebrations.
quotes.author: Anna Claybourne

quotes.quote: Beginning with its commercial introduction in the 1930's, the electric guitar developed into perhaps the most important instrument to shape American popular music in the decades to come.
quotes.author: The johns Hopkins University Press Baltimmore and London

quotes.quote: The major forms of american vernacular music that flourished from after World War II through the 1970's-urban blues, country music, rock 'n' roll, and rhythm and blues(R&B)--all depended on the electric guitar.
quotes.author: The johns Hopkins University Press Baltimmore and London

quotes.quote: Rock 'n' roll, the most widely embraced form of American popular music, could not have existed without the electric guitar.
quotes.author: The johns Hopkins University Press Baltimmore and London

quotes.quote: The major social changes that remade American life across the twentieth century enabled the rise of the electric guitar and its music.
quotes.author: The johns Hopkins University Press Baltimmore and London

quotes.quote: The forces that changed American society also nurtured the music and the audience for the electric guitar.
quotes.author: The johns Hopkins University Press Baltimmore and London

quotes.quote: Each of us carries a song inside us, the song that makes us human.
quotes.author: Philip Toshio Sudo

quotes.quote: Some schools teach that you must think, breathe, and live guitar twenty-four hours a day. This is obsessive.
quotes.author: Philip Toshio Sudo

quotes.quote: If all you know is the guitar to the exclusion of everything else, your playing will be empty.
quotes.author: Philip Toshio Sudo

quotes.quote: You must relate your guitar playing to the world at large, and vice versa.
quotes.author: Philip Toshio Sudo

quotes.quote: What you bring to your playing is the sum of what you are.
quotes.author: Philip Toshio Sudo

quotes.quote: For me, I think the only danger is being too much in love with guitar playing. The music is the most important thing and the guitar is only the instrument.
quotes.author: Jerry Garcia

quotes.quote: I saw Bob Dylan getting criticized in Australia by this guy who was saying, 'Your new songs aren't as relevant as your old songs.' And Dylan just said, 'Well, I'm out here writing songs-what are you doing?'
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: We didn't have any instruments, so I had to use my guitar.
quotes.author: Mother Maybelle Carter

quotes.quote: Puberty was very vague. I literally locked myself in a room and played guitar.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: I was left with an urge to make the guitar sound like things it shouldn't be able to sound like.
quotes.author: Adrian Belew

quotes.quote: Lean your body forward slightly to support the guitar against your chest, for the poetry of the music should resound in your heart.
quotes.author: Andre Segovia

quotes.quote: My vocation is more in composition really than anything else-building up harmonies using the guitar, orchestrating the guitar like an arm, a guitar army.
quotes.author: Jimmy Page

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is everything. It must be taut and vibrating like a guitar string.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: Anyone can play guitar; however, the trick is playing it well.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: A guitar is a lot like life, it can be strummed gently or you can play it furiously, either way, all the resonance is temporary.
quotes.author: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.quote: Your talent is a gift. It's like getting a guitar for Christmas; you gotta practice to be the most out of it.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Jeff is the guy who took the instrument of guitar into the furthest reaches of guitar universe and nobody ever - nobody even comes close.
quotes.author: Matthew Longfellow

quotes.quote: Clapton reinvented the electric guitar? Clapton plugs in a guitar, he plugs in an electric guitar and he plays it like an acoustic guitar.
quotes.author: Gilbert Adair

quotes.quote: Hendrix plugs in an electric guitar, he plays with his teeth.
quotes.author: Gilbert Adair

quotes.quote: 99% of people who come out on stage with a guitar can't play the guitar. You just demonstrated what that thing was actually intended for.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: To me, the real interest in playing guitar is to play guitar with another guy. Two guitars together, if you get it right, it can become like an orchestra.
quotes.author: Brett Morgen

quotes.quote: What really changed it to reggae was the riff, actual with the guitar. It was just basically a rhythm change, in terms of what the guitar, the guitar used to play like: chuck, chuck, chuck. And then it started playing: chuck-up, chuck-up, chuck-up, chuck-up
quotes.author: Kevin Macdonald

quotes.quote: It takes a big man to play a little guitar.
quotes.author: Brian Gunn

quotes.quote: Playing the guitar isn't as easy as it looks.
quotes.author: Jack Mendelsohn

quotes.quote: From the strings of my guitar, that seeks only your love, a voice comes forth, that speaks of kisses, lost on your lips, my heart sings with newfound happiness, at the dawning of this new love.
quotes.author: Marcel Camus

quotes.quote: You know what has one strap? Machine guns. You know what else? Electric guitars.
quotes.author: Jackie Filgo

quotes.quote: I would like for us to have dinner, one of these nights. Candle light. Soft guitars
quotes.author: Abe Burrows

quotes.quote: Maybe if musicians got off their blogs and picked up their guitars, the music business would be in better shape.
quotes.author: Josh Schwartz

quotes.quote: Hey, here I go a lucky so and so / Happy 'cause I know, I've got my fast guitar / Singing pretty songs, knowing I belong
quotes.author: Bill Dees

quotes.quote: I'm a lady from the valley / Coming out to check a band / See I'm a crazy into rock and rol / I got to have a guitar man
quotes.author: Bob Esty

quotes.quote: The only disadvantage of an honest heart is credulity.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: We live in such a gullible world. Anything that's written, anything that's posted, anything picture that is interpreted one way is taken as truth.
quotes.author: Keri Hilson

quotes.quote: People believe what they want to believe.
quotes.author: Tab Hunter

quotes.quote: The public is gullible. ... If [many satirists are] making the same joke, that's the danger. Then there's a solidifying effect and it becomes a truth.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Being gullible is simply having the quality of trusting people easily.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A little credulity helps one on through life very smoothly.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quotes.quote: Fame is proof that the people are gullible.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't be gullible, use life before it uses you. Understand there are no free lunches, and for every action you take, there's a reaction.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: Most people are sceptical about the wrong things and gullible about the wrong things.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: A gullible mind is a weak mind.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Could people be trained to be less gullible? Or are you as stuck with gullibility as you are with skin colour?
quotes.author: Keith Henson

quotes.quote: The cure for advanced gullibility is to go to sleep and consider matters again the next day.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Many people are gullible, and we can expect this to continue.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.quote: Swindlers are notoriously gullible.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Gods and politics are the tools with which the godless and unprincipled manipulate the gullible.
quotes.author: Janet E. Morris

quotes.quote: Credulity is belief in slight evidence, with no evidence, or against evidence.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Youth is easily deceived because it is quick to hope.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Gullibility is a knife at the throat of civilization.
quotes.author: David Wong

quotes.quote: When people are bewildered they tend to become credulous.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Some people say that taxes are the price we pay for civilization. But the runaway taxes of our time are the price we pay for being gullible.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: I had rather been thought of as being gullible for trusting God to take care of me than to end up feeling gullible that I didn't.
quotes.author: Josh Parham

quotes.quote: Some dubious people with little real spiritual training call themselves teachers, but actually take advantage of others in the name of taking care of peace of mind. This is unfortunate. It happens because, when it comes to spirituality, people are still gullible.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Our weakness resides in our insecurity as it makes us gullible and self-indulgent. Learning to control ourselves should be a better objective for some of us, especially those of us that operate in high positions.
quotes.author: Philip R. Bailey

quotes.quote: I'm just another gullible youth; I'm into idols.
quotes.author: Paul Weller

quotes.quote: Fame is proof that people are gullible.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Rock music has to be naive. And when you're no longer musically naive, or socially naive, or intellectually naive, and you start to get a bit more worldly-wise no way can you do that anymore.
quotes.author: Marian Anderson

quotes.quote: Incomplete comparisons of cultures can be misleading to the naive.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: I was just pretty naive when I was just a kid, mostly. I never thought about professions or anything. That's what I mean by 'naive.' I never thought about what I'd be doing to make money, stuff like that, I never thought about it
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quotes.quote: I think a lot of times we don't pay enough attention to people with a positive attitudes because we assume they are naive or stupid or unschooled.
quotes.author: Amy Adams

quotes.quote: I was naive, knew nothing, and agreed. But the arbitrator was a friend of the fellow suing me, a fact I didn't know at the time.
quotes.author: David Mellor

quotes.quote: It is just possible to imagine God speaking French. Christy never. His words do not function in a language so ill at ease in the naive or the sublime
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: The stupid neither forgive nor forget; the naive forgive and forget; the wise forgive but do not forget.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but Love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, ad when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
quotes.author: Joyce Giraud

quotes.quote: I'm so naive about finances. Once when my mother mentioned an amount and I realized I didn't understand, she had to explain: 'That's like three Mercedes.' Then I understood.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.quote: I had been gullible, naive, soft, pliable. That's why I got taken advantage of. To survive, you have to have tough skin.
quotes.author: Tia Carrere

quotes.quote: There's a gullible side to the American people. They can be easily misled. Religion is the best device used to mislead them.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.quote: I never thought I was gullible, but I know that I trust people easily and take people at face value.
quotes.author: Taapsee Pannu

quotes.quote: And that's the thing about people who mean everything they say. They think everyone else does too.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: Tell people there's an invisible man in the sky who created the universe, and the vast majority will believe you. Tell them the paint is wet, and they have to touch it to be sure.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: I am suspicious of all the things that the average people believe.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: The tendency to trust easily anyone gives way to a certain vulnerability.
quotes.author: Angelica Hopes

quotes.quote: Believe them and they'll you all sorts of things.
quotes.author: Valentin Rasputin

quotes.quote: A lie, like a pill, is easier to swallow when you don't think about it.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: People will believe anything. Except, it seems, the truth.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: We are inclined to believe those whom we do not know because they have never deceived us.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: In most cases, men willingly believe what they wish.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: The art of living is the art of knowing how to believe lies.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: To the pure, all things are pure.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: This gun is liberty; hold for certain that the day when you no more have it, you will be returned to slavery.
quotes.author: Toussaint Louverture

quotes.quote: If someone has a gun and is trying to kill you, it would be reasonable to shoot back with your own gun.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Guns are like thermometers, only instead of measuring body temperatures they measure our fear.
quotes.author: Jean Zimmerman

quotes.quote: When you carry a gun, you mean to harm somebody, kill somebody.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: It seems that the only gun violence some leftists approve of is gun violence aimed at cops and other groups they see as oppressive or racist.
quotes.author: Gary Bauer

quotes.quote: A gun show is about like-minded people who feel as if everything has been taken away from them - jobs, money, pride.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: The guns and the bombs, the rockets and the warships, are all symbols of human failure.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter if gun violence is down. We need to get guns and bullets and automatic weapons off the streets.
quotes.author: Don Lemon

quotes.quote: As for gun control advocates, I have no hope whatever that any facts whatever will make the slightest dent in their thinking - or lack of thinking.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Yes, people pull the trigger but guns are the instrument of death. Gun control is necessary, and delay means more death and horror.
quotes.author: Eliot Spitzer

quotes.quote: After a shooting spree, they always want to take the guns away from the people who didn't do it. I sure as hell wouldn't want to live in a society where the only people allowed guns are the police and the military.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: In light of all the gun violence in the USA, I'd prefer my democracy unleaded.
quotes.author: Jayseth Guberman

quotes.quote: Guns made us free and have kept us free, one side says; the other side rejects guns as instruments of domination, lawlessness, and terrorism. The conflict rages on because both sides are right.
quotes.author: Jan E. Dizard

quotes.quote: When a person has a gun, sometimes their mind clicks that this thing will win arguments and straighten people out.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: I have a very strict gun control policy: if there's a gun around, I want to be in control of it.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Violence is an evil thing, but when the guns are all in the hands of the men without respect for human rights, then men are really in trouble.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: Guns kill far more quickly and efficiently than knives, or crossbows, or toenail clippers; and, unlike bombs, you don't need to build one in your basement they come ready-made! There's a reason why guns are the overwhelming weapon of choice among mass murderers.
quotes.author: Quentin R. Bufogle

quotes.quote: You can have all the gun control laws in the country, but if you don't enforce them, people are going to find a way to protect themselves. We need to recognize that bad people are doing bad things with these weapons. It's not the law-abiding citizens, it's not the person who uses it as a hobby.
quotes.author: Michael Steele

quotes.quote: Speaking personally, you can have my gun, but you'll take my book when you pry my cold, dead fingers off of the binding.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: As long as there are guns, the individual that wants a gun for a crime is going to have one and going to get it. The only person who's going to be penalized and have difficulty is the law-abiding citizen, who then cannot have it if he wants protection the protection of a weapon in his home.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The problem is not the availability of guns, it is the availability of morons.
quotes.author: Antonio Meloni

quotes.quote: The world is filled with violence. Because criminals carry guns, we decent law-abiding citizens should also have guns. Otherwise they will win and the decent people will loose.
quotes.author: James Earl Jones

quotes.quote: You can't be afraid to put out a fire if you're a fireman. You can't be afraid to be a police officer and carry a gun if you're afraid to get up and go out there. So you've got to put that fear to the side and go out in faith to overcome that.
quotes.author: Duane Chapman

quotes.quote: When the gun fires you must concentrate for every second on the way to that finish line. You should know exactly how long it will take you to and think about every step of the race you are about to run.
quotes.author: Maurice Greene

quotes.quote: Guns are not the problem. The species is the problem.
quotes.author: Forrest Carr

quotes.quote: Gun violence has cost us too many political leaders, and hardly ever the worst ones.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: This country has a mental health problem disguised as a gun problem, and a tyranny problem disguised as a security problem.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: Gun control is like trying to reduce drunk driving by making it tougher for sober people to own cars.
quotes.author: Sheriff Jim Wilson

quotes.quote: The policemen or soldiers are only a gun in the establishments hand. They make the racist secure in his racism.
quotes.author: Huey Newton

quotes.quote: It's better to have a gun and not need it than to need a gun and not have it.
quotes.author: Christian Slater

quotes.quote: Arms in the hands of citizens may be used at individual discretion in private self defense.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Banning guns is like banning forks in an attempt to stop making people fat.
quotes.author: Vince Vaughn

quotes.quote: That rifle on the wall of the labourer's cottage or working class flat is the symbol of democracy. It is our job to see that it stays there.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The very atmosphere of firearms anywhere and everywhere restrains evil interference. They deserve a place of honor with all that is good. When firearms go, all goes. We need them every hour.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: One man with a gun can control 100 without one.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: If I had a gun, why one of us might have got hurt, and it might have been me. I wouldn't have liked that, would I?
quotes.author: Brian Donlevy

quotes.quote: If you ever say another word about me or make another indecent proposal, I'm gonna get that gun of mine and I'll change you from a rooster to a hen with one shot.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Playing with gun is easy but it is really tough to realize the technicalities behind this dangerous weapon.
quotes.author: Sreechinth C.

quotes.quote: Remember the first rule of gunfighting, have a gun.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: They will not accept the truth that if you take all the guns off the street you still will have a crime problem, whereas if you take the criminals off the street, you cannot have a gun problem.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: As you know and have heard me say, I don't believe anything will be accomplished by making it harder for honest citizens to own guns. I do believe we could do much more with the stiffer penalties for those who are convicted of using guns in the commission of a crime.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: We have often heard that the pen is mightier than the sword. I guess they now feel that the pen is more dangerous than a semi-automatic machine gun.
quotes.author: Ted Kennedy

quotes.quote: Guns don't kill people. People kill people.
quotes.author: Chicago Daily Tribune

quotes.quote: It's the unloaded gun that kills people.
quotes.author: Warren Hilleary

quotes.quote: He had a venerable gun, which was long enough to club any game with that came within shooting distance.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Writing is like pulling a trigger of a gun; if you are not loaded, nothing happens.
quotes.author: Henry Seidel Canby

quotes.quote: Like the Highlandman's gun, she wants stock, lock, and barrel to put her into repair.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: The first thing you'll see in my area is this gun, Dutch, and it'll be the last thing you'll see.
quotes.author: Louis "Pretty" Amberg

quotes.quote: We can manage without butter but not, for example, without guns. If we are attacked we can only defend ourselves with guns not with butter.
quotes.author: Joseph Goebbels

quotes.quote: I couldn't tell a joke if you put a gun to my head.
quotes.author: Neil Simon

quotes.quote: If you reduce the guns and the ammo, you'll reduce the murders.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.quote: The fascination of shooting as a sport depends almost wholly on whether you are at the right or wrong end of the gun.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: That was the trouble with explaining with words. If you explained with gunpowder, people listened.
quotes.author: Dean F. Wilson

quotes.quote: Guns, she was reminded then, were not for girls. They were for boys. They were invented by boys. They were invented by boys who had never gotten over their disappointment that accompanying their own orgasm there wasn't a big boom sound.
quotes.author: Lorrie Moore

quotes.quote: If you take guns away from legal gun owners, then the only people who would have guns would be the bad guys. Even a pacifist would get violent if someone were trying to kill him or her. You would fight for your life, whatever your beliefs.
quotes.author: Bruce Willis

quotes.quote: Tyler and me at the edge of the roof, the gun in my mouth, I'm wondering how clean this gun is.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: When guns are outlawed, only the Government will have guns. The Government - and a few outlaws. If that happens, you can count me among the outlaws.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: You don't spread democracy with a barrel of a gun.
quotes.author: Helen Thomas

quotes.quote: Don't you read the statistics? Guns are unisex these days.
quotes.author: Benjamin R. Smith

quotes.quote: Thoughts are the gun, words are the bullets, deeds are the target, the bulls-eye is heaven.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Our votes must go together with our guns. After all, any vote we shall have, shall have been the product of the gun. The gun which produces the vote should remain its security officer - its guarantor. The people's votes and the people's guns are always inseparable twins.
quotes.author: Robert Mugabe

quotes.quote: Political power grows out of the barrel of a gun.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: I grew up in a tough neighborhood and we used to say you can get further with a kind word and a gun than just a kind word.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: A gun is no more dangerous than a cricket bat in the hands of a madman.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.quote: Your genetics load the gun. Your lifestyle pulls the trigger.
quotes.author: Mehmet Oz

quotes.quote: An armed man is a citizen. A disarmed man is a subject.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It ain't gun control we need; it's sin control.
quotes.author: Si Robertson

quotes.quote: If someone has a gun and is trying to kill you, it would be reasonable to shoot back with your own gun.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Anyone can shoot a gun but the real power comes from non-violent means.
quotes.author: J.C. Phillips

quotes.quote: With the right to bear arms comes a great responsibility to use caution and common sense on handgun purchases.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: You don't need a weapon to protect yourself.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: You don't spread democracy with a barrel of a gun.
quotes.author: Helen Thomas

quotes.quote: Gun control is like trying to reduce drunk driving by making it tougher for sober people to own cars.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A free people ought...to be armed
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The people have a right to keep and bear arms.
quotes.author: Patrick Henry

quotes.quote: One man with a gun can control a hundred without one.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: There are no dangerous weapons. There are only dangerous men.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: I don't think there should be more gun control. I think there should be more education.
quotes.author: Sam Brownback

quotes.quote: You don't shoot to kill; you shoot to stay alive.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To conquer a nation, first disarm its citizens.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: I have a very strict gun control policy: if there's a gun around, I want to be in control of it.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Gun control means control. It means control for the government and the government starts controlling the people.
quotes.author: Luke Scott

quotes.quote: Gun bans disarm victims, putting them at the mercy of murderers or terrorists who think nothing of breaking the gun laws.
quotes.author: Michael Badnarik

quotes.quote: An unarmed man can only flee from evil, and evil is not overcome by fleeing from it.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: How many have to die before we will give up these dangerous toys?
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The only thing that stops a bad guy with a gun is a good guy with a gun.
quotes.author: Wayne LaPierre

quotes.quote: The right to buy weapons is the right to be free.
quotes.author: A. E. van Vogt

quotes.quote: Laws can't control the lawless.
quotes.author: Wayne LaPierre

quotes.quote: Gun Control is not about guns; it's about control.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Guns are not the problem. The species is the problem.
quotes.author: Forrest Carr

quotes.quote: Guns are not the problem. It is us that is the problem.
quotes.author: Keita Shimizu

quotes.quote: The world is filled with violence. Because criminals carry guns, we decent law-abiding citizens should also have guns. Otherwise they will win and the decent people will lose.
quotes.author: James Earl Jones

quotes.quote:
To disarm the people is the best and most effectual
Way to enslave them.
quotes.author: George Mason

quotes.quote: We do not need guns and bombs to bring peace, we need love and compassion.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If more sane people were armed, the crazy people would get off fewer shots.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Irony: Some of the people yelling the loudest for gun control are protected by armed security.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's not a gun control problem; it's a cultural control problem.
quotes.author: Bob Barr

quotes.quote: Gun bans don't disarm criminals, gun bans attract them.
quotes.author: Walter Mondale

quotes.quote: We don't have a gun problem; we have a math problem: ZERO GUNS = ZERO GUN-RELATED DEATHS.
quotes.author: Quentin R. Bufogle

quotes.quote: Gun Control: A measure to ensure that guns always point in one direction.
quotes.author: CrimethInc.

quotes.quote: Not everybody needs a gun , to get things done.
quotes.author: Tamer Abo Aliun

quotes.quote: For an unarmed man may be attacked with greater confidence than an armed man.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Know guns, know peace, know safety. No guns, no peace, no safety.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: As you know and have heard me say, I don't believe anything will be accomplished by making it harder for honest citizens to own guns. I do believe we could do much more with stiffer penalties for those who are convicted of using guns in the commission of a crime.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: My concern about gun control is that it's taking our eyes off what might be the real answers to crime. It's diverting our attention.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: On the subject of gun control...I believe that the problem belongs at the state level. I think there would be great problems with regard to enforcement at the national level.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: We have passed some laws which I believe are probably more effective than gun control. Anyone convicted of a crime who had a gun in his or her possession at the time of the crime— regardless of whether the weapon was used or not— has five to fifteen years added to the sentence.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: My biggest frustration so far is the fact that this society has not been willing to take some basic steps to keep guns out of the hands of people who can do just unbelievable damage. We're the only undeveloped country on earth where this happens..And it happens once a week. And it's a one-day story. The country has to do some soul-searching on this.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Honestly this is not going to change unless the people who want to prevent these kinds of mass shootings from taking place feel at least as passionate, at least as mobilized and well-funded as the NRA and the gun manufacturers are because the politics in Congress are such where even members of Congress who know better are fearful if they vote their conscience and support common sense measures like background checks. they're worried they're going to lose.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Honestly this is not going to change unless the people who want to prevent these kinds of mass shootings from taking place feel at least as passionate, at least as mobilized and well-funded as the NRA and the gun manufacturers are because the politics in Congress are such where even members of Congress who know better are fearful if they vote their conscience and support common sense measures like background checks. they're worried they're going to lose.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The unmistakable lesson is that to secure liberty and civil society, Colonial Americans first had to preserve their right to arms.
quotes.author: Philip Mulivor

quotes.quote: The right to keep and bear arms is the one right that allows rights to exist at all.
quotes.author: Charlton Heston

quotes.quote: The danger from armed citizens is only to the government, not to the society; and as long as they have nothing to revenge in the government, there are many advantages in their being accustomed to the use of arms, and no possible disadvantage.
quotes.author: Joel Barlow

quotes.quote: Both oligarch and tyrant mistrust the people, and therefore deprive them of their arms.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Disarming citizens has a double effect, it palsies the hand ad brutalizes the mind; a habitual disuse of physical forces totally destroys the moral, and men lose at once the power of protecting themselves, and of discerning the cause of their oppression.
quotes.author: Joel Barlow

quotes.quote: A woman who demands further gun control legislation is like a chicken who roots for Colonel Sanders.
quotes.author: Larry Elder

quotes.quote: And I cannot see why arms should be denied to any man who is not a slave, since they are the only true badges of liberty.
quotes.author: Andrew Fletcher

quotes.quote: If I could have gotten 51 votes in the Senate of the United States for an outright ban on assault weapons, picking up every one of them— Mr. and Mrs. America, turn them all in— I would have done it.
quotes.author: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.quote: The rifle itself has no moral stature since it has no will of its own. Naturally, it may be used by evil men for evil purposes, but there are more good men than evil, and while the latter cannot be persuaded to the path of righteousness by propaganda, they can certainly be corrected by good men with rifles.
quotes.author: Jeff Cooper

quotes.quote: Most gun control arguments miss the point. If all control boils fundamentally to force, how can one resist aggression without equal force? How can a truly 'free' state exist if the individual citizen is enslaved to the forceful will of individual or organized aggressors? It cannot.
quotes.author: Tiffany Madison

quotes.quote: An armed society is a polite society.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: You can have all the gun control laws in the country, but if you don't enforce them, people are going to find a way to protect themselves. We need to recognize that bad people are doing bad things with these weapons. It's not the law-abiding citizens, it's not the person who uses it as a hobby.
quotes.author: Michael Steele

quotes.quote: In 1911, Turkey established gun control. From 1915 to 1917, 1.5 million Armenians, unable to defend themselves, were exterminated.
quotes.author: Joe Wurzelbacher

quotes.quote: We have to face the fact that meaningful gun control has to be a part of homeland security.
quotes.author: Jeh Johnson

quotes.quote: I don't believe in gun bans; that's a fallacy that people have, that they think if you believe in gun control you want to ban guns. That's not true.
quotes.author: Jim Jefferies

quotes.quote: Make no mistake about it. Gun control is not about crook control. It's about American control.
quotes.author: Derrick Grayson

quotes.quote: Do countries with strong gun control laws have lower murder rates? Only if you cherry-pick the data.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: There is a lot of talks now about metal detectors and gun control. Both are good things. But they are no more a solution than forks and spoons are a solution to world hunger.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: As for gun control advocates, I have no hope that any facts whatever will make the slightest dent in their thinking - or lack of thinking.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: After a shooting spree, they always want to take the guns away from the people who didn't do it.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: One of the ordinary modes, by which tyrants accomplish their purposes without resistance, is, by disarming the people and making it an offense to keep arms.
quotes.author: Joseph Story

quotes.quote: The most effective means of fighting crime in the United States is to outlaw the possession of any type of firearm by the civilian populace.
quotes.author: Janet Reno

quotes.quote: The Guru has to bear the disciple's burden of sin.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Let no man in the world live in delusion. Without a Guru none can cross over to the other shore.
quotes.author: Guru Nanak

quotes.quote: A real Guru's initiation is beyond the divisions of sects and creeds: it is the awakening to our own inner reality which, once glimpsed, determines our further course of development and our actions in life without the enforcement of outer rules.
quotes.author: Anagarika Govinda

quotes.quote: If anyone steps on your ego, instantly, he becomes your enemy. But a Guru is a friend who constantly tramples your ego.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: People don't get the gurus they deserve, they get the gurus they manufacture.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: One does not become a guru by accident.
quotes.author: James Fenton

quotes.quote: The Guru is the conveyance in which the spiritual influence is brought to you. Anyone can teach, but the spirit must be passed on by the Guru to the Shishya (disciple), and that will fructify.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The guru must be a man who has known, has actually realized the Divine truth, has perceived himself as the spirit.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The one who has the power of transmitting this current is called a Guru.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: A true teacher would never tell you what to do. But he would give you the knowledge with which you could decide what would be best for you to do.
quotes.author: Christopher Pike

quotes.quote: A Guru desires nothing from you except your well-being and progress on the path!
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: A spiritual master who is one hundred percent Krishna conscious is the bonaï¬de spiritual master.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Being with the Guru means spontaneous integration of life and wisdom.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: You are never a real guru until you understand that you are serving others and delivering them to the light.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: A Guru is needed not to worship, but to direct you.
quotes.author: Alan Finger

quotes.quote: The guru is the means of realization.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The Guru is the means of realisation. "There is no knowledge without a teacher."
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: A Guru is not someone who holds a torch for you. He is the torch.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: The Spiritual master is the mercy representative of the Lord.
quotes.author: Srimad Bhagavatam

quotes.quote: He alone teaches who has something to give, for teaching is not talking, teaching is not imparting doctrines, it is communicating.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Don't go searching for a Guru. When the pain of ignorance within you becomes a scream, a Guru will come in search for you.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: Light another's path and the universe will light your own.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: You don't go to a Guru for solace. He is not a tranquilizer - he is there to awaken you.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: The biggest Guru mantra is: never share your secrets with anybody. It will destroy you.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: The genuine Guru is God's representative and he speaks about God and nothing else.
quotes.author: A. C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quotes.quote: The job of a Guru is not to interpret the scriptures but to take you to another dimension of life.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: Deep inside of you is a 'Guru' with the wisdom of the entire Universe!
quotes.author: Erin Fall Haskell

quotes.quote: The Teacher provides Spiritual Energy! Just like roots provide nutrients to the flowers!
quotes.author: Master Choa Kok Sui

quotes.quote: The Guru is the bright mask which God wears in order to come to us.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: A Guru is a cascade of energy. You have to soak your spiritual seed in it. It shall sprout.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: The Guru cannot awaken you; all that he can do is to point out what is.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Guru's grace is not designed to fulfill your plans but life's plan for you.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: When the Guru comes, O mother, joyous bliss is mine; / Boundless blessing, mystic rapture, rise within my soul. Surging music, strains of glory, fill my heart with joy; / Breaking forth in songs of gladness, praise to God within. / Comes the Guru, I have found him; joyous bliss is mine.
quotes.author: Sikh Scriptures

quotes.quote: The man who gives him the benefit of the revealed canon...should be known as his guru.
quotes.author: Laws of Manu

quotes.quote: To one who has the highest devotion for God, and for his Guru even as for God, to him these matters which have been declared become manifest if he is a great soul.
quotes.author: Svetashvatara Upanishad

quotes.quote: The Guru is the ladder, the dinghy, the raft by means of which one reaches God; The Guru is the lake, the ocean, the boat, the sacred place of pilgrimage, the river. Without the Guru, there can be no bhakti, no love.
quotes.author: Hymns of Guru Nanak

quotes.quote: There is one God, eternal truth is his name, / Creator of all things and the all-pervading spirit. / Fearless and without hatred, timeless and formless, / Beyond birth and death, self-enlightened. / He is known by the grace of the Guru.
quotes.author: Guru Nanak

quotes.quote: Who, but the True Guru, could save a sinner like me? / Guru, thou art my father and my mother, / Thou art my friend, and hast wrought my salvation.
quotes.author: Hymns of Guru Ram Das

quotes.quote: The guru is just trying to help you, to bring you to a point where you can at least surrender the ego. Then a deep ecstasy will happen between you and your master. Wherever there is a 'let-go,' ecstasy happens— that is the law.
quotes.author: Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: A Guru is like a door frame through which we see God.
quotes.author: Ram Das

quotes.quote: If you go looking for a guru and you are not ready to find one, you will not find what you are looking for. On the other hand, when you are ready the guru will be exactly where you are at the appropriate moment.
quotes.author: Ram Das

quotes.quote: At certain stages in the spiritual journey, there is a quickening of the spirit which is brought about through the grace of the guru.
quotes.author: Ram Das

quotes.quote: Wherever there is the congregation of saints, there it is God's order for me to abide.
quotes.author: Guru Nanak

quotes.quote:
Don't come on like a Guru / With your mind all filled with words / A lot of folks might listen / And then you will be heard
/ But in the end you're fooling / Yourself and that be all / Don't come on like a Guru / No, don't you be a fool.
quotes.author: Peter Duggan

quotes.quote: Being such person’s disciple / It is the gift of great fortune / These gurus for ages / You have made richness a great, famous story.
quotes.author: Hakikur Rahman

quotes.quote: Staying right at the edge of dualism and nondualism through love is the relationship with your Guru.
quotes.author: Ram Das

quotes.quote: In whosoever presence you find peace of mind, devoid of fear, only that person can be your guru.
quotes.author: Ilaiyaraaja

quotes.quote: A guru is like a live road map. If you want to walk uncharted terrain, I think it is sensible to walk with a road map.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: I have never said that there is no need for a guru. All depends on what you call guru. He need not be in a human form.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: I had a Guru. He was a great saint and most merciful. I served him long - very, very long; still, he would not blow any mantra in my ears. I had a keen desire never to leave him but to stay with him and serve him and at all cost receive some instruction from him.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: A true teacher would never tell you what to do. But he would give you the knowledge with which you could decide what would be best for you to do.
quotes.author: Christopher Pike

quotes.quote: Let each man take the path according to his capacity, understanding, and temperament. His true guru will meet him along that path.
quotes.author: Sivananda

quotes.quote: YOU are your own guru. YOU are your own soul mate. YOU are powerful. Take the reigns and drive your carriage home to love.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: When surrender happens, the universe itself becomes your Guru and starts walking you to your blissful home.
quotes.author: Shunya

quotes.quote: The soul your only guru reminds you that, God finally believes in you and given you everything in your hand, never misuse, you are now wiser than wisest and sensible too.
quotes.author: Santosh Kumar

quotes.quote: GURU is a word that epitomizes knowledge. There is a tattva (element) of Guru in each of us. Knowingly or unknowingly, whenever we do something to benefit another, without expecting anything in return, we bring alive the Guru element within ourselves.
quotes.author: Hingori

quotes.quote: Great gurus are not great writers, but great writers are great gurus!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: He fills the disciple with wisdom / and sets his soul aglow, / so that one day the disciple can / reignite the flame in many more.
quotes.author: Hingori

quotes.quote: The driving motivation of a spiritual teacher is to show that while the extent of human problems is understood, there is a different way of seeing life.
quotes.author: Donna Goddard

quotes.quote: The Guru is one who dwells in the Light and the Light dwells in him.
quotes.author: Dada J.P. Vaswani

quotes.quote: Never ignore a gut feeling, but never believe that it's enough.
quotes.author: Robert Heller

quotes.quote: Love starts with a gut feeling, but that gut feeling better be nourished.
quotes.author: Vanessa Paradis

quotes.quote: One life to live, live it to the fullest. If you have doubts or your gut feeling says something, listen. Don't waste time, time will waist you.
quotes.author: Behdad Sami

quotes.quote: If you mean, "My gut feeling is telling me this; therefore I can act on it and I don't have to worry," we say you should never trust your gut.
quotes.author: Gary A. Klein

quotes.quote: By the time you're 18, 19, you know yourself, and you shouldn't go against your gut feeling, which is a temptation in the first year of university.
quotes.author: Kimberley Nixon

quotes.quote: You need to take your gut feeling as an important data point, but then you have to consciously and deliberately evaluate it, to see if it makes sense in this context.
quotes.author: Gary A. Klein

quotes.quote: I believe that gut feelings, the sense of balance, and spatial self-perception are so firmly coupled to our biological body that we will never be able to leave it experientially on a permanent basis.
quotes.author: Thomas Metzinger
