quotes.quote: The most successful people are often very intuitive. Consciously or unconsciously, they follow their gut feelings. Following intuition puts us in the flow - a very alive, productive, and desirable state.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: If you're going to be an entrepreneur, it's not all textbook. It's gut feeling, it's intuition, it's a feeling you have that you can do this and make it happen. I think you have to have a personality.
quotes.author: Wayne Huizenga

quotes.quote: Everything I do is just really my intuition, and every time I go against my intuition, it's a mistake. Even though I may sit down and analyze and intellectualize something on paper, if I go against my gut feeling, it's wrong.
quotes.author: Tamara Mellon

quotes.quote: We must be unafraid to be utterly honest, to honor our gut feelings, and to say and do the unpopular when necessary. We have to give up our addiction to other people's opinions and surrender to the freedom of acting with strength and courage.
quotes.author: Suzanne Falter-Barns

quotes.quote: There are receptors to these molecules in your immune system, in your gut and in your heart. So when you say, 'I have a gut feeling' or 'my heart is sad' or 'I am bursting with joy,' you're not speaking metaphorically. You're speaking literally.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Money comes and goes, but your inner feelings, your gut feelings, your manhood, your womanhood, whatever, that stays with you. That don't go anywhere. So you either proud of who you are and how you handle situations or you not. If you handle a situation wrong, you, it will haunt you.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.quote: I guess if you have an original take on life, or something about you is original, you don't have to study people who came before you. You don't have to mimic anybody. You just have a gut feeling inside, an instinct that tells you what's right for you, and you can't do it in any other way.
quotes.author: Barbra Streisand

quotes.quote: Trust your hunches. Hunches are usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: The very essence of instinct is that it's followed independently of reason.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else's.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.quote: Telling us to obey instinct is like telling us to obey 'people.' People say different things: so do instincts. Our instincts are at war... Each instinct, if you listen to it, will claim to be gratified at the expense of the rest.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Instinct must be thwarted just as one prunes the branches of a tree so that it will grow better.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: If every instinct you have is wrong, then the opposite would have to be right.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: An insatiable appetite for glory leads to sacrifice and death, but innate instinct leads to self-preservation and life.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: Good instincts usually tell you what to do long before your head has figured it out.
quotes.author: E. Michael Burke

quotes.quote: Instinct is the direct connection with truth.
quotes.author: Laurette Taylor

quotes.quote: Instinct is intelligence incapable of self-consciousness.
quotes.author: John Sterling

quotes.quote: The truth of your instincts is the root of your foundation.
quotes.author: Sanford Meisner

quotes.quote: Follow your instincts. That's where true wisdom manifests itself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The repression of virtuous instinct in the modern world is an incremental tragedy. Repress one instinct, and you repress many; other parts of consciousness go down, also.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.quote: Instinct is the nose of the mind.
quotes.author: Delphine de Girardin

quotes.quote: My gut feelings and my faith tell me that until God shuts a door, no human can shut it.
quotes.author: Olusegun Obasanjo

quotes.quote: Of course, you can never really know if someone is fully revealing himself to you or not, so all we can go by is our own gut feelings.
quotes.author: Brian McGinn

quotes.quote: Warren Buffet told me once and he said always follow your gut. When you have that gut feeling, you have to go with don't go back on it.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.quote: I just have a gut feeling about something, if I really want to do it, if I'm excited about it, if I want to explore it. And that goes across all different sorts of genres.
quotes.author: Maria Bello

quotes.quote: Trust your gut feeling about things, listen to what others are saying, and look at the results of your actions. Once you know the truth, you can set about taking action to improve. Everyone will be better for it.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: My gut feeling about sequels is that they should be premeditated: You should try to write a trilogy first or at least sketch out a trilogy if you have any faith in your film.
quotes.author: Vin Diesel

quotes.quote: Don't you dare underestimate the power of your own instinct.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.quote: The instinct of self-preservation in human society, acting almost subconsciously, as do all drives in the human mind, is rebelling against the constantly refined methods of annihilation and against the destruction of humanity.
quotes.author: Bertha von Suttner

quotes.quote: The instinct to worship is hardly less strong than the instinct to eat.
quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

quotes.quote: There is no instinct like that of the heart.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Trust your instinct to the end, though you can render no reason.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Survival instincts are one of those things that never die.
quotes.author: Kiersten White

quotes.quote: Instinct teaches us to look for happiness outside ourselves.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: The instinct of interest is the universal instinct of mankind.
quotes.author: Charles Macklin

quotes.quote: Instinct is a marvelous thing. It can neither be explained nor ignored.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: He may not have been born withÂ guts, but he didn't have to die without them.
quotes.author: Katherine Paterson

quotes.quote: Follow your gut and your heart. You'll almost always make the right choice.
quotes.author: Leighton Meester

quotes.quote: If you have theÂ gutsÂ to be yourself, other people'll pay your price.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: What takes more guts? To fight for your own life at any cost - or prove that you're willing to lose it?Â
quotes.author: Kirsten Miller

quotes.quote: If you build the guts to do something, anything, then you better save enough to face the consequences
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It takes confidence andÂ gutsÂ to intentionally create tension.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: From the gut comes the strut, and where hunger reigns, strength abstains.
quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

quotes.quote: Have theÂ gutsÂ to be true to yourself. Nothing more.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: If you greatly desire something, have the guts to stake everything on obtaining it.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: There are times in all of our lives when a reliance on gut or intuition just seems more appropriate - when a particular course of action just feels right.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: Your gut is your inner compass. Whenever you have to consult with other people for an answer, you're headed in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Trust your gut. You know yourself, so don't let somebody else tell you who you are.
quotes.author: Tatiana Maslany

quotes.quote: RealÂ gutsÂ are nothing more than developing your inner voice to the point where it is louder and stronger than the voice of your fear.
quotes.author: Georgette Mosbacher

quotes.quote: Don't ever second-guess a strong feeling that you have. Trust your gut.
quotes.author: Allison DuBois

quotes.quote: You have to listen to what resonates within your own gut. You find your direction there. Your voice comes out.
quotes.author: Kathy Mattea

quotes.quote: Anybody with a little guts and the desire to apply himself can make it, he can make anything he wants to make of himself
quotes.author: Willie Shoemaker

quotes.quote: It takes guts to realize you screwed up and to then come clean without any excuses.
quotes.author: Brandon Webb

quotes.quote: Trusting your gut is always the best thing - no matter what people around you insist you should be doing or saying or thinking. Only you know and once you live in truth,your heart is completely free.
quotes.author: Liberty Ross

quotes.quote: Always trust your gut and your intuition will steer you right, every time.
quotes.author: Charisma Carpenter

quotes.quote: You've got to have theÂ gutsÂ not to be afraid to screw up.
quotes.author: Fuzzy Zoeller

quotes.quote: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.
quotes.author: Paul Bryant

quotes.quote: If you greatly desire something, have theÂ gutsÂ to stake everything on obtaining it.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: Ability and guts is an unbeatable combination.
quotes.author: Eamon Dunphy

quotes.quote: What is the definition ofÂ guts? Grace under pressure.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Just go with your gut and communicate.
quotes.author: Andy Cohen

quotes.quote: There's no substitute for guts.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: Never ignore a gut feeling, but never believe that it's enough.
quotes.author: Robert Heller

quotes.quote: You must have theÂ gutsÂ to throw off the chains of modesty and mediocrity in order to be the light that the world needs.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: TheÂ gutsÂ carry the feet, not the feet theÂ guts.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Your gut is always right.
quotes.author: Sharon Osbourne

quotes.quote: Go with your gut, but use your head.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: Gut health is the key to overall health.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.quote: It takes noÂ gutsÂ to be skeptical, it takesÂ gutsÂ to believe.
quotes.author: Charles Michael Davis

quotes.quote: You can't coach guts and commitment.
quotes.author: Heyneke Meyer

quotes.quote: It takes a lot ofÂ gutsÂ to stop measuring things that are measurable, and even moreÂ gutsÂ to create things that don't measure well by conventional means.
quotes.author: Seth

quotes.quote: You just go with your gut instinct, because your gut is smarter than your heart.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum.
quotes.author: Holly Near

quotes.quote: It's good to go with your gut instincts in life. You just should. Even if it doesn't work out, something good will come out of it.
quotes.author: Karen Gillan

quotes.quote: Spilling yourÂ gutsÂ is just exactly as charming as it sounds.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: If your heart, head and gut are telling you the same thing, then you owe it to yourself to chase it.
quotes.author: Marc Blucas

quotes.quote: It takes an uncommon amount of guts to put your dreams on the line.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: It takes guts to get out of the ruts.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Condition andÂ gutsÂ take over where knowledge and skill end.
quotes.author: Ed Parker

quotes.quote: Guts win more games than ability.
quotes.author: Bob Zuppke

quotes.quote: Always write from your gut, no matter what the project is.
quotes.author: Paul Haggis

quotes.quote: It's one thing to haveÂ guts; it's another to be crazy.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: If you've got theÂ gutsÂ to stick it out... you're going to make it.
quotes.author: Brian Hays

quotes.quote: It takes knowledge to know something. It takes guts to do what you know.
quotes.author: Pete Wentz

quotes.quote: Guts are a combination of confidence, courage, conviction, strength of character, stick-to-itiveness, pugnaciousness, backbone, and intestinal fortitude. They are mandatory for anyone who wants to get to and stay at the top
quotes.author: D. A. Benton

quotes.quote: The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: The holy passion of Friendship is so sweet and steady and loyal and enduring a nature that it will last through a whole lifetime, if not asked to lend money.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A good friend will help you move. But best friend will help you move a dead body.
quotes.author: Jim Hayes

quotes.quote: If you can survive 11 days in cramped quarters with a friend and come out laughing, your friendship is the real deal.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: A best friend is the only one that walks into your life when the world has walked out.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Being soaked alone is cold. Being soaked with your best friend is an adventure.
quotes.author: Emily Wing Smith

quotes.quote: My best male friend is my best friend until he crosses me. We're all protective of the self.
quotes.author: Neil LaBute

quotes.quote: That's the cool thing about having a best friend. They know what your pain feels like already, so you don't have to explain it.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: Good friends will allow you to be as innocent and free as a child when in private, and as wise and mature as an adult when in public.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It's one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Friendships that last are those wherein each friend respects the other's dignity to the point of not really wanting anything from them.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: A friend is someone you can be alone with and have nothing to do and not be able to think of anything to say and be comfortable in silence.
quotes.author: Sheryl Condie

quotes.quote: Nothing makes the earth seem so spacious as to have friends at a distance; they make the latitudes and longitudes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: Dave Tyson Gentry

quotes.quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Friends are the most important part of your life. Treasure the tears, treasure the laughter, but most importantly, treasure the memories.
quotes.author: Dave Brenner

quotes.quote: The great thing about new friends is that they bring new energy to your soul.
quotes.author: Shanna Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Foley

quotes.quote: A friend is the one who comes in when the whole world has gone out.
quotes.author: Grace Pulpit

quotes.quote: Love is blind; friendship tries not to notice.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: A friend is a person who knows what you are saying, even if you're not talking.
quotes.author: Sarah Bennett

quotes.quote: Friends are great. Friends are wonderful. Friends who can cook are like winning the lottery.
quotes.author: Greg Tamblyn

quotes.quote: A friend that ain't in need is a friend indeed.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas, unless your friends are on twitter.
quotes.author: Greg Tamblyn

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who makes it easy to believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Heidi Wills

quotes.quote: Man's best support is a very dear friend.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: No friendship is an accident.
quotes.author: O. Henry

quotes.quote: Once you are my friend, I am responsible for you.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: I believe in angels, the kind that heaven sends. I'm surrounded by angels, and I call them my best friends.
quotes.author: Pamela Daranjo

quotes.quote: Friends are like stars, they come and go, but the ones that stay are the ones that glow
quotes.author: Roxy Quiksilver

quotes.quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: Sometimes we don't need to be with friends. We just need to know we have them, that's enough.
quotes.author: Wilson Kanadi

quotes.quote: we're not perfect. we laugh too hard, we are way too loud, and we are such dorks. but doing it together is what makes us best friends
quotes.author: maria gonzales

quotes.quote: Its strange how we find the best of friends in the most unexpected people.
quotes.author: Aly Hunter

quotes.quote: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: A friend is one of the nicest things you can have, and one of the best things you can be.
quotes.author: Douglas Pagels

quotes.quote: Everyone is your best friend when you are successful. Make sure that the people that you surround yourself with are also the people that you are not afraid of failing with.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: There’s not a word yet for old friends who’ve just met.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: A single rose can be my garden… a single friend, my world.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Don’t make friends who are comfortable to be with. Make friends who will force you to lever yourself up.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than you can in two years by trying to get other people interested in you.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: How many slams in an old screen door? Depends how loud you shut it. How many slices in a bread? Depends how thin you cut it. How much good inside a day? Depends how good you live ’em. How much love inside a friend? Depends how much you give ’em.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote:
How the Magic of Friendship grows.
Oh, and how I used to wonder/What friendship could be!
quotes.author: Lauren Faust

quotes.quote: The differences between me and my friends are the very things that make our friendship strong.
quotes.author: Lauren Faust

quotes.quote: Friendship is friendship, a wonderful thing, and I'm all for it. You know me on this point!
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: I think it means that Scoob and Shaggy's friendship will live on. Whether they're together or not.
quotes.author: Matt Lieberman

quotes.quote: The most beautiful quality of a true friendship is to understand and be understood with absolute clarity.
quotes.author: Bryan Fuller

quotes.quote: Without trust, there's no friendship, no closeness. None of the emotional bonds that make us who we are.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: Friendship is sometimes less an emotional response, and more a sense of familiarity.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: People you have to lie to so they like you aren't worth your friendship.
quotes.author: Melissa Goddard

quotes.quote: I guess you give up things when you take on a friendship.
quotes.author: Melissa Goddard

quotes.quote: A high school friend should be someone... who would do anything for you, someone who catches you when you fall, someone who always supports you. It might not be the person you want it to be, but it will definitely be someone who appreciates.
quotes.author: Linan Peng

quotes.quote: If she can't be my best friend, I can't be in love with her. Without friendship, there is no love. Simple. Love is friendship.
quotes.author: Karan Johar

quotes.quote: A man of values never places his business above friendship.
quotes.author: Jim Byrnes

quotes.quote: Friendship can sometimes involve a breach of individual separateness.
quotes.author: Bryan Fuller

quotes.quote: I'm glad you're here. I wish to part with you in friendship.
quotes.author: Fran Walsh

quotes.quote: Friendship is constant in all other things, save in the office and affairs of love.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.quote: As Shakespeare says in The Tempest, Act 2, Scene 7: Most friendship is feigning, most loving - mere folly.
quotes.author: Betty Comden

quotes.quote: The elements that go to make up a friendship - a really close friendship - are mysterious. The scales must be properly, one might say, delicately balanced.
quotes.author: Jerry Adelman

quotes.quote: I think we have the kind of friendship where if I were the devil, you'd be the only one I would tell.
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: Not many friendships last over two lifetimes. I wish we could have made it three.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: There is no power on Earth greater than the power of love. True love like, true friendship, is one of life's sweetest miracles.
quotes.author: David J. Corbett

quotes.quote: Keep smiling, keep shining / Knowing you can always count on me, for sure / That's what friends are for.
quotes.author: Clarence Mcdonald

quotes.quote: For good times and bad times / I'll be on your side forever more / That's what friends are for.
quotes.author: Clarence Mcdonald

quotes.quote: We are the champions, my friends. / And we'll keep on fighting 'til the end.
quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

quotes.quote: Old friends / Are the best friends
quotes.author: Eric Baker

quotes.quote: To the Father, Son and Holy Spirit / I hold You nearest / My best friend
quotes.author: Michael Atha

quotes.quote: Good friends support and understand each other; have fun together.
quotes.author: Ann Williams

quotes.quote: Friends respect, share, listen, confide and trust.
quotes.author: Ann Williams

quotes.quote: Before borrowing from a friend, decide which you need most.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
quotes.author: St.Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: When I look into the distant future, I see us rolling into the sunset together. In our wheelchairs.
quotes.author: Christina Garcia

quotes.quote: We have been friends together. In sunshine and in shade.
quotes.author: Caroline Sheridan Norton

quotes.quote: Familiarity breeds content
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Make new friends, but keep the old.
quotes.author: Catherine Dee

quotes.quote: New-made friendships, like new wine / Age will mellow and refine.
quotes.author: Catherine Dee

quotes.quote: We need old friends to help us grow old and new friends to help us stay young.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: How rare and wonderful is that flash pf a moment when we realize we have discovered a friend.
quotes.author: William Rotsler

quotes.quote: I am quite sure that no friendship yields its true pleasure and nobility of nature without frequent communication, sympathy and service.
quotes.author: George Edward Woodberry

quotes.quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it be lost.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: To what gods is sacrificed that rarest and sweetest thing upon earth, friendship? To vanity and to interest.
quotes.author: Guillame-Chretien de Lamoignon de Malesherbes

quotes.quote: As such, it describes a relationship that falls short — for whatever reason, of the fuller communion of romantic sexual love.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: A platonic friendship is an unhealthy lie.
quotes.author: John Oliver Hobbes

quotes.quote: Everyone loves being her friend— to the point that every one of her male friends has a crush on her— because we are all drawn toward the sun.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: In traditional China, however, it was the relationship between two male friends that was usually the stronger emotional bond.
quotes.author: Qin Xue Herzberg

quotes.quote: My love and hers have always been purely platonic.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Men and women might have very different goals and motives for their 'friendship,' as each may look at the responsibilities of friendship and love a bit differently. As a result, they tend to co-create this friend zone confusion.
quotes.author: Jeremy Nicholson

quotes.quote: Even if he's one of the girls, or you're one of the guys, the male-female BFF dynamic has a few subtle differences from other kinds of friendships.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Moss

quotes.quote: Your female friends will carefully listen to the unique elements of your current dating drama, and come up with thoughtful and relevant advice; your male friends will tell you that this guy is an asshole. No one hears more about how guys are 'all animals' than a woman with a male best friend.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Moss

quotes.quote: In this daily passion played by men and women, there emerges an ideal called the platonic relationship— the belief that a man and a woman can be just friends.
quotes.author: Clayton Dunham

quotes.quote: When you were young, for a male to make friends with another male was pretty damn simple - you walked up to them and asked them to be your friend. Try that as an adult and you will get some very strange looks!
quotes.author: Ben D. Ingham

quotes.quote: The world has plenty of advice for young men when it comes to dating, choosing a career, and seeing the world. Why not for making friends? After all, having strong, authentic male friendships can be incredibly beneficial to our long-term well-being.
quotes.author: Mark Roman

quotes.quote: No doubt, you can point to experiences in your own life where a male friendship left a lasting positive impact.
quotes.author: Mark Roman

quotes.quote: My best male friend is my best friend until he crosses me. We're all protective of the self.
quotes.author: Neil LaBute

quotes.quote: I have a great pack of female friends, but I also have a lot of guy friends. I believe that platonic relationship is entirely possible.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: Whenever I'm around my guy friends, I'm always playing video games. I've always enjoyed the graphics side of them, how they look.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.quote: If I'm having a really bad day, I always have a girlfriend - or even a guy friend - who I can call. They'll listen to me wallow for a minute and then be like, 'Okay, let's stop. Everything's great. Let's figure out how to fix whatever's bothering you.'
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.quote: That's the cool thing about having a best friend. They know what your pain feels like already, so you don't have to explain it.
quotes.author: Susane Colasanti

quotes.quote: When it comes to emotionally close friendships we found that as the level of emotional intimacy with male friends increases, the odds of getting help on a number of levels increases.
quotes.author: Robert Garfield

quotes.quote: The love of man to woman is a thing common and of course, and at first partakes more of instinct and passion than of choice; but true friendship between man and man is infinite and immortal.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: You don’t feel attraction or share romance with a male friend.
quotes.author: Sonya Schwartz

quotes.quote: Increased physical activity enhances positive energy
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Those who think they have not time for bodily exercise will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
quotes.author: Edward Stanley

quotes.quote: Getting fit is all about mind over matter. I don't mind, so it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Adam Hargreaves

quotes.quote: The more you sweat in training, the less you bleed in combat.
quotes.author: Richard Marcinko

quotes.quote: The deadlift also serves as a way to train the mind to do things that are hard.
quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

quotes.quote: Your current body is the only body that can take you to your new body — so be kind to it.
quotes.author: Elaine Moran

quotes.quote: The real workout starts when you want to stop.
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.quote: If you think lifting weights is dangerous, try being weak. Being weak is dangerous.
quotes.author: Bret Contreras

quotes.quote: I don't believe in bodybuilders using steroids. If a man doesn't have enough male hormones in his system to create, a nice hard, muscular body, he should take up ping pong.
quotes.author: Steve Reeves

quotes.quote: In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.
quotes.author: Rich Froning Jr

quotes.quote: Don't be scared to LIFT HEAVY! You won't get huge and bulky, you'll just get amazing.
quotes.author: Jessie Hilgenberg

quotes.quote: Don't quit. You're already in pain. You're already hurt. Get a reward from it!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: When working out, length is not a substitute for intensity.
quotes.author: Bill Loguidice

quotes.quote: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying 'I will try again tomorrow.'
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: There's no secret formula. I lift heavy, work hard, and aim to be the best.
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.quote: You shall gain, but you shall pay with sweat, blood, and vomit.
quotes.author: Pavel Tsatsouline

quotes.quote: To be number one, you have to train like you're number two
quotes.author: Maurice Green

quotes.quote: People laugh and call me lazy, while they twit around in their three-hour workout making zero progress. Sometimes, instead of what you do in the weight room, it's what you don't do that will lead to success.
quotes.author: Jim Wendler

quotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: The fight is won or lost far away from witnesses, behind the lines, in the gym, and out there on the road, long before I dance under those lights.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Be patient and tough; some day this pain will be useful to you
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: The pain of discipline is nothing like the pain of disappointment.
quotes.author: Justin Langer

quotes.quote: No matter who you are, no matter what you do, you absolutely, positively do have the power to change.
quotes.author: Bill Phillips

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: The gym was originally the domain of jocks, weightlifters, and basketball and football players. Today due to a heightened national awareness of fitness the gym is part of the daily routine for millions of Americans.
quotes.author: Nan Marshall

quotes.quote: If it weren't for the fact that the TV set and the refrigerator are so far apart, some of us wouldn't get any exercise at all.
quotes.author: Joey Adams

quotes.quote: I have to exercise in the morning, before my brain figures out what I'm doing.
quotes.author: Marsha Doble

quotes.quote: An hour of basketball feels like 15 minutes. An hour of treadmill feels like a weekend in traffic school.
quotes.author: David Walters

quotes.quote: A man who drinks in a healthy, fit, and self-approving manner will mix vodka with yogurt and get tangled in the Nautilus machine trying to kiss his own ass.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: People come to the gym to enhance their looks and health or simply to enjoy the activity and improve their quality of life.
quotes.author: Yigal Pinchas

quotes.quote: The gym is a protected artificial environment that can be accessible to all exercises at all times and under all conditions.
quotes.author: Yigal Pinchas

quotes.quote: The gym is also the ideal place for those 'loners' who come to work out rather than to develop social ties.
quotes.author: Yigal Pinchas

quotes.quote: Now that I am in the gym, though interestingly I still choose the group exercise studio within the gym, I am there so frequently that it has become almost a second home to me.
quotes.author: Shari Dworkin

quotes.quote: At the end of each of those hectic days as I do on most workdays, I would eagerly look forward to lifting weights or do aerobics with my woman friends at the gym.
quotes.author: Jo Malin

quotes.quote: Fitness is something that happens to you while you're practising good technique.
quotes.author: Terry Laughlin

quotes.quote: I have been in some schools in which the teachers call physical education, 'gym,' even when the school had no gymnasium.
quotes.author: Charmain Sutherland

quotes.quote: Happiness is a ball after which we run wherever it rolls, and we push it with our feet when it stops.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: In gym class, learning involves both your brain and your body. It teaches your body how to move.
quotes.author: Darlene R. Stille

quotes.quote: What hurts today makes you stronger tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jay Cutler

quotes.quote: Exercise is really important to me - it's therapeutic. So if I'm ever feeling tense or stressed or like I'm about to have a meltdown, I'll put on my iPod and head to the gym or out on a bike ride along Lake Michigan with the girls.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: The word 'aerobics' came about when the gym instructors got together and said: If we're going to charge $10 an hour, we can't call it Jumping up and down.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: You're going to have to let it hurt. Let it suck. The harder you work, the better you will look. Your appearance isn’t parallel to how heavy you lift, it’s parallel to how hard you work.
quotes.author: Joe Manganiello

quotes.quote: The gym is somewhere you can go to just forget for an hour what you do for a living, what you are doing on a daily basis. You just turn up and get on with it.
quotes.author: Luke Evans

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It’s going to be a journey. It’s not a sprint to get in shape.
quotes.author: Kerri Walsh Jennings

quotes.quote: Going to the gym was never about 'working out' like it is for most people. To me, It was a matter of life or death. It was either me or the weights-and I was going to win. I've always had that competitive streak, whether it was in the gym, on the stage, or In anything else I did.
quotes.author: Rich Gaspari

quotes.quote: When people tell me they can't afford to join a gym, I tell them to go outside; planet Earth is a gym and we're already members. Run, climb, sweat, and enjoy all of the natural wonders that are available to you.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Your mind is the strongest and most valuable muscle you can grow in the gym.
quotes.author: Greg Plitt

quotes.quote: When it comes to eating right and exercising, there is no ‘I'll start tomorrow.’ Tomorrow is a disease.
quotes.author: V.L. Allinea

quotes.quote: A man’s health can be judged by which he takes two at a time — pills or stairs.
quotes.author: Joan Welsh

quotes.quote: Exercise is done against one’s wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: Fitness — if it came in a bottle, everybody would have a great body.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Total physical fitness is a positive state of well-being bringing about sufficient strength and energy to participate in a full, active lifestyle.
quotes.author: Karen S. Mazzeo

quotes.quote: There is always tension in women's gymnastics between athleticism, grace, performance, and eros.
quotes.author: Meghan O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Hard work is always hard work, for young gymnasts and old gymnasts. Whoever can handle this will be a champion.
quotes.author: Svetlana Boguinskaya

quotes.quote: Love it like over splits. You can't expect to give into it all in one sitting. But if you work at it, warm the muscles gradually, your body will eventually accept it as normal.' The bulk of his shoulder nudged my much smaller one lightly. 'It might even feel good.
quotes.author: Laurel Ulen Curtis

quotes.quote: In gymnastics, smaller will always be better in many ways. The stress in the head, that will be the same for all. But the stress on the body and the concussions it must endure, that will always be easier for the little ones
quotes.author: Bela Karolyi

quotes.quote: Competing in gymnastics is the greatest reminder of being alive as a human being.
quotes.author: Raj Bhavsar

quotes.quote: I just stay focused, and I always think about gymnastics. I am just doing what I always do... working really hard and pushing myself to the maximum and keeping myself motivated.
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.quote: If you're not standing on the edge you're taking up too much space.
quotes.author: Suzanne Yoculan

quotes.quote: I started from zero and went back to the basics in gymnastics.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: Gymnastics has made me strong. I feel like it broke me down to my lowest point, but at the same time, it has given me the greatest strength anyone could ask for.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: We're taught at such a young age that you can always be better and that you're never perfect and that you're never good enough.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: A comeback in gymnastics is almost impossible in itself.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: Jump off the beam, flip off the bars, follow your dreams and reach for the stars.
quotes.author: Nadia Comaneci

quotes.quote: If you believe you can get through an injury and fight back, and you really love gymnastics enough, you can get through it.
quotes.author: Courtney Kupets

quotes.quote: Goals have to be realistic and flexible.
quotes.author: Shannon Miller

quotes.quote: If there has not been such a thing as gymnastics, I would have had to invent it because I feel at one with the sport.
quotes.author: Olga Korbut

quotes.quote: In gymnastics, the longest routine you do is a minute and a half, and that's pretty tough to get through.
quotes.author: Shannon Miller

quotes.quote: I did gymnastics when I was growing up and to this day I can still do the splits.
quotes.author: Kristin Kreuk

quotes.quote: I know gymnastics. It's always been a subjective appreciation.
quotes.author: Bela Karolyi

quotes.quote: It might have been easier to retire, to say my knee couldn't handle it and let that be that. At the same time, the prospect of not being able to compete in gymnastics anymore was heartbreaking.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: Everything is about your movements and precision and timing, which is what gymnastics is about.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: Gymnastics is not only a good thing to live by, but it is important to understand how it does help you in life.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: When I go in to compete, whether it's gymnastics or anything else, I do my own thing. I compete with myself.
quotes.author: Shannon Miller

quotes.quote: Strength and conditioning are the keys to good performance and longevity in gymnastics.
quotes.author: Suzanne Yoculan

quotes.quote: It is through artistic gymnastics that I have experienced a lot of joy, pleasure and satisfaction about my own physical abilities from childhood days. Those who only see the labour in my discipline fail to recognise the aesthetic component completely. This, however, is deeply connected with the human soul. Artistic gymnastics has been and always will be a great challenge for me.
quotes.author: Ivan Ivankov

quotes.quote: Wake up every day knowing that today is a new day and only you can determine the outcome of that day. So dream big, accept the challenge, and never look back.
quotes.author: Alicia Sacramone

quotes.quote: In gymnastics, you have to be perfect every step along the way
quotes.author: Shannon Miller

quotes.quote: Talent alone is not enough. I believe that a really good gymnast is 10% inspiration and 90% perspiration.
quotes.author: Vladislav Rastorotsky

quotes.quote: Gymnastics taught me everything - life lessons, responsibility and discipline and respect.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: Flexibility is the greatest strength.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: If you want to take it up a step and aim to become a competitive gymnast, you have to be mentally strong and prepared to take on the workload of going to the gym every day, rain or shine.
quotes.author: Shannon Miller

quotes.quote: Gymnastics, for me, gave me a lot of self-pride: that drive to want to be great at something for myself. But it also gave me a sense of appreciation toward God. Now that I'm getting older, I really appreciate the talents God gave me. Not just physically, but mentally and emotionally.
quotes.author: Amanda Borden

quotes.quote: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: There will be mistakes and there will falter. There will be things that are not a part of your plan. See the challenges in your life and accept them and embrace them.
quotes.author: Dominique Dawes

quotes.quote: It's amazing the gymnastics you can do when you don't want to do something. How you can force yourself against all the forces of nature. I threw myself backward.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: Happiness lies not in the mere possession of money it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: My message is to never quit, never give up. When you have a little trouble here and there, just keep fighting. In the end, it will pay off.
quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

quotes.quote: If you don't leap, you'll never know what it's like to fly.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Face your deficiencies and acknowledge them but do not let them master you. Let them teach you patience, sweetness, insight.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
quotes.author: Herbert Kaufman

quotes.quote: Failure is only postponed success as long as courage 'coaches' ambition. The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
quotes.author: Herbert Kaufman

quotes.quote: It’s called the pursuit of perfection. The pursuit is the idea that you’ll never be perfect in gymnastics but you can continue to pursue it as long as you’re doing it. I don’t think it’s possible to be perfect in gymnastics. It’s just one of those sports that you’re always trying to improve and pursue that perfection.
quotes.author: Jonathan Horton

quotes.quote: The truth is, gymnastics is a beautiful sport that has allowed me to grow and learn invaluable life lessons: sacrifice, dedication, discipline. Eventually, it led me to my voice.
quotes.author: Katelyn Ohashi

quotes.quote: Being able to do something that I love and be at such a high level of gymnastics is just amazing.
quotes.author: Laurie Hernandez

quotes.quote: The important thing is to be able, at any moment, to sacrifice what we are for what we could become.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: Discipline is the quality that carries over from gymnastics to acting.
quotes.author: Mitch Gaylord

quotes.quote: I don't run away from a challenge because I am afraid. Instead, I run toward it because the only way to escape fear is to trample it beneath your feet.
quotes.author: Nadia Comaneci

quotes.quote: Remember before the nineteen seventy-two Olympic Games I was total skinny, I was small, very strong, they may be don't like to see a gymnastics like that. I don't know but, gymnastics, might. Nineteen seventy-two supposed to be changed somewhere.
quotes.author: Olga Korbut

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid if things seem difficult in the beginning. That's only the initial impression. The important thing is not to retreat; you have to master yourself.
quotes.author: Olga Korbut

quotes.quote: Gymnastics uses every single part of your body, every little tiny muscle that you never even knew.
quotes.author: Shannon Miller

quotes.quote: Gymnastics is the type of sport where you can't take something that gives you more energy. Something may be great for the vault, but then you have the bars after it and you have to be more sedate for that.
quotes.author: Shannon Miller

quotes.quote: Everything is about your movements and precision and timing, which is what gymnastics is about.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: I think about my goals. There were a lot of times in gymnastics when I really didn't want to go in and train, but you can't make it to the Olympics if you don't train.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: As long as you've done your best, making mistakes doesn't matter. You and I are human we will mess up. What counts is learning from your mistakes and getting back up when life has knocked you down.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: Gymnastics is just one part of my life, and I'm having as much fun with it as possible.
quotes.author: Simone Biles

quotes.quote: Never mind what others do; do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day, and you are a success.
quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill
